[\[104a.2\]]rnam par byang bar sgro 'dogs pa yang med de/_kun nas nyon mongs pa nyid stong pa ste/_gang 'di la bzod pa de ni shin tu bzod pa'o/_/gang mya ngan las 'das par rtogs pa de la 'khor ba bsal ba yang med/_mya ngan las 'das par sgro 'dogs pa yang med de/_'khor ba nyid stong pa 
[\[104a.3\]]ste/_gang 'di la bzod pa de ni shin tu bzod pa'o/_/gang ma skyes pa/_ma bskyed pa/_ma byung ba/_ma phyung ba de la 'jig pa gang yang med do/_/'jig pa med pas na/_zad pa med de/_gang 'di la bzod pa de ni shin tu bzod pa'o/_/gang ma byas pa/_mngon par 'dus ma 
[\[104a.4\]]byas pa/_sgro btags pa med pa/_rnam par ma brtags pa/_ma bsgrubs pa/_ma bstan pa/_nye bar ma gtugs pa de la skye ba gang yang med de/_gang skye ba med pa de ni mi skye ba'o/_/gang mi skye ba de ni shin tu bzod pa'o/_/gang de ltar bzod pa de ni mi skye ba la bzod pa'o/_/
[\[104a.5\]]gang mi skye ba la bzod pa de ni skye ba med par bzod pa'o/_/gang skye ba med par bzod pa de ni shin tu bzod pa ste/_de ltar bzod pa rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni lung bstan pa'i bzod pa thob bo/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa mi 
[\[104a.6\]]zad pa zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pas bzod pa mi zad pa'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_byang chub sems dpa' blo gros 
[\[104a.7\]]mi zad pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/_sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_lha'i ba dan dag gis gtor to/_/sil snyan rnams kyang dkrol 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]te/_gang gis bzod pa mi zad pa 'di thos nas mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzod pa can du 'gyur ro zhes ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod do/_/ji tsam du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di byur 
[\[104b.2\]]bur yongs su gang bar gyur pa de tsam du de dag gi me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_lha'i ba dan de dag gtor to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems 
[\[104b.3\]]dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_lha'i ba dan 'di dag gi snod gyis shig_/blo gros mi zad pas 
[\[104b.4\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snod ni byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs bskyed pa'i slad du/_bdag gi lus lags te/_bdag gis bgyis lags so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa de'i tshe/_gzugs thams cad lus su 
[\[104b.5\]]'jug pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_de snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_lha'i 
[\[104b.6\]]ba dan de dag thams cad lte ba khung gi nang du song ste/_de'i lus la yang bri ba 'am gang bar yang mi mngon no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'dug pas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[104b.7\]]rigs kyi bu khyod ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas pas de snyed kyi me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_lha'i ba dan rnams khyod kyi lus su song yang khyod kyi lus la bri ba 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]'am/_gang bar yang mi mngon pa'i ting nge 'dzin de'i ming ci zhes bya/_blo gros mi zad pas smras pa/_rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming gzugs thams cad lus su 'jug pa zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' bkod pa chen pos smras pa/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[105a.2\]]ting nge 'dzin 'di'i yul ci/_blo gros mi zad pas smras pa/_rigs kyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gzugs su snang ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kho bo'i lus su bcug kyang /_kho bo'i lus kyi chos nyid la 'phel ba'am/_'bri ba med do/_/
[\[105a.3\]]de na 'khor de dag las byang chub sems dpa' dang /_lha dang /_mi kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag gis kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di'i mthu blta'o snyam pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi de dag gi bsam pa 
[\[105a.4\]]mkhyen nas/_byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di'i mthu ston cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pas ting nge 'dzin de la shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_
[\[105a.5\]]phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyang dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba rang gi lus su bcug ste/_bcug nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rgyan gyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bkod pa na byang chub 
[\[105a.6\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi longs spyod dang /_yongs su spyad pa ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i longs spyod dang /_yongs su spyad pa bstan to/_/thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yang byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa'i lus kyi nang du bdag nyid song ba snyam du shes so/_/de nas byang chub sems 
[\[105a.7\]]dpa' blo gros mi zad pas cho 'phrul chen po 'di bstan nas/_'khor de dag thams cad dang /_phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyang dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba phyir so so'i gnas su bzhag go/_/de nas byang chub 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]sems dpa' bkod pa chen pos/_byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin 'di'i mthu ngo mtshar to/_/blo gros mi zad pas smras pa/_rigs kyi bu kho bos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kho bo'i 
[\[105b.2\]]lus su bcug kyang /_kho bo'i lus kyi chos nyid la bri ba'am gang bar yang mi mngon no/_/bzod pa mi zad pa'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa dang /_cho 'phrul 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_lha dang /_mi'i skye dgu khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa drug bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[105b.3\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[105b.4\]]rnams kyi bzod pa mi zad pa 'di ni khyod kyis legs par smras na/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus mi zad pa la brtsams te/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus mi zad par 'gyur ba khyod spobs par gyis shig_/blo gros mi zad 
[\[105b.5\]]pas smras pa/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_brgyad po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par blangs pa ste/_brgyad po gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_go cha mi zad pa dang /_rtul ba mi zad pa dang /_yang dag par bsgrub pa mi zad pa dang /_sems 
[\[105b.6\]]can yongs su smin par byed pa mi zad pa dang /_bsod nams kyi tshogs mi zad pa dang /_ye shes kyi tshogs mi zad pa dang /_shes rab kyi tshogs mi zad pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i tshogs mi zad pa'o/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de la 
[\[105b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa'i go cha mi zad pa gang zhe na/_gang 'di 'khor ba na yongs su mi skyo ba ste/_de bskal pa 'di snyed cig tu go cha bgo'o/_/bskal pa 'di snyed cig tu go cha mi bgo'o zhes bskal pa bgrang bas byang chub mi tshol gyi/_go cha bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid gyon 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]par byed de/_gal te 'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' ji snyed pa de snyed kyis nyin zhag gcig tu gyur la/_de lta bu'i nyin zhag gis zhag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga zhing zla ba phyed/_zhag sum cu la zla ba ste/_zla ba bcu gnyis shing lor gyur la/_lo'i bgrang ba 'di lta bus lo stong 
[\[106a.2\]]phrag brgya la byang chub kyi sems gcig bskyed cing /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig mthong la 'jug pa de lta bu dang /_bgrang ba de 'dra bas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[106a.3\]]pa mthong bas sems can gcig gi sems kyi spyod pa shes kyang /_'jug pa de lta bu dang /_bgrang ba de 'dra bas sems can thams cad la yang de snyed de snyed kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas so so re rer sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi 
[\[106a.4\]]spyod pa shes kyang mi gong ba'i go cha'o/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'jug pa 'di nyid dang /_bgrang ba 'di nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la rim gro byed pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[106a.5\]]bya ba'i phyir 'jug pa 'di nyid dang /_bgrang ba 'di nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la rim gro byed pa dang /_de bzhin du bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin 
[\[106a.6\]]gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la rim gro byed pa dang /_de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa 
[\[106a.7\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la rim gro byed pa dang /_'jug pa 'di nyid dang /_bgrang ba 'di nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ba dang /_byang chub tu 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]sems bskyed pa de dag gis skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gcig mngon par bsgrub cing /_rnam grangs 'dis mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad yongs su 'grub pa mngon par sgrub par byed kyang mi gong ba'i go cha gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha mi zad pa zhes bya'o//_//
[\[106b.2\]]bam po gsum pa/_de la byang chub sems dpa'i rtul ba mi zad pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa'i rtul ba mi zad pa ni/_gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mes yongs su gang ba las kyang 'bogs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa blta bar spro ba'o/_/byang 
[\[106b.3\]]chub sems dpa'i rtul ba ni chos mnyan pa'i phyir spro ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i rtul ba ni/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir spro ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i rtul ba ni/_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad kyi phyir spro ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i rtul ba ni thams 
[\[106b.4\]]cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phyir spro ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i rtul ba ni/_pha rol gyi don gyi phyir 'jug pas na de'i phyir rtul ba zhes bya'o/_/pha rol zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/_pha rol 'dul ba'i phyir/_pha rol yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir 'jug pas na de'i phyir rtul ba 
[\[106b.5\]]zhes bya'o/_/mi lhod pa dang /_ma zhum pa dang /_brtan pa dang /_mi zlogs pa dang /_dge ba'i bsam pa dang /_snying rje chen po la gnas shing /_rtag tu sems can gyi don la brtson par 'jug pas na/_de'i phyir rtul ba zhes bya'o/_/gom pa 'dor ba dang /_gom 
[\[106b.6\]]pa gzhog cing 'gro ba thams cad du byang chub kyi sems mngon du byed do/_/sems can la lta bar yang lta zhing nyon mongs pa'i phyogs su yang mi ltung ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rtul ba mi zad pa zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par bsgrub pa mi zad pa gang 
[\[106b.7\]]zhe na/_gang ji lta bur dge ba'i sems skyes shing byung ba byang chub kyi phyir yongs su sngo bar byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par bsgrub pa mi zad pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir te/_byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]ni byang chub kyi snying po la ma 'dug gi bar du bar ma dor yongs su zad pa'am/_gtugs par 'gyur ba gang yang med do/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di lta ste dper na/_chu'i thigs pa rgya mtsho chen por ltung ba ni bskal pas ma bsregs kyi bar du bar ma dor 
[\[107a.2\]]yongs su zad pa'am/_gtugs par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang byang chub kyi snying po la ma 'dug gi bar du bar ma dor yongs su zad pa'am/_gtugs par 'gyur ba gang yang med do/_/yang dag par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba ni gang 
[\[107a.3\]]'di yang dag pa'i bsgrub pa ste/_yang dag par zhugs pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag yang dag par sgrub pa sems can thams cad bskyab pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba la gzud pa'i phyir/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 
[\[107a.4\]]yongs su sngo bar byed de/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba'i phyir/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba 
[\[107a.5\]]dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su sngo ba ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par bsgrub pa mi zad pa zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mi zad pa gang zhe na/_sems 
[\[107a.6\]]can gyi khams ni tshad med de/_de la byang chub sems dpas bgrang ba 'di lta bus 'jug par bya'o/_/gal te bdag gis nyin gcig la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ste/_tshul 'dis bskal pa dpag 
[\[107a.7\]]tu med grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab par sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par bya zhing /_sems can gyi khams de snyed du dpag tu med pa/_de snyed du grangs med pa/_de snyed du bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_de yongs su smin par bya ste/_de lta bur byas kyang sems can rnams 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]kyi brgya'i cha gcig kyang smin par ma byas/_stong gi cha dang /_brgya stong gi cha dang /_bye ba'i cha dang /_bye ba brgya'i cha dang /_bye ba stong gi cha dang /_bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang /_grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang /_rgyur yang yongs su smin par ma byas so zhes gal 
[\[107b.2\]]te rab tu brjod pa 'di thos nas byang chub sems dpa' mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de ni/_brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i byang chub sems dpar rig par bya ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mi zad pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems 
[\[107b.3\]]dpa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs mi zad pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams ni tshad med de/_de la byang chub sems dpas bgrang ba 'di 'dra bas 'jug par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad dang /_'das pa dang /_da ltar byung ba dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i slob pa dang /_
[\[107b.4\]]mi slob pa thams cad dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams ji snyed pa bsod nams de snyed brgyar bsgyur bas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la spu'i khung bu gcig 'grub bo/_/de bzhin du spu'i khung bu thams cad du gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung 
[\[107b.5\]]po ji snyed pa brgyar bsgyur te/_gtan pa med pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po gcig yang dag par bsgrubs pa des/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la dpe byad bzang po gcig 'grub ste/_de bzhin du dpe byad bzang po thams cad re re nas yongs su 'grub bo/_/dpe byad bzang po 
[\[107b.6\]]thams cad du gtogs pa'i tshad bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed pa stong du bsgyur te/_gtan pa med pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po gcig bsgrubs pa des/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gcig mngon par 'grub ste/_de bzhin du sku la skyes bu chen po'i 
[\[107b.7\]]mtshan sum cu re re nas mngon par 'grub bo/_/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cur gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed pa stong phrag bcur bsgyur te/_gtan pa med pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po gcig yang dag par bsgrubs pa des/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu skyes bu chen po'i mtshan mngon par 'grub bo/_/mdzod spur gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed pa de las stong phrag brgyar bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po yang dag par bsgrubs pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la dbu'i gtsug 
[\[108a.2\]]tor dang /_spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba skyes bu chen po'i mtshan mngon par 'grub bo/_/gtsug tor du gtogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de las bye ba phrag brgya stong du bsgyur ba de bas kyang lhag pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po yang dag par bsgrubs pa des/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[108a.3\]]chos kyi dung yongs su 'grub par 'gyur te/_chos kyi dung des de bzhin gshegs pa bzhed na/_'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag dbyangs kyis go bar mdzad cing /_chos 'dul ba bsam pa dang /_dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rnams kyang 
[\[108a.4\]]tshim par mdzad do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs la 'jug pa 'di thos nas mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs mi zad pa zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi tshogs mi zad pa gang zhe na/_
[\[108a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi tshogs ni tshad med de/_de la byang chub sems dpa'i bgrang ba 'di 'dra bas 'jug par bya'o/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes dang ldan 
[\[108a.6\]]par gyur kyang /_de dag gi chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_brgya stong gi cha dang /_bye ba'i cha dang /_bye ba brgya'i cha dang /_bye ba stong gi cha dang /_bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang /_grangs dang /_cha dang /_
[\[108a.7\]]bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang /_rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/de bzhin du chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes dang ldan pa rnams ni/_brgyad pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa la'o/_/brgyad pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa rnams ni/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa la'o/_/
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]rgyun du zhugs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa rnams ni/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i ye shes dang ldan pa la'o/_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i ye shes dang ldan pa rnams ni/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i ye shes dang ldan pa la'o/_/phyir mi 'ong ba'i ye shes dang ldan pa rnams ni/_dgra bcom pa'i 
[\[108b.2\]]ye shes dang ldan pa la'o/_/dgra bcom pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa rnams ni/_rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang ldan pa la'o/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang ldan pa rnams ni/_bskal pa brgyas nges par byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i brgya'i char 
[\[108b.3\]]yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/_dpe dang /_rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/bskal pa brgyas nges par 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes dang ldan pa rnams ni/_bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes dang ldan pa la'o/_/bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub 
[\[108b.4\]]sems dpa'i ye shes dang ldan pa rnams ni/_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes dang ldan pa la'o/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes dang ldan pa rnams ni/_skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i 
[\[108b.5\]]brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/_dpe dang /_rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes dang ldan par gyur 
[\[108b.6\]]kyang /_byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/_dpe dang /_rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag na sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag 
[\[108b.7\]]thams cad byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes dang ldan par gyur kyang /_de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/_rgyu dang dpe'i bar du 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad thams cad yongs su 'grub pa'i rim pa yang de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' gang ye shes kyi tshogs la 'jug pa 
[\[109a.2\]]'di thos nas/_mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi tshogs mi zad pa zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi tshogs mi zad pa gang zhe na/_gang sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la 'jug pa shes pa 
[\[109a.3\]]de ni shes rab kyi tshogs mi zad pa'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sems ji snyed pa de dag sems can gcig gi sems kyi 'jug pa gcig la yod par gyur la/_tshul 'dis sems can thams cad de snyed du tshad med 
[\[109a.4\]]pa'i sems kyis gang bar gyur te/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad sems can gcig gi sems gcig la yod par gyur la/_rnam grangs 
[\[109a.5\]]'dis sems can thams cad de snyed du tshad med pa'i nyon mongs pas gang ba'i sems su gyur na yang /_de la byang chub sems dpas gang shes rab kyi tshogs gcig bsgrubs pas/_sems can de dag gi sems su gtogs pa'i sems bskyed pa ji snyed pa'i sems bskyed pa de 
[\[109a.6\]]dag thams cad so so'i dmigs pa byung ste/_zhig cing zhu ba rnams shes par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i shes rab kyi tshogs bskyed par bya'o/_/shes rab des kyang sems can de dag gi sems su snang ba dang /_nyon mongs par snang ba dus gsum dang ldan pa gang yang mi shes pa med 
[\[109a.7\]]do/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' 'dis ma khyab pa gang yang med do/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab 'dis kyang sems can de dag gi sems su snang ba'am/_nyon mongs par snang ba dus gsum dang ldan pa de dag gsal 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]bar ma gyur pa'am yongs su mi shes pa med de/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi tshogs mi zad pa zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa'i tshogs mi zad pa gang zhe na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad 
[\[109b.2\]]bsags pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi tshogs bsags pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad bsags pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa'i tshogs mi zad pa'o/_/dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste/_byang chub kyi 
[\[109b.3\]]snying po la 'dug gi bar du/_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i dmigs pa dang /_sbyor ba bsags pa gang yin pa dge ba'i sems bskyed pa'i tshogs gang dag gis/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrubs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams 
[\[109b.4\]]cad yang dag par sgrub pa'i tshogs mi zad pa zhes bya ste/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par blang ba'o/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus mi zad pa gang 
[\[109b.5\]]lus kyi dge ba'i las kyi rten dang /_ngag gi dge ba'i las kyi rten dang /_yid kyi dge ba'i las kyi rten to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_brtson 'grus gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad lus dang /_ngag dang /_sems dang ldan pa'i phyir te/_lus dang /_ngag gi brtson 'grus 
[\[109b.6\]]pas sems kyi brtson 'grus nyid mchog ces bshad do/_/de la sems kyi brtson 'grus gang zhe na/_sems kyi 'jug pa dang /_sems gnas pa ste/_de la sems kyi 'jug pa gang zhe na/_gang byang chub kyi sems kyi rtsom pa'o/_/de la sems gnas pa gang zhe na/_gang 
[\[109b.7\]]byang chub kyi sems nye bar ma zhi ba'o/_/de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/_gang sems can rnams la snying rje che ba'o/_/sems gnas pa gang zhe na/_gang bdag med pa la bzod pa'o/_/de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/_gang sems can thams cad sdud pa'o/_/gnas pa gang zhe na/_gang 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa'o/_/de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/_gang 'khor ba na mi skyo ba'o/_/gnas pa gang zhe na/_khams gsum pa mi dmigs so/_/de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'o/_/gnas pa gang zhe na/_gang sbyin pas rlom 
[\[110a.2\]]sems su mi byed pa'o/_/de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/_gang bslab pa yang dag par len pa'o/_/gnas pa gang zhe na/_gang bslab pas rlom sems su mi byed pa'o/_/de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/_bzod cing mi mjed pa'o/_/gnas pa gang zhe na/_gang sems la rma mi phyin pa'o/_/de 
[\[110a.3\]]la 'jug pa gang zhe na/_gang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rtsom pa'o/_/gnas pa gang zhe na/_gang sems dben pa'o/_/de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/_gang bsam gtan yang dag par sgrub pa'o/_/gnas pa gang zhe na/_gang sems la nges par sems pa'o/_/de la 'jug pa 
[\[110a.4\]]gang zhe na/_gang thos pa la chog mi shes pa'o/_/gnas pa gang zhe na/_gang tshul bzhin sbyor ba'o/_/de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/_gang ji skad thos pa bzhin du chos ston pa'o/_/gnas pa gang zhe na/_gang brjod du med pa'i chos nyid do/_/de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/_gang shes 
[\[110a.5\]]rab kyi tshogs yongs su tshol ba'o/_/gnas pa gang zhe na/_gang spros pa shin tu chad pa'o/_/de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/_gang tshangs pa'i gnas pa rnams sogs pa'o/_/gnas pa gang zhe na/_gang yang dag pa'i shes pas btang snyoms pa'o/_/de la 'jug pa gang 
[\[110a.6\]]zhe na/_gang mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/_/gnas pa gang zhe na/_gang zag pa med pa la 'dris par byed pa'o/_/de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/_gang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa skyed pa'o/_/gnas pa gang zhe na/_gang dran pa yid la byed pa med pa'o/_/
[\[110a.7\]]de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/_gang yang dag par spong ba la sbyor ba'o/_/gnas pa gang zhe na/_gang dge ba dang mi dge ba'i sems dang bral ba'o/_/de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/_gang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa mngon par sgrub pa'o/_/gnas pa gang zhe na/_gang lhun gyis grub par bya ba la 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]'jug pa'o/_/de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/_gang dbang po la mkhas pa'o/_/gnas pa gang zhe na/_gang dbang po med pa'i chos la rtog pa'o/_/de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/_gang stobs yang dag par sgrub pa'o/_/gnas pa gang zhe na/_gang mi rdzi ba'i ye shes so/_/de la 
[\[110b.2\]]'jug pa gang zhe na/_gang byang chub kyi yan lag yang dag par 'byung ba'o/_/gnas pa gang zhe na/_gang chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa'i ye shes so/_/de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/_gang lam gyi tshogs tshol ba'o/_/gnas pa gang zhe na/_gang gar 
[\[110b.3\]]yang mi 'gro ba'o/_/de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/_gang zhi gnas tshol ba'o/_/gnas pa gang zhe na/_gang zhi gnas kyi sems zhi ba'o/_/de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/_gang lhag mthong spyod pa'o/_/gnas pa gang zhe na/_gang chos nyid shes pa'o/_/de la 'jug pa gang zhe 
[\[110b.4\]]na/_gang rgyur rtogs pa'o/_/gnas pa gang zhe na/_gang rgyu kun shes pa'o/_/de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/_gang gzhan gyi sgra thos pa'o/_/gnas pa gang zhe na/_gang chos la nan tan byed pa'o/_/de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/_lus kyi rgyan to/_/gnas pa gang zhe na/_
[\[110b.5\]]gang lus kyi chos nyid do/_/de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/_gang ngag gi rgyan to/_/gnas pa gang zhe na/_gang 'phags pa'i mi smra ba'o/_/de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/_gang rnam par thar pa gsum la mos pa'o/_/gnas pa gang zhe na/_gang byed pa med pa'o/_/de la 'jug pa 
[\[110b.6\]]gang zhe na/_gang bdud bzhi yongs su spong ba'o/_/gnas pa gang zhe na/_gang bag chags dang nyon mongs pa'i mtshams sbyor ba thams cad bsal ba'o/_/de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/_gang thabs su lta ba'o/_/gnas pa gang zhe na/_gang shes rab tu lta ba'o/_/de la 
[\[110b.7\]]'jug pa gang zhe na/_gang rtsom par lta ba'o/_/gnas pa gang zhe na/_gang nyams su lon par byed pa'o/_/de la 'jug pa gang zhe na/_gang brdar lta ba'o/_/gnas pa gang zhe na/_gang don dam par lta ba ste/_'di ni sems kyi brtson 'grus zhes bya'o/_/de la sems 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]kyi brtson 'grus mi zad pa de yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/_gang 'jug pa thams cad gnas pa dang /_mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba dang /_de mtshan ma'i las thams cad du yang 'jug la/_ye shes kyi las la yang gnas pa ste/_de las thams 
[\[111a.2\]]cad kyang ye shes kyi bya ba byed do/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi las gang zhe na/_gang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu dang /_sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i rgyur 'dus byas su yang mi gtong zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rgyur 'dus ma byas su mi ltung ba ste/_'di ni 
[\[111a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi zad pa zhes bya'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi zad pa 'di bstan pa na/_lha dang /_mi'i skye dgu khrag khrig bdun cu rtsa drug bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/byang chub 
[\[111a.4\]]sems dpa' stong phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus mi zad pa 'di ni/_
[\[111a.5\]]khyod kyis legs par smras na/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan mi zad pa la brtsams te/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsam gtan mi zad par 'gyur ba khyod spobs par gyis shig_/blo gros mi zad pas smras pa/_btsun pa sha 
[\[111a.6\]]ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi zad pa ni/_rnam pa bcu drug ste/_de ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad la med do/_/de la rnam pa bcu drug po dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[111a.7\]]bsam gtan yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni de la ma chags pa'o/_/bdag bde ba la ma chags pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni ro myang ba med pa'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi nyon 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]mongs pa spang ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni snying rje chen po la dmigs pa'o/_/'dod pa'i khams su dmigs pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni ting nge 'dzin ldog pa'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa kun 
[\[111b.2\]]shes pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni mngon par shes pa yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'o/_/sems kyi dbang phyug shes pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni sems las su rung ba'o/_/gzugs dang /_gzugs med pa'i 
[\[111b.3\]]khams zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni/_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_ldang ba thams cad shes pa'o/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 
[\[111b.4\]]snyoms par 'jug pa zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni/_zhi ba dang /_rab tu zhi ba'o/_/shin tu mthar thug pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni mi 'khrugs pa'o/_/nyon mongs pa dang bag chags 
[\[111b.5\]]kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad legs par 'joms pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni log par bsgrub pa'i gnyen po'o/_/'jig rten thams cad las bsgral ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni shes rab la 'jug pa'o/_/
[\[111b.6\]]sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni/_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa sngon du 'gro ba'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan mi zad pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 
[\[111b.7\]]bsam gtan ni/_dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi gcod pa'o/_/rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni ma nyams pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]rnams kyi bsam gtan ni/_chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i ye shes so/_/ye shes kyi bdag nyid che ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan ni nam mkha' khyab pa ste/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di ni byang chub sems 
[\[112a.2\]]dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa bcu drug ste/_gang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams la med pa'o/_/de la bsam gtan yongs su sbyang ba gang zhe na/_gang mngon par shes pa dang /_ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa'o/_/de la mngon par 
[\[112a.3\]]shes pa ni gang /_ye shes ni gang zhe na/_gang gis gzugs su snang ba thams cad mthong ba 'di ni mngon par shes pa zhes bya'o/_/gang gis gzugs thams cad kyi chos nyid mi zad par shes kyang /_mi zad pa'i chos mngon sum du mi byed pa 'di ni ye shes zhes bya'o/_/
[\[112a.4\]]gang gi sgrar grag pa thams cad thob pa de ni mngon par shes pa zhes bya'o/_/gang sgra thams cad sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' brjod du med par shes pa 'di ni ye shes zhes bya'o/_/gang gis sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams shes pa 'di ni mngon par 
[\[112a.5\]]shes pa zhes bya'o/_/gang sems 'gog par shes la sems 'gog pa mngon sum du yang mi byed pa 'di ni ye shes zhes bya'o/_/gang sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' rjes su dran pa 'di ni mngon par shes pa zhes bya'o/_/gang dus gsum la ma chags par shes pa 
[\[112a.6\]]'di ni ye shes zhes bya'o/_/gang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing du 'gro ba 'di ni mngon par shes pa zhes bya'o/_/gang gis zhing nam mkha' dang mtshungs par shes pa 'di ni ye shes zhes bya'o/_/gang dbyer med pa'i chos 'dod pa 'di ni mngon par shes pa zhes bya'o/_/gang 
[\[112a.7\]]chos thams cad mnyam par mthong ba'i shes pa 'di ni ye shes zhes bya'o/_/gang 'jig rten thams cad dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid 'di ni mngon par shes pa zhes bya'o/_/gang 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad dang ma 'dres par shes pa 'di ni ye shes zhes bya'o/_/gang brgya byin dang /_
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba rnams zil gyis gnon pa 'di ni mngon par shes pa zhes bya'o/_/gang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyi bor shes pa 'di ni ye shes zhes bya ste/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan 
[\[112b.2\]]yongs su sbyang ba zhes bya'o/_/yang sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang /_sems g.yeng ba ji snyed par byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi tshogs dang /_sems gzhag pa shes pa'ang de snyed de/_sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang /_sems g.yeng ba 
[\[112b.3\]]ji snyed pa de snyed du/_byang chub sems dpas kyang bsam gtan gyi tshogs yang dag par bsgrub par bya'o/_/mnyam pa nyid de la gnas pas na/_de'i phyir mnyam par gzhag pa zhes bya'o/_/sems can mnyam pa nyid dang /_sems mnyam pa nyid dang /_bsam pa mnyam pa nyid 
[\[112b.4\]]dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_sbyor ba mnyam pa nyid dang /_sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab mnyam pa nyid dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du gnas pas na/_
[\[112b.5\]]de'i phyir mnyam par gzhag pa zhes bya'o/_/ting nge 'dzin gang dang mnyam pa byang chub kyang de dang mnyam mo/_/byang chub gang dang mnyam pa sems can thams cad kyang de dang mnyam mo/_/sems can thams cad gang dang mnyam pa chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam ste/_mnyam pa 
[\[112b.6\]]nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas na/_de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/byang chub gang dang mnyam pa stong pa'ang de dang mnyam mo/_/stong pa nyid gang dang mnyam pa sems can thams cad kyang de dang mnyam mo/_/sems can thams cad gang dang mnyam pa/_chos thams 
[\[112b.7\]]cad kyang de dang mnyam ste/_mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas na/_de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/stong pa nyid gang dang mnyam pa mtshan ma med pa yang de dang mnyam mo/_/mtshan ma med pa gang dang mnyam pa/_sems can thams cad kyang de dang mnyam mo/_/
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]sems can thams cad gang dang mnyam pa chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam ste/_mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas na/_de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/mtshan ma med pa gang dang mnyam pa smon pa med pa'ang de dang mnyam mo/_/smon pa med 
[\[113a.2\]]pa gang dang mnyam pa sems can thams cad kyang de dang mnyam mo/_/sems can thams cad gang dang mnyam pa chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam ste/_mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas na/_de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/smon pa med pa gang dang mnyam pa 
[\[113a.3\]]mngon par 'du mi byed pa'ang de dang mnyam mo/_/mngon par 'du mi byed pa gang dang mnyam pa/_sems can thams cad kyang de dang mnyam mo/_/sems can thams cad gang dang mnyam pa/_chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam ste/_mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas na/_
[\[113a.4\]]de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/mngon par 'du mi byed pa gang dang mnyam pa mi skye ba'ang de dang mnyam mo/_/mi skye ba gang dang mnyam pa sems can thams cad kyang de dang mnyam mo/_/sems can thams cad gang dang mnyam pa chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam ste/_
[\[113a.5\]]mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas na/_de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/mi skye ba gang dang mnyam pa mi 'byung ba'ang de dang mnyam mo/_/mi 'byung ba gang dang mnyam pa sems can thams cad kyang de dang mnyam mo/_/sems can thams cad gang dang mnyam pa 
[\[113a.6\]]chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam ste/_mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas na/_de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/mi 'byung ba gang dang mnyam pa dngos po med pa'ang de dang mnyam mo/_/dngos po med pa gang dang mnyam pa sems can thams cad kyang de dang mnyam 
[\[113a.7\]]mo/_/sems can thams cad gang dang mnyam pa chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam ste/_mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas na/_de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/dngos po med pa gang dang mnyam pa rnam par dag pa'ang de dang mnyam mo/_/rnam par dag pa 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]gang dang mnyam pa sems can thams cad kyang de dang mnyam mo/_/sems can thams cad gang dang mnyam pa chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam ste/_mnyam pa nyid de la snyoms par zhugs pas na/_de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/rang gi sems mnyam pa sems 
[\[113b.2\]]can thams cad kyi sems mnyam pa nyid de la zhugs pas na/_de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/phan par byed pa dang /_phan par mi byed pa thams cad la snyoms shing /_sa dang mnyam pa'i sems/_chu dang mnyam pa'i sems/_me dang mnyam pa'i sems/_rlung 
[\[113b.3\]]dang mnyam pa'i sems/_nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems te/_mi mtho mi dma' bar gnas shing mi g.yo bar gyur pa/_spyod lam thams cad du mnyam par gzhag pa/_spyod lam ma bcos pa/_rang bzhin gyis snyoms par zhugs pa/_mi rgod pa dang /_mi g.yeng ba/_
[\[113b.4\]]mu cor mi smra ba/_tshig ma 'chal pa/_don shes pa/_chos shes pa/_dus shes pa/_tshod shes pa/_dus min shes pa/_'jig rten thams cad kyi rjes su snyegs shing /_'jig rten dang ma 'dres pa/_'jig rten gyi chos brgyad las 'das pa/_nyon mongs pa thams cad 
[\[113b.5\]]dang ma 'dres pa/_'du 'dzi'i nang na yang spyod lam dben pa ste/_de lta bu'i chos la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni mnyam par bzhag pa'i gnas kyang mi 'dor la/_'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad du yang snang ste/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[113b.6\]]thabs dang /_shes rab kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i thabs ni gang /_shes rab ni gang zhe na/_gang byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par ma bzhag pa na/_sems can la lta ba'i phyir/_snying rje chen po'i 
[\[113b.7\]]dmigs pa la sems 'dogs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i thabs zhes bya'o/_/gang zhi ba dang rab tu zhi bas bsam gtan du byed pa 'di ni de'i shes rab bo/_/gang byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par bzhag pa na/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la rton pa 'di ni de'i thabs so/_/gang 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]chos gang la yang mi gnas par bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni de'i shes rab bo/_/gang byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par gzhog pa na/_dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba la lta ba 'di ni de'i thabs so/_/gang chos kyi dbyings dbyer med par bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni 
[\[114a.2\]]de'i shes rab bo/_/gang byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par gzhog pa'i tshe/_sangs rgyas kyi sku'i rgyan mngon du byed pa 'di ni de'i thabs so/_/gang chos kyi sku dbyer med par bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni de'i shes rab bo/_/gang byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par gzhog pa na/_sangs 
[\[114a.3\]]rgyas kyi gsung tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs la sems pa de ni de'i thabs so/_/gang chos nyid brjod du med par bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni de'i shes rab bo/_/gang byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par gzhog pa na/_sems rdo rje lta bur byin gyis rlob pa 'di ni de'i thabs so/_/gang rang 
[\[114a.4\]]bzhin gyis g.yeng ba med par bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni de'i shes rab bo/_/gang mnyam par gzhog pa na/_sngon gyi smon lam gyis sems can yongs su smin par byin gyis rlob pa 'di ni de'i thabs so/_/gang sems can thams cad la bdag med par bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni de'i 
[\[114a.5\]]shes rab bo/_/gang mnyam par gzhog pa na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la lhag par dmigs te/_bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni de'i thabs so/_/gang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gnas nam mkha' dang mtshungs par bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni de'i shes rab bo/_/gang mnyam par gzhog 
[\[114a.6\]]pa na/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa mngon du byed pa 'di ni de'i thabs so/_/gang zhig nam mkha' dang mtshungs par bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni de'i shes rab bo/_/gang mnyam par gzhog pa na/_byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dmigs pa mngon du byed pa 'di ni de'i 
[\[114a.7\]]thabs so/_/gang nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni de'i shes rab bo/_/gang mnyam par gzhog pa na/_chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar 'dod pa 'di ni de'i thabs so/_/gang bskor ba'ang med/_mi bskor ba'ang med par bsam gtan 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]byed pa 'di ni de'i shes rab bo/_/gang byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par gzhog pa na/_byang chub kyi yan lag gi tshogs la rnam par mi g.yeng ba mngon du byed pa 'di ni de'i thabs so/_/gang nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 
[\[114b.2\]]kyis mkhyen pa sems dang ldan pa dang /_sems dang mi ldan pa dang /_'du shes med pa dang /_'du shes yongs su shes pa ji snyed pa de dag yongs su bsal ba'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi nges par gyur pa dang /_'thun par bsam gtan byed pa 'di ni 
[\[114b.3\]]de'i shes rab ste/_de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi zad pa yin no/_/bdud thams cad kyis kyang de la glags mi rnyed cing /_de la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi snod kyang nye bar gnas pa yin te/_thams cad mkhyen 
[\[114b.4\]]pa'i ye shes kyang 'thob bo/_/bsam gtan mi zad pa zhi ba 'di bstan pa na/_byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong nyi ma'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/_/ci'i phyir ting nge 'dzin de nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dper na nyi ma 'char ba na zla ba dang /_
[\[114b.5\]]skar ma'i sgron ma dang /_mar me'i sgron ma dang /_rtswa'i me'i sgron ma thams cad mog mog por 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin thob na/_ma rabs dang /_nyi tshe ba'i shes rab thams cad shes rab kyi snang bas zil gyis mnan te/_
[\[114b.6\]]slob pa dang /_mi slob pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi shes rab dang /_de ma yin pa gzhan sems can phal pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyang shes rab kyi snang bas zil gyis gnon pas na/_de'i phyir nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya'o/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[114b.7\]]gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/_ting nge 'dzin rnam pa mang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma mngon par bsgrubs te/_de dag la phyogs tsam zhig bstan to/_/glog gi sgron mas brgyan dang zla ba'i 'od/_/dge bkod rnam snang de bzhin bsam mi khyab/_/'phags par snang dang dri 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]ma med pa dang /_/chos rnams kun la dbang byed yon tan 'od/_/mya ngan med dang brtul zhugs grub pa dang /_/grags pa brtan dang kun nas 'phags pa dang /_/chos kyi sgron ma chos dpal lhun po che/_/chos kyi dbang phyug chos shes dbang byed dang /_/chos kyi 
[\[115a.2\]]phung po rnam par 'thor ba dang /_/chos rnams 'dzin pa rnam par dag pa dang /_/pha rol sems kyi spyod par spyod pa dang /_/rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan nyon mongs sel/_/bdud bzhi'i stobs rnams rab tu 'joms pa dang /_/stobs bcu 'phags pa stobs dang ldan pa dang /_/chags 
[\[115a.3\]]med chags pa shin tu gcod pa dang /_/lag na sgron ma shin tu sgra bsgrags pa dang /_/sa 'dzin dang ni brtan pa'i rang bzhin dang /_/lhun po sgron ma mi pham rgyal ba dang /_/shes rab skyed dang ye shes ta la la/_/bsam gtan 'byung gnas mtha' yas dbang byed dang /_/sems rnams 
[\[115a.4\]]las su rung bar byed pa dang /_/byed dang byas dang tshor byed med pa dang /_/chu yi zla ba nyi ma'i dbyangs dag dang /_/ting 'dzin mi gtong bdud rnams 'joms pa dang /_/rnam pa sna tshogs 'du shes med pa dang /_/stag dang glang po shin tu dul ba dang /_/rgyal ba kun gyi rjes su dran 
[\[115a.5\]]pa dang /_/chos dran dge 'dun ye shes dbang byed dang /_/mi zlogs pa dang ldog pa med pa dang /_/mig mi 'dzums dang bdag med rab dag dang /_/rtag tu stong pa'i rnam par 'jug pa dang /_/rtag tu mtshan med rtag tu mi smon dang /_/gnas par bsam gtan byed pa mi chags 
[\[115a.6\]]dang /_/rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin ces bya'o/_/mngon par 'phags dang nges par bcom pa dang /_/kun nas 'khyil dang rnam par dag pa dang /_/nges par sems dang nyon mongs bral ba dang /_/yangs pa nam mkha' lta bu zhes kyang bya/_/gzud pa dang ni yon tan 'jug pa dang /_/
[\[115a.7\]]dran rtogs blo gros shes rab sgrub pa dang /_/spobs pa dag ni mi zad phyed pa dang /_/sgra ston pa dang bden pa mthong ba dang /_/'dzin pa zhes kyang bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_/chud mi za dang legs byas sbyin pa dang /_/'gro ba tshim par byed dang bltar mi mthong /_/rab tu rtogs dang 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]dga' mgu skyed pa dang /_/byams pa 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin dag dang /_/snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba bsam dag pa/_/dga' ba'i rnam pa dag la 'jug pa dang /_/btang snyoms gnyis la chags las grol ba dang /_/chos don chos byed ye shes ta la la/_/mi 'khrugs pa dang ye 
[\[115b.2\]]shes rgya mtsho dang /_/'gro ba tshim byed rnam par dul ba dang /_/rnam par grol ba'i ye shes dbang byed dang /_/rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan snying po'i pad ma dang /_/pad ma 'das dang 'jig rten chos bral dang /_/mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang /_/rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dag dang /_/
[\[115b.3\]]dpa' bar 'gro zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_/sangs rgyas dgongs dang de bzhin mi 'khrugs dang /_/gzi brjid can dang gzi brjid 'od zer dang /_/rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mchog sbyin dang /_/sangs rgyas rgyan rnams shin tu bkod pa dang /_/kun tu snang dang sangs rgyas zhing dag 
[\[115b.4\]]dang /_/sems can bsam par rab tu 'jug pa dang /_/mgu byed shin tu mgu byed ting 'dzin dang /_/byang chub lam gyi rjes su 'thun pa dang /_/pha rol phyin brgyan gtsug na rin po che/_/byang chub yan lag me tog sbyin pa dang /_/rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu sbyin pa ste/_/mi 
[\[115b.5\]]'chi dbyangs dang dmigs med rlung bzhin 'gro/_/rin chen mtha' dang rgya mtsho'i shugs 'dzin dang /_/ri dang brag rnams rdob par byed pa dang /_/rdzu 'phrul don chen yang dag skyed pa dang /_/sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa mthong ba dang /_/thos pa thams cad 'dzin dang mi g.yeng dang /_/
[\[115b.6\]]skad cig gcig la ye shes sbyin pa dang /_/yon tan mtha' yas rgya mtsho rnam par dag_/de ltar ting 'dzin 'di dag mtha' yas dpag med de/_/bsam gtan bye ba khrag khrig dag gi pha rol song /_/byang chub sems dpa' dam pa mchog rab 'jigs med pa/_/brtan mchog 
[\[115b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po ting 'dzin rnam dag rtogs/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan mi zad pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan mi zad pa 'di ni khyod kyis legs par smras na/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab mi zad pa la brtsams te/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams shes rab mi zad par 'gyur ba khyod spobs par 
[\[116a.2\]]gyis shig_/blo gros mi zad pas smras pa/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyang mi zad pa yin te/_shes rab de'i rnam pa ni ji lta bu/_'jug pa ni ci zhe na/_thos pa ni rnam pa'o/_/tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ni 'jug pa'o/_/thos 
[\[116a.3\]]pa'i yang rnam pa ni ci lta bu/_'jug pa ni ci zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thos pa'i rnam pa ni ci zhe na/_brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ste/_'di lta ste/_'dun pa'i rnam pa dang /_bsam pa'i rnam pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa'i rnam pa dang /_sbyor ba'i rnam pa dang /_dge 
[\[116a.4\]]ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rnam pa dang /_nga rgyal med pa'i rnam pa dang /_bag yod pa'i rnam pa dang /_gus par byed pa'i rnam pa dang /_'thun par 'dzin pa'i rnam pa dang /_bka' blo bde ba'i rnam pa dang /_bsnyen bkur byed pa'i rnam pa dang /_rna ba blags te nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_
[\[116a.5\]]yid la byed pa'i rnam pa dang /_rnam par mi g.yeng ba'i rnam pa dang /_gnas kyi rnam pa dang /_rin po cher 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang /_sman du 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i rnam pa dang /_dran pa'i snod kyi rnam pa dang /_rtogs 
[\[116a.6\]]pa shes pa'i rnam pa dang /_blo gros 'dod pa'i rnam pa dang /_blo la 'jug pa'i rnam pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos la mi ngoms par nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_gtong ba spel ba'i rnam pa dang /_dul zhing cang shes pa'i rnam pa dang /_mang du thos pa la bsten pa'i rnam pa dang /_bsti 
[\[116a.7\]]stang du byas te dga' ba myong bar byed pa'i rnam pa dang /_lus bde ba'i rnam pa dang /_sems rab tu dga' ba'i rnam pa dang /_mi skyo bar nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_don nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_chos nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_nan tan nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_gzhan gyis bstan pa nyan 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]pa'i rnam pa dang /_chos ma thos pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_mngon par shes pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa med pa'i rnam pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po nyan pa'i 
[\[116b.2\]]rnam pa dang /_thabs mkhas pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_tshangs pa'i gnas nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_dran pa dang shes bzhin nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_skye ba la mkhas pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_mi skye ba la mkhas pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_mi sdug pa'i rnam pa dang /_byams pa'i 
[\[116b.3\]]rnam pa dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rnam pa dang /_mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang /_bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang /_zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /_stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang /_mngon par 
[\[116b.4\]]'du mi byed pa'i rnam pa dang /_dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa'i rnam pa dang /_bden pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnam pa dang /_chud mi gzon pa'i rnam pa dang /_rang gi kha na las pa'i rnam pa dang /_rang gi sems srung ba'i rnam pa dang /_brtson 'grus mi gtong ba'i rnam pa dang /_chos 
[\[116b.5\]]la nges par sems pa'i rnam pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po'i rnam pa dang /_rang gi phyogs srung ba'i rnam pa dang /_pha rol gyi phyogs dang /_nyon mongs pa tshar gcod pa'i rnam pa dang /_nor bdun yang dag par 'du ba'i rnam pa dang /_dbul ba thams cad tshar gcod pa'i 
[\[116b.6\]]rnam pa dang /_mdzangs pas bsngags pa'i rnam pa dang /_mkhas pa mngon par dga' ba'i rnam pa dang /_'phags pas kun shes pa'i rnam pa dang /_'phags pa ma yin pa dad par byed pa'i rnam pa dang /_bden pa mthong ba'i rnam pa dang /_phung po'i skyon rnam par spang 
[\[116b.7\]]ba'i rnam pa dang /_'dus byas yongs su 'jal ba'i rnam pa dang /_don la rton pa'i rnam pa dang /_chos la rton pa'i rnam pa dang /_ye shes la rton pa'i rnam pa dang /_nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa'i rnam pa dang /_sdig pa thams cad mi bya ba'i rnam pa dang /_bdag 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]dang gzhan la phan pa'i rnam pa dang /_legs par byas pa'i las kyi rnam pa dang /_mi 'gyod pa'i rnam pa dang /_khyad par du 'gro ba'i rnam pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'thob pa'i rnam pa ste/_de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thos pa rnam pa 
[\[117a.2\]]brgyad cu rtsa bzhi zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la 'jug pa ni sum cu rtsa gnyis te/_sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_zhi gnas kyi gnas la 'jug pa dang /_lhag mthong la rnam par dpyod pa'i 
[\[117a.3\]]'jug pa dang /_sems las su rung ba'i 'jug pa dang /_lus dben pa la 'jug pa dang /_sems dben pa la 'jug pa dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pa dang /_bden pa'i rjes su 'thun pa la 'jug pa dang /_chad pa med pa la 'jug pa dang /_rtag pa med 
[\[117a.4\]]pa la 'jug pa dang /_rgyu dang rkyen la 'jug pa dang /_bdag med pa dang /_sems can med pa dang /_srog med pa dang /_gang zag med pa la 'jug pa dang /_'ong ba dang /_'gro ba dang /_gnas med pa la 'jug pa dang /_mi 'pho zhing rgyu dang 'bras bu chud mi za ba la 'jug 
[\[117a.5\]]pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa la 'dris par byed pa la 'jug pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa la mngon sum du mi byed pa la 'jug pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 
[\[117a.6\]]'jug pa skyed pa'i tshul la 'jug pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye ba la 'jug pa dang /_mngon par shes pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa dang /_zag pa zad pa'i ye shes mngon sum du byed pa ma yin pa la 'jug pa dang /_nang 
[\[117a.7\]]du rtog pa la 'jug pa dang /_nges par gyur par mi 'jug pa la 'jug pa dang /_'dus byas kyi skyon yongs su 'jal ba la 'jug pa dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos mngon sum du mi byed par 'jug pa dang /_sems can thams cad la bdag med par so sor rtog pa la 'jug pa dang /_
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]snying rje chen po mi gtong ba la 'jug pa dang /_skye ba thams cad 'jig par lta ba la 'jug pa dang /_rtag tu bsams bzhin du shes pas srid pa thams cad yongs su 'dzin par 'jug pa dang /_yid byung zhing 'dod chags dang bral ba'i 'jug pa dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos kyang 
[\[117b.2\]]mngon sum du mi byed par 'jug pa dang /_'dod pa'i dga' ba'i yon tan yal bar 'dor ba la 'jug pa dang /_chos kyi dga' ba mi gtong ba la 'jug pa dang /_spros pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad spong ba la 'jug pa dang /_thabs mkhas pa'i spros pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa 
[\[117b.3\]]mi spong bar 'jug pa ste/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la 'jug pa sum cu rtsa gnyis zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang tshul bzhin zhes bya ba de ni rigs pa'i tshig go/_/de ni tshul gyi tshig go/_/
[\[117b.4\]]de ni sgo'i tshig go/_/de ni kha'i tshig go/_/de ni rgyu'i tshig go/_/de ni rkyen gyi tshig go/_/de ni mi 'gog pa'i tshig go/_/de ni mi 'gal ba'i tshig go/_/de ni btang snyoms kyi tshig go/_/de ni len pa med pa'i tshig go/_/de ni dor ba med pa'i tshig go/_/de ni rkyen med pa'i tshig go/_/de ni rten pa 
[\[117b.5\]]med pa'i tshig go/_/de ni mi gnas pa'i tshig go/_/de ni ma g.yos pa'i tshig go/_/de ni rnam par ma g.yos pa'i tshig go/_/de ni sgro btags pa med pa'i tshig go/_/de ni mnyam pa nyid kyi tshig go/_/de ni mi mnyam pa med pa'i tshig go/_/de ni bden pa'i tshig go/_/de ni yang dag pa'i 
[\[117b.6\]]tshig go/_/de ni mi 'gyur ba'i tshig go/_/de ni phyir bya ba med pa'i tshig go/_/de ni zhi ba'i tshig go/_/de ni rab tu zhi ba'i tshig go/_/de ni nye bar zhi ba'i tshig go/_/de ni spros pa med pa'i tshig go/_/de ni blang ba med pa'i tshig go/_/de ni gzhag pa med pa'i tshig go/_/de ni ma tshang ba med 
[\[117b.7\]]pa'i tshig go/_/de ni lhag pa med pa'i tshig go/_/de ni phyir dbyung du med pa'i tshig go/_/de ni gnyen po med pa'i tshig go/_/de ni dam pa'i tshig go/_/de ni de kho na'i tshig go/_/de ni de bzhin nyid kyi tshig go/_/de ni ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi tshig go/_/de ni gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]nyid kyi tshig go/_/de ni ji lta ba bzhin gyi tshig go/_/de ni chud mi za ba'i tshig go/_/de ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i tshig go/_/de ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi tshig go/_/de ni dus gsum yongs su ma chad pa'i tshig go/_/de ni gzugs la rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa'i 
[\[118a.2\]]tshig go/_/de ni tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa la rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa'i tshig go/_/de ni sa'i khams la rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa'i tshig go/_/de bzhin du de ni chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams la rnam 
[\[118a.3\]]par shes pa mi gnas pa'i tshig go/_/de ni mig dang /_gzugs dang /_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas pa'i tshig go/_/de bzhin du de ni rna ba dang /_sgra dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_sna dang /_dri dang /_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams 
[\[118a.4\]]dang /_lce dang /_ro dang /_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_lus dang /_reg bya dang /_lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang /_yid dang /_chos dang /_yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la mi gnas pa'i tshig go/_/de ni don la rton pa'i tshig go/_/de ni chos 
[\[118a.5\]]la rton pa'i tshig go/_/de ni ye shes la rton pa'i tshig go/_/de ni nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa'i tshig go/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang tshul bzhin zhes bya ba de ni chos thams cad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ji ltar bdag la bdag med pa de bzhin du/_chos thams 
[\[118a.6\]]cad rigs pas mthong zhing /_ji ltar sems can la bdag med pa de bzhin du chos thams cad rigs pas mthong na/_de ltar mthong ba na tshul bzhin mthong ba'o/_/'khor ba'i khams kyi tshul bzhin gang yin pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi tshul bzhin yang de yin no 
[\[118a.7\]]zhes gang gis de ltar mtshungs shing bye brag med par mthong ba de ni/_tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor ba zhes bya'o/_/gang gis kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin dang /_rnam par byang ba'i rang bzhin mtshungs shing bye brag med par mthong ba de ni/_tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor ba zhes bya'o/_/gang 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]rigs pa dang /_mi rigs par mi sems pa de ni tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor ba yin te/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_mdor na byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin sbyor ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi gnas ni sems can no/_/de sems can gyi gnas kyang mi spong la/_chos kyi gnas 
[\[118b.2\]]kyang 'khrugs par mi byed de/_de ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin la 'jug pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de ltar de'i chos kyi rnam pa dang /_thos pa'i rnam pa dang /_tshul bzhin la 'jug pa'i sbyor ba'i rgyu 'thun pa de ni shes rab ces bya'o/_/de la shes 
[\[118b.3\]]rab ni 'grogs pa bcu drug dang lhan cig mi gnas te/_bcu drug po dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ma rig pa'i 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/de bzhin du 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug dang /_reg pa dang /_tshor 
[\[118b.4\]]ba dang /_sred pa dang /_len pa dang /_srid pa dang /_skye ba dang /_rga shi'i 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/ma rig pa 'gog pa'i 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/de bzhin du 'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_ming dang gzugs dang /_skye mched drug 
[\[118b.5\]]dang /_reg pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_sred pa dang /_len pa dang /_srid pa dang /_skye ba dang /_rga shi 'gog pa'i 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/'jig tshogs la lta ba'i 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas/_'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtsa ba las byung bar lta 
[\[118b.6\]]bar gyur pa drug cu rtsa gnyis po'i bar dag gi 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/mthon dman gyi 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas/_'jig rten gyi chos rnyed pa dang /_ma rnyed pa dang /_snyan pa dang /_mi snyan pa dang /_smad pa dang /_bstod pa dang /_bde ba dang /_
[\[118b.7\]]sdug bsngal gyi bar gyi 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/khro ba dang /_khon du 'dzin pa dang /_'chab pa dang /_yongs su gdung ba dang /_phrag dog dang /_ser sna dang /_sgyu dang /_g.yo dang /_ngo tsha med pa dang /_khrel med pa dang /_khengs pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]rgyags pa dang /_bag med pa dang /_nga rgyal dang /_lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang /_nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang /_nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang /[ {]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang /_mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang /_log pa'i nga rgyal rnams kyi 'grogs pa dang lhan cig 
[\[119a.2\]]mi gnas pa nas/_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi bar gyi 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi kun nas ldang ba phra mo dang /_sbom po dang /_chung ngu dang /_'bring dang /_chen po'i 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas 
[\[119a.3\]]nyon mongs pa'i kun nas ldang ba thams cad kyi bar gyi 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/gti mug gi mun pa dang /_rab rib kyi ling tog dang /_sgrib pa dang /_chod pa'i 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas/_nyams par 'gyur ba'i cha dang 'thun pa'i chos kun nas 
[\[119a.4\]]ldang ba thams cad kyi bar gyi 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/'dod pa dang /_thab mo'i rnyog pa dang /_phung po dang /_nyon mongs pa dang /_'chi bdag dang /_lha'i bu'i bdud rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas/_bdud kyi las thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig mi gnas 
[\[119a.5\]]so/_/bdag dang /_sems can dang /_srog dang /_gso ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_shed las skyes dang /_shed bur 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas/_'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/
[\[119a.6\]]las kyi sgrib pa dang /_chos kyi sgrib pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /_lta ba'i sgrib pa dang /_'gro ba'i sgrib pa dang /_rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa dang /_shes pa'i sgrib pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas/_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig 
[\[119a.7\]]mi gnas so/_/rtog pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa dang /_yongs su rtog pa dang /_mtshan ma dang /_dmigs pa dang /_mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_bye brag phyed pa dang /_rnam par rig pa rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas mdud pa dang /_sgro btags pa thams cad kyi 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]bar dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/bdag dang /_rtag pa dang /_gtsang ba dang /_bde ba'i 'grogs pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas phyin ci log thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas/_
[\[119b.2\]]chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/ser sna dang /_gtong ba dang /_'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang /_tshul khrims dang /_gnod sems dang /_bzod pa dang /_le lo dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_rnam par g.yeng ba dang /_bsam gtan dang /_
[\[119b.3\]]'chal pa'i shes rab dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs dang mi 'thun pa'i phyogs sems pa dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/nges pa dang /_ma nges pa dang /_yang dag pa dang /_log pa dang /_dge ba dang /_mi dge ba dang /_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa 
[\[119b.4\]]dang /_kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas dang /_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_bzang po dang /_ngan pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_'khor 
[\[119b.5\]]ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas/_chos thams cad kyi mi 'thun pa'i phyogs dang /_gnyen po'i bar dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/theg pa tha dad pa dang /_sems can tha dad pa dang /_zhing tha dad pa dang /_sangs rgyas tha dad pa dang /_chos tha 
[\[119b.6\]]dad pa dang /_dge 'dun tha dad pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas/_tha dad pa thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/mi shes pa dang /_shes pa dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_kun rdzob dang /_don dam pa dang lhan cig mi gnas pa nas/_mtshan ma yid la byed 
[\[119b.7\]]pa thams cad kyi bar dang lhan cig mi gnas so/_/shes rab ni gang rgyu ba med pa/_lus med pa/_mtshan nyid med pa/_mtshan ma med pa/_'dus ma byas pa ste/_de ni mtshan ma dang /_yid la byed pa thams cad dang /_sems dang /_yid dang /_rnam par shes pa dang /_gnas dang /_
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]ming dang /_mtshan ma dang /_gcig pa dang /_tha dad pa dang lhan cig mi gnas te/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_shes rab ni 'grogs pa bcu drug po de dag dang lhan cig mi gnas so//_//bam po bzhi pa/_de la shes rab kyi yul gang zhe na/_
[\[120a.2\]]'di lta ste/_chos brgyad la mkhas pa'o/_/de la chos brgyad la mkhas pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phung po la mkhas pa dang /_khams la mkhas pa dang /_skye mched la mkhas pa dang /_bden pa la mkhas pa dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang /_dus gsum 
[\[120a.3\]]la mkhas pa dang /_theg pa thams cad la mkhas pa dang /_chos thams cad la mkhas pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i phung po la mkhas pa gang zhe na/_gang 'di phung po rnams kyi dper bya bar bstan pa ste/_dbu ba rdos par bstan pa dang /_chu'i chu bur du bstan pa dang /_smig rgyur 
[\[120a.4\]]bstan pa dang /_chu shing gi sdong por bstan pa dang /_sgyu mar bstan pa dang /_rmi lam du bstan pa dang /_brag car bstan pa dang /_mig yor du bstan pa dang /_gzugs brnyan du bstan pa dang /_sprul par bstan pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzugs ni dbu ba rdos pa lta bu ste/_dbu 
[\[120a.5\]]ba rdos pa lta bu ni bdag ma yin/_sems can ma yin/_srog ma yin/_gso ba ma yin/_skyes bu ma yin/_gang zag ma yin no/_/dbu ba rdos pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa gzugs kyi rang bzhin yang de yin te/_gang 'di la mkhas pa de ni phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[120a.6\]]tshor ba ni chu'i chu bur lta bu'o/_/'du shes ni smig rgyu lta bu'o/_/'du byed rnams ni chu shing lta bu'o/_/rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/_sgyu ma yang bdag ma yin/_sems can ma yin/_srog ma yin/_gso ba ma yin/_skyes bu ma yin/_gang zag ma yin no/_/sgyu 
[\[120a.7\]]ma'i rang bzhin gang yin pa/_rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yang de yin te/_gang 'di la mkhas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/_/phung po rnams ni rmi lam lta bu ste/_rmi lam yang bdag ma yin/_sems can ma yin/_srog ma yin/_gso ba 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]ma yin/_skyes bu ma yin/_gang zag ma yin no/_/rmi lam gyi rang bzhin gang yin pa phung po rnams kyi rang bzhin yang de yin te/_gang 'di la mkhas pa de ni/_byang chub sems dpa'i phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/_/phung po rnams ni brag ca lta bu ste/_brag ca ni bdag ma 
[\[120b.2\]]yin/_sems can ma yin/_srog ma yin/_gso ba ma yin/_skyes bu ma yin/_gang zag ma yin no/_/brag ca'i rang bzhin gang yin pa phung po rnams kyi rang bzhin yang de yin te/_gang 'di la mkhas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/_/phung po 
[\[120b.3\]]rnams ni mig yor lta bu ste/_mig yor kyang bdag ma yin/_sems can ma yin/_srog ma yin/_gso ba ma yin/_skyes bu ma yin/_gang zag ma yin no/_/mig yor gyi rang bzhin gang yin pa/_phung po rnams kyi rang bzhin yang de yin te/_gang 'di la mkhas pa 
[\[120b.4\]]'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/_/phung po rnams ni gzugs brnyan lta bu ste/_gzugs brnyan ni bdag ma yin/_sems can ma yin/_srog ma yin/_gso ba ma yin/_skyes bu ma yin/_gang zag ma yin no/_/gzugs brnyan gyi rang bzhin 
[\[120b.5\]]gang yin pa/_phung po rnams kyi rang bzhin yang de yin te/_gang 'di la mkhas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/_/phung po rnams ni sprul pa lta bu ste/_sprul pa ni bdag ma yin/_sems can ma yin/_srog ma yin/_gso ba ma yin/_skyes 
[\[120b.6\]]bu ma yin/_gang zag ma yin no/_/sprul pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa/_phung po rnams kyi rang bzhin yang de yin te/_gang 'di la mkhas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/_/phung po zhes bya ba de ni 'jig rten te/_'jig rten kyang 'jig pa'i 
[\[120b.7\]]mtshan nyid do/_/'jig rten gyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de rang bzhin gyis mi rtag pa'o/_/rang bzhin gyis sdug bsngal ba'o/_/rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o/_/rang bzhin gyis bdag med pa'o/_/rang bzhin gyis zhi ba ste/_gang 'di la mkhas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]phung po la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i khams la mkhas pa gang zhe na/_gang chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i ye shes so/_/chos kyi dbyings ni sa'i khams yin mod kyi/_chos kyi dbyings sra ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi 
[\[121a.2\]]dbyings chu'i khams yin mod kyi/_chos kyi dbyings rlan pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi dbyings me'i khams yin mod kyi/_chos kyi dbyings yongs su smin par byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi dbyings rlung gi khams yin mod kyi/_chos kyi dbyings g.yo 
[\[121a.3\]]ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi dbyings mig gi khams yin mod kyi/_chos kyi dbyings lta ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi dbyings rna ba'i khams yin mod kyi/_chos kyi dbyings nyan pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi dbyings sna'i khams yin mod kyi/_
[\[121a.4\]]chos kyi dbyings snom pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi dbyings lce'i khams yin mod kyi/_chos kyi dbyings myong bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi dbyings lus kyi khams yin mod kyi/_chos kyi dbyings nom pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi dbyings 
[\[121a.5\]]yid kyi khams yin mod kyi/_chos kyi dbyings rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi dbyings mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams yin mod kyi/_chos kyi dbyings gzugs so sor rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi dbyings rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams 
[\[121a.6\]]yin mod kyi/_chos kyi dbyings sgra so sor rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi dbyings sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams yin mod kyi/_chos kyi dbyings dri so sor rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi dbyings lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams yin mod 
[\[121a.7\]]kyi/_chos kyi dbyings ro so sor rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi dbyings lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams yin mod kyi/_chos kyi dbyings reg bya so sor rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi dbyings yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams yin 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]mod kyi/_chos kyi dbyings chos so sor rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi dbyings gzugs kyi khams yin mod kyi/_chos kyi dbyings mig gi rnam par shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi dbyings sgra'i khams yin mod kyi/_chos 
[\[121b.2\]]kyi dbyings rna ba'i rnam par shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi dbyings dri'i khams yin mod kyi/_chos kyi dbyings sna'i rnam par shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi dbyings ro'i khams yin mod kyi/_chos kyi dbyings 
[\[121b.3\]]lce'i rnam par shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi dbyings reg bya'i khams yin mod kyi/_chos kyi dbyings lus kyi rnam par shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi dbyings chos kyi khams yin mod kyi/_chos kyi 
[\[121b.4\]]dbyings yid kyi rnam par shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi dbyings gzugs kyi khams yin mod kyi/_chos kyi dbyings gzugs su rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi dbyings sgra'i khams yin mod kyi/_chos kyi dbyings sgrar rnam 
[\[121b.5\]]par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi dbyings dri'i khams yin mod kyi/_chos kyi dbyings drir rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi dbyings ro'i khams yin mod kyi/_chos kyi dbyings ror rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi dbyings 
[\[121b.6\]]reg bya'i khams yin mod kyi/_chos kyi dbyings reg byar rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi dbyings chos kyi khams yin mod kyi/_chos kyi dbyings chos su rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi dbyings dang /_bdag gi khams de ni mtshungs so/_/
[\[121b.7\]]chos kyi dbyings dang /_'dod pa'i khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams de ni mtshungs so/_/chos kyi dbyings dang /_'khor ba'i khams dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings de ni mtshungs so/_/chos kyi dbyings dang /_sems can gyi 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_chos thams cad kyi khams de ni mtshungs so/_/de ci'i phyir de mtshungs zhe na/_stong pa nyid du mtshungs pas na de ni mtshungs so/_/mtshan ma med par mtshungs pa dang /_smon pa med par mtshungs pa dang /_
[\[122a.2\]]mngon par 'du mi byed par mtshungs pa dang /_skye ba med par mtshungs pa dang /_'byung ba med par mtshungs pa dang /_dngos po med par mtshungs pa dang /_chos thams cad tha dad pa med par mtshungs pa dang /_sgrib pa med par mtshungs pa dang /_nam mkha'i khams su 
[\[122a.3\]]mtshungs pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mtshungs pas/_de dag mtshungs pa'o/_/'dus byas kyi khams la 'jug pa dang /_'dus ma byas kyi khams la 'jug pa tshad med de/_gang bstan pa de la chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyi sgo nas 'jug pa 'di ni byang chub 
[\[122a.4\]]sems dpa'i khams la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa gang zhe na/_chos kyi skye mched la 'jug pa'i ye shes te/_chos kyi skye mched ni mig gi skye mched yin mod kyi/_chos kyi skye mched lta ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos 
[\[122a.5\]]kyi skye mched rna ba'i skye mched yin mod kyi/_chos kyi skye mched nyan pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi skye mched sna'i skye mched yin mod kyi/_chos kyi skye mched mnom pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi skye mched lce'i skye mched yin mod kyi/_chos kyi skye mched 
[\[122a.6\]]myang ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi skye mched lus kyi skye mched yin mod kyi/_chos kyi skye mched nom pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi skye mched yid kyi skye mched yin mod kyi/_chos kyi skye mched chos rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi skye 
[\[122a.7\]]mched gzugs kyi skye mched yin mod kyi/_chos kyi skye mched mig gi rnam par shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi skye mched sgra'i skye mched yin mod kyi/_chos kyi skye mched rna ba'i rnam par shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]no/_/chos kyi skye mched dri'i skye mched yin mod kyi/_chos kyi skye mched sna'i rnam par shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi skye mched ro'i skye mched yin mod kyi/_chos kyi skye mched lce'i rnam par shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan 
[\[122b.2\]]nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi skye mched reg bya'i skye mched yin mod kyi/_chos kyi skye mched lus kyi rnam par shes pas rnam par rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin no/_/chos kyi skye mched chos kyi skye mched yin mod kyi/_chos kyi skye mched yid kyi rnam par shes pas rnam par 
[\[122b.3\]]rig par bya ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin te/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang skye mched la mkhas pa ni/_mig gi skye mched ni/_bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo /_/de bzhin du rna ba'i skye mched dang /_sna'i skye mched dang /_lce'i skye 
[\[122b.4\]]mched dang /_lus kyi skye mched dang /_yid kyi skye mched dang /_gzugs kyi skye mched dang /_sgra'i skye mched dang /_dri'i skye mched dang /_ro'i skye mched dang /_reg bya'i skye mched dang /_chos kyi skye mched kyang bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ji 
[\[122b.5\]]skad du/_mig ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ste/_'di ni de'i rang bzhin no/_/de bzhin du rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ste/_'di ni de'i rang bzhin no/_/de bzhin du gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_
[\[122b.6\]]chos rnams ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ste/_'di ni de'i rang bzhin no zhes gsungs so/_/'di ltar gang skye mched rnams la skye mched du mi byed cing /_dge ba'i chos kyang mi sogs/_mi dge ba'i chos kyang 'bri bar mi byed la/_dge ba dang mi dge ba la 'du shes gnyis su 
[\[122b.7\]]mi 'gyur ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa'o/_/gzhan yang skye mched la mkhas pa ni/_mig gi skye mched kyi 'dod chags kyi gnas dang rten ni gzugs kyi skye mched de/_gang mig gzugs la 'dod chags dang bral bar mthong la/_'dod chags dang 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]bral ba'i chos kyang mngon sum du mi byed pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin du rna ba'i skye mched kyi sgra'i skye mched dang /_sna'i skye mched kyi dri'i skye mched dang /_lce'i skye mched kyi ro'i skye mched dang /_lus kyi skye mched 
[\[123a.2\]]kyi reg bya'i skye mched dang /_yid kyi skye mched kyi 'dod chags kyi gnas dang rten ni chos kyi skye mched de/_gang yid chos las 'dod chags dang bral bar mthong la/_'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos kyang mngon sum du mi byed pa 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas 
[\[123a.3\]]pa zhes bya'o/_/skye mched ces bya ba ni/_'phags pa'i skye mched dang /_'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye mched do/_/de la 'phags pa'i skye mched ni gang lam yang dag par bsgrub pa'o/_/'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye mched ni gang lam dang mi 'thun pa'o/_/de la byang chub 
[\[123a.4\]]sems dpa'i lam la gnas nas lam dang mi 'thun pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skyed cing /_lam gyi skye mched kyang mi 'dor ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i skye mched la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa gang zhe na/_
[\[123a.5\]]'jug pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa yin te/_'jug pa bzhi gang zhe na/_gang 'di sdug bsngal shes pa dang /_kun 'byung ba shes pa dang /_'gog pa shes pa dang /_lam shes pa'o/_/de la sdug bsngal shes pa zhes bya ba ni gang phung po rnams ni mi skye 
[\[123a.6\]]bar shes pa'o/_/kun 'byung ba shes pa zhes bya ba ni/_gang sred pa legs par 'joms pa'i shes pa'o/_/'gog pa shes pa zhes bya ba ni ma rig pa dang /_bag la nyal ba rnams mi 'byung ba'o/_/lam shes pa zhes bya ba ni/_mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i chos thams cad la 
[\[123a.7\]]sgro mi 'dogs pa ste/_de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa shes pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag la de lta bus shes rab dang ye shes kyis rab tu shes kyang sems can la blta ba'i phyir mngon sum du mi byed cing /_sems can rnams kyang 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]yongs su smin par byed de/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa rnam pa gsum ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_gang 'di kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang /_don dam pa'i bden pa dang /_mtshan nyid kyi bden pa'o/_/
[\[123b.2\]]de la kun rdzob kyi bden pa gang zhe na/_'jig rten gyi tha snyad dang /_yi ge dang /_sgra dang /_brdas bstan pa ji snyed pa'o/_/don dam pa'i bden pa ni/_gang la sems kyi rgyu ba med pa ste/_yi ge lta ci smos/_mtshan nyid kyi bden pa ni/_gang 'di mtshan nyid thams cad mtshan 
[\[123b.3\]]nyid gcig pa ste/_mtshan nyid gcig po yang mtshan nyid med pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i kun rdzob kyi bden pa bstan pas kyang yongs su mi skyo/_don dam pa'i bden pa mngon sum du byed par yang mi ltung /_mtshan nyid kyi bden pas bden pa gcig tu rtogs kyang /_
[\[123b.4\]]sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang bden pa rnam pa gnyis te/_rnam pa gnyis po gang zhe na/_gang 'di tha snyad kyi bden pa dang /_don dam pa'i bden pa'o/_/de la tha snyad kyi bden pa ni/_
[\[123b.5\]]dus su bden par smra ba ste/_gang 'di sdug bsngal gyi bden pa dang /_kun 'byung ba'i bden pa dang /_'gog pa'i bden pa dang /_lam gyi bden pa dang /_'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi bden pa dang /_yi ge dang /_sgra dang /_brdas bstan pa ji snyed pa'o/_/don dam pa'i 
[\[123b.6\]]bden pa gang /_'di brjod pa med pa'i chos can/_mya ngan las 'das pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rtag tu chos kyi de bzhin nyid kyi phyir/_de'i rigs ni rtag pa'i phyir ro/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' tha snyad kyi bden pa bstan pas kyang yongs su mi skyo/_don dam pa'i bden 
[\[123b.7\]]pa mngon sum du byed par yang mi ltung la/_sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed de/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang bden pa ni gcig ste/_gnyis su med do/_/de la bden pa gcig ni gang 'di chos thams 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]cad la sgro 'dogs pa med cing sgro 'dogs par ltung ba'i sems can rnams kyang bden pa la rab tu 'dzud pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i sgro 'dogs pa'i bden pa bstan pas kyang mi skyo la/_sgro 'dogs pa med pa'i bden pa gcig bstan pa yang mngon sum du mi byed 
[\[124a.2\]]cing /_sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bden pa la mkhas pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang phung po lnga ni sdug bsngal ba ste/_gang phung po lnga rnams sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid 'di ni sdug bsngal zhes bya'o/_/gang gis sdug bsngal gyi 
[\[124a.3\]]mtshan nyid de stong par rtogs pa 'di ni sdug bsngal la sdug bsngal du shes pa 'phags pa'i bden pa'o/_/gang phung po lnga'i sred pa'i rgyu dang /_lta ba'i rgyu bag la nyal ba 'di ni kun 'byung ba zhes bya'o/_/gang gis sred pa'i rgyu dang /_lta ba'i rgyu de dag mi len pa dang /_sgro mi 
[\[124a.4\]]'dogs pa dang /_reg par mi byed pa 'di ni kun 'byung ba la kun 'byung bar shes pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o/_/gang phung po lnga po dag shin tu zad de 'gags nas/_sngon gyi mthar mi 'byung ba dang /_phyi ma'i mthar mi 'pho ba dang /_da ltar byung bar phyin pa med pa 'di 
[\[124a.5\]]ni 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa ste/_de la gang gis de ltar shes pa 'di ni/_'gog pa la 'gog par shes pa 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o/_/lam gang la brten te sdug bsngal shes pa dang /_kun 'byung ba shes pa dang /_'gog pa shes pa la reg cing gnyis su med
