[\[164b.2\]]ti'i bu/_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi yan lag bdun mi zad pa ste/_de la byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_brtson 'grus yang 
[\[164b.3\]]dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/_/de la dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang 
[\[164b.4\]]zhe na/_dran pa gang gis chos rnams rtogs par 'gyur ba dang /_chos rnams la so sor rtog pa dang /_chos rnams la dpyod pa dang /_chos rnams la kun 'gro ba dang /_chos rnams la bsam pa dang /_chos rnams la rjes su rtog pa ste/_de dran pa des chos rnams kyi rang gi mtshan 
[\[164b.5\]]nyid rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/chos rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid gang zhe na/_chos thams cad ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa ste gang gis de ltar dran zhing rtogs pa 'di ni dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o/_/de la chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/_gang 
[\[164b.6\]]chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong rnam par 'byed pa shes te/_chos gang ji lta ji lta bur rnam par dbye bar bya ba nges pa'i don kyang nges pa'i don du/_drang ba'i don kyang drang ba'i don du/_kun rdzob kyi don kyang kun rdzob kyi don du/_don dam pa yang don dam par/_brda yang brdar/_rnam 
[\[164b.7\]]par nges pa yang rnam par nges par/_chos de dang de dag de lta bur rnam par 'byed pa 'di ni chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o/_/de la brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/_gang dran pa 'di dang /_chos rnam par 'byed pa dang /_dga' 
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]ba dang /_shin tu sbyangs pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_btang snyoms shes pa 'di rab tu 'dzin pa dang /_spro ba dang /_stobs dang /_rtul ba dang /_phyir mi ldog pa dang /_'dun pa dang /_mthu dang /_brtson pa mi gtong ba dang /_lam mngon par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/_
[\[165a.2\]]brtson pa 'di ni brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o/_/de la dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/_chos la dga' ba dang /_chos la mos pa dang /_chos la mchog tu dga' ba gang gis sems ma god pa dang /_dad cing 'dod pa ste/_chos la dga' ba 
[\[165a.3\]]gang gis lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs par 'gyur ba dang /_nyon mongs pa rnams sel ba 'di ni dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o/_/de la shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/_gang lus shin tu sbyangs pa dang /_sems shin tu sbyangs pas nyon 
[\[165a.4\]]mongs pa bsal bas sgrib pa dang bral ba dang /_zhi gnas la 'jug pa'i dmigs pa la sems gzhog pa 'di ni shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o/_/de la ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/_gang sems mnyam par bzhag pas chos kyi ye 
[\[165a.5\]]shes mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'i/_sems mnyam par ma bzhag pas ni ma yin no/_/gang sems mnyam par bzhag pas chos de dag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'i/_sems mnyam par ma bzhag pas ma yin te/_lta ba dang /_bag la nyal dang /_kun nas ldang ba 
[\[165a.6\]]de dag bor bas kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ste/_gzhan du na chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad tha dad du dbye ba med pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_'di ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya'o/_/de 
[\[165a.7\]]la btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na/_gang 'di ni bde ba dang /_yid mi bde ba'i cha dang 'thun pa'i chos rnams kyis sems yongs su mi gtugs pa dang /_'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis mi 'phrogs pa dang /_mthon dman du mi gnas pa'i phyir mi sgul ba yin te/_
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]gnod pa med pa dang /_'phrogs pa med pa dang /_rjes su chags pa med pa dang /_zhe 'gras pa med pa dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa'i lam dang 'thun pa 'di ni btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya ste/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 
[\[165b.2\]]byang chub kyi yan lag bdun mi zad pa'o/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam mi zad pa ste/_de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam gang zhe na/_lam zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ste/_'di lta ste/_yang dag 
[\[165b.3\]]pa'i lta ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ngag dang /_yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /_yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /_yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /_yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /_yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/de la yang dag pa'i lta ba gang zhe na/_gang 'di 
[\[165b.4\]]'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa ste/_bdag tu lta ba las kun nas langs pa ma yin/_sems can du ma yin/_srog tu ma yin/_gso bar ma yin/_skyes bur ma yin/_gang zag tu ma yin/_shed las skyes su ma yin/_shed bur ma yin/_byed pa por ma yin/_tshor ba 
[\[165b.5\]]por lta ba las kun nas langs pa ma yin/_rtag pa dang chad par lta ba las kun nas langs pa ma yin/_'byung ba dang 'jig par lta ba las kun nas langs pa ma yin/_dge ba dang /_mi dge ba dang /_lung du mi ston par lta ba las kun nas langs pa yang ma yin pa nas 'khor ba dang 
[\[165b.6\]]mya ngan las 'das par lta ba'i bar las kun nas langs pa yang ma yin te/_'di ni yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya'o/_/de la yang dag pa'i rtog pa gang zhe na/_rtog pa gang dag gis 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi nyon mongs pa dag kun tu 'byung ba'i kun tu rtog pa de dag 
[\[165b.7\]]la mi rtog pa dang /_rtog pa gang dag gis tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po rnams kun tu 'byung ba'i kun tu rtog pa de dag la mi rtog pa ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa zhes bya'o/_/de la yang dag 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]pa'i ngag gang zhe na/_ngag gang gis bdag la yang yongs su mi gdung zhing /_gzhan la yang ma yin pa dang /_bdag la yang kun nas nyon mongs par mi byed cing /_gzhan la yang ma yin pa dang /_bdag la yang mi gnod cing /_gzhan la yang ma yin pa ste/_ngag gang 
[\[166a.2\]]gis 'phags pa'i lam la legs par 'jug pa mnyam par gzhag pa la brtson pa'i ngag de dang ldan pa yin te/_'di ni yang dag pa'i ngag ces bya'o/_/de la yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' gang zhe na/_gang las kyang gnag la rnam par smin pa gnag pa'i las de mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang /_
[\[166a.3\]]gang las kyang dkar la rnam par smin pa yang dkar ba'i las de mngon par 'du byed pa dang /_gang las kyang dkar gnag la rnam par smin pa yang dkar gnag tu 'gyur ba'i las de dag mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang /_las gang mi gnag mi dkar zhing rnam par smin pa yang med la las kyis las 
[\[166a.4\]]zad par 'gyur ba'i las de mngon par 'du byed pa'o/_/de las la rton pas yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' la brtson pa zhes bya ste/_'di ni yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' zhes bya'o/_/de la yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba gang zhe na/_gang 'phags pa'i rigs dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /_yo byad bsnyungs 
[\[166a.5\]]pa mi gtong ba dang /_tshul 'chos pa med pa dang /_kha gsag med pa dang /_thob kyis 'jal ba med pa dang /_dgang sla ba dang /_gso sla ba dang /_cho ga bzang po'i ngang tshul can dang /_gzhan gyi rnyed pa la phrag dog med pa dang /_bdag gi rnyed pas chog shes pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba med 
[\[166a.6\]]pa dang /_'phags pas gnang ba'i 'tsho ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba'o/_/de la yang dag pa'i rtsol ba gang zhe na/_rtsol ba gang log pa rnams kyis 'phags pas ma gnang ba/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi nyon mongs pa'i bag la nyal ba byed pa'i rtsol ba de mi 'dod 
[\[166a.7\]]cing /_rtsol ba gang yang dag par 'phags pa'i lam dang bden pa la 'jug pa/_mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba'i lam du gtod pa'i rtsol ba de'i rjes su 'gro ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i rtsol ba zhes bya'o/_/de la yang dag pa'i dran pa gang zhe na/_dran pa gang shin tu nye bar gzhag pa dang /_mi 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]sgul ba dang /_drang ba dang /_gya gyu med pa dang /_'khor ba'i skyon gyi nyes dmigs la lta ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam du 'dren pa ste/_dran pa dang /_gzhungs pa dang /_'phags pa'i lam mi brjed pa 'di ni yang dag pa'i dran pa zhes bya'o/_/de la yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_yang 
[\[166b.2\]]dag pa nyid du mnyam pa dang /_gang chos thams cad kyis mnyam pa ste/_ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas pas sems can thams cad rab tu thar bar bya ba'i phyir yang dag pa nges par 'gyur ba la 'jug pa 'di ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/_/yang gang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la 
[\[166b.3\]]gnas nas sems can thams cad rab tu thar bar bya ba'i phyir yang dag pa nges par 'gyur ba la 'jug pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin mi zad pa zhes bya'o/_/'di ni 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi lam ste/_de byang 
[\[166b.4\]]chub sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'chad pa dang /_ston pa dang /_rab tu ston pa dang /_'dzin du 'jug pa dang /_mos par byed pa dang /_klog tu 'jug pa dang /_shes par byed pa dang /_rnam par shes par byed pa dang /_rab tu shes par byed pa dang /_rab tu 'dzud pa dang /_
[\[166b.5\]]rnam par 'grel ba dang /_rnam par 'byed pa dang /_gsal bar byed pa dang /_yang dag par ston pa 'di ni btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam mi zad pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhi gnas dang /_lhag 
[\[166b.6\]]mthong yang mi zad pa yin te/_de la zhi gnas mi zad pa gang zhe na/_gang sems zhi ba dang /_rab tu zhi ba dang /_nye bar zhi ba dang /_rnam par mi g.yeng ba dang /_dbang po legs par bsdams pa dang /_mi rgod pa dang /_mi 'phyar ba dang /_mu cor mi smra ba dang /_yab yab po ma yin pa dang /_mi 
[\[166b.7\]]'gyur ba dang /_zhi des pa dang /_bsrungs pa dang /_cang shes pa dang /_las su rung ba dang /_rtse gcig pa dang /_gcig pur dga' ba dang /_'du 'dzi yongs su spong ba dang /_dben par dga' ba dang /_lus dben pa dang /_sems ma brlang ba dang /_dgon par mngon du phyogs pa yid la byed 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]pa dang /_'dod pa nyung ba dang /_'dod pa med pa dang /_'dod chen med pa dang /_chog shes pa dang /_'tsho ba yongs su dag pa dang /_cho ga phun sum tshogs pa dang /_spyod lam bsrungs pa dang /_dus shes pa dang /_tshod shes pa dang /_dus min shes pa dang /_drod shes pa dang /_dgang sla 
[\[167a.2\]]ba dang /_gso sla ba dang /_so sor brtags pa'i stobs kyis mi mtho mi dma' ba dang /_ngan du brjod pa dang /_ngan du smras pa'i tshig gi lam dang du len pa dang /_rnal 'byor la mngon du phyogs pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /_nang du yang dag 'jog la mngon par dga' ba dang /_bsam gtan gyi 
[\[167a.3\]]yan lag yid la byed pa dang /_byams pa skyed pa dang /_snying rje mngon par sgrub pa dang /_dga' ba la gzhog pa dang /_btang snyoms sgom pa dang /_bsam gtan dang po dang /_bsam gtan gnyis pa dang /_bsam gtan gsum pa dang /_bsam gtan bzhi pa dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas 
[\[167a.4\]]skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang /_'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa mthar gyis snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po 'di dag ni zhi gnas zhes bya'o/_/'di ltar zhi gnas kyi tshogs ni tshad med pa ste/_zhi 
[\[167a.5\]]gnas kyi tshogs de dag la gang brtson pa 'di ni zhi gnas mi zad pa zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag mthong mi zad pa gang zhe na/_gang shes rab kyi cha dang 'thun pa sgom pa'i lam ste/_chos rnams la g.yo ba med par shes pa dang /_bdag med pa dang /_sems can med pa dang /_
[\[167a.6\]]srog med pa dang /_gso ba med pa dang /_gang zag med par shes pa dang /_phung po rnams la sgyu mar mthong ba'i shes pa dang /_khams rnams la sbrul gdug pa lta bur mthong ba'i shes pa dang /_skye mched rnams la grong stong pa lta bur mthong ba'i shes pa dang /_bden pa rnams la shin tu rtogs 
[\[167a.7\]]par mthong ba'i shes pa dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang mi 'gal bar mthong ba'i shes pa dang /_lta ba thams cad dang bral bar mthong ba'i shes pa dang /_rgyu dang 'bras bu dang rnam par smin pa chud mi za bar mthong ba'i shes pa dang /_'bras bu 'thob pa mngon sum du bya ba la nges par 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]mthong ba'i shes pa dang /_yang dag pa nyid la 'jug pa mthong ba'i shes pa ni lhag mthong zhes bya ste/_lhag mthong zhes bya ba ni chos rnams yang dag par mthong ba'o/_/chos rnams ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba'o/_/chos rnams de kho na nyid du mthong ba'o/_/chos rnams gzhan ma yin pa 
[\[167b.2\]]nyid du mthong ba'o/_/chos rnams stong pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med par mthong ba'o/_/chos rnams mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang /_de bzhin du ma skyes pa dang /_ma byung ba dang /_dngos po med pa dang /_ji lta ba bzhin dang /_rnam par dag pa dang /_dben par mthong ba'o/_/chos 
[\[167b.3\]]rnams g.yo ba med pa dang /_byed pa med pa dang /_bdag po med pa dang /_yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang /_dbyer med cing ro gcig pa dang /_nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid dang /_rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das par mthong ba'o/_/lhag mthong zhes bya ba ni yod pa'i rnam par yang mi mthong /_
[\[167b.4\]]med pa'i rnam par yang mi mthong /_skye ba dang /_'jig pa dang /_gnas pa'i rnam par yang mi mthong /_dmigs pa dang mtshan ma'i rnam par yang mi mthong ba ste/_de mthong mod kyi ci yang mi mthong ngo /_/gang gi tshe mthong ba med pa de'i tshe mthong ste/_lhag mthong gis kyang mthong ba yang ma 
[\[167b.5\]]yin/_ma mthong ba yang ma yin par mthong ngo /_/gang gi tshe de ltar mthong ba de'i tshe yang dag pa nyid mthong ngo /_/yang dag pa nyid mthong bas lhag mthong la mkhas pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' lhag mthong gis de ltar mthong yang mngon par 'du mi byed par yang mi ltung 
[\[167b.6\]]zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byed pa las kyang mi ldang ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag mthong mi zad pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi zhi gnas dang lhag mthong mi zad pa'o/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang byang 
[\[167b.7\]]chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs dang spobs pa mi zad pa yin te/_de la gzungs mi zad pa gang zhe na/_gzungs zhes bya ba ni gang sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsags pa/_dran pas chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong 'dzin pa dang /_kun 'dzin pa dang /_mi brjed pa dang /_dran pas yang 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]dag par 'dzin pa ste/_'di ni gzungs zhes bya'o/_/yang gzungs zhes bya ba ni gang gis sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa kun tu 'dzin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_nyan thos thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad kyis 
[\[168a.2\]]smras pa kun tu 'dzin pa dang /_legs par smras pa thams cad ma lus par kun tu 'dzin pa ste/_'di ni gzungs zhes bya'o/_/gang gi tshe bskal pa gzhan du brjes par gyur tam/_tshe gzhan du brjes par gyur pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' de'i gzungs kyi dran pa'i shes pa de chud za bar 
[\[168a.3\]]mi 'gyur/_brjed par yang mi 'gyur te/_chos thams cad 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig gis lag mthil na skyu ru ra'i 'bru 'dug pa bzhin du mthong ba 'di ni gzungs mi zad pa zhes bya'o/_/de la spobs pa mi zad pa gang zhe na/_spobs pa zhes bya ba ni gang 'di thogs pa med pa'i spobs 
[\[168a.4\]]pa dang /_rgyun chad pa med pa'i spobs pa dang /_mi 'phrogs pa'i spobs pa dang /_ma rmongs pa'i spobs pa dang /_myur ba'i spobs pa dang /_dga' ba'i spobs pa dang /_la gor du spobs pa dang /_mi 'gyur ba'i spobs pa dang /_rno ba'i spobs pa dang /_mgyogs pa'i spobs pa dang /_de'i 
[\[168a.5\]]spobs pa de ni las kyi rnam par smin pa yongs su sbyangs pa/_sangs rgyas kyis bslabs pa/_lha rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/_phyad par lung ston pa/_'bras bu yod par chos ston pa/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam du 'gro ba ste/_de de ltar spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no/_/
[\[168a.6\]]gzugs su snang ba ji snyed par byang chub sems dpa' de'i mdo dang tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa la spobs par snang ba yang de snyed du/_sgrar grag pa ji snyed par byang chub sems dpa' de'i mdo dang tshigs su bcad pa bshad pa la spobs par snang ba yang de snyed de 'di bstan to/_/'di bshad do zhes 
[\[168a.7\]]de mi rtog cing mngon par 'du byed pa med mod kyi/_'khor gang dang gang du 'gro yang rung ste/_gal te rgyal rigs kyi 'khor du'am/_gal te bram ze'i 'khor du'am/_gal te rje'u rigs kyi 'khor du'am/_gal te khyim bdag gi 'khor du'am/_gal te dge sbyong gi 'khor du'am/_gal te 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]rgyal chen bzhi'i 'khor du'am/_gal te sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i 'khor du'am/_gal te 'thab bral gyi 'khor du'am/_gal te dga' ldan gyi 'khor du'am/_gal te 'phrul dga'i 'khor du'am/_gal te gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi 'khor du'am/_gal te bdud kyi 'khor du'am/_gal 
[\[168b.2\]]te tshangs pa'i 'khor du yang rung ste/_de dang der de'i lhun gyis grub pa nyid du sems can thams cad kyi dad pa dang /_dbang po dag la chos rnams spobs par gyur te/_de 'dod na tshe gzhan nam/_bskal pa gzhan gyi bar du'ang mi ldang zhing thogs pa med par chos ston to/_/de'i chos bstan pa 
[\[168b.3\]]des kyang de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par bya ba'i phyir nges pa 'byung bar 'gyur te/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa mi zad pa'o/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzungs dang spobs pa mi zad pa'o/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_
[\[168b.4\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi mdo bzhi mi zad pa ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag par byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bstan pa mi zad pa'i shes pa rab tu 'jug pa dang /_'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal bar byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[168b.5\]]kyi bstan pa mi zad pa'i shes pa rab tu 'jug pa dang /_chos thams cad bdag med par byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bstan pa mi zad pa'i shes pa rab tu 'jug pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa zhi bar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bstan pa mi zad pa'i shes pa 'jug pa'o/_/de la mi rtag pa'i 
[\[168b.6\]]don gang zhe na/_med pa'i don dang /_mi chags pa'i don te/_dngos po rnam par 'jig pa'i don ni ma yin no/_/mi rtag pa'i don ni chos la bdag med pa ste/_ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa'i phyir de la rnam par 'jig pa gang yang med de/_'di ni mi rtag pa'i don to/_/de la sdug bsngal gyi don 
[\[168b.7\]]gang zhe na/_mngon par dga' ba med pa'i don ni sdug bsngal gyi don to/_/dga' ba zad pa'i don ni sdug bsngal gyi don to/_/smon pa med pa'i don ni sdug bsngal gyi don to/_/sdug bsngal gyi sgra rab tu bstan pa'i don ni sdug bsngal gyi don to/_/nam mkha' rab tu brjod pa'i don ni sdug 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]bsngal gyi don te/_'di ni sdug bsngal gyi don ces bya'o/_/de la bdag med pa'i don gang zhe na/_bdag ni shin tu bdag med pa ste/_gang bdag med pa'i don de ni gsob bo/_/gsog go/_/ya ma brla'o/_/stong pa'o/_/stong pa'i don ni bdag med pa'i don te/_'di ni 
[\[169a.2\]]bdag med pa'i don ces bya'o/_/de la zhi ba'i don gang zhe na/_zhi ba ni zhi bas zhi bar mi 'gyur te/_zhi ba nyid zhi ba'o/_/ma zhi ba'ang zhi bas zhi bar mi 'gyur te/_gang zhi ba'i don de ni mtshan ma thams cad nye bar zhi ba ste/_'di ni zhi ba zhes bya'o/_/zhi ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste/_'di 
[\[169a.3\]]ni zhi ba'i don ces bya'o/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi mdo bzhi mi zad pa'o/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gcig pu bgrod pa'i lam mi zad pa yin te/_de la gcig pu bgrod pa'i lam gang 
[\[169a.4\]]zhe na/_gcig pu bgrod pa'i lam la byang chub sems dpa' rnams gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa yin te/_gcig pu bgrod pa'i lam zhes bya ba ni/_byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu gnyis ma yin zhing /_grogs med par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu go cha gyon te/_bdag 
[\[169a.5\]]gi brtson 'grus dang /_mthu dang /_stobs kyis yongs su bzung ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pas gzhan gyi skabs med par bdag nyid byed cing bdag gi mthu stobs kyis 'phags te/_des de lta bu'i go cha sra ba bgos nas sems can thams cad kyis yongs su thob par bya ba gang ci yod pa de dag 
[\[169a.6\]]thams cad bdag gis yongs su thob par bya'o/_/gang 'phags pa thams cad dang /_theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thob par bya ba la de bdag gis yongs su thob par bya'o/_/sbyin pa ni bdag gi grogs ma yin gyi bdag ni sbyin pa'i grogs so/_/tshul 
[\[169a.7\]]khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab ni bdag gi grogs ma yin gyi bdag ni tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi grogs so/_/bdag la ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyis rim gro mi bya'i/_
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]bdag gis ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la rim gro bya'o/_/bdag la ni bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams kyis rim gror mi bya'i/_bdag gis ni bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams la rim gro bya'o/_/bdag la ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis rim gror mi bya'i/_bdag gis ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rim 
[\[169b.2\]]gror bya'o/_/gang 'di lta bu'i chos la grogs med par bdag nyid byed cing gzhan gyi go skabs med par bdag gcig pu gnyis ma yin zhing grogs med par rdo rje sa'i snying po la 'dug ste/_bdud stobs dang bcas pa rnams btul la/_sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med 
[\[169b.3\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam la/_de yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de ni/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gcig pu bgrod pa'i lam mi zad pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_gzhan yang byang chub 
[\[169b.4\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mi zad pa ste/_de la thabs gang zhe na/_thabs gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni rnam par sgrub cing slong ba ste/_thabs ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i chos thams cad nye bar gzhog pa'o/_/thabs ni bsam pa nges par sems pa'o/_/
[\[169b.5\]]thabs ni sbyor ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'o/_/thabs ni lhag pa'i bsam pas bye brag tu 'phags pa'i chos 'dod pa'o/_/thabs ni sbyin pas pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o/_/thabs ni tshul khrims kyis skye ba thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa'o/_/thabs ni bzod pas byang chub kyi 
[\[169b.6\]]phyir lus dang ngag dang sems kyi rgyan to/_/thabs ni brtson 'grus kyis 'jug pa dang /_gnas pa la brtson pa'o/_/thabs ni bsam gtan gyis bsam gtan las phyir ldog par shes pa'o/_/thabs ni shes rab kyis 'dus ma byas spong ba'o/_/thabs ni byams pas dpung gnyen med pa rnams kyi 
[\[169b.7\]]skyabs so/_/thabs ni snying rjes 'khor ba la mi smod pa'o/_/thabs ni dga' bas dga' ba dang /_mi dga' ba la mi mjed pa'o/_/thabs ni btang snyoms kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_tshogs thams cad 'phel ba'o/_/thabs ni lha'i mig gis sangs rgyas kyi spyan 'thob pa'o/_/thabs ni lha'i 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]rna bas sangs rgyas kyi snyan 'thob pa'o/_/thabs ni pha rol gyi sems shes pas dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa 'thob pa'o/_/thabs ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pas dus gsum la chags pa med par shes pa'o/_/thabs ni rdzu 'phrul bya ba shes pas de bzhin 
[\[170a.2\]]gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul 'thob pa'o/_/thabs ni sems can dag gi bsam pa rnams la 'jug pa'o/_/thabs ni sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid rab tu shes pa'o/_/thabs ni rgal nas 'jug pa'o/_/zhugs nas kyang rgal ba'o/_/thabs ni nyon mongs pa med pas kun nas nyon mongs pa'o/_/
[\[170a.3\]]thabs ni khur bor nas khur khyer ba'o/_/thabs ni tshad yod pa tshad med par ston pa'o/_/thabs ni tshad med pa tshad yod par ston pa'o/_/thabs ni dbang po zhan pa rnams la gsal bar byed pa'o/_/thabs ni dus dang dus ma yin pa shes pa'o/_/thabs ni lam la lam ngan par 'gro ste 
[\[170a.4\]]lam ngan pa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams yang dag pa'i lam la rab tu 'god pa'o/_/thabs ni nyung ngu las mang por byed do/_/mang po las tshad med par byed do/_/thabs ni bye ba'i sems can rnams 'dum par byed do/_/thabs ni tha ma dang /_'bring dang /_rab la gnas pa'o/_/
[\[170a.5\]]thabs ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i rigs las 'khor ba'i rigs par ltung ngo /_/thabs ni thar pa las bcings pa tshol lo/_/thabs ni shes bya zad par byed de/_shes bya zad par yang mi ltung ngo /_/thabs ni spyod lam thams cad 'khrugs par byed la spyod lam rnams las kyang mi nyams 
[\[170a.6\]]so/_/thabs ni sems can la lta ba'i tshul khrims la ma yin no/_/thabs ni bsdu bas lta ba la rten gyi rtsod pas ni ma yin no/_/thabs ni sgra 'byin pa'o/_/thabs ni khams gsum pa spyod yul pa'o/_/thabs ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum 'thob pa'i mtshan nyid spyod pa'o/_/
[\[170a.7\]]thabs ni 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye bo dang 'dres kyi 'phags pa'i skye bo dang ma 'dres pa'o/_/thabs ni mya ngan las 'das pa la rgyab kyis bltas shing 'khor ba la mngon du phyogs pa'o/_/thabs ni bdud kyi spyod yul na nyon mongs pa med par snang ba'o/_/thabs ni thams cad nas 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]thams cad de/_thams cad nas thams cad pa'ang ma yin te/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mi zad pa zhes bya'o/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi zad pa brgyad cu ste/_mi zad pa 'dir sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[170b.2\]]chos thams cad chud cing 'dus pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pas mi zad pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di bshad pa na srog chags 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa brgyad sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa sems skyes par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[170b.3\]]lnga khri nyis stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod par bya ba'i phyir me tog gi phreng ba dang /_me tog gi gdugs dang /_me tog gi rna rgyan kha dog dang ldan pa/_dri dang ldan pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bcom 
[\[170b.4\]]ldan 'das dang /_byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la mngon par gtor to/_/lha rnams kyis kyang steng gi nam mkha' la glu blangs te/_'di skad ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par 
[\[170b.5\]]bsgrubs pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir mi zad pa'i rnam pas bstan to/_/sems can gang dag mi zad pa'i sgo'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang mos pa dang /_yongs su 'dri ba dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang 
[\[170b.6\]]ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa de dag kyang mi zad pa 'di dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku las phrag pa'i ras phud de/_byang chub sems dpa' blo 
[\[170b.7\]]gros mi zad pa la chos kyi dgab pa'i phyir byin nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/legs so legs so/_/skyes bu dam pa mi zad pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod kyis legs par smras so/_/khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su yi rang ngo /_/gang khyod la ngas rjes su yi rang ba de 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pas phrag pa'i ras de lag pa gnyis kyis blangs te/_spyi bo la bzhag nas 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol ba 'di lha dang /_
[\[171a.2\]]mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten lags so zhes gsol to/_/de nas phyogs bcu nas rin po che'i ras bcos bu dang /_rin po che'i gdugs dang /_rin po che'i ba dan dang /_rin po che'i lda ldi rin po che'i spang rgyan dang /_rin po ches spras pa'i dar 
[\[171a.3\]]gyi lda ldi dag 'ong bar snang ste/_de dag 'ongs nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa'i lus la mngon par 'gebs par byed de/_rin po che'i ras bcos bu dang /_rin po che'i gdugs dang /_rin po che'i ba dan dang /_lda ldi rin po che'i spang rgyan can de dag las blo gros 
[\[171a.4\]]mi zad pa legs so legs so/_/blo gros mi zad pa khyod kyis mi zad pa'i sgo'i le'u legs par smras te/_khyod kyis legs par smras pa la rjes su yi rang ngo zhes sgra byung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[171a.5\]]rin po che'i ras bcos bu dang /_rin po che'i gdugs rnams dang /_rin po che'i ba dan rnams dang /_lda ldi rin po che'i spang rgyan can 'di dag gang nas mchis/_'di lta bu'i sgra dag ga las byung /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub 
[\[171a.6\]]sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_sems can gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas pa de dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs 
[\[171a.7\]]par sangs rgyas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis/_byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la byas pa gzo ba dang /_byas pa tshor bar 'dzin pas/_skyes bu dam pa 'di'i yang dag pa'i yon tan brjod cing /_'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang mchod pa 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]bya ba'i phyir chos kyi dgab pa 'di dag btang ngo /_/de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de/_byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa la rab tu dga' ba dang /_mos pa dang /_ri mo shin tu cher bskyed nas tshig 'di skad ces gang bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa 
[\[171b.2\]]la blta ba dang /_phyag 'tshal ba dang /_mchod pa dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_chos bstan pa 'di yang mnyan pa rnyed pa ni bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/_/sems can gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa'i ming thos pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par 
[\[171b.3\]]rnyed pa yin na/_gang dag gis 'di mngon sum du sha'i mig gis mthong la/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang nyan cing thos nas kyang mos pa dang /_yongs su 'dri ba dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_ston pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_gzhan dag 
[\[171b.4\]]la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa lta ci smos zhes smras so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de'i legs par smras pa la rjes su yi rang bar mdzad de/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[171b.5\]]mo gang gis tshe'i tshad bskal par gnas pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la sbyin pa byin la/_tshul khrims dang /_brtul zhugs yang dag par blangs pa thams cad la slob cing /_sems can thams cad kyis nyes par byas pa yang bzod la/_mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba 
[\[171b.6\]]bzhin du brtson 'grus brtsams shing gnas te/_bsam gtan rtse gcig dang ldan la shes rab kyi bye brag la mkhas kyang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang bral na de'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par ngas ma bshad do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i 
[\[171b.7\]]rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang /_thos nas kyang mos pa dang /_'dri ba dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang /_sgom pa'i rnal 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]'byor la brtson par gnas pa de ni/_de'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ngas bshad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems 
[\[172a.2\]]dpa' gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu ston te/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston pa de ni de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos kyi sbyin pa de ni sbyin pa rnams kyi mchog yin pa'i phyir ro/_/byang chub kyi sems ma brjed pas/_
[\[172a.3\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brtson pa'i tshul khrims dang /_brtul zhugs dang /_legs par sdom pa gang yin pa 'di ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang bslab pa thams cad ni/_chos 
[\[172a.4\]]kyi rnam grangs 'di las yongs su bstan pa'i phyir ro/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa bstan pa gang yin pa de ni/_sems can thams cad kyis kyang bskyod par mi nus te/_gang chos thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i bzod pa de ni/_de'i bzod pa'i 
[\[172a.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog go/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu 'don pa dang /_ston pa dang /_sbyor ba dang /_sgom pa'i lus dang /_ngag dang /_sems kyi brtson 'grus gang yin pa de ni/_de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la sems 
[\[172a.6\]]nges par sems shing /_rnam par mi g.yeng la rtse gcig tu nges par sems pa gang yin pa de ni/_de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog go/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na mngon sum du shes pa dang /_gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog par shes pa dang /_rab tu 
[\[172a.7\]]rnam par 'byed pa shes pa dang /_nan tan shes pa gang yin pa de ni/_de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la rab tu sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/_dka' ba chung ngus pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag bsgom 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs 'dis kyang de 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lus la yod pa'am/_glegs bam du byas kyang rung ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de'i 
[\[172b.2\]]lag mthil du phyin par shes par bya'o/_/gal te 'byung ba chen po rnams gzhan du gyur kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' de'i byang chub ni mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyi rgya ste/_byang 
[\[172b.3\]]chub sems dpa' de dag kyang rgya 'di la 'tshal bar bya ste/_gang rgya 'di'i phyir 'brang ba de dag ni/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi phyir 'brang ba yin no/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi stobs dang bcas/_'khor dang bcas pa/_bcom ldan 'das la thal 
[\[172b.4\]]mo sbyar te/_phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po bzhi rnams ni/_bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rgyun du zhugs pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa'i 
[\[172b.5\]]rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi g.yog dang /_rim gro bgyi bar rab tu spro ste/_bcom ldan 'das chos smra ba de dag la bdag cag gis ston par 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das theg pa thams cad ni 'di las 
[\[172b.6\]]byung ngo /_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das las chos kyi rnam grangs brgya stong mang po thos kyang /_shin tu nges pa'i chos kyi don 'di lta bu bstan pa 
[\[172b.7\]]bdag cag gis sngon nam yang ma thos so/_/bcom ldan 'das grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang dang gang na/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad pa dang /_rab tu ston pa de dang der bdag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]lha rnams dang bcas te/_chos nyan pa'i slad du mchi'o/_/chos smra ba de dag la yang chos kyi srung ba bgyi'o/_/rigs kyi bu de dag ci nas 'jigs pa ma mchis par gyur cing /_'khor gyi 'jigs pa dang bral bas/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la zhugs te/_
[\[173a.2\]]gzhan la yang rgya cher rab tu ston par brtson 'grus dang /_stobs dang /_mthu dang /_spro ba dang /_spobs pa dang /_dran pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtogs pa rab tu stsal bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka gang khyod kyis chos smra ba rnams srung 
[\[173a.3\]]bar byed pa de ni/_legs so legs so/_/kau shi ka chos smra ba bzung bas na/_dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung bas ni/_sems can thams cad yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag pos/_
[\[173a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag tshangs pa'i ris kyi lhar bcas pas/_bsam gtan gyi dga' ba dang /_bde ba btang ste/_gang dang gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa de dang der/_chos kyi rnam grangs de mnyan pa'i slad du 
[\[173a.5\]]mchi'o/_/der chos smra ba de dag gis ltas bzhes na/_'dir tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i ris kyi lha rnams dang bcas te/_chos mnyan pa'i phyir lhags so zhes 'tshal bar bgyis te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_snang ba chen po mthong ba dang /_
[\[173a.6\]]lha rdzas kyi dri mnam pa dang /_chos smra ba des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la nges pa'i tshig gis nges pa'i tshig dang /_tshig gi mtshams sbyar bar tshig gi mtshams su mi brjed cing dran par spobs pa dang /_'khor de dag thams cad kyang /_sems rnam par mi g.yeng bar 
[\[173a.7\]]chos la gus par yid la bgyid pas chos nyan pa ste/_ltas bzhi po de dag gis/_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang lhan cig tu chos nyan du 'dir mchis par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la bdud sdig can gyis 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis/_bdag gi stobs dang bzhon par bcas pa thams cad stobs chung bar bgyis so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa ni/_de nyid kyis byang chub sems 
[\[173b.2\]]dpa' de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa lags te/_bcom ldan 'das/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na byang chub sems dpa' de gnas na/_de nyid sangs rgyas zhes bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das/_byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pa dang /_
[\[173b.3\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i gzi brjid kyi tshogs dang /_stobs bskyed pas/_bdag gi nga rgyal dang /_rgyags pa dang /_dregs pa rnams bcom pas/_chos smra ba de dag bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba bar dam bca'o/_/gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa der 
[\[173b.4\]]sems bskyed pa'i bag tsam gyis kyang bar chad bgyid du mi mchi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo/_dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod kyis zung shig_/lhogs 
[\[173b.5\]]shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das/_bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po da ltar bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs rgyas par bgyid pa'i rngo mi thogs lags so/_/bcom 
[\[173b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyas par rnam par dbye ba'i phyir/_snying las chung ngur gyis shig_/'khor 'di na gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phyogs bcur rgyas par byed pa dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[173b.7\]]dpa' dag tshogs shing 'khod do/_/de nas 'khor de nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcus dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phyogs 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]bcu'i 'jig rten du ma lus par rdzogs shing rgyas par bgyi'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba dang /_dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyas 
[\[174a.2\]]par bgyid de/_bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gi rna lam du grags par 'gyur ba dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_ston pa de dag ni byang chub 
[\[174a.3\]]sems dpa' byams pa'i byin gyi rlabs su rig par bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu dam pa dag ji ltar khyod da ltar nga'i mdun na dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par langs pa de bzhin 
[\[174a.4\]]du/_khyod sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi spyan sngar dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par langs pa legs so legs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[174a.5\]]ldan 'das bdag blo zhan pas/_bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir don dang /_tshig dang /_yi ge yongs su rdzogs par ma bgyis pa lta na bcom ldan 'das dang /_mi zad pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag la bdag bzod pa gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[174a.6\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros mi zad pa so so yang dag par rig pa sgrib pa med pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la don dang /_chos dang /_nges pa'i tshig dang /_spobs pa rnams la 'khrul pa med do/_/'gog pa la yang 'khrul pa med do/_/gang dag chos 
[\[174a.7\]]'di lta bu dag rtogs par khong du chud pa'i skyes bu dam pa de dag ni yang dag pa'i don rnam par nges pa thob pa yin no/_/blo gros mi zad pa khyod ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i dam pa'i mchog thob cing dbang rnyed pa/_theg pa chen po 'di la gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing rnam par 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]nges pa'i dam pa'i mchog thob pa ste/_blo gros mi zad pas 'di thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la lus kyi 'khrul pa'am/_ngag gi 'khrul pa'am/_sems kyi 'khrul pa gang yang med do/_/de dag thams cad ni ye shes sngon du 'gro ba'i lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi 
[\[174b.2\]]las dang ldan pa yin no/_/blo gros mi zad pa khyod ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang pos chos bstan pa'i phyir rjes su dgongs so/_/blo gros mi zad pa nga lta bu rnams kyis khyod 'dra ba'i skyes bu dam pa rnams la shin tu bzod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[174b.3\]]dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji lta bur gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa dang /_don dang /_
[\[174b.4\]]tshig dang /_yi ge mi zad pa bstan pa dang /_'dus pa chen po'i le'u dang /_blo gros mi zad pa'i le'u zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung na/_de las chos la dran pa'i stobs kyi mthu bskyed pa 'bum 'gyur du 
[\[174b.5\]]thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan dag la yang bstan na sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi bya bas nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dag thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros 
[\[174b.6\]]mi zad pa dang /_gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'dus pa 
[\[174b.7\]]chen po'i le'u 'bum pa las/_blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de d+harma tA shI las zhus/_skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]{D176}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya bi ma la kIr ti nir de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_'phags pa nyan thos dang /_rang 
[\[175a.2\]]sangs rgyas 'das pa dang /_da ltar gyi dang /_ma byon pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das yangs pa'i grong khyer na a mra srung ba'i tshal na/_dge slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu 
[\[175a.3\]]bzhugs te/_thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/_sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/_cang shes pa/_glang po chen po/_bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_khur bor ba/_bdag 
[\[175a.4\]]gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol du son pa sha stag go/_/byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong dang yang thabs cig ste/_mngon par shes 
[\[175a.5\]]pa mngon par shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa chen po yongs su sbyangs pa las nges par byung ba/_sangs rgyas kyis byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/_chos kyi grong khyer srung ba/_dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa/_seng ge'i sgra chen po sgrogs pa/_
[\[175a.6\]]phyogs bcur sgra shin tu bsgrags pa/_gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur pa/_dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi 'chad par byed pa/_bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa pha rol gyi rgol ba thams cad kyi zil gyis mi non pa/_dran pa dang /_
[\[175a.7\]]blo gros dang /_rtogs pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_gzungs dang /_spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa/_sgrib pa dang kun nas sdang ba thams cad dang bral ba/_sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la gnas pa/_spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa sbyin pa dang /_dul ba dang /_mi 'gyur ba dang /_yang 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]dag par sdom pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab dang /_thabs la mkhas pa dang /_smon lam dang /_stobs dang /_ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung ba/_mi dmigs pa dang mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang ldan pa/_phyir mi ldog 
[\[175b.2\]]pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba/_mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa/_sems can thams cad kyi dbang po shes pa la mkhas pa/_'khor thams cad kyi zil gyis mi non pa'i mi 'jigs pas rnam par gnon pa/_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po bsags pa/_mtshan dang 
[\[175b.3\]]dpe byad bzang po thams cad kyis lus shin tu brgyan pa/_gzugs dam pa 'dzin pa/_rgyan dang bral ba/_ri rab kyi rtse mo mtho ba bzhin du snyan pa dang grags pas mngon par 'phags pa/_lhag pa'i bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra bas sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la mi phyed pa'i dad pa rnyed pa/_
[\[175b.4\]]chos rin po che'i 'od zer las bdud rtsi'i char shin tu 'bebs pa/_sems can thams cad kyi skad dang /_smra ba dang /_dbyangs kyi yan lag dang /_sgra rnam par dag pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa/_chos zab mo rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug cing mtha' dang /_mtha' med par lta ba'i bag 
[\[175b.5\]]chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba kun gcod pa dang /_seng ge ltar 'jigs pa med cing sgra mngon par sgrogs pa/_chos chen po'i 'brug sgra sgrogs pa/_mtshungs pa dang mi mtshungs pa'i chos las yang dag par 'das pa/_chos rin po che'i shes rab dang bsod nams kyi tshogs yang dag par 
[\[175b.6\]]sgrub pa'i ded dpon chen po drang ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_phra ba dang /_'jam pa dang /_blta dka' ba dang /_rtogs par dka' ba'i chos kyi tshul la mkhas pa/_sems can rnams kyi 'ong ba dang /_'gro ba dang /_sems can gyi bsam pa rtogs pa'i rjes su zhugs pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang ldan 
[\[175b.7\]]pa/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba/_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ma 'dres pa la lhag pa'i bsam pas zhugs pa/_ngan song gi 'jigs pa dang /_ngan 'gro'i log par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa'i 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]'obs thams cad las rgal bas bsams bzhin du srid pa'i 'gro bar skye ba ston pa/_sman pa'i rgyal po chen po/_sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i cho ga la mkhas pa/_sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad rtogs pa/_ci rigs par chos kyi sman 
[\[176a.2\]]sbyar ba rab tu sbyor ba/_yon tan mtha' yas pa'i 'byung gnas dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par yon tan bkod pas legs par brgyan pa mthong ba dang /_thos pa 'bras bu yod pa/_gom pa 'dor ba 'bras bu yod pa/_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag 
[\[176a.3\]]tu med par yon tan yongs su brjod kyang yon tan gyi chu bo mtha' yas par rtogs pa la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' mnyam par lta ba zhes bya dang /_mnyam mi mnyam lta ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin rnam par sprul pa'i rgyal po dang /_chos kyi dbang phyug dang /_chos kyi tog dang /_
[\[176a.4\]]'od kyi tog dang /_'od bkod pa dang /_rin po che bkod pa dang /_bkod pa chen po dang /_spobs pa brtsegs pa dang /_rin po che brtsegs pa dang /_lag na rin po che dang /_lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang /_rtag tu lag brkyang dang /_rtag tu lag bteg dang /_rtag tu gdung dang /_
[\[176a.5\]]rtag tu dga' dgod dbang po dang /_mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang /_lha'i rgyal po dang /_smon lam la zhugs pas phyin pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa rab tu bsgrub pa thob dang /_nam mkha'i mdzod dang /_rin chen sgron ma 'dzin dang /_rin chen dpa' dang /_rin chen 
[\[176a.6\]]dga' ba dang /_rin chen dpal dang /_mig 'phrul can dang /_dra ba can gyi 'od dang /_dmigs pa med pa'i bsam gtan dang /_shes rab brtsegs dang /_rin chen gtong dang /_bdud 'joms dang /_glog gi lha dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po dang /_mtshan brtsegs 
[\[176a.7\]]yang dag 'das dang /_seng ge'i nga ro mngon par bsgrags pa'i dbyangs dang /_ri'i rtse mo kun tu 'joms pa'i rgyal po dang /_spos kyi glang po che dang /_spos kyi ba glang glang po che dang /_rtag tu 'bad dang /_brtson pa mi 'dor ba dang /_rab kyi blo gros dang /_mdzes par skyes dang /_
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]pad mo'i dpal gyi snying po dang /_pad mo bkod pa dang /_spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang /_mthu chen thob dang /_tshangs pa'i dra ba can dang /_rin chen gdan dkar can dang /_bdud las rgyal dang /_zhing snyoms brgyan dang /_nor bu rin chen gdugs dang /_gtsug na gser dang /_
[\[176b.2\]]gtsug na nor bu dang /_byams pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong ngo /_/gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa nas tshangs pa ral pa can la sogs pa tshangs pa khri bcom ldan 'das la lta ba dang /_
[\[176b.3\]]phyag 'tshal ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir lhags pa de dag kyang 'khor de nyid du 'dus so/_/gling chen po bzhi pa so so nas kyang brgya byin khri nyis stong lhags te/_de dag kyang 'khor de nyid du 'dus so/_/de bzhin du gzhan yang dbang che ba/_dbang che bar grags pa'i 
[\[176b.4\]]tshangs pa dang /_brgya byin dang /_'jig rten skyong dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur to/_/de bzhin du 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_
[\[176b.5\]]dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams kyang der lhags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal gyi snying po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te/_'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to/_/rgya mtsho'i nang nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab mngon par 'phags pa bzhin 
[\[176b.6\]]du 'khor thams cad zil gyis mnan te lam me lhan ne lhang nger dpal gyi snying po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' lid tsa bI gzhon nu dkon mchog 'byung gnas lid tsa bI gzhon nu lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig tu rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs thogs nas yangs pa'i grong 
[\[176b.7\]]khyer chen po nas byung ste/_a mra srung ba'i tshal ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/_rin po che'i gdugs ji lta bu thogs pa de dag gis bcom ldan 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]'das la mngon par bskyabs te/_mngon par bskyabs nas phyogs gcig 'khod do/_/rin po che'i gdugs de dag phul ma thag tu de'i mod la sangs rgyas kyi mthus rin po che'i gdugs de dag gcig tu gyur te/_rin po che'i gdugs des stong gsum gyi stong chen 
[\[177a.2\]]po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad khebs par snang ngo /_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi chu zheng de dag kyang rin po che'i gdugs chen po de nyid kyi nang na snang ngo /_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na ri'i rgyal po ri rab gang dag yod 
[\[177a.3\]]pa rnams dang /_gangs ri dang /_ri btang bzung dang /_ri btang bzung chen po dang /_spos kyi ngad ldan dang /_rin po che'i ri dang /_ri nag po dang /_khor yug dang /_khor yug chen po dang /_de dag thams cad kyang rin po che'i gdugs chen po de nyid kyi nang na snang ngo /_/stong 
[\[177a.4\]]gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgya mtsho chen po gang dag yod pa rnams dang /_mtsho dang /_mtshe'u dang /_rdzing dang /_'bab chu dang /_chu bran dang /_lu ma 'bab pa de dag thams cad kyang rin po che'i gdugs chen po de nyid kyi nang na snang ngo /_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 
[\[177a.5\]]'jig rten gyi khams 'di na nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang dang /_skar ma'i gzugs dang /_lha'i gnas dang /_klu'i gnas dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i gnas rnams dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi'i 
[\[177a.6\]]gnas dang /_grong dang /_gror khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang rin po che'i gdugs chen po gcig po de nyid kyi nang na snang ngo /_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos ston pa 
[\[177a.7\]]gang 'byung ba de yang rin po che'i gdugs chen po gcig po de las 'byung ba'i sgrar grag go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das las de lta bu'i cho 'phrul chen po 'di mthong nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur te/_tshim zhing mgu nas yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /_
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]yid bde ba skyes nas de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal te/_mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing 'khod do/_/de nas lid tsa bI gzhon nu dkon mchog 'byung gnas kyis bcom ldan 'das las de lta bu'i cho 'phrul chen po 'di mthong nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 
[\[177b.2\]]'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/gtsang zhing mdzes pa pad ma'i 'dab ltar yangs pa'i spyan/_/dgongs pa dag cing zhi gnas pha rol phyin mchog brnyes/_/dge ba'i las bsags yon 
[\[177b.3\]]tan rgya mtsho dpag mi lang /_/dge sbyong zhi ba'i lam brten khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/skyes bu khyu mchog 'dren pa'i rdzu 'phrul khyod gzigs shig_/bde bar gshegs pa'i zhing mchog rab gsal kun kyang gda'/_/khyod kyi chos kyi bka' mchid rgya che 'chi med 'gro/_/de dag thams cad nam mkha' 
[\[177b.4\]]'di yi dkyil na gda'/_/khyod kyi chos kyi rgyal srid mchog 'di chos kyis rgyal/_/rgyal bas 'gro ba rnams la chos kyi nor kyang stsal/_/chos rnams rab tu 'byed mkhas don dam ston mdzad pa/_/chos kyi dbang phyug chos rgyal khyod la mgos phyag 'tshal/_/mchis pa ma lags pa dang ma mchis ma 
[\[177b.5\]]lags dang /_/chos 'di thams cad rgyu las brten nas 'byung ba dang /_/'di la bdag med tshor ba po dang byed med cing /_/dge sdig las ci'ang chud mi za zhes gsung gis ston/_/thub dbang khyod kyis bdud dpung stobs can rab btul nas/_/byang chub mchog rab zhi ba mi 'chi bde ba brnyes/_/
[\[177b.6\]]de la tshor med sems dang yid kyi rgyu ba med/_/mu stegs ngan pa'i tshogs rnams kun gyis de mi rtogs/_/rmad byung chos kyi rgyal po lha mi mngon sum du/_/lan gsum bzlas pa chos kyi 'khor lo rnam mang po/_/shin tu zhi ba rang bzhin rnam dag rab tu bskor/_/de tshe dkon mchog 
[\[177b.7\]]gsum po dag kyang nye bar bstan/_/khyod kyis dkon mchog chos kyis legs par gang btul ba/_/de dag rtog pa ma mchis rtag par rab tu zhi/_/khyod ni skye rga na 'chi mthar 'byin sman pa'i mchog_/yon tan rgya mtsho dpag mi lang la mgos phyag 'tshal/_/bsti stang legs par bgyis 
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]pas mi bskyod ri rab bzhin/_/tshul khrims ldan dang tshul khrims 'chal la mtshungs par byams/_/mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs shing thugs kyang nam mkha' bzhin/_/sems can dkon mchog 'di la su zhig mchod mi bgyid/_/thub pa chen po 'khor rnams 'dus pa 'di dag 
[\[178a.2\]]ni/_/khyod kyi zhal du rab tu dad pa'i yid kyis lta/_/thams cad kyis kyang rgyal ba rang gi mdun gnas mthong /_/de ni rgyal ba'i ma 'dres sangs rgyas mtshan lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung gcig rab tu phyung ba yang /_/'khor rnams kyis ni gsung la tha dad rnam par rig_/
[\[178a.3\]]'gro ba dag gis rang gi don bzhin rnam rig pa/_/de ni rgyal ba'i ma 'dres sangs rgyas mtshan lags so/_/gsung gcig rab tu bsgrags pa mdzad pa de yis ni/_/kha cig bag chags bsgos shing kha cig rtogs par byas/_/som nyi 'tshal ba 'dren pas rab tu zhi mdzad de/_/de ni rgyal 
[\[178a.4\]]ba'i ma 'dres sangs rgyas mtshan lags so/_/stobs bcu 'dren pa'i rtsal mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'jigs pa mi mnga' 'jigs bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ma 'dres pa yi chos rnams nges par rab rtogs pa/_/'gro ba thams cad 'dren pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/kun 
[\[178a.5\]]tu sbyor ba'i bcings pa gcod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/pha rol phyin nas skam la bzhugs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dub pa'i 'gro ba sgrol ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'khor ba'i 'gro bar mi gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sems can rnams dang 'gro bar zhugs shing kun 'grogs kyang /_/
[\[178a.6\]]'gro ba thams cad las ni rnam par grol ba'i thugs/_/pad ma dag ni chu skyes chu yis yong mi gos/_/thub pa'i pad mas stong pa nyid ni nges par bsgoms/_/mtshan ma thams cad rnam pa kun tu rab tu bsal/_/khyod ni ci la'ang smon par mdzad pa yong mi mnga'/_/sangs rgyas dag gi 
[\[178a.7\]]mthu chen bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_/nam mkha' lta bur mi gnas pa la bdag phyag 'tshal/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lid tsa bI gzhon nu dkon mchog 'byung gnas kyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]'das lid tsa bI gzhon nu lnga brgya tsam po 'di dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs te/_'di dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gang lags zhes sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa zhu na/_bcom ldan 
[\[178b.2\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa legs par bshad du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lid tsa bI gzhon nu dkon mchog 'byung gnas la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_legs so legs so/_/gzhon 
[\[178b.3\]]nu khyod gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa las brtsams te de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dri ba legs so/_/de'i phyir gzhon nu khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa las brtsams te ngas khyod la bshad do/_/
[\[178b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas lid tsa bI gzhon nu dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang /_lid tsa bI gzhon nu lnga brgya tsam po de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu sems can gyi zhing ni byang 
[\[178b.5\]]chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' ji tsam du sems can rnams la rgyas par byed pa de tsam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to/_/sems can rnams ji lta bus 'dul bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to/_/sangs 
[\[178b.6\]]rgyas kyi zhing la 'jug pa ji lta bus sems can rnams sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la 'jug par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing la 'jug pa ji lta bus sems can rnams 'phags pa lta bus dbang po skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bus sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin to/_/
[\[178b.7\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni sems can gyi don las byung ba'i phyir ro/_/dkon mchog 'byung gnas 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' la ji lta bur bya ba 'dod pa de bzhin du byed mod kyi nam mkha' la ni byar mi rung zhing brgyan du yang mi rung ba de bzhin du/_
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]dkon mchog 'byung gnas chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs par shes nas byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji lta bur bya bar 'dod pa de lta bur sangs rgyas kyi zhing byed mod kyi/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nam mkhar ni byar mi rung 
[\[179a.2\]]zhing brgyan du mi rung ngo /_/dkon mchog 'byung gnas 'on kyang bsam pa'i zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/_de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sems can g.yo med pa dang /_sgyu med pa rnams skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu lhag pa'i bsam pa'i zhing ni byang chub 
[\[179a.3\]]sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/_de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dge ba'i rtsa ba dang tshogs thams cad bsags pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sbyor ba'i zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/_de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dge ba'i chos 
[\[179a.4\]]thams cad la gnas pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa rgya chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/_de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sbyin pa'i 
[\[179a.5\]]zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/_de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims kyi zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/_de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bsam pa 
[\[179a.6\]]thams cad dang ldan zhing dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su srung ba'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro/_/bzod pa'i zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/_de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan cing bzod pa dang /_dul ba dang zhi gnas 
[\[179a.7\]]dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro/_/brtson 'grus kyi zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/_de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der dge ba'i chos thams cad la brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro/_/bsam gtan gyi 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/_de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der dran pa dang shes bzhin gyis mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro/_/shes rab kyi zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/_de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[179b.2\]]zhing der yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshad med pa bzhi rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/_de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms la gnas pa'i sems can 
[\[179b.3\]]rnams skye bar 'gyur ro/_/bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/_de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der rnam par grol ba thams cad kyis yongs su zin pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro/_/thabs la mkhas pa ni byang chub sems 
[\[179b.4\]]dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/_de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der thabs dang dpyod pa thams cad la mkhas pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/_de byang chub thob pa'i sangs 
[\[179b.5\]]rgyas kyi zhing der dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_lam sgrub pa shes pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro/_/yongs su bsngo ba'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[179b.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/_de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du yon tan thams cad kyi rgyan rnams snang bar 'gyur ro/_/mi khom pa brgyad rab tu zhi bar bstan pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/_de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ngan song thams cad shin tu chad cing 
[\[179b.7\]]mi khom pa brgyad med par 'gyur ro/_/bdag nyid bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la gnas shing pha rol gyi ltung ba mi gleng ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/_de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ltung ba'i sgra yang mi grag par 'gyur ro/_/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]su dag pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste/_de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der tshe nges pa dang /_longs spyod che ba dang /_tshangs par spyod pa dang /_bden pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i tshig gis brgyan pa dang /_ngag 'jam pa dang /_'khor mi 
[\[180a.2\]]phyed pa dang /_bye ba sdum pa la mkhas pa dang /_phrag dog dang bral ba dang /_gnod sems kyi sems med pa dang /_yang dag par lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa ci 'dra bar bsam pa 
[\[180a.3\]]yang de 'dra'o/_/bsam pa ci 'dra bar sbyor ba yang de 'dra'o/_/sbyor ba ji snyed par lhag pa'i bsam pa yang de snyed do/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa ji snyed par nges par sems pa yang de snyed do/_/nges par sems pa ji snyed par sgrub pa yang de snyed do/_/sgrub pa ji snyed par 
[\[180a.4\]]yongs su bsngo ba yang de snyed do/_/yongs su bsngo ba ji snyed par thabs rnams kyang de snyed do/_/thabs rnams ji snyed par zhing yongs su dag pa yang de snyed de/_zhing yongs su dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can yongs su dag pa yang de bzhin no/_/sems can yongs su dag 
[\[180a.5\]]pa ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes yongs su dag pa yang de bzhin no/_/ye shes yongs su dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa yongs su dag pa yang de bzhin no/_/bstan pa yongs su dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ye shes bsgrubs pa yongs su dag pa yang de bzhin no/_/ye shes bsgrubs pa 
[\[180a.6\]]yongs su dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rang gi sems yongs su dag pa yang de bzhin te/_rigs kyi bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed 'dod pas rang gi sems yongs su sbyang ba la nan tan bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ji lta bur byang chub sems 
[\[180a.7\]]dpa'i sems yongs su dag pa de 'dra bar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/_gal te ji lta bur sems yongs su dag pa de 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur na/_
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_de sems yongs su ma dag gam/_ci na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di lta bur yongs su ma dag par snang snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas 
[\[180b.2\]]tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_nyi ma dang zla ba yongs su ma dag gam ci na dmus long dag gis mi mthong /_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/de ni dmus long gis nongs kyi nyi ma dang zla bas ni ma nongs so/_/bka' 
[\[180b.3\]]stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin du sems can la las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa mi mthong ba de ni sems can rnams kyis mi shes pas nyes kyi de la de bzhin gshegs pas nyes pa ni ma yin no/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni 
[\[180b.4\]]yongs su dag mod kyi khyod kyis de mi mthong ngo /_/de nas tshangs pa ral pa can gyis gnas brtan shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su ma dag go zhes ma zer cig_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[180b.5\]]yongs su dag pa 'di lta ste dper na btsun pa shA ri'i bu gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi gnas kyi bkod pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa'ang kho bos de 'dra ba mthong ngo /_/de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bus tshangs pa ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[180b.6\]]tshangs pa kho bos ni sa chen po 'di mthon dman dang /_tsher ma dang /_g.yang sa dang /_ri'i rtse mo dang /_ngam grog dang /_'jim ngan gyis rab tu gang bar mthong ngo /_/tshangs pa ral pa can gyis smras pa/_'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di 'dra bar yongs su ma dag par mthong ba ni btsun pa 
[\[180b.7\]]shA ri'i bu sems la mthon dman yod cing sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la bsam pa yongs su ma dag par nges so/_/gang dag btsun pa shA ri'i bu sems can thams cad la sems mnyam zhing sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la bsam pa yongs su dag pa de dag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di yongs su dag par 
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]mthong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di la zhabs kyi mthe bos bsnun pa dang /_bsnun ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che du ma brtsegs pa dang /_rin po che brgya stong du ma'i tshogs dag rin po che brgya stong du 
[\[181a.2\]]ma so sor bkod par gyur pa 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin chen mtha' yas bkod pa bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang de 'dra'o/_/de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de'ang ngo mtshar du gyur cing bdag nyid kyang rin po che'i pad 
[\[181a.3\]]ma bkod pa'i stan la 'dug pa snyam byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa 'di mthong ngam gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i bkod pa 
[\[181a.4\]]'di dag gda'o/_/bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ni rtag tu 'di 'dra mod kyi sems can dman pa rnams yongs su smin par byas pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de lta bur nyes pa mang po'i skyon chags par ston te/_shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na lha'i bu rnams 
[\[181a.5\]]rin po che'i snod gcig tu zas za yang bsod nams ji lta bu bsags pa'i bye brag gis lha'i zas bdud rtsi nye bar gnas pa de bzhin du shA ri'i bu sems can sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu skyes pa dag kyang sems can ji ltar yongs su dag pa bzhin du sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon 
[\[181a.6\]]tan bkod pa mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa 'di snang ba na srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/lid tsa bI gzhon nu gang dag lid tsa bI gzhon nu dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang lhan cig tu lhags pa lnga brgya 
[\[181a.7\]]po de dag kyang rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul de dag brtul ba dang /_de nas yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de phyir sngon gyi rang bzhin du gyur par snang ngo /_/de na nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi lha dang mi rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma'o 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]'du byed 'di dag ni mi rtag go snyam du rig nas srog chags sum khri nyis stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/dge slong brgyad stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya chen po la mos pa'i 
[\[181b.2\]]srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong yang chos thams cad rnam par bsgrubs pas nye bar gzhag pa'i mtshan nyid du rig nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//yang de'i 
[\[181b.3\]]tshe yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po na lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba zhig 'dug ste/_sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/_sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/_bzod pa thob pa/_spobs pa thob pa/_mngon par shes pa 
[\[181b.4\]]chen pos rnam par rtsen pa/_gzungs thob pa/_mi 'jigs pa thob pa/_bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom pa/_chos kyi tshul zab mo la shin tu zhugs pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par byung ba/_thabs mkhas pa rtogs par khong du chud pa/_spobs pa dang 
[\[181b.5\]]ldan pa/_sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la mkhas pa/_sems can gyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa las nges par byung ba so so ci rigs par chos ston pa/_theg pa chen po 'di la brtson par byas shing shes par byas pa/_shin tu brtags te las byed pa/_
[\[181b.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam la gnas pa/_blo dam pa rgya mtsho lta bu'i rjes su zhugs pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bkur te rab tu bsngags pa/_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis phyag byas pa de sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 
[\[181b.7\]]thabs la mkhas pas yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po na gnas te/_sems can mgon med pa dang dbul po rnams bsdu ba'i phyir longs spyod zad mi shes pa/_sems can tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams bsdu ba'i phyir tshul khrims yongs su dag pa/_sems can sdang ba dang /_
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]rab tu sdang ba dang /_gnod sems can dang /_tshul khrims 'chal pa dang /_khro ba'i sems can rnams bsdu ba'i phyir bzod pa dang dul ba thob pa/_sems can le lo can rnams bsdu ba'i phyir brtson 'grus 'bar ba/_sems 'khrug pa'i sems can rnams 
[\[182a.2\]]bsdu ba'i phyir bsam gtan dang /_dran pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa/_sems can 'chal pa'i shes rab can rnams bsdu ba'i phyir shes rab rnam par nges pa thob pa/_gos dkar po gyon la dge sbyong gi spyod pas phun sum tshogs pa/_khyim gyi gnas na gnas la 'dod pa'i 
[\[182a.3\]]khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams dang /_ma 'dres pa/_bu dang /_chung ma dang /_slas rnams kyang rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa/_g.yog bran gyis yongs su bskor bar snang yang rab tu dben par spyod pa/_rgyan gyis brgyan par snang yang 
[\[182a.4\]]rtag tu mtshan dang ldan pa/_zas skom gyi zas za bar snang ba yang rtag tu bsam gtan gyi dga' ba'i zas za ba/_rtsed mo dang /_rgyan po'i grwa thams cad na snang yang rtsed mo dang rgyan po la chags pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed cing rtag tu don yod par spyod pa/_ya 
[\[182a.5\]]mtshan can thams cad tshol yang sangs rgyas la mi phyed pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa/_'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gsang sngags dang bstan bcos kyi rnam pa shes kyang rtag tu chos kyi kun dga' la dga' mos pa/_'du 'dzi kun gyi nang na snang yang thams cad kyi nang 
[\[182a.6\]]na gtso bor mchod pa/_'jig rten dang 'thun par bya ba'i phyir rgan rabs dang /_bar ma dang /_gzhon nu'i grogs su gyur cing chos bzhin du smra ba/_tha snyad thams cad du 'jug kyang rnyed pa dang longs spyod la re ba med pa/_sems can thams cad gdul ba'i phyir lam gyi 
[\[182a.7\]]bzhi mdo dang sum mdo thams cad na'ang snang la sems can rnams srung ba'i phyir rgyal po'i bya ba rnams la yang zhugs pa/_theg pa dman pa la mos pa zlog cing theg pa chen po la sems can rnams yang dag par gzud pa'i phyir chos nyan pa dang /_yang dag par brjod pa thams cad 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]na yang snang ba/_byis pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir yi ge'i grwa khang thams cad du'ang 'gro ba/_'dod pa'i nyes pa yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir smad 'tshong gi khyim kun du'ang 'jug pa/_dran pa yang dag par gzhag pa'i phyir chang 'tshong ba'i khyim thams cad du'ang 
[\[182b.2\]]'jug pa/_chos kyi mchog bstan pa'i phyir tshong dpon gyi nang du yang tshong dpon du kun gyis bkur ba/_'dzin pa thams cad kyi len pa yongs su gcad pa'i phyir khyim bdag gi nang du'ang khyim bdag tu kun gyis bkur ba/_bzod pa dang des pa dang /_stobs la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir 
[\[182b.3\]]rgyal rigs kyi nang du yang rgyal rigs su kun gyis bkur ba/_nga rgyal dang /_rgyags pa dang /_dregs pa shin tu gzhom pa'i phyir bram ze'i nang du yang bram zer kun gyis bkur ba/_rgyal po'i bya ba thams cad chos dang 'thun par bsgo ba'i phyir blon po'i nang du yang blon por 
[\[182b.4\]]kun gyis bkur ba/_rgyal po'i longs spyod dang dbang phyug la chags pa bzlog pa'i phyir gzhon nu'i nang du yang gzhon nur kun gyis bkur ba/_bud med gzhon nu yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du yang nyung rum du kun gyis bkur ba/_tha mal 
[\[182b.5\]]ba'i bsod nams khyad par du 'phags par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir skye bo phal pa dang yang 'thun par 'jug pa/_dbang phyug gi bdag por bstan pa'i phyir brgya byin gyi nang du yang brgya byin du kun gyis bkur ba/_ye shes kyi khyad par bstan pa'i phyir tshangs pa'i nang du'ang 
[\[182b.6\]]tshangs par kun gyis bkur ba/_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten skyong ba'i nang du yang 'jig rten skyong bar kun gyis bkur ba ste/_de ltar lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pa tshad med pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i ye shes dang ldan te/_yangs pa'i grong 
[\[182b.7\]]khyer chen po na gnas shing 'dug go/_/de thabs la mkhas pas bdag nyid na ba lta bur bstan nas de la nad 'dri ba'i phyir yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po nas rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_dbang po dang /_gzhon nu'i 'khor dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dang /_tshong dpon dang /_
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]grong pa dang /_yul gyi mi dang /_de ma yin pa srog chags stong phrag mang po nad 'drir 'ongs te/_der lhags pa de dag la lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pas 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i lus 'di nyid las brtsams nas chos ston te/_grogs po dag lus 'di ni 'di ltar 
[\[183a.2\]]mi rtag pa/_'di ltar mi brtan pa/_'di ltar yid brtan du mi rung ba/_'di ltar nyam chung ba/_'di ltar snying po med pa/_'di ltar zhig pa/_'di ltar yun thung ba/_'di ltar sdug bsngal ba/_'di ltar nad mang ba/_'di ltar 'gyur ba'i chos can no/_/grogs po 
[\[183a.3\]]dag 'di ltar lus 'di ni nad mang po'i snod de/_mkhas pas de la gnas par mi bya'o/_/grogs po dag lus 'di ni bcang mi bzod pa ste/_dbu ba rdos pa lta bu'o/_/lus 'di ni ring du mi gnas pa ste/_chu'i chu bur lta bu'o/_/lus 'di ni nyon mongs pa'i sred pa las byung ba 
[\[183a.4\]]ste/_smig rgyu lta bu'o/_/lus 'di ni snying po med pa ste chu shing gi sdong po lta bu'o/_/kye ma lus 'di ni rus pa la rgyus pas sbrel ba ste 'khrul 'khor lta bu'o/_/lus 'di ni phyin ci log las byung ba ste sgyu ma lta bu'o/_/lus 'di ni yang dag pa ma yin pa mthong ba ste rmi lam lta 
[\[183a.5\]]bu'o/_/lus 'di ni sngon gyi las kyis gzugs brnyan snang ba ste gzugs brnyan lta bu'o/_/lus 'di ni rkyen la rag lus pa'i phyir brag ca lta bu'o/_/lus 'di ni sems 'khrug cing 'gyes pa'i mtshan nyid de sprin lta bu'o/_/lus 'di ni skad cig tu 'jig pa dang ldan zhing mi gnas pa ste 
[\[183a.6\]]glog dang mtshungs so/_/lus 'di ni rkyen sna tshogs las byung ba ste bdag po med pa'o/_/lus 'di ni sa dang 'dra ste byed pa med pa'o/_/lus 'di ni chu dang 'dra ste bdag med pa'o/_/lus 'di ni me dang 'dra ste srog med pa'o/_/lus 'di ni rlung dang 'dra ste gang zag med pa'o/_/lus 
[\[183a.7\]]'di ni nam mkha' dang 'dra ste rang bzhin med pa'o/_/lus 'di ni 'byung ba chen po rnams kyi gnas te yang dag pa ma yin pa'o/_/lus 'di ni bdag dang bdag gi med pa ste stong pa'o/_/lus 'di ni rtswa dang /_shing dang /_rtsig pa dang /_bong ba dang /_mig yor lta bu ste bems po'o/_/
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]lus 'di ni rlung gi 'khrul 'khor dang ldan pas 'byung ste tshor ba med pa'o/_/lus 'di ni rnag dang mi gtsang ba bsags pa ste gsog go/_/lus 'di ni rtag tu bsku ba dang /_mnye ba dang /_'jig pa dang /_'gyes pa'i chos can te gsob bo/_/lus 'di ni nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis 
[\[183b.2\]]gtses pa'o/_/lus 'di ni rtag tu rga bas zil gyis non pa ste khron pa rnying pa dang 'dra ba'o/_/lus 'di ni 'chi ba'i mtha' yin te mthar mi gnas pa'o/_/lus 'di ni phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched kyis yongs su zin pa ste/_gshed ma dang sbrul gdug pa 
[\[183b.3\]]dang /_grong stong pa lta bu ste/_khyod kyis de lta bu'i lus de la yid byung ba dang skyo ba bskyed cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mos pa bskyed par bgyi'o/_/grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni chos kyi sku ste ye shes las skyes pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni bsod nams 
[\[183b.4\]]las skyes pa/_sbyin pa las skyes pa/_tshul khrims las skyes pa/_ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa/_shes rab las skyes pa/_rnam par grol ba las skyes pa/_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba las skyes pa/_byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang 
[\[183b.5\]]snyoms las skyes pa/_sbyin pa dang /_dul ba dang /_yang dag par sdom pa las skyes pa/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam las skyes pa/_bzod pa dang des pa las skyes pa/_brtson 'grus brtan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las skyes pa/_bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa 
[\[183b.6\]]dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa las skyes pa/_thos pa dang /_shes rab dang /_thabs las skyes pa/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun las skyes pa/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong las skyes pa/_stobs bcu las skyes pa/_mi 'jigs pa bzhi las 
[\[183b.7\]]skyes pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad las skyes pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad las skyes pa/_mngon par shes pa dang rig pa las skyes pa/_mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba las skyes pa/_dge ba'i chos thams cad yang dag par sdud pa las skyes pa/_
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]dben pa las skyes pa/_yang dag pa nyid las skyes pa/_bag yod pa las skyes pa'o/_/grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni dge ba'i las tshad med pa las skyes pa ste/_khyed kyis de lta bu'i sku de la mos pa bskyed par bya'o/_/sems can 
[\[184a.2\]]thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nad rab tu spang ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o/_/de bzhin du lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pas de ltar nad 'dri ba'i tshogs pa de dag la ji nas sems can brgya stong mang po dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[184a.3\]]pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de lta de lta bur chos 'chad do/_/thabs la mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i le'u zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o//_//de nas lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pa 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag ni na zhing mi bde ste khri'i steng na
