[\[204a.4\]]te/_de ni skye ba dang 'jig pa 'dod pa'o/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos ni rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba ste/_de la gang dag chos gang la chags na tha na mya ngan las 'das pa la yang rung ste/_de dag ni chos 'dod pa ma yin gyi/_de dag ni 'dod chags kyi rdul 'dod pa'o/_/
[\[204a.5\]]chos ni yul ma yin te/_gang dag yul 'grang ba de dag ni chos 'dod pa ma yin gyi/_de dag ni yul 'dod pa'o/_/chos ni blang ba med pa/_dor ba med pa ste/_gang dag chos gang la 'dzin pa dang /_gtong ba de dag ni chos 'dod pa ma yin te/_de dag ni 'dzin pa dang gtong 
[\[204a.6\]]ba 'dod pa'o/_/chos ni kun gzhi med pa ste/_gang kun gzhi la dga' ba de dag ni chos 'dod pa ma yin gyi/_de dag ni kun gzhi 'dod pa'o/_/chos ni mtshan ma med pa stong pa ste/_gang dag gi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma'i rjes su 'jug pa de dag ni chos 'dod pa ma yin 
[\[204a.7\]]te/_de dag ni mtshan ma 'dod pa'o/_/chos ni lhan cig gnas pa ma yin te/_gang su dag chos dang lhan cig gnas pa de dag ni chos 'dod pa ma yin gyi/_de dag ni gnas pa 'dod pa'o/_/chos ni mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_bye brag phyed pa dang /_rnam par rig 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]pa ma yin te/_gang dag mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_bye brag phyed pa dang /_rnam par rig pa la spyod pa de dag ni mthong pa dang /_thos pa dang /_bye brag phyed pa dang /_rnam par rig pa 'dod pa yin gyi de dag ni chos 'dod pa ma yin no/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu chos ni 'dus byas dang 'dus ma 
[\[204b.2\]]byas med pa ste/_gang dag 'dus byas spyod yul ba de dag ni chos 'dod pa ma yin gyi de dag ni 'dus byas su 'dzin pa 'dod pa'o/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu de lta bas na khyod chos 'dod par bya na khyod kyis chos thams cad mi 'dod par bya'o/_/chos bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu lnga brgya chos rnams 
[\[204b.3\]]la chos kyi mig rnam par dag go/_/de nas lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod kyis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong grangs med pa dag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyu zhing 'gro ba na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na seng ge'i khri thams cad kyi 
[\[204b.4\]]mchog yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa dag mthong /_de skad ces smras pa dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di nas shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten 
[\[204b.5\]]gyi khams lhun po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i sgron ma'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku ni dpag tshad 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i seng ge'i khri'i tshad ni dpag tshad 'bum 
[\[204b.6\]]phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi lus kyang dpag tshad 'bum phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis so/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi seng ge'i khri yang dpag tshad 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa bzhi yod de/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i sgron ma'i rgyal po de'i 
[\[204b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams lhun po'i rgyal mtshan de na seng ge'i khri thams cad kyi mchog yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa dag yod do/_/de nas lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pas de'i tshe de lta bu'i bsam pa kun bsams shing /_'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul 'di mngon par 'du byed pa 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]mngon par byas te/_gang 'jig rten gyi khams lhun po'i rgyal mtshan de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i sgron ma'i rgyal po des seng ge'i khri sum khri nyis stong bskur te/_de tsam du 'phang mtho ba/_de tsam du yangs pa/_de tsam du blta na sdug pa/_
[\[205a.2\]]gang byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_lha'i bu de dag gis sngon ma mthong ba de dag steng gi nam mkha' las 'ongs te/_lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pa'i khyim du so sor gnas 
[\[205a.3\]]so/_/seng ge'i khri sna tshogs sum khri nyis stong ma 'dom par shong ste/_khyim de yang de tsam du yangs par snang ngo /_/yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po yang bsgribs par gyur pa med/_'dzam bu'i gling dang gling bzhi pa yang bsgribs pa med de/_de dag thams cad kyang sngon ji lta ba 
[\[205a.4\]]bzhin du snang ngo /_/de nas lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal seng ge'i khri dang 'tsham pa'i lus su byin gyis rlobs la byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag dang seng ge'i khri la 'dug shig_/de nas byang chub 
[\[205a.5\]]sems dpa' gang mngon par shes pa thob pa de dag ni bdag gi lus dpag tshad 'bum phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis par byin gyis brlabs te seng ge'i khri la 'khod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang dag las dang po pa de dag ni seng ge'i khri de dag la 'dug ma nus so/_/de nas lid tsa bI dri 
[\[205a.6\]]ma med par grags pas ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag mngon par shes pa lnga 'grub par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bur byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos bstan te/_de dag gis mngon par shes pa thob nas lus dpag tshad 'bum phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis par mngon par sprul te seng ge'i khri de 
[\[205a.7\]]dag la 'khod do/_/nyan thos chen po de dag kyang seng ge'i khri de dag la 'khod ma nus te/_de nas lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu seng ge'i khri la 'dug shig_/smras pa/_skyes bu dam pa seng ge'i khri 'di dag mtho zhing che 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]bas 'dug mi nus so/_/smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i sgron ma'i rgyal po de la phyag gyis shig dang /_'dug nus par 'gyur ro/_/de nas nyan thos chen po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i sgron ma'i rgyal po de la phyag 
[\[205b.2\]]'tshal nas gdod de dag seng ge'i khri la 'khod do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyim chung ngu'i nang du seng ge'i khri 'di lta bur mtho zhing che ba sna tshogs 'di lta bu stong phrag 'di snyed chud pa dang /_'di dag gis 
[\[205b.3\]]yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po yang bsgribs par ma gyur/_'dzam bu'i gling gi grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i 'khor dang /_gling chen po bzhi la'ang cung zad kyang ma bsgribs/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_
[\[205b.4\]]nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i gnas rnams kyang bsgribs par ma gyur te/_sngon ci 'dra ba phyis kyang de bzhin du snang ba ni ngo mtshar to/_/lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pas smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[205b.5\]]rnams la ni rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba yod de/_rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni ri'i rgyal po ri rab de tsam du mtho ba/_de tsam du che ba/_de tsam du 'phags pa/_de tsam du yangs pa yang yungs 'bru'i nang du 
[\[205b.6\]]'jug ste/_yungs 'bru de yang skyes pa yang med/_ri rab kyang gang ba'ang med la bya ba de yang ston to/_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyang bdag cag gang du bcug mi shes so/_/rdzu 'phrul gyis 'dul ba'i sems can gzhan 
[\[205b.7\]]dag gis ni ri'i rgyal po ri rab de yungs 'bru'i nang du bcug par shes shing mthong ngo /_/de ni btsun pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul la 'jug pa'o/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu'i phung po rnams ba spu'i khung bu gcig tu blugs te/_nya dang /_rus sbal dang /_chu srin byis pa gsod dang /_sbal pa dang /_chu las skyes pa'i srog chags gzhan dag la yang gnod par gyur pa 
[\[206a.2\]]med/_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin rnams kyang 'di snyam du bdag cag gar btsud snyam yang mi sems la/_bya ba de yang snang zhing sems can de dag la gnod cing 'khrug par gyur pa yang med do/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[206a.3\]]'di yang rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo bzhin lag pa g.yas pas blangs te bskor nas 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'phangs kyang sems can rnams bdag cag gang du phyung gang nas 'ongs mi shes so/_/slar yang blangs nas gnas bzhin du bzhag kyang 'ong ba 
[\[206a.4\]]dang 'gro bar mi shes mod kyi bya ba de yang kun tu snang ngo /_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'khor ba tshad med pas 'dul ba'i sems can dag kyang yod/_'khor ba bstung bas 'dul ba dag kyang yod de/_de la rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa'i byang 
[\[206a.5\]]chub sems dpa' ni 'khor ba tshad med pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir zhag bdun yang bskal pa 'das par ston te/_'khor ba bstung bas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni bskal pa yang zhag bdun gyis 'das par ston to/_/de la 'khor 
[\[206a.6\]]ba tshad med pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams ni zhag bdun la yang bskal pa 'das pa snyam du shes so/_/gang 'khor ba bstung bas 'dul ba'i sems can de dag ni bskal pa yang zhag bdun gyis 'das par shes so/_/de ltar rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 
[\[206a.7\]]gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu ston to/_/sems can thams cad kyang lag pa g.yas pa'i mthil du bzhag ste/_sems kyi mgyogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro zhing sangs rgyas 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]kyi zhing kun tu ston kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig nas kyang ma g.yos so/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa ji snyed yod pa de thams cad spu'i khung bu gcig tu ston to/_/phyogs bcu na zla ba dang /_nyi ma dang /_skar ma'i gzugs ji snyed yod 
[\[206b.2\]]pa de thams cad kyang spu'i khung bu gcig tu ston to/_/phyogs bcu na rlung gi dkyil 'khor ldang ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kha'i nang du brngubs kyang de'i lus zhig pa'ang med cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi rtswa dang nags tshal rnams nyal ba'ang med do/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs 
[\[206b.3\]]rgyas kyi zhing rnams bsregs pa'i bskal pas tshig pa'i me'i phung po de kun rang gi ltor bcug kyang gang des las bya ba de'ang byed do/_/'og tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de steng du byung ste bteg nas/_gyen du sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[206b.4\]]gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das par steng du 'jog ste/_'di lta ste/_dper na skyes bu mthu chen po zhig gis khab kyi rtse mos rgya shug gi lo ma la btsugs te bteg pa bzhin no/_/de ltar rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[206b.5\]]can thams cad 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs su byin gyis rlob bo/_/de bzhin du 'jig rten skyong ba'i gzugs su byin gyis rlob bo/_/brgya byin gyi gzugs su byin gyis rlob bo/_/tshangs pa'i gzugs su byin gyis rlob bo/_/nyan thos kyi gzugs su byin gyis rlob bo/_/
[\[206b.6\]]rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su byin gyis rlob bo/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs su byin gyis rlob bo/_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su byin gyis rlob bo/_/phyogs bcu na sems can rab 'bring tha ma thams cad kyi sgrar grags pa dang /_sgrar 
[\[206b.7\]]btags pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi gsung dbyangs dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang chos kyi sgra dang /_dge 'dun gyi sgrar byin gyis rlob ste/_sgra dbyangs de las kyang mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa'i sgra dbyangs 'byung 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]bar byed de/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rnam pa ji snyed du bstan pas chos ston pa de dag thams cad sgra dang dbyangs de dag las 'byung bar byed do/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di ni rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[207a.2\]]dpa' rnams kyi yul la 'jug pa cung zad tsam zhig bstan par zad de/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yul la 'jug pa bstan pa ni bskal pa las lhag pa'am/_de las 'das pa yang 
[\[207a.3\]]kho bos bshad do/_/de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa 'di thos nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/_gnas brtan shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste dper na mi 
[\[207a.4\]]dmus long gi mdun du la las gzugs su gyur ba thams cad bstan kyang dmus long des gzugs gcig kyang mi mthong ba de bzhin du/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sgo 'di bstan pa'i tshe nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dmus 
[\[207a.5\]]long dang 'dra bar mig med de/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyu gcig tsam yang mngon sum du ma gyur na/_rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di thos nas mkhas pa su zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mi skyed/_dbang po shin tu nyams pa 
[\[207a.6\]]sa bon tshig pa dang rul ba ltar theg pa chen po 'di la snod du ma gyur na da ji ltar bya/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis chos bstan pa 'di thos nas cho nges btab ste/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su go bar byas so/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[207a.7\]]thams cad kyis ni rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di thos na rgyal bu gzhon nus cod pan blang ba bzhin du rab tu dga' bas spyi bor blang zhing 'di la mos pa'i stobs shin tu bskyed par bya'o/_/gang rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di la mos pa de la bdud 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]thams cad kyang ci zhig byed par 'gyur/_gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu sum khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de nas lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pas gnas brtan 'od srung chen po la 'di 
[\[207b.2\]]skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa 'od srung chen po phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa dag na bdud ji snyed bdud byed pa de dag thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams thabs la mkhas pas sems can 
[\[207b.3\]]yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bdud byed do/_/btsun pa 'od srung chen po phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa dag na byang chub sems dpa' la slong ba gang dag gis lag pa'am/_rkang pa'am/_rna ba'am/_sna'am/_khrag gam/_rgyus pa'am/_rus 
[\[207b.4\]]pa'am/_rkang pa'am/_mig gam/_ro stod dam/_mgo'am/_yan lag dang /_nying lag gam/_rgyal po'i srid dam/_yul 'khor ram/_ljongs sam/_chung ma dang /_bu pho dang /_bu mo dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_rta dang /_glang po che dang /_shing rta dang /_bzhon 
[\[207b.5\]]pa dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_nor bu rin po che rnams kyang rung /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_bro ba rnams sam/_gos rnams kyang rung /_nyam nga bar byas te slong ba de dag thams cad 
[\[207b.6\]]kyang phal cher rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams te/_thabs la mkhas pas lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa 'di ston to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_btsun pa 'od srung chen po byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dka' thub drag pas na 
[\[207b.7\]]de lta bur ston te/_go skabs ma phye bar byang chub sems dpa' la nyam nga bar byed pa'i mthu skye bo phal po che la med do/_/go skabs ma phye bar gsad pa'am bslang bar yang mi nus so/_/btsun pa 'od srung 'di lta ste/_dper na srin bu me khyer gyis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]gyi 'od zil gyis mnan par mi nus pa de bzhin du btsun pa 'od srung go skabs ma phye bar byang chub sems dpa'i thad du 'gro ba'am bslang bar mi nus so/_/btsun pa 'od srung chen po 'di lta ste/_dper na bal glang glang po che la brdeg pa ni bong bus bzod par 
[\[208a.2\]]mi nus te/_de bzhin du btsun pa 'od srung chen po byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pas byang chub sems dpa' la nyam nga bar byed mi nus kyi byang chub sems dpa' nyid byang chub sems dpa' la nyam nga bar byed de/_byang chub sems dpas nyam nga bar byas pa byang chub sems dpas 
[\[208a.3\]]bzod do/_/btsun pa 'od srung chen po de ni rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs shes pa'i stobs la 'jug pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//de 
[\[208a.4\]]nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/skyes bu dam pa byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la ji ltar blta bar bya/_smras pa/_'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na skyes bu mkhas pa chu zla la lta ba de 
[\[208a.5\]]bzhin du byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la blta bar bya'o/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na sgyu ma mkhan dag sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa'i mi la lta ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la blta bar bya'o/_/'jam dpal 'di lta 
[\[208a.6\]]ste/_dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor la bzhin lta ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la blta bar bya'o/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na smig rgyu'i chu ltar byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la blta bar bya'o/_/'jam 
[\[208a.7\]]dpal 'di lta ste dper na brag ca'i sgra skad lta bur byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la blta bar bya'o/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' la sprin gyi phung po lta bur byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la blta bar bya'o/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]dbu ba rdos pa'i sngon gyi mtha' lta bur byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la blta bar bya'o/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na chu'i chu bur 'byung ba dang 'jig pa ltar byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la so sor brtag go/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na chu 
[\[208b.2\]]shing la snying po lta ba ltar byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la so sor brtag go/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na glog gi 'pho ba ltar byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la so sor brtag go/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na khams lnga po ltar 
[\[208b.3\]]byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la so sor brtag go/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na skye mched bdun po ltar byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la so sor brtag go/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na gzugs med pa dag la gzugs su snang ba ltar 
[\[208b.4\]]byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la so sor brtag go/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na sa bon brngos pa las myu gu 'grub pa ltar byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la so sor brtag go/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na sbal pa'i spu'i gos ltar byang 
[\[208b.5\]]chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la so sor brtag go/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na shi ba 'dod pa'i rtsed mo la dga' ba ltar byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la so sor brtag go/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'jig tshogs 
[\[208b.6\]]la lta ba ltar byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la so sor brtag go/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na lan cig phyir 'ong ba la srid pa gsum po ltar byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la so sor brtag go/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na phyir 
[\[208b.7\]]mi 'ong ba la mngal du 'jug pa ltar byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la so sor brtag go/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na dgra bcom pa la 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug bzhin du byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la so sor 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]brtag go/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ser sna dang /_'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang /_gnod sems dang /_rnam par 'tshe ba'i sems bzhin du byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la so sor brtag 
[\[209a.2\]]go/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa la bag chags bzhin du byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la so sor brtag go/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na mi dmus long gis gzugs mthong ba ltar byang chub sems dpas sems can 
[\[209a.3\]]thams cad la so sor brtag go/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la so sor brtag go/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' la 
[\[209a.4\]]ni bya'i rjes bzhin du byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la so sor brtag go/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na ma ning la pho mtshan skye ba bzhin du byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la so sor brtag go/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na mo gsham 
[\[209a.5\]]gyi bu rnyed pa bzhin du byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la so sor brtag go/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i nyon mongs pa'i ma skyes pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la so sor brtag go/_/
[\[209a.6\]]'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na rmi lam na snang ba sad na mthong ba bzhin du byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la so sor brtag go/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na kun tu mi rtog pa la nyon mongs pa bzhin du byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la so sor brtag 
[\[209a.7\]]go/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na rgyu med pa las me 'byung ba bzhin du byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la so sor brtag go/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i nying mtshams sbyor ba bzhin du byang chub sems dpas sems can thams 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]cad la so sor brtag go/_/'jam dpal de lta bur yang dag pa nyid bdag med par rab tu rtogs pas byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la so sor brtag go/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu gal te byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la de lta bur so sor brtag na ji 
[\[209b.2\]]ltar na de sems can thams cad la byams pa chen po skye bar 'gyur/_smras pa/_'jam dpal nam byang chub sems dpa' de ltar so sor rtog pa na de ltar chos yongs su shes nas sems can 'di dag la'ang bdag gis chos bstan to snyam ste/_de bas na de sems can thams cad 
[\[209b.3\]]la yang dag pa'i skyabs kyi byams pa skye ste/_len pa med pa'i phyir nye bar zhi ba'i byams pa'o/_/nyon mongs pa med pas gdung ba med pa'i byams pa'o/_/dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ci bzhin pa nyid kyi byams pa'o/_/kun nas ldang ba med pa'i phyir 'gal ba 
[\[209b.4\]]med pa'i byams pa'o/_/phyi nang ma 'dres pa'i phyir gnyis su med pa'i byams pa'o/_/shin tu mthar thug pa'i phyir mi 'khrugs pa'i byams pa'o/_/bsam pa rdo rje lta bur mi phyed pa'i phyir brtan pa'i byams pa'o/_/rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i phyir 
[\[209b.5\]]yongs su dag pa'i byams pa'o/_/bsam pa mnyam pa'i phyir mnyam pa'i byams pa'o/_/dgra bcom pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa'i byams pa'o/_/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa'o/_/yang de bzhin nyid khong du chud 
[\[209b.6\]]pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i byams pa'o/_/sems can gnyid kyis log pa rab tu sad par byed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi byams pa'o/_/rang mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyir rang byung gi byams pa'o/_/ro mtshungs pa'i phyir byang chub kyi byams pa'o/_/rjes 
[\[209b.7\]]su chags pa dang /_khong khro ba spangs pa'i phyir sgro btags pa med pa'i byams pa'o/_/theg pa chen po yongs su snang bar byed pa'i phyir snying rje chen po'i byams pa'o/_/stong pa dang bdag med par so sor rtog pa'i phyir yongs su mi skyo ba'i byams pa'o/_/slob dpon dpe mkhyud 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]med pa'i phyir chos kyi sbyin pa'i byams pa'o/_/tshul khrims 'chal pa'i sems can la lta ba'i phyir tshul khrims kyi byams pa'o/_/bdag dang pha rol srung ba'i phyir bzod pa'i byams pa'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi khur khyer ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi byams 
[\[210a.2\]]pa'o/_/ro myang ba med pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyi byams pa'o/_/dus su thob par byed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi byams pa'o/_/thams cad du sgo ston pa'i phyir thabs kyi byams pa'o/_/bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir tshul 'chos pa med pa'i byams pa'o/_/bsam pa thag pa nas byed 
[\[210a.3\]]pa'i phyir g.yo med pa'i byams pa'o/_/nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa'i byams pa'o/_/bcos ma ma yin pa'i phyir sgyu med pa'i byams pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi bde ba la 'god pa'i phyir bde ba'i byams pa ste/_'jam dpal de ni byang chub sems 
[\[210a.4\]]dpa'i byams pa chen po'o/_/smras pa/_de'i snying rje chen po gang yin/_smras pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba ci byas pa sems can thams cad la gtong ba'o/_/smras pa/_de'i dga' ba chen po gang yin/_smras pa/_gang byin nas yid dga' bar 'gyur te mi 'gyod pa'o/_/smras pa/_
[\[210a.5\]]de'i btang snyoms gang yin/_smras pa/_gang gnyi ga'i don du 'gyur ba'o/_/smras pa/_'khor ba'i 'jigs pas skrag pa gang la brten par bya/_smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i 'jigs pas skrag pa ni sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid la brten par 
[\[210a.6\]]bya'o/_/smras pa/_sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid la gnas par 'dod pas gang la gnas par bya/_smras pa/_sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid la gnas par 'dod pas sems can thams cad la snyoms par gnas par bya'o/_/smras pa/_sems can thams cad la snyoms par 
[\[210a.7\]]gnas par 'dod pas gang la gnas par bya/_smras pa/_sems can thams cad la snyoms par gnas par 'dod pas sems can thams cad rab tu thar bar bya ba'i phyir gnas par bya'o/_/smras pa/_sems can thams cad rab tu thar bar bya bar 'dod pas ji lta bur bya/_
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]smras pa/_sems can thams cad rab tu thar bar bya bar 'dod pas nyon mongs pa las rab tu thar bar bya'o/_/smras pa/_nyon mongs pa spang bar 'dod pas/_ji ltar rab tu sbyar bar bya/_smras pa/_nyon mongs pa spang bar 'dod pas tshul bzhin rab tu sbyar bar bya'o/_/smras 
[\[210b.2\]]pa/_ji lta bur rab tu sbyar na/_tshul bzhin du rab tu sbyor ba yin/_smras pa/_skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa la rab tu sbyor ba ni tshul bzhin du/_rab tu sbyor ba yin no/_/smras pa/_ci mi skyed/_ci mi 'gog_/smras pa/_mi dge ba rnams mi skyed cing /_
[\[210b.3\]]dge ba rnams mi 'gog go/_/smras pa/_dge ba dang mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang /_smras pa/_'jig tshogs ni rtsa ba'o/_/smras pa/_'jig tshogs kyi rtsa ba gang /_smras pa/_'jig tshogs kyi rtsa ba ni 'dod pa dang chags pa'o/_/smras pa/_'dod pa dang chags pa'i 
[\[210b.4\]]rtsa ba gang /_smras pa/_'dod pa dang chags pa'i rtsa ba ni yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa'o/_/smras pa/_yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa'i rtsa ba gang /_smras pa/_yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa'i rtsa ba ni phyin ci log gi 'du shes so/_/smras pa/_
[\[210b.5\]]phyin ci log gi 'du shes kyi rtsa ba gang /_smras pa/_phyin ci log gi 'du shes kyi rtsa ba ni rten med pa'o/_/smras pa/_rten med pa'i rtsa ba gang /_smras pa/_'jam dpal gang rten med pa de'i rtsa bar 'gyur ba ci zhig yod de/_de ltar chos thams cad ni rten med pa'i rtsa ba la 
[\[210b.6\]]gnas pa'o/_/de nas khyim de na gang gnas pa'i lha mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi chos bstan pa 'di thos nas dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_bdag gi lus rags pa bstan nas lha'i me tog dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 
[\[210b.7\]]dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag la mngon par gtor te/_gtor ba dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus la me tog gang dag bab pa de dag ni sa la lhung ngo /_/nyan thos chen po rnams kyi lus la me tog gang dag bab pa de dag ni de nyid du chags nas sa la ma lhung ngo /_/de 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]nas nyan thos chen po de dag rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis me tog de dag sprugs kyang ma lhung ngo /_/de nas lha mo des tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu me tog 'di dag sprugs te ci bya/_smras pa lha mo me tog 'di dag ni rung ba ma 
[\[211a.2\]]yin pas na bdag me tog 'di dag 'dor ro/_/lha mos smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu de skad ma smra zhig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_me tog 'di dag ni rung ba yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar me tog de dag ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog pa ste/_gnas brtan shA ri'i bu 
[\[211a.3\]]nyid rtog cing rnam par rtog go/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang dag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung nas rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa de dag ni rung ba ma yin pa'o/_/gnas brtan ni rtog cing rnam par rtog ste/_gang dag mi rtog pa de dag ni rung ba'o/_/btsun 
[\[211a.4\]]pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa spangs pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag gi lus la me tog mi chags pa la ltos 'di lta ste/_dper na 'jigs pa'i rang bzhin can gyi mi la ni mi ma yin pa rnams kyis glags rnyed do/_/de bzhin 
[\[211a.5\]]du 'khor ba'i 'jigs pas skrag pa rnams la ni gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg byas glags rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/gang dag 'du byed thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba de dag la ni gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg byas 
[\[211a.6\]]ci zhig byar yod/_gang dag bag chags ma spangs pa de dag la ni me tog kyang 'chags kyi/_gang dag bag chags spangs pa de dag gi lus la me tog mi chags te/_de bas na bag chags thams cad spangs pa rnams kyi lus la me tog mi chags so/_/de nas tshe dang 
[\[211a.7\]]ldan pa shA ri'i bus lha mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha mo khyod khyim 'di'i nang du zhugs nas yun ji srid cig lon/_lha mos smras pa/_gnas brtan gyis rnam par grol ba la zhugs nas yun ji srid pa'o/_/smras pa/_lha mo khyod khyim 'dir gnas nas ring po ma lon pa 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]lta zhig_/smras pa/_gnas brtan gyis rnam par grol ba la zhugs nas ji srid lon/_de nas gnas brtan cang mi zer bar gyur to/_/smras pa/_gnas brtan shes rab chen po dang ldan pa'i mchog ni ci'i phyir mi smra zhing /_da dus la bab na dris pa'i lan mi blan/_smras pa/_lha 
[\[211b.2\]]mo rnam par grol ba ni brjod du med na de ji skad du brjod mi shes so/_/smras pa/_gnas brtan gyis gang yi ger brjod pa de thams cad kyang rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rnam par grol ba gang yin pa de ni nang na'ang med/_phyi rol na'ang med/_gnyi ga med par 
[\[211b.3\]]yang mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du yi ge de nang na'ang med/_phyi rol na'ang med/_gnyi ga med par yang mi dmigs so/_/de lta bas na btsun pa shA ri'i bu yi ge bsal bas rnam par grol ba ma ston cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad mnyam pa ni 'phags pa'i rnam 
[\[211b.4\]]par grol ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/smras pa/_lha mo 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang bral ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba ma yin nam/_lha mos smras pa/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang bral bas rnam par grol ba'o zhes bya ba 'di ni mngon pa'i nga 
[\[211b.5\]]rgyal can rnams la bstan pa ste/_gang dag mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa de dag la ni 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi rang bzhin nyid rnam par grol ba'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus lha mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/legs so legs so/_/lha mo khyod kyis 
[\[211b.6\]]ci thob cing ci la mngon du byas nas khyod de lta bu'i spobs pa dang ldan/_smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu bdag gis ni ci'ang thob pa'ang med/_mngon sum du byas pa'ang med de/_des na bdag gi spobs pa 'di 'dra'o/_/gang dag 'di snyam du bdag gis thob cing mngon sum du byas so snyam 
[\[211b.7\]]pa de dag ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la nga rgyal can zhes bya'o/_/smras pa/_lha mo khyod nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am/_theg pa chen po pa'am/_smras pa/_bdag ni nyan thos kyi theg pa ston pas na nyan thos kyi theg pa can no/_/bdag 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]ni rten 'brel bcu gnyis kyi sgo nas 'jug pas na rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can no/_/bdag ni snying rje chen po mi gtong bas na theg pa chen po pa yin mod kyi 'on kyang btsun pa shA ri'i bu dper na tsam pa ka'i tshal du zhugs na e ran ta'i dri la mi snom gyi/_tsam pa 
[\[212a.2\]]ka'i tshal du zhugs na tsam pa ka nyid kyi dri la snom pa de bzhin du btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyim 'di na sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi yon tan dri dang ldan pa gnas pas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi dri la mi snom mo/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyim 'dir brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten 
[\[212a.3\]]skyong ba dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po gang dag khyim 'dir gnas pa de dag kyang skyes bu dam pa 'di'i chos thos pas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi yon tan gyi dris byang chub kyi sems 
[\[212a.4\]]bskyed de dong ngo /_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu bdag khyim 'di na lo bcu gnyis lon yang byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen por ldan pa dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dang ldan pa ma gtogs par nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i gtam sngon ma thos 
[\[212a.5\]]so/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyim 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnam pa brgyad rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par snang ngo /_/brgyad po gang zhe na/_khyim 'di na gser gyi kha dog gi 'od rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad pas na mtshan mo'am/_nyin bar du yang mi mngon/_khyim 'dir zla ba dang 
[\[212a.6\]]nyi ma'ang mi mngon mi snang ste/_de ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos dang ldan pa dang po'o/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang gang dag khyim 'dir zhugs pa de dag zhugs ma thag tu nyon mongs pas gtse ba med de de ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gnyis pa'o/_/btsun pa 
[\[212a.7\]]shA ri'i bu gzhan yang khyim 'di na rtag tu brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang mi 'bral te/_de ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gsum pa'o/_/gzhan yang btsun pa 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]shA ri'i bu khyim 'di na rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par chos bsgrags pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i gtam dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i gtam dang mi 'bral te/_de ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bzhi pa'o/_/gzhan yang btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyim 'di na 
[\[212b.2\]]rtag tu lha dang /_mi'i rnga dang /_glu'i dbyangs dang /_rol mo byed de/_rnga de dag las sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa bsgrub pa'i sgra dus thams cad du 'byung ste/_'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos lnga pa'o/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang khyim 'di na rin po che thams cad kyis 
[\[212b.3\]]gang ba zad mi shes pa'i gter chen po bzhi yod de/_de'i mthus sems can dbul zhing phongs pa thams cad kyis khyer te dong yang zad mi shes te/_de ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos drug pa'o/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang khyim 'di na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang /_snang 
[\[212b.4\]]ba mtha' yas dang /_mi 'khrugs pa dang /_dkon mchog dpal dang /_dkon mchog 'od 'phro dang /_dkon mchog zla ba dang /_dkon mchog bkod pa dang /_bzod dka' dang /_don thams cad grub pa dang /_rin chen mang dang /_seng ge bsgrags pa dang /_seng ge'i sgra de 
[\[212b.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa rnams skyes bu dam pa 'dis bsams ma thag tu kun gshegs te/_gshegs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo la 'jug pa bstan nas slar gshegs te/_de ni ngo 
[\[212b.6\]]mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bdun pa'o/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang khyim 'di na lha thams cad kyi gnas kyi bkod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa thams cad snang ste/_de ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos brgyad pa'o/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyim 'di na ngo mtshar rmad 
[\[212b.7\]]du byung ba'i chos brgyad po de dag snang ste/_'di lta bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos mthong na nyan thos kyi chos la su zhig 'dod par 'gyur/_smras pa/_lha mo khyod bud med kyi dngos po las bsgyur na ci nyes/_smras pa/_bdag gi lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du bud med kyi dngos po btsal 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]na'ang da dung ma rnyed do/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu sgyu ma mkhan gyis bud med sprul pa de la 'di ltar khyod bud med kyi dngos po las bsgyur na ci nyes zhes byas na de ji skad zer bar 'gyur/_smras pa/_de la yang dag pa yongs su grub pa gang yang med do/_/smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu de 
[\[213a.2\]]bzhin du chos thams cad yongs su ma grub pa ste/_sgyu mas sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid la bud med kyi dngos po las bsgyur na ci nyes zhes khyod de snyam du sems/_de nas lha mo des 'di lta bur byin gyi brlab pas byin gyis brlabs nas ji lta bur gnas brtan shA ri'i bu lha mo de ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar 
[\[213a.3\]]snang ste/_lha mo de yang gnas brtan shA ri'i bu ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar snang ngo /_/de nas lha mo shA ri'i bu'i gzugs su gyur pa des shA ri'i bu lha mo'i gzugs su gyur pa de la 'di ltar btsun pa shA ri'i bu bud med kyi dngos po las bsgyur na ci nyes zhes dris so/_/shA ri'i bu lha mo'i 
[\[213a.4\]]gzugs su gyur pas 'di skad ces smras so/_/kho bo skyes pa'i gzugs ni mi snang bar gyur te/_kho bo bud med kyi lus su gyur nas gang bsgyur mi shes so/_/smras pa/_gal te gnas brtan gyis bud med kyi gzugs las slar bsgyur nus na ni bud med thams cad 
[\[213a.5\]]kyang bud med kyi dngos po las 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar gnas brtan bud med du snang ba de bzhin du bud med thams cad kyang bud med kyi gzugs su snang ste/_bud med ma yin pa las bud med kyi gzugs su snang ngo /_/de la dgongs te bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad bud med 
[\[213a.6\]]kyang ma yin/_skyes pa'ang ma yin zhes gsungs so/_/de nas lha mo des byin gyis brlabs de btang ba dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu slar yang bdag gi gzugs dang ldan par gyur to/_/de nas lha mo des shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod kyis bud 
[\[213a.7\]]med kyi gzugs su byas pa de ga re/_smras pa/_bdag gis byas pa'ang med bsgyur ba'ang med do/_/smras pa/_de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang byas pa'ang med/_bsgyur ba'ang med do/_/gang ma byas shing bsgyur ba med pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi bka'o/_/smras pa/_lha mo khyod 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa de gar skye bar bdag kyang der skye'o/_/smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa la ni 'chi 'pho ba yang med/_skye ba yang med do/_smras pa/_chos thams cad kyang de bzhin te/_'chi 'pho med cing skye ba 
[\[213b.2\]]med do/_/smras pa/_lha mo khyod ci srid na byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/_smras pa/_gang gi tshe gnas brtan khyod so so'i skye bo'i chos dang ldan par 'gyur ba de'i tshe bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/smras pa/_lha mo kho bo so so'i skye bo'i 
[\[213b.3\]]chos dang ldan par 'gyur ba de ni gnas ma yin no/_/smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de ni gnas ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub ni gnas ma yin pa la gnas pa'i phyir te/_de lta bas na gnas ma yin pa la ni su 
[\[213b.4\]]yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med do/_/gnas brtan shA ri'i bus smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ni gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/mngon par 
[\[213b.5\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/lha mos smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams zhes bya ba de ni yi ge bgrang ba'i brda'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]te/_sangs rgyas rnams ni 'das pa'am ma 'ongs pa'am/_
[\[213b.6\]]da ltar byung ba ma yin te/_byang chub ni dus gsum las yang dag par 'das pa'o/_/gnas brtan gyis dgra bcom pa thob bam/_smras pa/_thob pa med pa'i rgyus thob bo/_/smras pa/_de bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa med pa'i rgyus mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[213b.7\]]byang chub bo/_/de nas lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pas tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu lha mo 'di ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis la bsnyen bkur byas te/_mngon par shes pa'i ye shes la rnam par rtse ba/_smon 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]lam las yang dag par byung ba/_bzod pa thob pa/_phyir mi ldog pa la yang dag par zhugs pa ste/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam gyi dbang gis ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du gnas so/_/lha mo'i le'u ste drug pa'o//_//de 
[\[214a.2\]]nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'gro bar song ba yin/_smras pa/_'jam dpal gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba ma yin par 
[\[214a.3\]]'gro ba de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'gro bar song ba yin no/_/smras pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba gang /_smras pa/_gang gi tshe mtshams med pa lnga'i 'gro bar 'gro yang gnod sems dang /_rnam par 'tshe ba dang /_
[\[214a.4\]]rab tu sdang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro bar 'gro yang nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad dang bral ba yin/_dud 'gro'i 'gro bar 'gro yang glen pa'i mun pa mun gnag dang bral ba yin/_lha ma yin du 'gro bar 'gro yang nga rgyal dang /_rgyags pa dang /_dregs pa 
[\[214a.5\]]med pa yin/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gro yang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad blangs pa yin/_mi g.yo ba dang gzugs med pa'i 'gro bar 'gro yang de'i 'gro ba la yang dag par 'jug pa ma yin/_'dod chags kyi 'gro bar 'gro yang 'dod pa'i longs spyod 
[\[214a.6\]]thams cad la 'dod chags dang bral ba yin/_zhe sdang gi 'gro bar 'gro yang sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa yin/_gti mug gi 'gro bar 'gro yang chos thams cad la shes rab kyis nges par rtogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa yin/_ser sna'i 'gro bar 'gro yang lus 
[\[214a.7\]]dang srog la mi lta bas phyi nang gi dngos po yongs su gtong ba yin/_tshul khrims 'chal pa'i 'gro bar 'gro yang kha na ma tho ba cung zad la'ang 'jigs par lta zhing sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pa thams cad la gnas pa yin/_gnod sems kyi tha ba dang khong khro 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]ba'i 'gro bar 'gro yang shin tu gnod sems med cing byams pa la gnas pa yin/_le lo'i 'gro bar 'gro yang brtson 'grus rtsom pa rgyun mi 'chad cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su tshol ba la brtson pa yin/_dbang po 'khrul pa'i 'gro bar 'gro yang rang bzhin gyis snyoms 
[\[214b.2\]]par zhugs shing bsam gtan don yod pa yin/_'chal pa'i shes rab kyi 'gro bar 'gro yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'gro bar song zhing 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas pa yin/_tshul 'chos pa dang kha gsag byed pa'i 
[\[214b.3\]]'gro bar 'gro yang ldem po ngag la mkhas shing thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa tshar phyin pa yang yin/_nga rgyal gyi 'gro ba'ang ston la 'jig rten thams cad kyi zam pa dang stegs bur 'gyur ba yang yin/_nyon mongs pa'i 'gro bar 'gro yang shin tu kun nas nyon mongs pa med 
[\[214b.4\]]cing rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa yang yin/_bdud kyi 'gro bar 'gro yang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa yang yin/_nyan thos kyi 'gro bar 'gro yang sems can rnams la ma thos pa'i chos thos par byed pa yang yin/_rang sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[214b.5\]]'gro bar 'gro yang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po las byung ba yang yin/_dbul po'i 'gro bar 'gro yang longs spyod zad mi shes pa'i rin po che lag na thogs pa yang yin/_dbang po nyams pa'i 'gro bar 'gro yang gzugs 
[\[214b.6\]]bzang zhing mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa yang yin/_rigs ngan par skye ba'i 'gro bar 'gro yang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rab tu skye bar 'gyur ba yang yin/_nyam chung zhing mdog ngan pa gzhan pa'i 'gro bar 'gro 
[\[214b.7\]]yang blta na sdug pa dang /_sred med kyi bu'i lus lta bu thob pa yang yin/_sems can thams cad la na ba dang /_mi bde ba'i spyod pa'ang ston la 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa las shin tu 'das shing rab tu choms pa yang yin/_longs spyod kyi 'gro bar 'gro yang btsal ba 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]thams cad med cing mi rtag pa'i 'du shes la so sor rtog pa mang ba yang yin/_byang chub sems dpas slas dang gar thabs mang po ston kyang dben par spyod cing 'dod pa'i 'dam las rgal ba yang yin/_khams dang skye mched kyi 'gro bar 'gro yang gzungs thob cing spobs 
[\[215a.2\]]pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa yang yin/_mu stegs can gyi 'gro bar 'gro yang mu stegs su gyur pa yang ma yin/_'jig rten thams cad kyi 'gro bar 'gro yang 'gro ba thams cad las phyir ldog pa yang yin/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'gro bar 'gro yang 'khor ba'i rgyun kyang mi 
[\[215a.3\]]gtong ba yin te 'jam dpal de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba ma yin par 'gro ba ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'gro bar song ba yin no/_/de nas lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs 
[\[215a.4\]]pa rnams kyi rigs ni gang yin/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu 'jig tshogs ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs so/_/ma rig pa dang /_srid pa'i sred pa ni rigs so/_/'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug ni rigs so/_/phyin ci log bzhi ni rigs so/_/sgrib pa lnga ni rigs so/_/skye mched drug ni 
[\[215a.5\]]rigs so/_/rnam par shes pa la gnas pa bdun ni rigs so/_/log pa brgyad ni rigs so/_/kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po dgu ni rigs so/_/mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu ni rigs so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs te rigs kyi bu mdor na lta bar gyur pa 
[\[215a.6\]]drug cu rtsa gnyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs so/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal ci las bsams te de skad smra/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu 'dus ma byas mthong ba nges par 'jug pa la gnas pas ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed mi nus so/_/
[\[215a.7\]]nyon mongs pa'i 'byung gnas 'dus byas la gnas pa bden pa ma mthong bas ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nus so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na dgon dung gis phyogs su me tog ut+pal dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]dri mchog rnams mi skye ste/_'dam dang chu gling du bskyed na me tog ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po dang /_dri mchog rnams skye'o/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du 'dus ma byas nges pa thob pa'i sems can rnams la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mi skye'o/_/nyon mongs pa'i 
[\[215b.2\]]'dam dang /_chu gling du gyur pa'i sems can rnams la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams skye'o/_/'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' la sa bon mi skye'i/_sa la gnas shing skye ba de bzhin du 'dus ma byas nges pa thob pa'i sems can la sangs rgyas kyi chos mi skye'i/_'jig tshogs la lta ba ri rab dang 
[\[215b.3\]]mnyam pa bskyed nas byang chub kyi sems skye ste/_de nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams skye'o/_/rigs kyi bu rnam grangs 'dis nyon mongs pa thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs su rig par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen por ma zhugs par rin thang 
[\[215b.4\]]med pa'i rin po cher phyin par mi nus so/_/de bzhin du nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtshor ma zhugs par ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de las skyed par mi nus so/_/de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_legs so legs so/_/'jam 
[\[215b.5\]]dpal tshig 'di ni legs par smras pa 'di ni yang dag go/_/nyon mongs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs te/_bdag cag lta bus ni byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'am/_sangs rgyas kyi chos la mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ga la nus/_mtshams med pa lnga dang ldan pas 
[\[215b.6\]]ni byang chub kyi sems bskyed par yang nus/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar nus so/_/'di lta ste/_dper na skyes bu dbang po ma tshang ba la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ni yon tan med cing nus pa med pa ste/_de bzhin du kun tu sbyor ba thams cad spangs 
[\[215b.7\]]pa'i nyan thos la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yon tan med cing nus pa med de/_de la phyir dmigs par mi nus so/_/'jam dpal de lta bas na so so'i skye bo rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa gzo'i/_nyan thos rnams ni byas pa gzo ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]so so'i skye bos ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thos pas dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par byed la/_nyan thos kyis ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sangs rgyas kyi chos stobs dang mi 'jigs pa rnams 
[\[216a.2\]]thos kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par mi nus pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzugs thams cad ston pa zhes bya ba 'khor der 'dus te 'dug pa des lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyim bdag khyod kyi pha ma 
[\[216a.3\]]dang /_bu dang /_chung ma dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba rnams ga re/_mdza' bshes dang /_nye du dang /_snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams ga re/_g.yog dang /_rta dang /_glang po che dang /_shing rta dang /_dpung bu chung dang /_bzhon pa rnams ga re/_de skad ces 
[\[216a.4\]]smras pa dang /_lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pas byang chub sems dpa' gzugs thams cad ston pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams dag gi/_/ma ni shes rab pha rol phyin/_/pha ni thabs la mkhas pa ste/_/'dren pa rnams ni de 
[\[216a.5\]]las skyes/_/chos la dga' ba chung ma ste/_/byams dang snying rje bu mo yin/_/chos dang bden gnyis bu pho yin/_/stong pa'i don sems khyim yin no/_/de bzhin nyon mongs thams cad ni/_/ci dgar dbang byed slob ma'o/_/mdza' bshes byang chub yan lag ste/_/des ni byang 
[\[216a.6\]]chub mchog rig 'gyur/_/de grogs rtag tu 'grogs pa ni/_/pha rol phyin pa drug rnams so/_/bsdu ba de yi bud med khyim/_/glu dbyangs chos rnams ston pa po/_/gzugs rnams de yi skyed mos tshal/_/byang chub yan lag me tog rgyas/_/'bras bu rnam grol ye 
[\[216a.7\]]shes te/_/chos kyi nor chen stong pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa rdzing yin te/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi chu yis bkang /_/rnam dag pad mas kun khebs pa/_/de la 'khru ba dri ma med/_/mngon shes de yi bzhon pa ste/_/theg pa chen po bla na med/_/kha lo sgyur ba byang chub sems/_/
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]lam ni zhi ba yan lag brgyad/_/de yi rgyan ni mtshan rnams dang /_/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'o/_/bsam pa dge ba de dag gi/_/gos ni khrel yod ngo tsha shes/_/de dag dam chos nor dang ldan/_/rab tu sbyor ba chos ston pa/_/nan tan dag ni rnyed chen te/_/yongs su bsngo ba byang 
[\[216b.2\]]chub phyir/_/mal ni bsam gtan bzhi rnams te/_/'tsho ba dag pas kun tu bting /_/de dag sad pa ye shes te/_/rtag tu thos pa mnyam par gzhag_/de dag zas ni bdud rtsi ste/_/rnam grol khu ba btung ba yin/_/bsam pa rnam dag khrus yin te/_/spos kyis bsku ba 
[\[216b.3\]]tshul khrims so/_/nyon mongs dgra rnams bcom pas na/_/de dag dpa' bo mi pham pa/_/bdud bzhi dag kyang rab tu btul/_/byang chub dkyil 'khor rgyal mtshan bsgreng /_/bsams bzhin skye ba ston mod kyi/_/skye ba med cing 'byung ba med/_/zhing kun tu yang snang ba ni/_/
[\[216b.4\]]nyi ma shar ba bzhin du'o/_/'dren la mchod pa thams cad kyis/_/sangs rgyas bye ba mchod nas kyang /_/bdag dang sangs rgyas rnams la ni/_/nams kyang gnas par yong mi byed/_/ji ltar sems can phan par yang /_/sangs rgyas zhing rnams spyod mod kyi/_/nam mkha' lta bur 
[\[216b.5\]]zhing rnams gyur/_/sems can sems can 'du shes med/_/sems can kun gyi gzugs rnams dang /_/sgra skad gang rnams 'byin pa dang /_/'jigs med byang chub sems dpa' rnams/_/skad cig gcig gis ston par byed/_/bdud kyi las rnams shes mod kyi/_/bdud 
[\[216b.6\]]rnams kyi yang rjes su 'jug_/thabs kyi pha rol phyin pa dag_/de yi bya ba kun kyang ston/_/sgyu ma'i chos kyis rnam rtsen pas/_/sems can yongs su smin pa'i phyir/_/rga ba dang ni na bar gyur/_/bdag nyid shi bar rab tu ston/_/sa rnams rab tu tshig pa ni/_/bskal pas 
[\[216b.7\]]sreg par kun ston te/_/sems can rtag par 'du shes pa/_/mi rtag par ni rab bstan to/_/sems can bye ba stong rnams kyang /_/yul gcig tu ni mgron du gnyer/_/thams cad khyim du zan byin te/_/thams cad byang chub phyir bsngo'o/_/sngags dang rig pa ci yod dang /_/
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]bzo gnas rnam pa mang po dag_/thams cad kyi yang pha rol phyin/_/sems can thams cad bde thob byed/_/'jig rten ya mtshan ji snyed pa/_/de dag kun tu rab byung nas/_/lta ba tha dad gyur pa yi/_/sems can rnams ni yongs su 'grel/_/zla ba'am nyi mar de gyur te/_/
[\[217a.2\]]brgya byin tshangs pa skye dgu dbang /_/chu dang mer kyang rab gyur te/_/sa dang rlung du'ang de bzhin no/_/nad kyi bskal pa bar ma la/_/de ni rtsi mchog dam par gyur/_/des ni sems can rnam grol zhing /_/nad rnams med cing bde bar 'gyur/_/mu ge'i bskal pa bar ma la/_/zas dang skom 
[\[217a.3\]]du bsgyur nas su/_/bkres shing skom pa med byas te/_/srog chags rnams la chos ston to/_/mtshon gyi bskal pa bar ma la/_/de dag byams pa sgom gyur te/_/sems can bye ba brgya mang po/_/gnod sems med la 'dzud par byed/_/g.yul chen 'dren pa'i nang du ni/_/de dag 
[\[217a.4\]]phyogs la mnyam par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' stobs chen rnams/_/'dum zhing 'du bar dga' bar byed/_/sangs rgyas zhing ni ji snyed pa/_/bsam gyis mi khyab dmyal bar yang /_/sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/_/bsams bzhin du ni der 'gro'o/_/ji snyed dud 
[\[217a.5\]]'gro'i skye gnas kyi/_/'gro bar rab tu bstan pa ni/_/thams cad du yang chos ston to/_/de phyir rnam par 'dren ces bya/_/'dod pa'i longs spyod rnams kyang ston/_/bsam gtan pa la bsam gtan ston/_/bdud rnams rab tu 'joms byed cing /_/de dag glags rnyed 'gyur 
[\[217a.6\]]mi byed/_/me dbus nas ni pad ma ltar/_/yang dag ma yin de ston te/_/de bzhin 'dod dang bsam gtan yang /_/yang dag ma yin de ston to/_/bsams bzhin smad 'tshong rnams su sgyur/_/skyes pa rnams ni bsdu ba'i phyir/_/'dod chags lcags kyus brjod nas su/_/de 
[\[217a.7\]]dag sangs rgyas ye shes 'god/_/sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/_/grong mi dang ni ded dpon dang /_/mdun na 'don dang blon po dang /_/blon po chen por rtag tu gyur/_/sems can dbul po rnams la ni/_/zad mi shes pa'i gter du gyur/_/gang la sbyin pa byin pa yang /_/
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]de dag byang chub sems bskyed btsud/_/nga rgyal khengs pa'i sems can la/_/de dag tshan chen mchog gyur te/_/nga rgyal kun kyang bcom nas su/_/bla med byang chub tshol du btsud/_/'jigs skrag sems can rnams la ni/_/rtag tu de yi mdun na 'dug_/de dag mi 'jigs byin nas kyang /_/
[\[217b.2\]]byang chub tu ni smin par byed/_/de dag lnga mngon shes pa yi/_/drang srong tshangs par spyod gyur te/_/bzod dang des pa tshul khrims dang /_/sdom pa la ni sems can 'god/_/rim gro lhur byed sems can rnams/_/'jigs pa med pas 'dir mthong na/_/bran dang g.yog tu shin tu gyur/_/slob mar 
[\[217b.3\]]yang ni nye bar 'gro/_/yan lag gang dang gang rnams kyis/_/sems can chos la dgar gyur pa/_/thabs chen shin tu bslabs pa dang /_/bya ba dag ni thams cad ston/_/de dag slob pa mtha' yas shing /_/spyod yul rnams kyang mtha' yas te/_/ye shes mtha' yas rdzogs pas na/_/srog 
[\[217b.4\]]chags mtha' yas grol bar byed/_/bskal pa dag ni bye ba dang /_/bskal pa bye ba phrag brgyar ni/_/bcom ldan sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang /_/de yi yon tan mtha' brjod dka'/_/gang rnams shes rab med pa yi/_/sems can dman pa ma gtogs par/_/mkhas pas chos 'di thos 
[\[217b.5\]]gyur nas/_/byang chub mchog la su mi smon/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//de nas lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/skyes bu dam pa dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnyis 
[\[217b.6\]]su med pa'i chos kyi sgor 'jug pa gang yin/_spobs par gyis shig_/byang chub sems dpa' chos rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba der 'dus pa des 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu skye ba dang 'jig pa ni gnyis te/_gang ma skyes ma byung ba de la 'jig pa gang yang med de/_mi skye ba'i chos 
[\[217b.7\]]la bzod pa thob pa ni gnyis su med pa la 'jug pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' dpal sbas kyis smras pa/_nga dang nga 'o zhes bya ba de ni gnyis te/_bdag tu sgro btags pa med na nga'i bar mi 'gyur te/_gang sgro btags pa med pa de ni gnyis su med pa la 'jug pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]dpal brtsegs kyis smras pa/_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba zhes bya ba de ni gnyis te/_kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs su shes nas rnam par byang ba la rlom sems su mi 'gyur zhing rlom sems thams cad legs par 'joms pa dang /_'thun par 'gro ba'i lam de ni 
[\[218a.2\]]gnyis su med pa la 'jug pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' skar [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]smras pa/_g.yo ba dang rlom sems de ni gnyis te/_gang g.yo ba med cing rlom sems su mi byed/_yid la mi byed/_lhag par bya ba med pa/_lhag par bya ba dang bral ba de ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o/_/byang 
[\[218a.3\]]chub sems dpa' lag [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]smras pa/_byang chub kyi sems dang /_nyan thos kyi sems zhes bya ba de ni gnyis te/_gang sgyu ma'i sems dang mtshungs par mthong ba de ni byang chub kyi sems kyang med/_nyan thos kyi sems kyang med de/_gang sems kyi mtshan nyid mtshungs pa de ni gnyis su med 
[\[218a.4\]]par 'jug pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' mig mi 'dzums kyis smras pa/_len pa dang mi len pa de ni gnyis te/_gang mi len pa de mi dmigs pa ste/_gang mi dmigs pa de la rtog pa dang bsal bar mi byed/_chos thams cad mi byed mi spyod pa de ni gnyis su med par 'jug 
[\[218a.5\]]pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' mig [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]smras pa/_mtshan nyid gcig pa dang mtshan nyid med pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis so/_/gang rtog par mi byed/_kun tu rtog par mi byed/_mtshan nyid gcig par mi byed/_mtshan nyid med par mi byed do/_/gang mtshan nyid dang mtshan nyid 
[\[218a.6\]]mi 'dra ba la mtshan nyid mtshungs par 'jug pa de ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' skar rgyal gyis smras pa/_dge ba dang mi dge ba zhes bya ba de ni gnyis te/_gang dge ba dang mi dge ba mi slong zhing mtshan ma dang mtshan ma med pa la gnyis su med par rtog pa ni gnyis 
[\[218a.7\]]su med par 'jug pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' seng ges smras pa/_kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba med pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis te/_gang gis rdo rje ltar rab tu 'bigs pa'i ye shes kyis mi 'ching mi 'grol ba de ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o/_/byang chub sems 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]dpa' seng ge blo gros kyis smras pa/_'di ni zag pa dang bcas pa/_'di ni zag pa med pa'o zhes bya ba de ni gnyis te/_gang mnyam pa nyid kyi chos thob pas zag pa dang zag pa med pa'i 'du shes su mi byed 'du shes med par gyur pa'ang ma yin/_mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid thob pa'ang med cing 'du 
[\[218b.2\]]shes kyi mdud pa med pa de ltar gang 'jug pa de ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' bde mos kyis smras pa/_'di ni bde ba/_'di ni mi bde ba'o zhes bya ba de ni gnyis te/_gang ye shes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir grangs thams cad dang bral zhing blo nam mkha' dang mtshungs 
[\[218b.3\]]par mi chags pa de ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyis smras pa/_'di ni 'jig rten pa'o/_/'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'o zhes bya ba de ni gnyis te/_gang 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin stong pa de la cung zad kyang rgal ba yang med/_'jug pa yang med/_'gro 
[\[218b.4\]]ba'ang med/_mi 'gro ba'ang med de/_gang la mi rgal/_mi 'jug_/'gro ba'ang med/_mi 'gro ba'ang med pa de ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' dul ba'i blo gros kyis smras pa/_'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis te/_'khor ba'i ngo bo nyid 
[\[218b.5\]]mthong bas mi 'khor zhing yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/_gang de ltar rtogs pa de ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' mngon sum mthong gis smras pa/_zad pa dang mi zad pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis so/_/zad pa ni shin tu zad pa ste/_gang shin tu zad pa de la 
[\[218b.6\]]zad par bya ba ma yin pas na de'i phyir mi zad pa zhes bya'o/_/gang mi zad pa de ni skad cig pa ste/_skad cig pa la zad pa med do/_/de lta bur rab tu zhugs pa de ni gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgor zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun nas sbas kyis smras pa/_bdag dang bdag med 
[\[218b.7\]]do zhes bya ba de ni gnyis te/_gang bdag gi dngos po mi dmigs pa de ci zhig bdag med par byed par 'gyur ba de dag gi ngo bo nyid mthong bas gnyis su med pa ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' glog gi lhas smras pa/_rig pa dang ma rig pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis te 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]ma rig pa'i rang bzhin ltar rig pa'ang de bzhin te/_ma rig pa gang yin pa de ni lung du ma bstan pa/_bgrang du med pa bgrang ba'i lam las 'das pa'o/_/gang 'di la mngon par rtogs pa de ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' mthong dgas smras pa/_
[\[219a.2\]]gzugs nyid stong pa ste/_gzugs bshig pa las stong pa ma yin gyi/_gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni stong pa ste/_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis so/_/rnam par shes pa nyid ni stong pa nyid de/_rnam par shes pa bshig pas 
[\[219a.3\]]stong pa ma yin gyi/_rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni stong pa nyid do/_/'di la gang gis nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la de bzhin du shes shing de lta bur ye shes kyis rig pa de ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi tog gis smras pa/_khams bzhi po yang 
[\[219a.4\]]gzhan la nam mkha'i khams kyang gzhan no zhes bya ba de ni gnyis te/_khams bzhi po ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin no/_/sngon gyi mtha' yang nam mkha'i rang bzhin no/_/phyi ma'i mtha' yang nam mkha'i rang bzhin no/_/de bzhin du da ltar yang nam mkha'i rang bzhin te/_gang de ltar khams la 
[\[219a.5\]]'jug pa'i ye shes de ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' rab kyi blo gros kyis smras pa/_mig dang gzugs so zhes bya ba de ni gnyis te/_gang mig yongs su shes pas gzugs la mi chags/_mi sdang mi rmongs pa de ni zhi ba zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin du rna ba dang sgra/_sna dang dri/_
[\[219a.6\]]lce dang ro/_lus dang reg_/yid dang chos de dag ni gnyis so/_/gang yang yid yongs su shes nas chos la mi chags/_mi sdang /_mi rmongs pa de ni zhi ba zhes bya'o/_/de ltar zhi ba la gnas pa ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo gros mi zad pas smras pa/_
[\[219a.7\]]sbyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba de ni gnyis te/_sbyin pa'i ngo bo nyid ni thams cad mkhyen pa'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ngo bo nyid ni yongs su bsngo ba'o/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab thams cad mkhyen 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba de ni gnyis so/_/thams cad mkhyen pa ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin no/_/yongs su bsngo ba yang thams cad mkhyen pa'i rang bzhin te/_gang tshul gcig pa 'di la 'jug pa de ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' blo zab kyis smras pa/_stong pa 
[\[219b.2\]]nyid kyang gzhan la mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa yang gzhan no zhes bya ba de ni gnyis te/_stong pa gang yin pa de la mtshan ma gang yang med do/_/mtshan ma med pa la smon pa med/_smon pa med pa la sems dang /_yid dang /_rnam par shes pa rgyu ba med de/_gang rnam par thar pa gcig gi 
[\[219b.3\]]sgo de la rnam par thar pa thams cad kyi sgo rnams su blta bar bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i sgor 'jug pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' dbang po zhi bas smras pa/_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun no zhes bya ba de ni gnyis te/_sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni chos so/_/chos kyi rang bzhin ni dge 
[\[219b.4\]]'dun te/_de dag thams cad kyang 'dus ma byas pa'o/_/'dus ma byas ni nam mkha'o/_/chos thams cad kyi tshul ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs te/_gang de ltar rjes su 'gro ba de ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' thogs pa med pa'i mig gis smras pa/_'jig tshogs 
[\[219b.5\]]dang 'jig tshogs 'gog pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis te/_'jig tshogs nyid ni 'gog pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig tshogs su lta ba mi skye ba med cing gang lta ba des 'jig tshogs so zhe'am/_'jig tshogs 'gog ces mi rtog ste/_de mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog_/shin tu mi 
[\[219b.6\]]rtog pas 'gog pa'i rang bzhin du gyur te/_mi 'byung mi 'jig pa de ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' shin tu dul bas smras pa/_lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi sdom pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos 'di dag ni mngon par 'du 
[\[219b.7\]]mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid de/_lus kyi mngon par 'du mi byed pa gang yin pa ngag gi mngon par 'du mi byed pa'ang de'i mtshan nyid do/_/yid kyi mngon par 'du mi byed pa'ang de'i mtshan nyid de/_gang chos thams cad kyi mngon par 'du mi byed pa de yin par shes par bya/_rjes su rig par bya ste/_
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]gang 'di la mngon par 'du mi byed par shes pa de ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams zhing gis smras pa/_bsod nams dang /_bsod nams ma yin pa dang /_mi g.yo ba mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byed do zhes bya ba 
[\[220a.2\]]de ni gnyis te/_gang bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa dang /_mi g.yo ba mngon par 'du mi byed pa de ni gnyis su med pa'o/_/bsod nams dang /_bsod nams ma yin pa dang /_mi g.yo ba'i 'du byed rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa ste/_de la bsod nams kyang med/_bsod 
[\[220a.3\]]nams ma yin pa yang med/_mi g.yo ba yang med/_mngon par 'du byed pa'ang med de/_gang de ltar mi sgrub pa de ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' pad ma bkod pas smras pa/_bdag kun nas ldang ba las skyes pa de ni gnyis te/_bdag yongs su 
[\[220a.4\]]shes pa de ni gnyis mi slong ngo /_/de ltar gnyis su med par gnas pa la rnam par rig pa med pas rnam par rig pa med pa de ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' dpal gyi snying pos smras pa/_dmigs pas rab tu phye ba de ni gnyis so/_/gang mi dmigs pa de ni 
[\[220a.5\]]gnyis su med pa ste/_de'i phyir gang len pa med cing 'dor ba med pa de ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' zla ba'i bla mas smras pa/_mun pa dang snang ba zhes bya ba de ni gnyis te/_mun pa'ang med/_snang ba'ang med pa de ni gnyis su med pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[220a.6\]]'di ltar 'gog par snyoms par zhugs pa la mun pa yang med/_snang ba yang med de/_chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid kyang de bzhin te/_gang mnyam pa nyid 'di la 'jug pa de ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' lag na phyag rgya rin po ches smras pa/_mya ngan 
[\[220a.7\]]las 'das pa la mngon par dga' zhing 'khor ba la mi dga' ba de ni gnyis te/_gang mya ngan las 'das pa la yang mngon par dga' ba med pa/_'khor ba la yang mi dga' ba med pa de ni gnyis su med pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang bcings pa las ni grol bar bstan gyi/_gang 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]shin tu ma bcings pa de thar pa ga la tshol/_ma bcings ma grol ba'i dge slong gis ni dga' ba dang mi dga' ba yang mi rnyed de/_de ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos smras pa/_lam dang lam ngan pa'o zhes bya ba de ni gnyis te/_
[\[220b.2\]]lam du zhugs pa la ni lam ngan pa mi spyod do/_/mi spyod pa la gnas pa ni lam gyi 'du shes sam/_lam ma yin pa'i 'du shes su mi 'gyur ro/_/'du shes yongs su rig pa ni blo gnyis su mi 'jug ste/_de ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' bden 
[\[220b.3\]]dgas smras pa/_bden pa dang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis te/_bden pa mthong bas kyang bden pa nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa lta ga la mthong /_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha'i mig gis mi mthong gi shes rab kyi mig gis mthong ste/_ji ltar mi mthong na rnam 
[\[220b.4\]]par mi mthong ba de ltar mthong ngo /_/gang la mthong ba yang med/_rnam par mthong ba yang med pa de ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis rang rang gi bstan pa bshad nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam 
[\[220b.5\]]dpal byang chub sems dpa'i gnyis su med par 'jug pa gang yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_skyes bu dam pa khyed kun gyis kyang legs par smras mod kyi khyed kyis bshad pa de thams cad ni gnyis so/_/bstan pa gcig ni ma gtogs te brjod du med pa/_smrar med pa/_bshad du med 
[\[220b.6\]]pa/_bsgrag tu med pa/_bstan du med par gdags su med pa de ni gnyis su med par 'jug pa'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kho bo cag gis ni rang rang gi bstan pa bshad zin na rigs kyi bu khyod kyang gnyis 
[\[220b.7\]]su med pa'i chos kyi sgo bstan pa la spobs par gyis shig_/de nas lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pa cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnyis su med par 'jug pa yin te/_de la yi ge dang /_sgra dang /_rnam par rig pa'i rgyu ba med do/_/bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgor zhugs pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur 
[\[221a.2\]]to/_/gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi sgor 'jug pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di snyam du bsams te/_gdugs tshod la'ang bab na byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni mi ldang na 'di dag zan gar za snyam mo/_/de nas lid 
[\[221a.3\]]tsa bI dri ma med par grags pas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par thar pa brgyad po gang dag gsungs pa'i rnam par thar pa de dag la gnas par gyis la 
[\[221a.4\]]zang zing dang 'dres pa'i rgyud kyis chos ma nyan cig_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu yud tsam zhig sdod cig dang /_sngon ma myong ba'i kha zas za bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i tshe lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/_'di 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du 
[\[221a.5\]]bya ba mngon par 'dus byas so/_/gang steng gi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams spos thams cad kyi dri mchog ces bya ba yod de/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_nyan thos chen po de 
[\[221a.6\]]dag la bstan to/_/de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog brtsegs pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes so/_/'jig rten gyi khams der phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi mi dang lha'i dri'i byung ba de bas 'jig rten gyi khams de'i shing las ches khyad du 'phags 
[\[221a.7\]]pa 'byung ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams de na ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ming yang med de/_byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gi tshogs 'dus pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog brtsegs pa de chos ston to/_/'jig rten gyi khams de na khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]kyang spos las byas/_'chag sa dang /_skyed mos tshal dang /_gzhal med khang thams cad kyang spos las byas so/_/gang byang chub sems dpa' de dag zas za ba'i zas de'i dris 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa khyab bo/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog brtsegs pa 
[\[221b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang thabs cig tu bshos gsol ba'i phyir zhugs te/_de na lha'i bu spos bkod pa'i zas zhes bya ba theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa de bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byed par brtson no/_/de nas thams 
[\[221b.3\]]cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des 'jig rten gyi khams de na bcom ldan 'das de dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag bshos la bkod de bzhugs pa mthong ngo /_/de nas lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces smras so/_/skyes bu dam pa khyed kyi 
[\[221b.4\]]nang na sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas zas len par su spro/_de na 'jam dpal gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis su yang spro ba med do/_/de nas lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal khyod kyi 'khor 'di 'dra la ngo mi tsha'am/_smras pa/_rigs kyi 
[\[221b.5\]]bu de bzhin gshegs pas ma bslabs pa la brnyas par mi bya'o zhes ma gsungs sam/_de nas lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pa mal de nas ma langs par byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mdun du sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus gser gyi kha dog lta bu mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos 
[\[221b.6\]]legs par brgyan pa zhig sprul te/_gang gis 'khor de dag thams cad mog mog por byas par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzugs su snang bar gyur to/_/de nas lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pas sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod steng gi phyogs 
[\[221b.7\]]su song la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams spos thams cad kyi dri mchog ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog brtsegs pa zhes bya ba da ltar bshos gsol ba'i phyir bzhugs pa der song la de bzhin gshegs 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]pa de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol cig_/lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la lan brgya stong du mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_'tsho 'am/_
[\[222a.2\]]stobs dang /_bde ba dang /_kha na ma tho ba mi mnga' zhing bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol zhing 'di skad ces kyang mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol ba'i pham phabs bdag la stsal bar gsol/_des 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid par 
[\[222a.3\]]'gyur ro/_/dman pa la mos pa'i sems can 'di dag kyang rgya chen po la dad par bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan kyang rgyas par bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/zhes gsol cig_/de nas sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' des lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pa la 
[\[222a.4\]]legs so zhes byas nas de mnyan te/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi mdun nas bzhin gyen du bltas te song na/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis de 'gro bar ma mthong ngo /_/de nas sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' des 'jig rten gyi khams spos thams cad kyi dri mchog ces bya ba der phyin nas/_
[\[222a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog brtsegs pa de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med par grags pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod 
[\[222a.6\]]pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_'tsho 'am/_stobs dang /_bde ba dang /_kha na ma tho ba mi mnga' zhing bde bar reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol lo/_/des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la lan brgya stong du mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[222a.7\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das gsol ba'i zhal zas kyi pham phabs bdag la stsal bar gsol/_des 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/dman pa la mos pa'i sems can 'di dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po la blo gros mos par 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]bgyid cing sangs rgyas kyi mtshan kyang rgyas par bgyid par 'gyur ro zhes mchi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog brtsegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog brtsegs pa de la 'di skad 
[\[222b.2\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can chen po 'di lta bu ga la mchis/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de gang na mchis/_dman pa la mos pa zhes bgyi ba de ci lags zhes bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis de skad ces zhus pa dang /_de nas bcom 
[\[222b.3\]]ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu 'og gi phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na de bzhin 
[\[222b.4\]]gshegs pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba snyigs ma lnga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na dman pa la mos pa'i sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/de na byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa de byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos ston te/_
[\[222b.5\]]des nga'i ming yongs su bsgrags pa dang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i bsngags pa rab tu bstan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu 'bar bar bya ba'i phyir sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' btang ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[222b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de'i che ba ji tsam na de'i sprul pa 'di yang rdzu 'phrul dang /_stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa 'di lta bur gyur/_bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' de'i che ba ni 'di 'dra ste/_des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sprul 
[\[222b.7\]]pa 'gyed de/_sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi bya bas nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog brtsegs pas dri thams cad dang ldan pa'i snod du dri thams cad bsgos pa'i zas blugs te/_de 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la byin no/_/de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag dgu bcu yang der 'gro bar chas te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang /_phyag 'tshal ba dang /_bsnyen 
[\[223a.2\]]bkur bgyi ba dang /_dri ma med par grags pa de dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag da de'i dus la bab par shes na deng shig_/rigs kyi bu dag sems can de dag myos shing bag med par gyur 
[\[223a.3\]]ta re/_dri rnams med par gyis la deng shig_/'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de'i sems can de dag spa gong bar 'gyur du 'ong gis rang gi gzugs kyang sgyur cig_/'jig rten gyi khams de la'ang ngan par 'du shes bskyed nas khong khro ba'i 'du shes ma skyed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[223a.4\]]rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni nam mkha'i zhing ste/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad mi ston to/_/de nas sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' des zhal zas de thogs nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[223a.5\]]brgya stong phrag dgu bcu dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang dri ma med par grags pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis skad cig yud tsam thang cig de nyid la 'jig rten gyi khams spos thams cad kyi dri mchog de nas mi snang bar gyur te/_lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pa'i khyim na 'dug go/_/de nas lid 
[\[223a.6\]]tsa bI dri ma med par grags pas seng ge'i khri snga ma ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i seng ge'i khri brgya stong phrag dgu bcur byin gyis brlabs te/_de la byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khod do/_/de nas sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' des zhal zas kyis bkang ba'i snod de dri ma med par grags pa la byin no/_/de nas zhal 
[\[223a.7\]]zas de'i dris yangs pa'i grong khyer chen por 'dug par gyur te/_'jig rten gyi khams stong gi bar du dri zhim po mnam par gyur to/_/gang yangs pa'i grong khyer gyi bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams dang /_lid tsa bI rnams kyi dbang po lid tsa bI zla gdugs kyis dri de mnams nas/_ngo mtshar du gyur 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]rmad du gyur te/_lus dang sems dang bar gyur nas lid tsa bI brgyad khri bzhi stong tshang ba dang lhan cig tu lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pa'i khyim du zhugs so/_/de dag gi khyim de na byang chub sems dpas gang dag seng ge'i khri de tsam du mtho ba de tsam du che zhing yangs pa la 'khod pa mthong ste/_mthong 
[\[223b.2\]]nas de dag shin tu mos shing rab tu dga' ba chen po skyes te/_de dag thams cad kyis nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag la phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/sa la spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang /_'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs yod pa 
[\[223b.3\]]na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyang dri des bskul nas lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pa'i khyim du lhags so/_/de nas lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pas gnas brtan shA ri'i bu dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal 
[\[223b.4\]]zas bdud rtsi thugs rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa zo la nyi tshe ba'i spyod pa la sems nye bar ma 'dogs shig_/sbyin pa spyod ma nus sa re/_de na nyan thos kha cig 'di snyam du sems so/_/zhal zas nyung ngu 'di la 'di lta bu'i 'khor 'dis ji ltar bza'o snyam mo/_/de nas sprul 
[\[223b.5\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' des nyan thos de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed rang gi shes rab dang bsod nams dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab dang bsod nams su ma snyom shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po bzhi ni zad kyang 
[\[223b.6\]]srid kyi zhal zas 'di la zad pa cung zad kyang med do/_/sems can thams cad kyis zhal zas 'di kham ri rab tsam du bskal par zos kyang 'di zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshul khrims dang /_shes rab dang /_ting nge 'dzin mi zad pa las byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[223b.7\]]zhal zas snod du lus pa 'di zad par mi nus so/_/de nas zhal zas des 'khor thams cad la tshim par byas kyang zhal zas de zad par ma gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba rnams dang /_sems can 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]gzhan dag gis zhal zas zos pa pa de dag kyang ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bde ba ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i bde ba lus las skyes so/_/de dag gi spu'i khung bu nas kyang 'di lta bu'i dri 'byung ba ni 'di lta ste dper na 'jig rten gyi 
[\[224a.2\]]khams spos thams cad kyi dri mchog de na shing rnams las dri 'byung ba bzhin no/_/de nas lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pa shes bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog brtsegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di skad ces smras
