[\[224a.3\]]so/_/rigs kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog brtsegs pa de'i chos ston pa ci 'dra/_de dag gis smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa de ni yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig gis chos mi ston te/_dri de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'dul bar gyur te/_spos kyi shing gang dang gang gi drung du byang chub 
[\[224a.4\]]sems dpa' de dag 'dug pa de dang de dag las 'di 'dra ba'i dri byung ste/_gang dri de mnams ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/_/ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu de dag thams cad la byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rnams 
[\[224a.5\]]skye'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'di na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa chos bstan pa ji lta bu rab tu ston par mdzad/_smras pa/_skyes bu dam pa rnams sems can 'di dag ni gdul dka' ste/_sems can dmu rgod 
[\[224a.6\]]gdul dka' ba 'di rnams la dmu rgod dang gdul dka' ba gdul ba'i gtam rnams rab tu ston to/_/dmu rgod gdul dka' ba rnams gdul ba gang /_dmu rgod gdul dka' ba gdul ba'i gtam de gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'di ni sems can dmyal ba'o/_/'di ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas 
[\[224a.7\]]so/_/'di ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten no/_/'di ni mi khom pa'o/_/'di ni dbang po nyams par skye ba'o/_/'di ni lus kyi nyes par spyod pa'o/_/'di ni lus kyis nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa'o/_/'di ni ngag gi nyes par spyod pa'o/_/'di ni ngag gis nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par smin 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]pa'o/_/'di ni yid kyi nyes par spyod pa'o/_/'di ni yid kyis nyes par spyad pa'i rnam par smin pa'o/_/'di ni srog gcod pa'o/_/'di ni ma byin par len pa'o/_/'di ni 'dod pas log par g.yem pa'o/_/'di ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba'o/_/'di ni phra ma'o/_/'di ni ngag rtsub po'o/_/'di ni tshig kyal pa'o/_/
[\[224b.2\]]'di ni brnab sems so/_/'di ni gnod sems so/_/'di ni log par lta ba'o/_/'di ni de dag gi rnam par smin pa'o/_/'di ni ser sna'o/_/'di ni ser sna'i 'bras bu'o/_/'di ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims so/_/'di ni khro ba'o/_/'di ni le lo'o/_/'di ni le lo'i 'bras bu'o/_/'di ni 'chal pa'i 
[\[224b.3\]]shes rab bo/_/'di ni 'chal pa'i shes rab kyi 'bras bu'o/_/'di ni bslab pa'i gzhi las 'das pa'o/_/'di ni so sor thar pa'o/_/'di ni bya ba'o/_/'di ni mi bya ba'o/_/'di ni rnam par 'byor pa'o/_/'di ni sgrib pa'o/_/'di ni sgrib pa med pa'o/_/'di ni ltung ba'o/_/'di ni 
[\[224b.4\]]ltung ba las byung ba'o/_/'di ni lam mo/_/'di ni lam ngan pa'o/_/'di ni dge ba'o/_/'di ni mi dge ba'o/_/'di ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'o/_/'di ni kha na ma tho ba med pa'o/_/'di ni zag pa dang bcas pa'o/_/'di ni zag pa med pa'o/_/'di ni 'jig rten pa'o/_/'di ni 'jig rten 
[\[224b.5\]]las 'das pa'o/_/'di ni 'dus byas so/_/'di ni 'dus ma byas so/_/'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'o/_/'di ni rnam par byang ba'o/_/'di ni 'khor ba'o/_/'di ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes de lta bur chos rnam pa du mar bshad pas rta dmu rgod lta bu'i sems rab tu gnas par byed do/_/'di 
[\[224b.6\]]lta ste dper na rta'am bal glang dmu rgod gnad du brdab pa tshun chad kyis dul bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sems can dmu rgod gdul dka' ba rnams kyang sdug bsngal thams cad smos pa'i gtam gyis dul bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis smras pa/_'di ltar bcom ldan 
[\[224b.7\]]'das shAkya thub pa sangs rgyas kyi che ba bzhag ste/_ngan cing dbul ba sems can dmu rgod rnams 'dul ba ni ngo mtshar to/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di lta bur sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang ba na 'khod pa de dag gi snying rje chen po'ang bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/de nas lid tsa bI dri ma med 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]par grags pas smras pa/_skyes bu dam pa dag de de bzhin te ji skad smras pa de bzhin no/_/gang 'dir skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gi snying rje chen po shin tu brtan no/_/de dag 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir tshe gcig la sems can gyi don shin tu mang du byed de/_'jig rten gyi 
[\[225a.2\]]khams spos thams cad kyi dri mchog der bskal pa brgya stong gis kyang sems can gyi don de ltar byed mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_skyes bu dam pa dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir gang de dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i dge ba bsags pa chos bcu yod de/_de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[225a.3\]]gzhan na med do/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dbul po rnams la ni sbyin pas sdud do/_/tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la ni tshul khrims kyis sdud do/_/khong khro ba rnams la ni bzod pas sdud do/_/le lo can rnams la ni brtson 'grus kyis sdud do/_/sems g.yeng ba rnams la ni bsam 
[\[225a.4\]]gtan gyis sdud do/_/shes rab 'chal pa rnams la ni shes rab kyis sdud do/_/mi khom par gyur pa rnams la ni mi khom pa brgyad las 'da' ba ston to/_/nyi tshe bar spyod pa rnams la ni theg pa chen po ston to/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams la ni dge ba'i rtsa bas sdud do/_/bsdu ba'i 
[\[225a.5\]]dngos po bzhis rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems can yongs su smin par byed pa ste/_dge ba bsags pa'i chos bcu po 'di dag rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan na med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis smras pa/_chos du dang ldan na byang chub sems 
[\[225a.6\]]dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nas shi 'phos nas ma rmas ma snad par sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gro bar 'gyur/_smras pa/_chos brgyad dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nas shi 'phos nas ma rmas ma snad par sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[225a.7\]]yongs su dag par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_sems can thams cad la bdag gis phan par bya ste/_'di dag las ni phan pa [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang mi 'tshal lo/_/sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad bzod par bya ste/_des dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]can thams cad la gtang bar bya'o snyam pa dang /_sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ston pa lta bur dga' ba dang /_thos pa dang ma thos pa'i chos rnams thos na mi spong ba dang /_gzhan gyi rnyed pa la phrag dog med cing bdag gi rnyed pas 
[\[225b.2\]]mi snyems shing sems nges par sems pa dang /_bdag gi 'khrul pa la so sor rtog cing gzhan gyi nyes pa mi gleng ba dang /_bag yod pa la dga' zhing yon tan thams cad yang dag par len pa ste/_chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi 
[\[225b.3\]]khams mi mjed nas shi 'phos nas ma rmas ma snad par sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de ltar 'khor der 'dus pa la de ltar chos bstan pas 'di ltar srog chags 'bum 
[\[225b.4\]]tshang ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/byang chub sems dpa' khri ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/sprul pas zhal zas blangs pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//_//yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das a mra srung ba'i 
[\[225b.5\]]tshal na chos ston pa'i 'khor gyi khyams de yang rgya che zhing yangs par gyur to/_/'khor de yang gser gyi kha dog lta bur 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar a mra srung ba'i tshal 'di rgya che zhing 
[\[225b.6\]]yangs par gyur pa dang /_'khor thams cad kyang gser gyi kha dog tu gda' ba 'di su'i snga ltas lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 'di ni lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gnyis 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor 
[\[225b.7\]]cing mdun du bdar te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du 'ong ba'i snga ltas so/_/de nas lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal sems can chen po 'di dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing phyag 'tshal bar 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]'gyur gyis yu bu cag bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du 'dong ngo /_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu dag de'i dus la bab par shes na 'dong ngo /_/de nas lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pas 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas pas ji ltar 'khor thams 
[\[226a.2\]]cad seng ge'i khri de dag dang bcas te lag pa g.yas pa'i steng du bzhag nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste der phyin pa dang /_de dag sa la bzhag ste bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun du bskor te phyogs gcig tu 'dug 
[\[226a.3\]]go/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog brtsegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang seng ge'i khri las babs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 
[\[226a.4\]]'khod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad kyang seng ge'i khri las babs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de bzhin du brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_
[\[226a.5\]]lha'i bu de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par dga' bar byas nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu dag rang rang 
[\[226a.6\]]gi seng ge'i khri la 'khod cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas de dag 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu khyod kyis sems can gyi mchog byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong 
[\[226a.7\]]ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de la khyod kyi 'du shes ji lta bur skyes/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag de la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 'du shes skyes lags so/_/ji ltar bsam pa dang /_gzhal ba dang /_
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]bgrang bar mi nus pa de lta bur de dag gi bgyid pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mthong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sngon ma mnams pa'i dri zhig gda' na 'di lta bu su'i dri lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[226b.2\]]kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gis lus kyi spu'i khung bu thams cad nas dri byung ba yin no/_/shA ri'i bus kyang smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo kho bo cag gi lus kyi spu'i khung bu thams cad nas kyang 'di lta bu'i dri byung ngo /_/smras pa/_dri ci las byung smras pa/_lid tsa 
[\[226b.3\]]bI dri ma med par grags pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog brtsegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams spos thams cad kyi dri mchog nas zhal zas blangs te/_zos so cog thams cad kyi lus las 'di lta bu'i dri byung ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos lid tsa 
[\[226b.4\]]bI dri mi med par grags pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/dri 'di ji srid kyi bar du chags par 'gyur/_smras pa/_ji srid zas ma zhu ba'i bar du'o/_/kun dga' bos smras pa/_zas de yun ji srid na zhu bar gyur/_smras pa/_zhag bdun phrag bdun gyis zhu bar 'gyur te/_de nas yang zhag 
[\[226b.5\]]bdun gyi bar du des mdangs rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/ma zhu ba'i gnod par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo dge slong gang nges pa la ma zhugs pas zas 'di zos na de dag nges pa la zhugs na de 'ju bar 'gyur ro/_/nges pa la zhugs pa gang gis zhal zas 'di zos pa de dag sems 
[\[226b.6\]]yongs su ma grol gyi bar du mi 'ju'o/_/sems can byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa gang dag gis de zos pa de dag byang chub tu sems bskyed na de 'ju bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gang dag gis zos pa de dag bzod pa ma thob kyi bar du mi 'ju'o/_/bzod pa thob pa gang dag 
[\[226b.7\]]gis zos pa de dag skye ba gcig gis thogs pa na 'ju bar 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/_dper na sman bro ldan zhes bya ba ltor song na dug thams cad med par ma gyur gyi bar du mi 'ju ste sman de phyis 'ju bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du btsun pa kun dga' bo nyon mongs pa 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]thams cad kyi dug med par ma gyur gyi bar du zas de 'ju bar mi 'gyur te/_zas de phyis gdod 'ju bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das zhal zas 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid do/_/
[\[227a.2\]]bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de de bzhin te/_ji skad smras pa de de bzhin no/_/kun dga' bo gang dag na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang yod do/_/gang dag na 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang 
[\[227a.3\]]yod do/_/gang dag na byang chub kyi shing gis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang yod do/_/gang dag na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang gzugs mthong bas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang yod do/_/gang dag na chos gos 
[\[227a.4\]]kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang yod do/_/de bzhin du zhal zas kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pa dang /_de bzhin du chu dang /_skyed mos tshal dang /_gzhal med khang dang /_khang pa brtsegs pas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pa dag kyang yod 
[\[227a.5\]]do/_/kun dga' bo gang dag na sprul pas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang yod do/_/kun dga' bo nam mkhas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag kyang yod do/_/de bzhin du nam mkha' dang bar snang dag sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa 
[\[227a.6\]]byed de/_de lta bus sems can de dag 'dul bar 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin du rmi lam dang /_gzugs brnyan dang /_chu zla dang /_brag ca dang /_sgyu ma dang /_smig rgyu dang /_dper bstan pa dang /_yi ge dang /_nges pa'i tshig ston pa sems can de dag la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed 
[\[227a.7\]]pa dag kyang yod do/_/gang dag na yi ge rnam par rig par byed pas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag kyang yod do/_/kun dga' bo gang na smra ba med pa dang /_brjod pa med pa dang /_mi bstan pa dang /_mi brjod pas sems can de dag la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]de/_de lta bur yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang yod do/_/kun dga' bo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyod lam dang /_longs spyod dang /_yongs su spyod pas sems can rnams 'dul ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mi byed pa ni gang yang med do/_/kun dga' bo bdud bzhi 
[\[227b.2\]]po de dag dang /_nyon mongs pa'i sgo brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis sems can rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed do/_/kun dga' bo 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sgor 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi 
[\[227b.3\]]sgo ste/_chos kyi sgo 'dir zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni yon tan rgya chen po bkod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams la zhum pa'ang med/_gong ba'ang med/_yon tan rgya chen po bkod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams la dga' ba yang med/_
[\[227b.4\]]snyems pa yang med de/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang rab tu ri mor skyed do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa rnams kyi sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su ston pa de ni ngo mtshar to/_/kun dga' bo 
[\[227b.5\]]'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyi yon tan gzhan dang gzhan du sna tshogs su 'gyur yang bya lam gyis khebs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang nam mkha' la tha dad pa med pa de bzhin du kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gzugs kyi sku tha dad du 'gyur yang de bzhin gshegs 
[\[227b.6\]]pa rnams kyi chags pa med pa'i ye shes ni tha dad pa ma yin no/_/kun dga' bo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs dang /_kha dog dang /_gzi brjid dang /_sku dang /_mtshan dang /_rigs btsun pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_
[\[227b.7\]]rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang /_stobs rnams dang /_mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_phan par dgongs pa dang /_spyod lam dang /_spyod pa dang /_lam dang /_tshe'i tshad dang /_chos ston pa 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]dang /_sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang /_sems can rnam par grol ba dang /_zhing yongs su dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mtshungs te/_de bas na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[228a.2\]]pa zhes bya'o/_/sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/_/kun dga' bo tshig de gsum gyi don rgyas pa dang /_tshig rnam par dbye ba gang yin pa de ni khyod tshe'i tshad bskal par 'dug kyang bde bar kun chub par sla ba ma yin no/_/stong gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kun dga' bo khyod 'dra bar 
[\[228a.3\]]mang du thos pa dang /_dran pa dang /_gzungs thob pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu gyur la/_kun dga' bo dang 'dra ba'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i tshig de gsum 
[\[228a.4\]]gyi don gdon mi za bar bstan pa ni bskal par yang kun chub par mi nus so/_/kun dga' bo de ltar sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni tshad med de/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi shes rab dang spobs pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di 
[\[228a.5\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das deng slan chad bdag mang du thos pa'i mchog go zhes dam mi 'cha'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod zhum pa'i sems ma skyed cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo khyod nyan thos rnams la dgongs te mang du thos pa'i 
[\[228a.6\]]mchog go zhes ngas bstan gyi byang chub sems dpa'i nang na ni ma yin no/_/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' lta zhog gi_/de dag ni mkhas pa dag gis tshod gzung bar bya ba ma yin te/_kun dga' bo rgya mtsho thams cad kyi gting ni tshad gzung bar nus kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 
[\[228a.7\]]shes rab dang /_ye shes dang /_dran pa dang /_gzungs dang /_spobs pa'i gting ni tshod gzung mi nus so/_/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams la khyod btang snyoms su gyis shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pa 'dis snga dro 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]gcig la bkod pa bstan pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul thob pa thams cad kyis bskal pa bye ba brgya stong du'ang rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul thams cad kyis ston mi nus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spos mchog brtsegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[228b.2\]]nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal zhing tshig 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di la ngan par 'du shes bskyed pa yid la bgyis pa rnams spang 
[\[228b.3\]]bar 'tshal lo/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul dang /_thabs mkhas pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_de dag sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/_ji lta ji lta bur bzhed pa de ltar de lta bur 
[\[228b.4\]]zhing bkod pa ston to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'jig rten gyi khams spos thams cad kyi dri mchog der mchis kyang bcom ldan 'das rjes su dran par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rdzongs shig bdag cag la stsal bar gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[228b.5\]]stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa zad pa dang /_mi zad pa zhes bya ba yod do/_/de la khyed kyis bslab par bya ste/_de yang gang zhe na/_zad pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus byas so/_/mi zad pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas te/_de la byang chub sems dpa' 'dus 
[\[228b.6\]]byas zad par mi bya/_'dus ma byas la'ang gnas par mi bya'o/_/de la 'dus byas mi zad pa ni 'di lta ste/_byams pa chen po las ma nyams pa'o/_/snying rje chen po ma btang ba'o/_/lhag pa'i bsam pas yang dag par btsud pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems mi brjed pa'o/_/sems 
[\[228b.7\]]can yongs su smin par byed pa la mi skyo ba'o/_/bsdu ba'i dngos po mi gtong ba'o/_/dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir lus dang srog 'dor ba'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba dag la chog mi shes pa'o/_/yongs su bsngo bar mkhas pa la 'god pa'o/_/chos tshol ba la le lo med 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]pa'o/_/chos bstan pa la slob dpon dpe mkhyud mi byed pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang /_mchod pa'i dngos po la brtson pa'o/_/bsams bzhin du skye bas mi skrag pa'o/_/phun sum tshogs pa dang rgud pa dag la ma khengs mi 'dud pa'o/_/ma bslab 
[\[229a.2\]]pa rnams la mi brnyas shing lobs pa rnams la ston pa ltar phangs par sems pa'o/_/nyon mongs pa rgyas pa rnams la tshul bzhin nye bar sbyor ba'o/_/dben pa la dga' zhing de la ma chags pa'o/_/bdag gi bde ba la ma zhen cing pha rol bde ba la zhen pa'o/_/bsam gtan dang /_ting 
[\[229a.3\]]nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa la mnar med pa ltar 'du shes pa'o/_/'khor ba la skyed mos tshal dang mya ngan las 'das pa lta bur 'du shes pa'o/_/slong ba rnams la dag pa'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes pa'o/_/bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba la thams cad mkhyen 
[\[229a.4\]]pa nyid rdzogs par byed par 'du shes pa'o/_/tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la bskyab par 'du shes pa'o/_/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la pha mar 'du shes pa'o/_/byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la bdag po g.yog tu 'du shes pa'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad 
[\[229a.5\]]kyis chog mi shes shing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi yon tan bdag gi zhing du sgrub pa'o/_/mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su bskang ba'i phyir gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin yongs su gtong ba'o/_/sdig pa thams cad mi byed pas lus dang /_ngag dang /_sems brgyan 
[\[229a.6\]]pa'o/_/lus dang ngag yongs su dag cing sems yongs su dag pas bskal pa grangs med par 'khor ba'o/_/sems dpa' bas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan tshad med pa thos kyang zhum par mi 'gyur ba'o/_/nyon mongs pa'i dgra tshar gcad par bya ba'i phyir/_shes rab kyi mtshon rnon po thogs 
[\[229a.7\]]pa'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi khur bkur ba'i phyir phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched kun shes pa'o/_/bdud kyi sde gzhom pa'i phyir brtson 'grus 'bar ba'o/_/nga rgyal med pa'i phyir ye shes tshol ba'o/_/chos gzung ba'i phyir 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes pa'o/_/
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]'jig rten thams cad dga' bar bya ba'i phyir/_'jig rten gyi chos thams cad dang ma 'dres pa'o/_/'jig rten dang 'thun par bya ba'i phyir spyod lam thams cad las ma nyams pa'o/_/bya ba thams cad yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i phyir/_mngon par shes pa bskyed 
[\[229b.2\]]pa'o/_/thos pa thams cad gzung ba'i phyir/_gzungs dang /_dran pa dang /_ye shes so/_/sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcad pa'i phyir/_dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa'o/_/chos bstan pa'i phyir byin gyi rlabs thogs pa med pa'o/_/spobs pa 
[\[229b.3\]]'thob pa rab tu rnyed pas spobs pa thogs pa med pa'o/_/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su dag pas lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa myong ba'o/_/tshad med pa bzhi rab tu bskyed pas tshangs pa'i lam du 'god pa'o/_/chos bstan par gsol ba dang rjes su yi rang zhing legs so 
[\[229b.4\]]zhes bya ba byin pas sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs rab tu thob pa'o/_/lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid sdom pas khyad par du 'gro ba dang /_chos thams cad la ma chags pas sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam rab tu thob pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun sdud pas theg pa chen po la yang 
[\[229b.5\]]dag par 'dzud pa'o/_/yon tan thams cad chud mi za bas bag yod pa yin te/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos la brtson zhing byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas zad par mi byed do/_/ji ltar na 'dus ma byas la mi gnas she na/_gang gi tshe stong pa nyid 
[\[229b.6\]]la byang bar byed cing stong pa nyid mngon sum du yang mi byed/_mtshan ma med pa la yongs su byang bar byed kyang mtshan ma med pa mngon sum du yang mi byed/_smon pa med pa la yongs su byang bar byed kyang smon pa med pa mngon sum du yang mi byed/_mngon par 'du mi byed pa 
[\[229b.7\]]la yongs su byang bar byed kyang mngon par 'du mi byed pa mngon sum du yang mi byed/_mi rtag par so sor rtog kyang dge ba'i rtsa bas chog mi shes/_sdug bsngal bar so sor rtog kyang bsams bzhin du skye/_bdag med par so sor rtog kyang bdag yongs su 'dor 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]ba'ang ma yin/_zhi bar so sor rtog kyang shin tu zhi ba'ang mi skyed/_dben par so sor rtog kyang lus dang sems kyis kyang 'bad/_gnas med par so sor rtog kyang dkar po'i chos kyi gnas spong ba'ang ma yin/_'byung ba med par so sor rtog kyang sems can rnams kyi khur blangs pa 
[\[230a.2\]]yang thogs/_zag pa med par so sor rtog kyang 'khor ba'i rgyun la slong bar yang byed/_rgyu ba med par so sor rtog kyang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir rgyu bar yang 'gyur bdag med par so sor rtog kyang sems can la snying rje chen po mi 'dor/_mi skye bar so sor rtog kyang 
[\[230a.3\]]nyan thos kyi nges par yang mi ltung /_gsog dang /_gsob dang /_snying po med pa dang /_bdag po med pa dang /_gnas med par so sor rtog kyang bsod nams gsog ma yin pa dang /_ye shes gsob ma yin pa dang /_brnags pa yongs su rdzogs shing rang byung ba'i ye shes su dbang 
[\[230a.4\]]bskur ba dang /_rang byung gi ye shes la brtson pa dang /_nges pa'i don sangs rgyas kyi rigs la rab tu gnas pa yin te/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na de lta bu'i chos la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dus ma byas la mi gnas shing 'dus byas kyang zad par mi byed do/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 
[\[230a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' ni bsod nams kyi tshogs yang dag par sgrub pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas la mi gnas so/_/ye shes kyi tshogs yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir 'dus byas zad par mi byed do/_/byams pa chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas la mi gnas so/_/snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir 
[\[230a.6\]]'dus byas zad par mi byed do/_/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'dus ma byas la mi gnas so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mos pa'i phyir 'dus byas zad par mi byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi mtshan yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dus ma byas la mi gnas so/_/thams cad mkhyen 
[\[230a.7\]]pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dus byas zad par mi byed do/_/thabs la mkhas pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas la mi gnas so/_/shes rab kyis shin tu brtags pa'i phyir 'dus byas zad par mi byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir 'dus ma byas la mi gnas 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]so/_/sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi phyir 'dus byas zad par mi byed do/_/sems can gyi don myong ba'i phyir 'dus byas la mi gnas so/_/chos kyi don yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir 'dus byas zad par mi byed do/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi phyir 'dus ma byas la mi gnas so/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bag chags 
[\[230b.2\]]kyi phyir 'dus byas zad par mi byed do/_/smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dus ma byas la mi gnas so/_/smon pa med pa'i phyir 'dus byas zad par mi byed do/_/bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas la mi gnas so/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir 'dus byas zad 
[\[230b.3\]]par mi byed do/_/mngon par shes pa lngas rnam par rtsen pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas la mi gnas so/_/sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mngon par shes pa drug gi phyir 'dus byas zad par mi byed do/_/pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs yongs su bskang ba'i phyir 'dus ma byas la mi gnas so/_/dus yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir 
[\[230b.4\]]'dus byas zad par mi byed do/_/chos kyi nor kun bsdu ba'i phyir 'dus ma byas la mi gnas so/_/nyi tse ba'i chos mi 'dod pas 'dus byas zad par mi byed do/_/chos kyi sman kun sdud pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas la mi gnas so/_/ci rigs par chos kyi sman sbyor ba'i phyir 'dus byas zad par mi 
[\[230b.5\]]byed do/_/dam bcas pa la brtan pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas la mi gnas so/_/dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par bya ba'i phyir 'dus byas zad par mi byed do/_/chos kyi rtsi thams cad sgrub pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas la mi gnas so/_/'di ltar chos chung ngu'i sman sbyor ba'i phyir 'dus byas zad 
[\[230b.6\]]par mi byed do/_/de nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad yongs su shes pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas la mi gnas so/_/nad thams cad zhi ba'i phyir 'dus byas zad par mi byed do/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas zad par mi byed cing 'dus ma byas la mi gnas te/_de ni byang 
[\[230b.7\]]chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par thar pa'i zad pa dang mi zad pa zhes bya ba yin no/_/skyes bu dam pa dag khyed kyis kyang de la brtson par gyis shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag bstan pa 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/_
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod par bya ba'i phyir stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad phye ma dang /_spos dang /_bdug pa mang po thams cad dang me tog gis pus mo nub tsam du khebs 
[\[231a.2\]]par byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du'ang mngon par bkram pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor nas ched du rjod pa brjod cing /_de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas mi snang bar gyur te/_skad cig yud 
[\[231a.3\]]tsam thang cig gis 'jig rten gyi khams spos thams cad kyi mchog der 'khod do/_/zad pa dang mi zad pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rdzongs kyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe de 
[\[231a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa la lta 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la ji ltar lta/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la lta 'tshal ba de'i tshe 
[\[231a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa mi mthong bas lta ba lags so/_/sngon gyi mtha' nas ma skyes pa dang /_phyi ma'i mthar mi 'pho ba dang /_da ltar gyi dus la'ang mi gnas par blta lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin te/_gzugs ma mchis pa'o/_/tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid 
[\[231a.6\]]kyi rang bzhin te/_tshor ba ma mchis pa'o/_/'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin te/_'du shes ma mchis pa'o/_/'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin te/_'du byed ma mchis pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin te/_rnam par shes pa ma mchis pa'o/_/khams bzhi ni mi 
[\[231a.7\]]gnas pa ste/_nam mkha'i khams dang mtshungs pa'o/_/skye mched drug ni ma skyes pa ste/_mig gi lam las shin tu 'das pa/_rna ba'i lam las shin tu 'das pa/_sna'i lam las shin tu 'das pa/_lce'i lam las shin tu 'das pa/_lus kyi lam las shin tu 'das pa/_yid kyi lam 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]las shin tu 'das pa/_khams gsum pa dang ma 'dres pa/_dri ma gsum dang bral ba/_rnam par thar pa gsum gyi rjes su mchis pa/_rig pa gsum thob pa/_ma thob pa yang dag par thob pa/_chos thams cad la ma chags pa'i mthar phyin pa/_yang dag pa nyid kyi mtha' ma mchis pa/_de 
[\[231b.2\]]bzhin nyid la rab tu gnas pa de phan tshun du bral ba/_rgyus ma bskyed pa/_rkyen la rag ma las pa/_mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/_mtshan nyid dang bcas pa ma lags pa/_mtshan nyid gcig pa'ang ma lags pa/_mtshan nyid tha dad pa'ang ma lags pa/_rtogs par 'gyur ba'ang ma lags pa/_kun tu 
[\[231b.3\]]rtogs par 'gyur ba'ang ma lags pa/_rnam par rtogs par gyur ba'ang ma lags pa/_pha rol na'ang ma lags pa/_tshu rol na'ang ma lags pa/_dbus na yang ma lags pa/_'di na yang ma lags pa/_pha bin yang ma lags pa/_de na yang ma lags pa/_gzhan na yang ma lags pa/_rnam par 
[\[231b.4\]]shes pas 'tshal bar bgyi ba'ang ma lags pa/_rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'ang ma lags pa/_mun pa yang ma lags pa/_snang ba yang ma lags pa/_ming ma mchis pa/_mtshan ma ma mchis pa/_nyam chung ba yang ma lags pa/_stobs dang ldan pa yang ma lags pa/_yul la mi 
[\[231b.5\]]gnas shing phyogs la mi gnas pa dge ba'ang ma lags pa/_mi dge ba'ang ma lags pa/_'dus byas kyang ma lags pa/_'dus ma byas kyang ma lags pa/_gang gi don du'ang brjod pa ma lags pa/_sbyin par yang ma lags pa/_ser snar yang ma lags pa/_tshul khrims su'ang ma 
[\[231b.6\]]lags pa/_'chal ba'i tshul khrims su'ang ma lags pa/_bzod par yang ma lags pa/_gnod sems su yang ma lags pa/_brtson 'grus su'ang ma lags pa/_le lor yang ma lags pa/_bsam gtan du'ang ma lags pa/_g.yeng bar yang ma lags pa/_shes rab tu yang ma lags 
[\[231b.7\]]pa/_'chal pa'i shes rab tu'ang brjod pa'ang ma lags pa/_bden par yang ma lags pa/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]par yang ma lags pa/_nges par 'byin pa yang ma lags pa/_nges par mi 'byin pa'ang ma lags pa/_'gro bar bgyi ba yang ma lags pa/_'gro bar mi bgyi ba yang ma lags pa/_smra 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]ba dang spyod pa thams cad shin tu chad pa ste/_zhing du gyur pa'ang ma lags pa/_zhing du ma gyur pa yang ma lags pa/_sbyin par 'os pa yang ma lags pa/_sbyin pa mi sbyong ba'ang ma lags pa/_gzung bar bgyi ba'ang ma lags pa/_reg par bgyi ba'ang ma lags pa/_mtshan ma ma mchis pa/_
[\[232a.2\]]'dus ma bgyis pa/_grangs dang bral ba/_mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa/_chos nyid kyis mtshungs pa/_mtshungs pa ma mchis pa/_brtson 'grus mtshungs pa ma mchis pa/_gzhal ba las shin tu 'das pa/_song ba'ang ma lags pa/_zhugs pa'ang ma lags pa/_shin tu 'das pa'ang ma lags 
[\[232a.3\]]pa/_mthong ba dang thos pa dang /_bye brag phyed pa dang /_rnam par rig pa'ang ma lags pa/_mdud pa thams cad ma mchis pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang mtshungs pa thob pa/_chos thams cad la snyoms shing chos thams cad la bye brag ma mchis pa thob pa/_thams cad du kha na ma tho 
[\[232a.4\]]ba ma mchis pa/_ci yang ma mchis pa/_snyigs ma ma mchis pa/_mi rtog pa/_rnam par mi rtog pa/_ma bgyis pa/_ma skyes pa/_ma 'thon pa/_ma byung ba/_kun nas ma byung ba/_'byung bar 'gyur ba yang ma lags pa/_'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'ang ma lags pa/_'jig pa ma mchis pa/_kun gzhi 
[\[232a.5\]]ma mchis pa/_mya ngan ma mchis pa/_dga' ba ma mchis pa/_rlabs ma mchis pa/_tha snyad du bstan pa thams cad kyis brjod par bgyi ba ma lags pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni 'di 'dra ste/_de la de ltar blta lags so/_/gang gis de ltar mthong ba de ni yang dag par 
[\[232a.6\]]mthong ba lags so/_/gang gis rnam pa gzhan du mthong ba de ni log par mthong ba lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dri ma med par grags pa de sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang nas shi 'phos te sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[232a.7\]]'dir mchis/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu khyod kyis skyes bu dam pa 'di la khyod gang nas shi 'phos te/_'dir skyes zhes dris shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod gang nas shi 'phos te 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]'dir skyes/_dri ma med par grags pas smras pa/_gnas brtan gyis chos gang mngon du byas pa'i chos de la 'chi 'pho dang /_skye ba gang yang yod dam/_smras pa/_chos de la 'chi 'pho'am skye ba gang yang med do/_/smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du chos thams cad 'chi 'pho med cing skye ba med na 
[\[232b.2\]]ci'i phyir na de lta bur khyod gang nas shi 'phos shing 'dir skyes snyam du sems/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa'i bud med dam skyes pa la khyod gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes zhes dris na de'i lan ci skad ces 'debs/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu sprul pa la 'chi 'pho yang med/_skye 
[\[232b.3\]]ba'ang med na de ci zhig lan ldon/_smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu chos thams cad ni sprul pa'i rang bzhin no zhes de bzhin gshegs pas ma gsungs sam/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/_/smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu chos thams cad sprul pa'i rang bzhin lta bu la ci'i phyir khyod 'di snyam du 
[\[232b.4\]]khyod ga las shi 'phos te 'dir skyes snyam du sems/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'chi 'pho zhes bya ba ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/skye ba zhes bya ba de ni nga mngon par 'du byed pa'i rgyun to/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' 'chi 'pho yang dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byed pa zad par mi byed do/_/
[\[232b.5\]]de skye yang mi dge ba'i rgyun 'brel bar mi byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu 'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i drung nas 'dir 'ongs so/_/gsol 
[\[232b.6\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa 'di sangs rgyas kyi zhing de tsam du rnam par dag pa nas mchis te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nongs pa mang po'i skyon chags pa la mngon par dga' ba ni ngo mtshar to/_/de nas lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pas smras pa/_shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_
[\[232b.7\]]nyi ma'i 'od rnams mun pa dang lhan cig 'grogs sam/_smras pa/_de ni ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de gnyis mi 'grogs sam/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de gnyis mi 'grogs te/_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ma thag tu mun pa thams cad med par 'gyur ro/_/smras pa/_ci'i phyir na 'dzam bu'i gling du 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]nyi ma 'char/_smras pa/_de ni snang bar bya ba dang mun pa bsal ba'i phyir ro/_/smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can rnams yongs su sbyang ba dang /_ye shes kyi snang bar bya ba dang /_mun pa chen po bsal ba'i phyir bsams bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[233a.2\]]yongs su ma dag pa rnams su skye ste/_nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig mi gnas shing sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i mun pa yang rnam par sel to/_/de nas 'khor de dag thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba de dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa de dang /_
[\[233a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag bdag cag gis blta'o snyam du skom par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor de dag thams cad kyi sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs 
[\[233a.4\]]kyi bu 'khor 'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba de dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa de mthong bar 'dod kyis 'khor 'di la khyod kyis ston cig_/de nas lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pas 'di snyam du bsams te/_bdag seng ge'i khri 'di las ma langs par 'jig rten gyi 
[\[233a.5\]]khams mngon par dga' ba de dang /_byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong du ma dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin gnas pa kho ra khor yug gi ris bskor ba dang bcas pa dang /_'bab chu dang /_mtshe'u dang /_chu mig dang /_mtsho dang /_rgya mtsho'i 'obs dang bcas pa 
[\[233a.6\]]dang /_ri rab dang /_ri bo dang /_de'u dang /_bog rir bcas pa dang /_zla ba dang /_nyi ma dang /_skar mar bcas pa dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za'i gnas su bcas pa dang /_tshangs pa'i gnas dang 'khor du bcas pa dang /_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_
[\[233a.7\]]yul 'khor dang /_mir bcas pa/_bud med dang /_khyim du bcas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpar bcas pa dang /_nyan thos kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i byang chub kyi shing dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa yang 'khor rgya mtsho snyed kyi nang na 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]bzhugs shing chos 'chad pa dang /_gang pad ma gang dag phyogs bcu na sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pa de dag dang /_rin po che'i skas gsum 'dzam bu'i gling nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas kyi bar du mngon par 'phags pa'i skas de la sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[233b.2\]]pa mi 'khrugs pa la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dzam bu'i gling du 'bab/_'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams blta ba'i phyir sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas su 'dzeg pa de lta bu'i yon tan tshad med pa tshogs pa 'jig rten 
[\[233b.3\]]gyi khams mngon par dga' ba de chu'i phung po nas bzung ste/_'og min gyi gnas kyi bar du rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo bzhin du nyi tse bar bcad de/_lag pa g.yas pas blangs nas me tog gi phreng ba bzhin du thogs te 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir bcug go/_/bcug nas kyang 'khor 'di thams 
[\[233b.4\]]cad la bstan par bya'o/_/de nas lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pa de 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas te/_'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba de nyi tshe bar bcad nas lag pa g.yas pas blangs te 'jig rten gyi 
[\[233b.5\]]khams mi mjed 'dir bcug go/_/der nyan thos dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_lha dang /_mi gang dag lha'i mig mngon par shes pa drug thob pa de dag gis skad cher bos pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'tshal to/_/bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag 'tshal to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[233b.6\]]bdag cag gi skyabs mdzod cig ces gsol pa dang /_'dul ba'i don du bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med par grags pas khyer ba de ni nga'i yul ma yin no/_/de na lha dang mi la sogs pa gzhan dag gis ni bdag cag gar 
[\[233b.7\]]khyer mi shes mi mthong ngo /_/'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba de 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir bcug kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gang ba'am/_bri bar yang mi mngon te/_dog cing gcer ba'ang med do/_/'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba de yang bri ba med de sngon ji lta ba bzhin du phyis kyang 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]de bzhin du snang ngo /_de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'khor de dag thams cad la bka' stsal pa/_kye grogs po dag 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa dang /_nyan thos bkod pa dang /_byang chub 
[\[234a.2\]]sems dpa' bkod pa 'di dag la ltos shig_/de dag gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di 'dra ba yongs su gzung bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa thams 
[\[234a.3\]]cad kyi rjes su bslab par bya'o/_/de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba bstan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa bstan pas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di'i lha dang mi'i skye dgu las khri phrag bcu bzhi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[234a.4\]]pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/kun gyis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba der skye bar smon lam btab ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de dag thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' bar skye bar lung bstan to/_/de ltar lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pas 'jig 
[\[234a.5\]]rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir sems can yongs su smin par bya ba ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad smin par byas nas 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba de slar gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[234a.6\]]shA ri'i bu khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba de dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa de mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mthong lags so/_/sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de 'dra bar gyur cig_/sems can thams 
[\[234a.7\]]cad kyang rigs kyi bu lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pa ji lta bu de 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan par gyur cig_/bdag cag kyang skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu mthong ba thob pa ni rnyed pa legs par lags te/_gang dag tha na da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'am/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos kyi 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]rnam grangs 'di thos pa'i sems can de dag kyang rnyed pa rab tu rnyed par 'gyur na/_gang dag thos nas mos pa dang /_yid ches pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_mos nas ston pa dang /_rab tu 'don pa dang /_gzhan dag la'ang 'chad pa dang /_sgom 
[\[234b.2\]]pa'i rnal 'byor la rjes su sbyor ba rnams la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi sug par thob par gyur pa de dag kyang chos rin po che'i gter rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di kha ton du bgyid pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i grogs su gyur pa lags 
[\[234b.3\]]so/_/gang dag chos 'di la mos pa rnams la rim gro dang bsnyen bkur bgyid pa de dag ni chos yang dag par srung ba lags so/_/gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bris te 'chang ba dang ri mor bgyid pa de dag gi khyim na de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par 'gyur ro/_/gang dag chos kyi rnam 
[\[234b.4\]]grangs 'di la rjes su yi rang ba de dag ni bsod nams thams cad yongs su bzung ba lags so/_/gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam dang /_sdom pa'i tshig tsam yang gzhan dag la ston pa de dag ni chos kyi mchod sbyin chen po bgyid pa lags so/_/
[\[234b.5\]]gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bzod pa dang /_'dun pa dang /_blo gros dang /_rtog pa dang /_lta ba dang /_mos pa dag ni de nyid de dag la lung bstan pa lags so/_/'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba blangs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig 
[\[234b.6\]]pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sngon de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa las chos kyi rnam grangs brgya stong mang po thos kyang ji ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las rnam par sprul 
[\[234b.7\]]pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul la 'jug pa rab tu bstan pa 'di lta bu ni sngon nam yang ma thos lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klo ga pa dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa de dag kyang the tsom ma mchis par 'di lta bu'i chos kyi snod 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]du 'gyur na/_gang dag bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la rjes su sbyor ba rnams la smos kyang ci 'tshal te/_de dag gis ngan song thams cad ni bcad/_de dag gis bde 'gro'i lam thams cad ni phye/_de dag sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ni gzigs/_de dag gis phas kyi rgol ba thams cad ni bcom/_
[\[235a.2\]]de dag gis bdud thams cad ni shin tu pham par bgyis/_de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i lam ni rnam par sbyangs/_de dag byang chub kyi snying po la ni gnas/_de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la ni yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_
[\[235a.3\]]rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba de dag la bdag 'khor thams cad dang bcas pas rim gro dang g.yog bgyi'o/_/grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa dang /_'chang 
[\[235a.4\]]ba dang /_rab tu ston pa der chos nyan pa'i slad du bdag g.yog dang bcas te mchi'o/_/rigs kyi bu ma dad pa rnams ni dad pa bskyed par bgyi/_dad pa rnams ni chos dang ldan pas bsrung zhing bskyab par bgyi'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad 
[\[235a.5\]]ces bka' stsal to/_/legs so legs so/_/lha'i dbang po khyod kyis legs par smras pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa yang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/lha'i dbang po 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub de ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las 
[\[235a.6\]]bstan to/_/lha'i dbang po de bas na gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /_tha na glegs bam la 'dri ba dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 
[\[235a.7\]]mchod par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i dbang po rigs kyi bu pho'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di de bzhin gshegs pas yongs su gang ba 'di lta ste dper na bu ram shing gi tshal lam/_'dam bu'i tshal lam/_smyig ma'i tshal lam/_til gyi zhing ngam/_
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]seng ldeng gi tshal bzhin du rab tu gang ba rnams la bskal pa'am/_bskal pa las lhag par rim gror byas/_bla mar byas/_bsti stang du byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la mchod pa thams cad dang bde ba'i yo byad kyis mchod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das 
[\[235b.2\]]nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa re re la yang mchod pa'i phyir gcig tu mkhregs pa ma zhig pa'i sku gdung gi mchod rten rin po che thams cad las byas pa rgyar ni gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi tshad tsam/_'phang du ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du phyin pa/_gdugs dang /_ba dan dang /_srog shing bsgrengs pas 
[\[235b.3\]]mdzes par rab tu byas te/_de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod rten so sor byas nas des de la bskal pa'am/_bskal pa las lhag par me tog thams cad dang /_spos thams cad dang /_rgyal mtshan thams cad dang /_ba dan thams cad kyis mchod pa byas shing rnga dang sil snyan 
[\[235b.4\]]rnams brdungs te mchod na lha'i dbang po 'di ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du bskyed dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang lags te/_bskal pa bye ba brgya stong gis kyang bsod nams kyi 
[\[235b.5\]]phung po de'i mthar phyin par mi nus lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i dbang po khyod mos par bya'o/_/khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o/_/gang rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tam/_klog gam/_kun chub par byed pa'i rigs kyi 
[\[235b.6\]]bu pho'am/_rigs kyi bu mo bsod nams shin tu mang du bskyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i dbang po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub ni chos las byung ste/_de chos kyis mchod par nus kyi zang zing gis ni ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/lha'i dbang po khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang 
[\[235b.7\]]'di ltar rig par bya ste/_lha'i dbang po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa/_rgya che ba/_tshad med pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur pa de'i dus de'i tshe na bskal pa rnam par sbyong ba la 'jig rten gyi khams cher bkod par de bzhin gshegs 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sman gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[236a.2\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi rgyal po de'i tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur gyur to/_/de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni bye ba khrag khrig phrag sum cu rtsa drug yod do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni bye ba khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis yod do/_/lha'i dbang po de'i 
[\[236a.3\]]tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen gdugs zhes bya ba gling bzhi la dbang ba rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/_de la bu dpa' ba/_rtul phod pa/_yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/_pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong du tshang ba yod do/_/rgyal po rin chen gdugs 
[\[236a.4\]]des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa la bar gyi bskal pa lnga'i bar du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis ri mor byas so/_/lha'i dbang po bar gyi bskal pa lnga po de dag 'das nas rgyal po rin chen gdugs kyis bu stong la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye khyed 
[\[236a.5\]]shes par gyis shig_/ngas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas kyis da khyed kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par gyis shig_/de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag pha rgyal po rin chen gdugs la legs so zhes smras nas de mnyan te/_de dang lhan cig tshogs nas de bzhin gshegs pa sman 
[\[236a.6\]]gyi rgyal po la bskal pa bar ma lnga'i bar du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas so/_/de'i nang nas rgyal bu zla gdugs zhes bya ba de gcig pu dben par song nas 'di snyam du sems te/_mchod pa de bas mchod pa gzhan ches khyad par du 'phags shing rgya che ba yod dam snyam pa dang /_
[\[236a.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bar snang de las lha dag 'di skad ces zer ro/_/skyes bu dam pa chos kyi mchod pa ni mchod pa thams cad kyi nang na mchog go/_/des smras pa/_chos kyi mchod pa de gang yin/_lhas smras pa/_skyes bu dam pa khyod de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal po de'i drung du song la 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]chos kyi mchod pa de gang lags zhes zhus shig dang /_bcom ldan 'das de khyod la lung ston to/_/de nas lha'i dbang po rgyal bu zla gdugs gzhon nu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi rgyal po ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 
[\[236b.2\]]'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal bu zla gdugs kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal po de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi mchod pa chos kyi mchod pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi mchod pa de 
[\[236b.3\]]gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu chos kyi mchod pa ni gang de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde zab mo zab mor snang ba/_'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa/_rtogs par dka' ba/_mngon par dka' ba/_khong du chud par dka' ba/_phra ba zhib pa/_mi 
[\[236b.4\]]dmigs pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi nang du gtogs pa/_gzungs dang mdo sde'i rgyal po'i phyag rgyas btab pa/_phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo ston pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug las byung ba/_'dzin pa rnams yongs su bzung ba/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang ldan pa/_byang chub kyi yan lag 
[\[236b.5\]]bsgrub par gtogs pa/_sems can la snying rje chen po 'jug pa/_byams pa chen po ston pa/_bdud kyi lta bar gyur pa thams cad med pa/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bstan pa/_bdag med pa/_sems can med pa/_srog med pa/_gang zag med pa/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa 
[\[236b.6\]]dang /_mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang /_ma skyes pa dang /_ma byung ba dang ldan pa/_byang chub kyi snying po sgrub pa/_chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po rnams kyis rab tu bstod 
[\[236b.7\]]cing bsngags pa/_dam pa'i chos kyi rigs rgyun mi gcod pa/_chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa/_chos kyi mchod pa'i mchog la zhugs pa/_'phags pa'i skye bo thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yang dag par ston pa/_yang dag pa'i don gyi chos so sor 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa/_chos kyi mdo mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_zhi ba las nges par byung ba/_ser sna can dang /_tshul khrims 'chal pa dang /_gnod sems can dang /_le lo can dang /_brjed ngas pa dang /_shes rab 'chal pa spa 'gong ba/_phas kyi rgol 
[\[237a.2\]]ba dang /_lta ba ngan pa dang /_dmigs pa la mngon par zhen pa thams cad sdangs par byed pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa/_'khor ba'i phyogs kyi gnyen po/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba yang dag par ston pa de lta bu'i mdo sde rnams gang yang dag par ston pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_so sor 
[\[237a.3\]]rtog pa dang /_dam pa'i chos kun sdud pa de ni chos kyi mchod pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos kyi mchod pa ni gang chos la chos su nges par sems pa/_chos la chos bzhin nan tan byed pa dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar 'thun pa/_mthar lta ba thams cad dang bral ba/_skye ba med pa/_'byung ba med 
[\[237a.4\]]pa la bzod pa/_bdag med pa sems can med par 'jug pa/_rgyu dang rkyen dang mi 'gal ba dang /_'thab pa med pa/_rtsod pa med pa/_nga yi ba med pa/_ngar 'dzin pa dang bral ba/_don la rton gyi tshig 'bru la mi rton pa/_ye shes la rton gyi rnam par shes pa la mi rton pa/_nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la 
[\[237a.5\]]rton gyi drang ba'i don kun rdzob la mngon par ma zhen pa/_chos nyid la rton gyi gang zag tu lta ba dmigs par 'dzin pa la mngon par ma zhen pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud pa/_kun gzhi med par 'jug pa/_kun gzhi yang dag par 'joms pa/_ma rig pa rnam par zhi ba nas/_rga shi 
[\[237a.6\]]dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa'i bar du rnam par zhi zhing de ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis la 'di lta ste/_sems can la lta ba zad mi shes par mngon par bsgrubs pas mngon par sgrub cing lta ba rnams la mi lta 
[\[237a.7\]]ba 'di ni rigs kyi bu bla na med pa'i chos kyi mchod pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i dbang po de ltar rgyal bu zla gdugs de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal po de las chos kyi mchod pa de lta bu thos pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i chos kyi bzod pa thob bo/_/gos dang rgyan ci thogs pa rnams bcom ldan 'das 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]de la phul nas tshig 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba dang /_dam pa'i chos la mchod pa bgyi ba'i slad du bdag dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrung bar spro'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bdag gis bdud dang phyir rgol ba 
[\[237b.2\]]rnams bcom nas bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba de ltar de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyi brlab par gsol/_de bzhin gshegs pas de'i bsam pa mkhyen nas phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na dam pa'i chos kyi grong khyer skyong zhing srung ba dang /_yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur bar lung bstan 
[\[237b.3\]]to/_/lha'i dbang po de nas rgyal bu zla gdugs de de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhugs bzhin du dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/_dge ba'i chos la brtson 'grus brtsams nas gnas so/_/de brtson 'grus brtsams shing dge ba'i chos la rab tu gnas nas ring po ma lon par mngon par shes pa lnga 
[\[237b.4\]]bskyed de/_/gzungs rnams rtogs par khong du chud par gyur to/_/de spobs pa rgyun mi chad pa thob pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal po de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang mngon par shes pa dang /_gzungs kyi stobs kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal po des 
[\[237b.5\]]chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba bzhin du bar gyi bskal pa bcu'i bar du rjes su bskor to/_/lha'i dbang po de ltar dge slong zla gdugs dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la mngon par brtson pas sems can bye ba brgya phrag bcu ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par byas par gyur 
[\[237b.6\]]to/_/srog chags khrag khrig phrag bcu ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la btul lo/_/sems can tshad med pa rnams ni mtho ris su skye bar byas so/_/lha'i dbang po de'i tshe de'i dus na rin chen gdugs zhes bya ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur pa de gzhan yin pa snyam du 'dzin na lha'i dbang 
[\[237b.7\]]po khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rin chen 'od 'phro de bzhin gshegs pa de de'i tshe de'i dus na rin chen gdugs zhes bya ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur to/_/rgyal po rin chen gdugs de'i bu stong yod pa de dag ni da ltar gyi bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag yin 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]te/_gang bskal pa bzang po 'di la sangs rgyas stong tshang bar 'byung ba'o/_/de las bzhi ni sangs rgyas log par dad sel la sogs pa sngon du byung ste/_lhag ma rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor ba 'jig la sogs pa snang mdzad la thug pa'i bar du ste/_tha mar ni de bzhin gshegs pa snang mdzad ces bya ba 
[\[238a.2\]]'byung ngo /_/lha'i dbang po de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal po de'i dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba/_rgyal bu zla gdugs zhes bya ba de gzhan yin pa snyam du 'dzin na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i dbang po nga de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu zla gdugs zhes 
[\[238a.3\]]bya bar gyur to/_/lha'i dbang po rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_lha'i dbang po ji tsam na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa'i nang na chos kyi mchod pa ni mchog ces bya'o/_/mchog dang /_dam pa dang /_mchog rab dang /_gya nom pa dang /_bla ma dang /_bla na med pa zhes bya'o/_/lha'i dbang po de 
[\[238a.4\]]lta bas nang la zang zing gis ma mchod par chos kyi mchod pas mchod cig_/nga la zang zing gis bsti stang ma byed chos kyi bsti stang gis ri mor gyis shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_byams pa ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[238a.5\]]pa'i byang chub bskal pa bye ba grangs med par yang dag par bsgrubs pa 'di khyod la gtad do/_/ci nas phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu khyod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis yongs su bzung bas 'dzam bu'i gling du rgyas par 'gyur zhing ma nub par gyis shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byams pa ma 'ongs 
[\[238a.6\]]pa'i dus na rigs kyi bu pho'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma thos pas nyams par gyur ta re/_'di lta bu'i mdo sde thos 
[\[238a.7\]]nas shin tu dga' zhing dad pa rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /_spyi bos len par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag bsrung ba'i phyir/_byams pa khyod kyis de'i dus na mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di rgyas par gyis shig_/byams pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyag rgya ni 'di gnyis te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_tshig 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]dang tshig 'bru sna tshogs la dad pa'i phyag rgya dang /_chos kyi tshul zab mos mi skrag cing /_yang dag pa nyid ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug pa'i phyag rgya ste/_byams pa de gnyis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyag rgya'o/_/byams pa de la byang chub sems dpa' gang dag tshig dang tshig 'bru sna tshogs la dad cing 
[\[238b.2\]]lhur len pa de dag ni las dang po pa yin te/_tshangs par spyad nas ring po ma lon par rig par bya'o/_/byams pa gang dag mdo sde zab mo ma gos pa phrugs pa dang /_snrel zhi'i rgyud kyi tshig dang /_rim pa rab tu dbye ba 'di 'don pa dang /_nyan pa dang /_mos pa dang /_ston par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[238b.3\]]dag ni ring du tshangs par spyod par rig par bya'o/_/byams pa de la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni rgyu gnyis kyis bdag la rma 'byin te/_chos zab mo la nges par sems par mi 'gyur ro/_/gnyis gang zhe na/_sngon ma thos pa'i mdo sde zab mo thos na skrag cing the tsom du gyur nas rjes su yi rang 
[\[238b.4\]]bar mi byed cing /_'di lta bur bdag cag gis sngon ma thos na de gang nas 'ongs zhes spong bar byed do/_/rigs kyi bu gang dag mdo sde zab mo 'dzin pa dang /_chos zab mo'i snod du gyur pa dang /_chos zab mo ston pa de dag la mi sten/_mi 'grogs/_bsnyen bkur mi byed cing /_de dag la bsti stang mi byed 
[\[238b.5\]]par gyur te bar bar du de dag la mi snyan par yang brjod do/_/rgyu de gnyis kyis las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid la rma 'byin te chos zab mo la nges par mi rtog pa'o/_/rgyu gnyis kyis zab mo la mi mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid la rma 'byin te/_ma skyes pa'i chos la yang bzod pa 
[\[238b.6\]]thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/gnyis gang zhe na/_las dang po pa spyad nas ring po ma lon pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la brnyas shing khyad du gsod pa de 'dzin du mi 'jug_/mi 'byed/_mi ston pa dang /_gang zab mo la shin tu ma dad pas bslab pa la ri mo mi byed cing 'jig rten gyi zang zing sbyin pas ni sems can la 
[\[238b.7\]]phan 'dogs shing chos kyi sbyin pas ma yin te/_byams pa zab mo la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rgyu 'di gnyis kyis bdag nyid la rma 'byin te/_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'ang myur du thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du legs par gsungs pa ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis da slan chad nongs pa 'di dag spang bar bgyi'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[239a.2\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs ma mchis pa nas yang dag par bsgrubs pa 'di bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/gzung bar bgyi'o/_/ma 'ongs pa'i rigs kyi bu pho dang /_rigs kyi bu mo snod du gyur pa de dag la mdo sde 'di lta bu lag tu son par bgyi'o/_/dran pa gang gis 'di 'dra ba'i 
[\[239a.3\]]mdo sde 'di lta bu la mos pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_kun chub par bgyid pa dang /_'dzud pa dang /_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher 'chad par 'gyur ba'i dran pa nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de dag brtan par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[239a.4\]]'das de'i dus na 'di lta bu'i mdo sde 'di la mos pa dang /_rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ba de ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i byin gyi rlabs lags par rig par bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas legs so 
[\[239a.5\]]legs so/_/byams pa khyod kyi tshig de ni legs par smras te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'ang khyod kyis legs par smras pa de la rjes su yi rang ba gnang ba mdzad do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis dbyangs gcig tu tshig 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang de 
[\[239a.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing so so nas mchis te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'di rgyas par bgyi'o/_/rigs kyi bu de dag kyang mos par bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang 'di skad ces 
[\[239a.7\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang dang gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu spyod pa dang /_'chad pa dang /_yang dag par ston pa de dang /_de dag tu bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]rgyal po chen po bzhi yang dpung dang bcas pa dang /_bzhon pa dang bcas pa 'khor dang bcas te/_der chos nyan pa'i slad du mchi'o/_/chos smra ba de'i dpag tshad khor yug tu ci nas kyang chos smra ba de la glags lta ba dang /_klan ka tshol ba gang gis kyang glags mi rnyed par bsrung bar 
[\[239b.2\]]bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig_/chongs shig_/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston cig_/gsol pa/_bdag gis chos kyi rnam 
[\[239b.3\]]grangs 'di bzung ba lags na/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de'i phyir/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa dang /_phrugs su sbyar 
[\[239b.4\]]ba snrel zhir mngon par bsgrubs pa dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par thar pa'i le'u zhes kyang bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di kun dga' bo khyod kyis zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_lid tsa bI dri ma med par grags pa dang /_'jam 
[\[239b.5\]]dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 
[\[239b.6\]]'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/sngon gyi sbyor ba dang /_dam pa'i chos gtad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu gnyis pa'o//_//'phags pa dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa zhes bya ba/_theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs 
[\[239b.7\]]so//_//shu lo ka stong brgyad brgya ste bam po drug go/_/lo ts+tsha ba ban de chos nyid tshul khrims kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]{D177}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya many+dzu shrI ni ra de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa 
[\[240a.2\]]dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/_dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong tham pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de'i tshe bcom 
[\[240a.3\]]ldan 'das 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing /_mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rin po che'i gdugs dpag tshad bcus 'khor ba tsam thogs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng gi drang thad na 'dzin 
[\[240a.4\]]cing 'dug go/_/de nas yongs su dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i bu mtshams [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa 'khor dang bcas te/_'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa stan las langs te/_'jam dpal gzhon nur 
[\[240a.5\]]gyur pa ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal khyod bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa mdzad pas da dung thugs ma tshim lags sam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_
[\[240a.6\]]rgya mtsho chen po chu zed pas chog par 'dzin par 'gyur snyam mam/_lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal de ni ma lags so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho chen po lta bu zab cing gting dpag dka' la/_dpag tu 
[\[240a.7\]]med pa yongs su tshol bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya bar 'dod pas gzhar yang chog par 'dzin par mi bya'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ci la dmigs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]par bgyi/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu dmigs pa bzhis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bya'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub kyi sems la dmigs pa dang /_sems can thams cad rab tu thar bar bya ba la dmigs pa dang /_
[\[240b.2\]]dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba la dmigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba la dmigs pa ste/_lha'i bu dmigs pa bzhi po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bya'o/_/'jam dpal gyis de skad ces 
[\[240b.3\]]smras nas/_lha'i bu mtshams [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_dge slong ma de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_'jam dpal 
[\[240b.4\]]gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te 
[\[240b.5\]]gtan la phab pa//[ {D178}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya bo d+hi pak+Sha nir de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa byang chub kyi phyogs bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[240b.6\]]thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byams pa dang /_'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[240b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal phyin ci log bzhi po dag gis sems phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems can rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ma mthong ba'i phyir 'di ltar yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'khor ba las mi 'da'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar 
[\[241a.2\]]dmigs na sems can rnams 'khor ba las mi 'da' ba bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal sems can rnams bdag dang /_bdag gir khas len pa'i phyir 'khor ba las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal su bdag 
[\[241a.3\]]dang gzhan du yang dag par rjes su mthong ba de las mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa ni chos thams cad shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das par rab tu mi shes te/_bdag dang gzhan du dmigs so/_/dmigs nas 
[\[241a.4\]]lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi las rnam pa gsum mngon par 'du byed do/_/de med pa la sgro btags nas bdag 'dod chags so/_/bdag zhe sdang ngo /_/bdag gti mug go zhes rnam par rtog go/_/gal te de de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung na de 'di snyam du 
[\[241a.5\]]sems te/_bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_bdag ni tshangs par spyod pa ste/_bdag 'khor ba las 'da' bar bya'o/_/bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rjes su thob par bya'o/_/bdag sdug bsngal rnams las thar bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de chos 'di dag ni dge ba dag 
[\[241a.6\]]go/_/chos 'di dag ni mi dge ba dag go snyam du rtog go/_/de chos 'di dag ni spang bar bya ba dag go/_/chos 'di dag ni mngon du bya ba dag go/_/sdug bsngal ni yongs su shes par bya ba'o/_/kun 'byung ba ni spang bar bya ba'o/_/'gog pa ni mngon sum du bya ba'o/_/lam ni bsgom 
[\[241a.7\]]par bya ba'o snyam du rtog go/_/de 'du byed rnams ni mi rtag pa/_'du byed rnams ni sdug bsngal ba/_'du byed rnams ni kun tu 'bar ba ste/_'du byed rnams las bdag 'bros par bya'o snyam du rtog go/_/des de ltar brtags pas mtshan ma sngon du 'gro ba'i yid 'byung ba dang ldan pa/_
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]mtshan ma sngon du 'gro ba'i 'du shes yid la byed pa dag skye'o/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_gang chos 'di dag yongs su shes pa de ni sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa'o snyam mo/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis kun 'byung ba spang bar bya'o snyam nas de chos thams cad kyis nyen te 
[\[241b.2\]]ma rtogs so/_/skrag go/_/dngang ngo /_/dngang bar 'gyur ro/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_chos de dag mngon du byed pa gang yin pa dang /_chos de dag gis nyen pa gang yin pa de ni/_kun 'byung ba spong ba'o snyam mo/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis 'gog pa 
[\[241b.3\]]mngon sum du bya'o snyam nas des chos de dag brtags te 'gog pa yin pa snyam du shes so/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_'di dag ni 'gog pa mngon sum du byed pa'o snyam mo/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis lam bsgom par bya'o snyam nas de gcig pu dben par song ste/_
[\[241b.4\]]chos de dag yid la byed pas zhi gnas 'thob bo/_/de yid 'byung ba yid la byed pa de dang zhi gnas 'thob pa des chos thams cad dang sems 'gras so/_/'bral lo/_/ldog go/_/log nas mngon par mi dga' ba'i sems bskyed do/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_
[\[241b.5\]]bdag ni sdug bsngal thams cad las thar te/_bdag gis yang gong du bya ba ci zhig yod kyis bdag ni dgra bcom pa'o snyam du bdag nyid kyis shes pa las de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe skye ba yang dag par rjes su mthong nas de sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la dogs pa dang /_yid gnyis dang /_
[\[241b.6\]]the tsom za'o/_/de the tsom du ltung ba'i sems kyis 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su skye'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de chos thams cad ma skyes pa la rnam par brtags pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 
[\[241b.7\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag ji ltar blta bar bgyi/_bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal sus 'du byed thams cad skye ba med par mthong ba des sdug bsngal yongs su shes so/_/sus chos thams cad 'byung ba med par 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]mthong ba des kun 'byung ba spangs so/_/sus chos thams cad shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mthong ba des 'gog pa mngon sum du byas so/_/sus chos thams cad dngos po med par mthong ba des lam bsgoms so/_/'jam dpal sus 'phags 
[\[242a.2\]]pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag 'di lta bur mthong ba de chos 'di dag ni dge ba dag go/_/chos 'di dag ni mi dge ba dag go/_/chos 'di dag ni spang bar bya ba dag go/_/chos 'di dag ni mngon sum du bya ba dag go/_/sdug bsngal ni yongs su shes par bya ba'o/_/kun 'byung ba ni spang 
[\[242a.3\]]bar bya ba'o/_/'gog pa ni mngon sum du bya ba'o/_/lam ni bsgom par bya ba'o snyam du mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo dag chags pa dang /_zhe sdang ba dang /_gti mug pa'i chos de ma skyes par des mthong zhing yang dag 
[\[242a.4\]]pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa dang /_rnam par bsgrubs par mthong ba'i phyir te/_chos de gang yang mi len to/_/mi 'dor ro/_/de khams gsum pa la sems mi chags te/_khams gsum pa thams cad ma skyes pa dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_rmi lam lta bu dang /_brag 
[\[242a.5\]]ca lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bur mthong ngo /_/des chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin de ltar mthong bas sems can thams cad la rjes su chags pa dang /_khong khro ba dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_des gang la rjes su chags pa dang /_khong khro 
[\[242a.6\]]bar 'gyur ba'i chos de mi dmigs te/_des nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_chos dang /_dge 'dun yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/des chos thams cad stong par yang dag par rjes su 
[\[242a.7\]]mi mthong ste/_chos gang dag la'ang the tshom mi za'o/_/the tshom mi za bas nye bar len par mi 'gyur ro/_/nye bar mi len pas len pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/_/'jam dpal dge slong rab 'byor gyis chos thams cad rnam pa de lta bur shes pas de 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal du mi 'ong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag nyid kyang mi dmigs na de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/_de ni gnas ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di 
[\[242b.2\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po dag ji ltar blta bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge slong dag mi sdug pa'i rnam par lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ston 
[\[242b.3\]]par 'gyur/_skye ba dang 'gog par tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ston par 'gyur/_sems la skye ba'i chos dang /_'gag pa'i chos su blta'o snyam du de ltar sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ston par 'gyur/_gang ril 
[\[242b.4\]]por 'du shes par mi 'gyur ba de ltar chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ston par 'gyur ba de dag 'byung ngo /_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[242b.5\]]'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po dag ji ltar blta bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i ldem po ngag shes par dka' yis thong shig_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar 
[\[242b.6\]]gzhag pa sgom pa bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal lus nam mkha' dang 'dra bar mthong ba 'di ni lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/_/'jam dpal sus tshor ba nang na yang ma yin/_phyi rol na yang ma yin 
[\[242b.7\]]zhing gnyi ga med pa la yang mi dmigs pa 'di ni tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/_/'jam dpal sus sems la ming tsam du zad par shes pa 'di ni sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/_/'jam dpal sus dge 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]ba dang /_mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa'i chos mi dmigs pa 'di ni chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ste/_'jam dpal dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po dag ni de ltar blta bar bya'o/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_
[\[243a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ji ltar blta bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal sus chos thams cad mi mnyam pa med la gnyis su med cing /_gnyis su dbyer med par mthong ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i lta ba'o/_/'jam 
[\[243a.3\]]dpal sus mi mthong ba'i tshul gyis chos thams cad mi rtog rnam par mi rtog_/kun tu mi rtog par mthong ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa'o/_/'jam dpal sus brjod pa mnyam pa nyid shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir chos thams cad brjod du med par mthong ba 'di ni yang dag 
[\[243a.4\]]pa'i ngag go/_/'jam dpal sus byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad bya ba med pa dang byed pa med par mthong ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha'o/_/'jam dpal sus 'tsho ba mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa'i phyir/_chos thams cad 'phel bar yang mi byed/_'grib 
[\[243a.5\]]par yang mi byed pa 'di ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba'o/_/'jam dpal sus rtsom pa med par brtul ba'i tshul gyis chos thams cad kun nas mi slong ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i rtsol ba'o/_/'jam dpal dran pa'i las dben pa'i phyir sus chos thams cad dran par mi byed pa 'di ni yang dag pa'i dran 
[\[243a.6\]]pa'o/_/'jam dpal sus dmigs pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mnyam par bzhag cing ma 'khrugs par mthong ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/'jam dpal 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni de ltar blta bar bya'o/_/'jam dpal gyis 
[\[243a.7\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dbang po lnga po dag ji ltar blta bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal sus rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad ma skyes par mthong bar yid ches pa 'di ni dad pa'i dbang po'o/_/'jam dpal sus nye ba'i 'du 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]shes dang ring ba'i 'du shes dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad la sems mi gtong ba 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o/_/'jam dpal sus dmigs pa dben pa'i phyir chos thams cad yid la mi byed cing dran pa mi 'dod pa 'di ni dran pa'i dbang po'o/_/'jam dpal sus 
[\[243b.2\]]gnyis su mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad gnyis su med par 'gyur ba 'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o/_/'jam dpal sus skye ba dang bral ba dang /_mi shes pa dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par mthong ba 'di ni shes rab kyi dbang po ste 'jam 
[\[243b.3\]]dpal dbang po lnga po dag ni de ltar blta bar bya'o/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po dag ji ltar blta bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal sus dran pa med cing yid la byed pa med pa'i phyir
