[\[243b.4\]]chos thams cad dngos po med par mthong ba 'di ni dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/_/'jam dpal sus dge ba dang /_mi dge ba dang /_lung du ma bstan pa yongs su mi 'grub pa'i phyir chos thams cad dben zhing mi dmigs pa 'di ni chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag 
[\[243b.5\]]byang chub kyi yan lag go/_/'jam dpal sus khams kyi 'du shes shin tu bshig pa'i phyir khams gsum pa mi len mi 'dor ba 'di ni brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/_/'jam dpal sus dga' ba dang /_mi dga' ba rnam par bshig pa'i phyir 'du byed 
[\[243b.6\]]thams cad la dga' ba mi skyed pa 'di ni dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/_/'jam dpal sus dmigs pa'i dngos po mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad la sems shin tu sbyangs par gyur pa 'di ni shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/_/'jam dpal 
[\[243b.7\]]sus chos thams cad rnam par gzhig pa rjes su rtogs pa'i phyir sems mi dmigs pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/_/'jam dpal sus chos thams cad la gnas par mi byed/_rten par mi byed/_chags par mi byed/_'ching bar mi byed cing de 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]chos thams cad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i btang snyoms can du gyur te/_dga' ba thob pa 'di ni btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/_'jam dpal byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po dag ni de ltar blta bar bya'o/_/'jam dpal gang la las 
[\[244a.2\]]'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po dag dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dag dang /_dbang po lnga po dag dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po dag de lta bur mthong ba 'di ni rgal ba'o zhes nga smra ste/_pha rol tu son pa'o/_/thang la 
[\[244a.3\]]gnas pa'o/_/bde ba thob pa'o/_/mi 'jigs pa thob pa'o/_/khur bor ba'o/_/rdul dang bral ba'o/_/ci yang med pa'o/_/nyon mongs pa med pa'o/_/len pa med pa'o/_/dgra bcom pa'o/_/dge sbyong ngo /_/bram ze'o/_/bkrus pa'o/_/rig pa'o/_/ring 
[\[244a.4\]]du song ba'o/_/gtsang ma'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi sras so/_/shAkya'i sras so/_/tsher ma dkrugs pa'o/_/'obs las rgal ba'o/_/shin tu brtan pa'o/_/rims nad med pa'o/_/dge slong ngo /_/'phags pa'o/_/rgyal mtshan rdzogs pa'o zhes smra'o/_/'jam dpal bzod pa de lta bu dang 
[\[244a.5\]]ldan pa ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas yin te rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti'i 'os kyang yin no/_/'jam dpal de lta bas na/_dge slong yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms don yod par yongs su bza' bar 'dod pa dang /_bdud 'dul bar 'dod pa dang /_'khor ba 
[\[244a.6\]]las yang dag par 'da' bar 'dod pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'dod pa dang /_sdug bsngal rnams las grol bar 'dod pas chos 'di dag la brtson par bya'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na lha'i bu sum khri nyis stong gis chos mngon par rtogs par gyur 
[\[244a.7\]]nas de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la man dA ra ba'i me tog gis gtor te tshig 'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das chos bstan pa 'di su dag gi rna lam du grag par gyur pa de dag ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la legs par rab tu byung ba legs par 'gyur na/_
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]gang dag thos nas mos pa dang /_dad pa dang /_de bzhin nyid du 'dzin par 'gyur ba dag lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_/bcom ldan 'das chos bstan pa 'di su dag gi rna lam du grag par gyur pa de dag ni/_mngon pa'i nga rgyal ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[244b.2\]]de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa byang 
[\[244b.3\]]chub kyi phyogs bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dz+nyA na sid+d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/_skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la 
[\[244b.4\]]phab pa/[ {D179}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya saM br-i ti pa ra mAr+tha sat+ya nir de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i 
[\[244b.5\]]mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_
[\[244b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri nyis stong dang /_'dod pa na spyod pa dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to/_/de nas lha'i bu rab tu 
[\[244b.7\]]zhi ba rnam par dul ba'i dbang phyug ces bya ba 'khor der 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa da ltar gang na mchis bcom ldan 'das bdag dang 'khor mang po 'di rnams kyang skyes bu dam pa des chos bstan par rab tu 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyogs su 
[\[245a.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bco brgyad 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams rin po che dang ldan pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i tog ces bya ba da ltar bzhugs pa 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/
[\[245a.3\]]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'ang da ltar de na 'dug go/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu rab tu zhi ba rnam par dul ba'i dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la ci nas de mtshan ma rig pas 
[\[245a.4\]]'dir mchi bar sems pa de lta bu'i mtshan ma zhig mdzad na legs so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa las thos pa lta bur nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa can rnams las/_de lta 
[\[245a.5\]]bu'i chos bstan pa mi thos te/_de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par gzhan su yang de lta bur chos ston mi nus so/_/bcom ldan 'das nam 'jam dpal chos ston pa de na bdud kyi khang pa thams cad mog mog por 'gyur ro/_/bdud thams cad kyis kyang glags mi rnyed do/_/
[\[245a.6\]]pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyang shin tu tshar chod par 'gyur ro/_/dmigs pa can rnams kyang dmigs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yang de la rjes su yi rang zhing rab tu gzung ba mdzad do/_/de nas 
[\[245a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu rab tu zhi ba rnam par dul ba'i dbang phyug gsol ba 'debs par mkhyen nas/_zhal gyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer gcig btang ste/_des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos snang bar byas nas/_sangs 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bco brgyad po de dag las thal te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing /_'jig rten gyi khams rin po che dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de snang ba chen pos khyab par byas 
[\[245b.2\]]so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i tog bzhugs pa la/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kha cig gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'od chen po rab tu gda' ba 'di su'i 
[\[245b.3\]]ltas sngon du byung ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i tog gis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bco brgyad 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/_de na bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[245b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa da lta na bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa des zhal gyi 
[\[245b.5\]]mdzod spu nas 'od zer gcig btang bas/_'od zer gyi snang ba des sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bco brgyad las thal nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos snang bar byas so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[245b.6\]]'das ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des 'od zer 'di btang /_bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i tog gis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sbran pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal gzhon 
[\[245b.7\]]nur gyur pa der 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa rnams dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za mang po la sogs pa 'khor der tshogs pa de dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la blta ba dang /_
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]chos nyan par 'dod do/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i tog gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang /_'khor de dag thams cad khyod la 
[\[246a.2\]]lta 'dod kyis/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba der song shig_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang ltas sngon du byung ba 'di 'tshal to/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu dang lhan cig 
[\[246a.3\]]tu de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i tog gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i tog la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas 'di lta ste/_skyes bu stobs po ches 
[\[246a.4\]]lag pa bskum pa las rkyong ba'am/_lag pa brkyang ba las skum pa bzhin du skad cig yud tsam thang cig de nyid kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin te/_de bar snang la lus mi snang bar 'dug nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[246a.5\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/_me tog sngon ma mthong ma thos pa/_dri zhim pa kha dog dang ldan pa yid du 'ong ba'i char chen po mngon par phab ste/_me tog gi char chen po phab pa des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten 
[\[246a.6\]]gyi khams 'di pus mo nub tsam du gang bar gyur to/_/de nas 'khor de thams cad me tog gi char chen po mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das su'i mthus 'di lta bur blta na sdug pa'i me tog gi char chen po mngon par 
[\[246a.7\]]phab/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che dang ldan pa nas byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu dang 'grogs te/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir phyin nas de dag gi lus mi snang bar 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i phyir 'di lta bu'i me tog gi char chen po mngon par phab po/_/'khor de dag gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag bdag cag gis blta'o/_/
[\[246b.2\]]de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/_byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu dang lhan cig tu bar snang las babs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_'jam dpal gzhon 
[\[246b.3\]]nur gyur pa rang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis sprul pa'i stan la 'khod do/_/de nas lha'i bu rab tu zhi ba rnam par dul ba'i dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[246b.4\]]'das 'khor 'di dag nyan 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' mchid kyi rgyud 'ga' zhig 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la smrar gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu khyod nyid kyis gang 'dod pa dris shig_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal 
[\[246b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na chos bstan pa ji lta bu dag 'byung na der mngon par dga'/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_don dam par na 'dod chags bskyed pa'i phyir yang ma yin/_'dod chags zad par bya ba'i 
[\[246b.6\]]phyir yang ma yin no/_/don dam par na zhe sdang bskyed pa'i phyir yang ma yin/_zhe sdang zad par bya ba'i phyir yang ma yin no/_/don dam par na gti mug bskyed pa'i phyir yang ma yin/_gti mug zad par bya ba'i phyir yang ma yin no/_/don dam par na ye shes bskyed 
[\[246b.7\]]pa'i phyir yang ma yin/_ye shes zad par bya ba'i phyir yang ma yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ci'i phyir/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu mi skye ba la skye ba'am/_zad pa gang yang med do/_/lha'i bu don dam par na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams la rnam par rtog pa skyes pa'am/_skye ba'am/_skye bar 'gyur ba gang yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_don dam par na chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir ro/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin 
[\[247a.2\]]gshegs pa de ci zhig spang ba'i phyir chos ston/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_don dam par na rang bzhin gyis mi skye mi zad pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de chos ston to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni don dam pa'i bden pa la lhur byed 
[\[247a.3\]]pa yin gyi kun rdzob kyi bden pa la yang lhur byed pa ma yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal don dam pa'i bden pa gang yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gal te don dam par na don dam pa'i bden pa lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi yul gyi rang 
[\[247a.4\]]bzhin du 'gyur na ni don dam pa'i bden pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su mi 'gro ste/_kun rdzob kyi bden pa nyid du 'gyur ro/_/'on kyang lha'i bu don dam par na don dam pa'i bden pa ni/_tha snyad thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/_bye brag med pa/_ma skyes pa/_ma 
[\[247a.5\]]'gags pa/_smra bar bya ba dang /_smra ba dang /_shes par bya ba dang /_shes pa dang bral ba'o/_/lha'i bu don dam pa'i bden pa ni rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul gyi bar las yang dag par 'das pa yin te/_
[\[247a.6\]]lha'i bu de la rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad 'jug pa'ang med/_ldog pa'ang med do/_/don dam par na de la pha rol yang med/_tshu rol yang med/_dbus kyang med de/_lha'i bu 'di ni don dam pa'i bden pa zhes sgro btags te brjod mod kyi/_ji ltar 
[\[247a.7\]]don dam pa'i bden pa'o zhes bya ba ltar ni ma yin no/_/lha'i bu don ni don dam par mi skye ba ste/_de la tha snyad thams cad mi 'jug go/_/don dam par gang la tha snyad thams cad mi 'jug pa de ni lha'i bu don dam pa'i bden pa ste/_ji ltar don dam pa'i bden pa'o/_/
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]zhes brjod pa ltar na ma yin no/_/lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang don dam par na chos thams cad dang /_sgra thams cad ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]te slu ba'i chos so zhes bka' stsal to/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar 
[\[247b.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pas chos bshad pa de [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du mi 'gyur ram/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni don dam par na [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du'ang mi 'chad/_bden par yang mi 'chad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i bu don dam par na de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma skyes pa 
[\[247b.3\]]ste/_de don dam par na bden pa dang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]par mi 'chad do/_/lha'i bu de ji snyam du sems/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas bshad pa de bden nam 'on te [{]brdzun[,]rdzun[}]/_lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pas bshad pa ni bden pa'ang ma 
[\[247b.4\]]yin [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'ang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal don dam par na de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa la yang dag par yongs su grub pa gang yang med do/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu de de bzhin te/_de bzhin gshegs pas don dam par chos thams cad 
[\[247b.5\]]yongs su ma grub par mkhyen to/_/gang don dam par yongs su ma grub pa de ni don dam par na bden pa zhes kyang mi bya/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa zhes kyang mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_don dam par na chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i phyir ro/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_ci 'jam dpal 
[\[247b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa don dam pa'i bden pa ston tam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu don dam pa'i bden pa ni bstan par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang ston pa dang gang gis ston pa dang ci ston pa dang /_gang la ston pa dang /_ci'i phyir ston pa'i chos de dag 
[\[247b.7\]]thams cad don dam par na rab tu ma skyes pa'o/_/rab tu ma skyes pa'i chos rnams kyis ni rab tu ma skyes pa'i chos rnams bshad mi nus so/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas don dam pa'i bden pa bstan pa 'di mi ston pa'i tshul gyis bstan pa na dge slong lnga brgya len pa med par 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa rnams ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma skyes pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa skyes so/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal don dam pa'i 
[\[248a.2\]]bden pa la mos par dka'o/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu don dam pa'i bden pa la ni dmigs pa can thams cad kyis mos par dka'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal don dam pa'i bden pa khong du chud par dka'o/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_
[\[248a.3\]]lha'i bu mi brtson pas don dam pa'i bden pa khong du chud par dka'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na dge slong mngon par brtson pa yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu don dam par na nam yongs su shes pa dang /_spang ba dang /_bsgom pa 
[\[248a.4\]]dang /_mngon du bya ba'i phyir brtson par ma gyur na lha'i bu de ltar dge slong mi brtson pa'i tshul gyis mngon par brtson pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang 'di snyam du don dam par 'di yongs su shes par bya'o/_/'di spang bar bya'o/_/'di bsgom par bya'o/_/'di mngon du 
[\[248a.5\]]bya'o snyam du sems pa'i sbyor ba de ni mtshan ma dang bcas pa/_spros pa dang bcas pa/_dmigs pa dang bcas pa/_nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa/_'khrug pa dang bcas pa/_'jigs pa dang bcas pa/_nad dang bcas pa/_sdug bsngal dang bcas pa/_zug rngu 
[\[248a.6\]]dang bcas pa/_dug dang bcas pa ste/_de'i sbyor ba de ni yang dag pa ma yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal yang dag par sbyor ba ni gang yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu don dam par na de bzhin nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_shin tu mi 
[\[248a.7\]]skye ba gang dang mnyam pa/_don dam par na mtshams med pa lnga po dag kyang de dang mnyam mo/_/don dam par na de bzhin nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_shin tu mi skye ba gang dang mnyam pa/_don dam par na lta bar gyur pa rnams kyang de dang mnyam mo/_/don dam 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]par na de bzhin nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_shin tu mi skye ba gang dang mnyam pa/_don dam par na so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang de dang mnyam mo/_/don dam par na de bzhin nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_shin tu mi skye ba gang dang mnyam pa/_don dam par na 
[\[248b.2\]]slob pa'i chos rnams kyang de dang mnyam mo/_/don dam par na de bzhin nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_shin tu mi skye ba gang dang mnyam pa/_don dam par na mi slob pa'i chos rnams kyang de dang mnyam mo/_/don dam par na de bzhin nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_
[\[248b.3\]]shin tu mi skye ba gang dang mnyam pa/_don dam par na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang de dang mnyam mo/_/don dam par na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gang dang mnyam pa/_don dam par na de bzhin nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_
[\[248b.4\]]shin tu mi skye ba'ang de dang mnyam mo/_/don dam par na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gang dang mnyam pa/_don dam par na mya ngan las 'das pa yang de dang mnyam mo/_/don dam par na mya ngan las 'das pa gang dang mnyam pa/_don dam par na 'khor 
[\[248b.5\]]ba yang de dang mnyam mo/_/don dam par na 'khor ba gang dang mnyam pa/_don dam par na kun nas nyon mongs pa yang de dang mnyam mo/_/don dam par na kun nas nyon mongs pa gang dang mnyam pa/_don dam par na rnam par byang ba yang de dang mnyam mo/_/don dam par na 
[\[248b.6\]]rnam par byang ba gang dang mnyam pa/_don dam par na chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam mo/_/de ltar don dam par na chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la yang dag par sbyor ba'i dge slong ni lha'i bu don dam par na yang dag par sbyor ba zhes bya ste ji skad brjod pa bzhin du ni ma yin 
[\[248b.7\]]no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal mnyam pa nyid gang gis don dam par na rnam par byang ba'i bar du gang dang mnyam pa don dam par na chos thams cad kyang de dang mnyam zhes bya/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_don dam par na chos thams cad shin tu mi 'byung bar 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]mnyam pa dang /_don dam par na chos thams cad shin tu mi skye bar mnyam pa dang /_don dam par na chos thams cad shin tu dngos po med par mnyam pas/_lha'i bu don dam par na chos thams cad mnyam mo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i bu don dam par na shin 
[\[249a.2\]]tu mi 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad ni tha dad du bya ba med do/_/lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/_kham pa'i snod kyi nang gi nam mkha' gang yin pa dang /_rin po che'i snod kyi nang gi nam mkha' gang yin pa de ni nam mkha'i khams nyid yin te/_de la don dam par na chung 
[\[249a.3\]]zad kyang tha dad du bya ba med do/_/lha'i bu de bzhin nyid du nyon mongs pa gang yin pa de don dam par na shin tu mi 'byung ba nyid do/_/rnam par byang ba gang yin pa de yang don dam par na shin tu mi 'byung ba nyid do/_/don dam par na 'khor ba yang shin tu mi 'byung ba nyid do/_/don 
[\[249a.4\]]dam par na mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du yang shin tu mi 'byung ba nyid do/_/'di la don dam par na tha dad du bya ba [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]kyang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_/don dam par na chos thams cad shin tu mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub sems 
[\[249a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'phags pa'i bden pa dag la ji ltar brtson par bya/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_/lha'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i bden pa dag la brtson par mi byed na/_ji ltar nyan thos rnams la mi ston pa'i 
[\[249a.6\]]tshul gyis chos ston/_/lha'i bu de lta mod kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bden pa sgom pa ni lta ba dang bcas pa'o/_/nyan thos kyi bden pa sgom pa ni mi lta ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni 
[\[249a.7\]]kun rdzob tu sems can thams cad la lta ba ste/_/bden pa rnams mi sgom pa'i tshul gyis kyang sgom mod kyi/_dngos po med par dmigs pa'i rnam pas yang dag pa nyid kyi mtha' de yang mngon du mi byed do/_/kun rdzob tu thabs mkhas pa bsgrub pa'i phyir byang chub 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag bden pa rnams la mi sgom pa'i tshul gyis sgom mo/_/kun rdzob tu 'khor ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i bden pa yang mi 'dor la/_kun rdzob tu sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la so sor brtag pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[249b.2\]]dpa' chen po dag bden pa rnams la mi sgom pa'i tshul gyis kyang sgom mo/_/lha'i bu 'di lta ste/_dper na 'dron pa mang po bcings nas skyes bu gcig bros te/_'dron pa mang po'i nang nas byung nas/_'brog dgon par zhugs pa dang /_de yid 'jigs shing skrag nas phyir mi 
[\[249b.3\]]ldog par 'brog dgon pa las 'das so/_/lha'i bu de bzhin du nyan thos rnams 'khor bas 'jigs shing skrag nas 'khor ba las bros te/_'jig rten 'dir phyir mi 'ong zhing gcig pu gnyis su med par bden pa sgom ste/_thabs kyi rigs pa dang bral bas sems can thams 
[\[249b.4\]]cad la mi lta ba nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar la mi lta ba'o/_/lha'i bu 'di lta ste/_dper na ded dpon g.yog mang po lam rgyags thams cad 'byor pa/_zong chen po bsdu ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam nas skye bo mang po bsdus te/_de 'jigs shing skrag pa med par 
[\[249b.5\]]'brog dgon pa de las 'da'o/_/lha'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang kun rdzob tu ded dpon chen po ltar 'jig rten gyi spyod pas/_sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba/_g.yog mang po snying rje chen po'i sbyor ba can/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 
[\[249b.6\]]kyi lam rgyags 'byor pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos pos yongs su bzung zhing bla na med pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes yang dag par bsdu ba'i khe chen po dang ldan pa yang sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi don byed cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs 
[\[249b.7\]]rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/_sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar gyur cing thabs la mkhas pas bden pa rnams la sgom mo/_/lha'i bu 'di lta ste/_dper na sha na'i ras la me tog tsam pa ka dang me tog 'bar shi kas bsgos na de'i dri myur du yal bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]lha'i bu de bzhin du nyan thos kyi bden pa la sgom pa ni yun thung bar blta ste/_de myur du mya ngan las 'das nas sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims dang /_thos pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang ye shes kyi dri yang mi 'byin/_bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor 
[\[250a.2\]]ba'i nyon mongs pa yang spong mi nus so/_/lha'i bu 'di lta ste/_dper na yul ka shi ka'i gos rin po che la/_mi dang lha'i spos dang /_me tog gi dris bskal pa chen po brgya stong du bsgos na/_de'i lha'i dri de rtag tu bro zhing /_dri gtsang mas lha dang mi zil gyis gnon to/_/
[\[250a.3\]]lha'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bden pa sgom pa mi sgom pa'i tshul gyis bskal pa brgya stong grangs med par bsgoms pa ni/_rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ma thob kyi bar du bar ma dor de yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[250a.4\]]mi 'da' zhing 'di lta ste/_rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu dri zhim par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi tha snyad du nyon mongs pa'i bag chags thams cad kyang spong zhing /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha 
[\[250a.5\]]ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams kyang 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha'i bu rab tu zhi ba rnam par dul ba'i dbang phyug gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[250a.6\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i tog de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun de ci 'dra/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_don dam par na dad pa'i rjes su 'gro ba yang ma yin/_gzhan la dad pas 'gro ba yang ma yin no/_/don dam par na rigs kyi rjes su 'gro ba yang ma yin te/_don 
[\[250a.7\]]dam par na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyang mi gtong ngo /_/don dam par na chos kyi rjes su 'gro ba yang ma yin te/_don dam par na chos gang yang mi dmigs so/_/don dam par na brgyad pa yang ma yin te/_kun rdzob tu na log pa'i chos brgyad dang yang 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]bral lo/_/don dam par na rgyun du zhugs pa yang ma yin te/_'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi bden par na ngan song thams cad las kyang 'das so/_/don dam par na lan cig phyir 'ong ba yang ma yin te/_kun rdzob tu na sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir yang 
[\[250b.2\]]'ong ngo /_/don dam par na phyir mi 'ong ba yang ma yin te/_kun rdzob tu na chos thams cad las 'ong ba med do/_/don dam par na dgra bcom pa yang ma yin te/_'jig rten gyi tha snyad du na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bla na med pa'i mchod par 'os pa yang yin no/_/
[\[250b.3\]]don dam par na nyan thos kyang ma yin te/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad las thos pa yang 'dzin to/_/don dam par na 'dod chags dang bral ba yang ma yin te/_kun rdzob tu na 'dod chags kyi yongs su gdung bas kyang mi gdung ngo /_/
[\[250b.4\]]don dam par na zhe sdang dang bral ba yang ma yin te/_kun rdzob tu na zhe sdang gi yongs su gdung bas kyang mi gdung ngo /_/don dam par na gti mug dang bral ba yang ma yin te/_kun rdzob tu na chos thams cad mun pa mun nag dang bral ba'o/_/don dam par na nyon mongs pa dang bral ba 
[\[250b.5\]]yang ma yin te/_kun rdzob tu na sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa gdul ba'i phyir yang brtson no/_/don dam par na thog ma nas ma skyes pa nges par zhugs kyang kun rdzob tu na bsams bzhin du srid pa len to/_/kun rdzob tu na 'khor ba yang yongs su 'dzin mod kyi/_don 
[\[250b.6\]]dam par na chos gang yang yongs su 'dzin pa dang gtong ba yang med do/_/de don dam par na chos thams cad shin tu dran pa dang bral bar mi mthong bas mthong ba ste/_kun rdzob tu na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang sgom mo/_/de don dam par na chos thams cad shin tu ma skyes ma 'gags 
[\[250b.7\]]par mi shes pa'i tshul gyis kyang rab tu shes la/_'jig rten gyi spyod par na yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang sgom mo/_/de don dam par na lus dang sems med pa yang 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyi bden par na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang sgrub bo/_/de don dam par na 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]dbang po thams cad dang bral yang kun rdzob tu na dbang po rnams kyang sgrub bo/_/de don dam par na chos thams cad rab tu dngos po med par mi mthong ba'i tshul gyis mthong yang nga rgyal can dmigs pa can thams cad tshar gcod pa'i phyir mi sgom pa'i tshul gyis stobs kyang sgom mo/_/de 
[\[251a.2\]]don dam par na chos thams cad shin tu dngos po med par khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir mi sgom pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang sgom mo/_/de don dam par na shin tu dngos po med kyang kun rdzob tu na sgom pa'i tshul gyis lam yang sgom mo/_/de don dam par na yang dag pa'i mtha' la zhi 
[\[251a.3\]]gnas mngon par sgrub bo/_/de don dam par na lhag mthong shin tu mi skye bar mi sgom pa'i tshul gyis mthong ngo /_/de don dam par na ma rig pa zad pa nyid du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rig pa skyed de/_don dam par na zad pa'am skye ba mi dmigs so/_/de sha'i mig gis sems can thams 
[\[251a.4\]]cad dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyang mthong la de don dam par na ci yang mi mthong ngo /_/de lha'i mig gis sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong yang don dam par na ci yang mi mthong ngo /_/de shes rab kyi mig gis sems can thams 
[\[251a.5\]]cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang /_g.yo ba rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes kyang don dam par na ci yang mi shes so/_/de chos kyi mig gis chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong yang don dam par na chos ci yang mi mthong ngo /_/de sangs rgyas kyi spyan 
[\[251a.6\]]gyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad byed kyang don dam par na ci yang mi byed do/_/de lha'i rna bas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis chos bstan pa thos kyang don dam par na ci yang mi thos so/_/de sems gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi sems la lta yang don dam 
[\[251a.7\]]par na ci yang mi lta'o/_/de rjes su dran pa'i ye shes kyis sngon gyi mtha' yang rjes su dran mod kyi don dam par na ci yang mi dran no/_/de rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gro yang don dam par na/_'ong ba'am 'gro ba med do/_/de ni zag pa zad kyang don dam 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]par na zad pa'i chos can ma yin no/_/snang yang snang la don dam par na de'i lus yongs su grub pa yang med do/_/smra yang smra la don dam par na yi ger yang mi brjod do/_/sems kyang sems la don dam par na sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos su brjod par bya ba ma yin no/_/don dam 
[\[251b.2\]]par na gzugs su yang mi snang la kun rdzob tu skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis ni brgyan/_dpe byad bzang pos ni spras/_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyis ni brgyan/_gzi brjid ni bsnyen par dka'/_brjod pa ni rnam par bsgrags/_tshul khrims kyi 
[\[251b.3\]]byug pas ni byugs/_ngan du smra ba'i tshig rnams kyis ni kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa med/_mngon par shes pas ni rnam par rol/_thos pas ni rnam par shigs/_spobs pas ni rab tu sgrog_/kun rdzob tu na ye shes kyis ni rnam par 'phrul/_ye shes kyi 'od kyis ni mun 
[\[251b.4\]]pa mun nag sel/_shes rab kyis ni snang bar byed/_mtha' yas par bstan pa ni rtogs par khong du chud do/_/kun rdzob tu na sems can thams cad kyi ni skyabs/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ni rtag tu gzigs/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang /_mu 
[\[251b.5\]]stegs can dmigs pa can thams cad kyis ni mi blta zhing byang chub kyi phyir ni rtag tu blta ba ste/_kun rdzob tu na bstan pa ni zad mi shes/_dran pa ni rgya mtsho dang 'dra/_ting nge 'dzin ni ri rab dang mtshungs/_bzod pa ni sa dang 'dra'o/_/kun rdzob tu na rnam par rtog pa thams cad sel 
[\[251b.6\]]ba'i phyir dpa' ba'o/_/mi shes pa'i mun pa mun nag sel ba'i phyir nyi ma lta bu'o/_/rab tu snang ba'i phyir zla ba dang 'dra'o/_/kun rdzob tu na 'du ba'i phyir dbang po dang mtshungs so/_/kun rdzob tu na sems la dbang byed pa'i phyir tshangs pa dang 'dra'o/_/kun rdzob tu na nam mkha' la dbang 
[\[251b.7\]]byed pa'i phyir mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o/_/kun rdzob tu na thams cad rjes su song yang don dam par na gang du song ba'am 'ongs pa'am/_'dug pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_don dam par na chos thams cad shin tu ma byung ba'i phyir ro/_/lha'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i tog de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni de dang 'dra ste/_de bas kyang lhag par bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos dang yang ldan no/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bstan pa 'di bshad pa na dge 
[\[252a.2\]]slong lnga brgya dang /_dge bsnyen lnga brgya dang /_lha'i bu lnga stong dmigs pa can de dag thams cad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i tog de'i nyan thos su gyur cig_/
[\[252a.3\]]'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_kye grogs po dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der dmigs pa can thams cad mi skye'o/_/kye grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs pa med pa rnams ni mi skye ba'i tshul gyis der skye'o/_/kye grogs po dag gal te khyed kyang der 'dod na 
[\[252a.4\]]khyed kyis mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par gyis shig_/kye grogs po dag khyed nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis brtson par gyur pa de'i tshe/_grogs po dag khyed la rnam pa'i mchog thams cad 
[\[252a.5\]]dang ldan pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang rnyed par mi dka' na/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/_lha'i bu rab tu zhi ba rnam par dul ba'i dbang phyug gis yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras 
[\[252a.6\]]so/_/'jam dpal nyan thos kyi 'dul ba ni ji lta bu/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dul ba ni ji lta bu/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu khams gsum gyis skrag pas btul ba ni nyan thos kyi 'dul ba'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams 
[\[252a.7\]]cad bsags shing sems can thams cad dbugs 'byin pa dang /_khams gsum du bsams bzhin du skye bas btul ba ni kun rdzob tu na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dul ba'o/_/nyon mongs pa thams cad la sdang ba ni nyan thos kyi 'dul ba'o/_/sems 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spong ba'i phyir rjes su btul ba ni kun rdzob tu na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dul ba'o/_/phyogs gcig rig pa ni nyan thos kyi 'dul ba'o/_/phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rig pa ni kun 
[\[252b.2\]]rdzob tu na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dul ba'o/_/bdud thams cad la btang snyoms pa ni nyan thos kyi 'dul ba'o/_/phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i bdud kyi rigs thams cad dkrugs shing /_phyir rgol ba thams 
[\[252b.3\]]cad 'joms pa ni kun rdzob tu na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dul ba'o/_/bdag gi rgyud gsal bar byed pa ni nyan thos kyi 'dul ba'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi rgyud gsal bar byed cing /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes snang bar byed pa dang /_chos 
[\[252b.4\]]thams cad la bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba snang bar byed pa ni kun rdzob tu na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dul ba'o/_/rang gi sems kyis bsams pa ni nyan thos kyi 'dul ba'o/_/'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar gyi sangs rgyas thams 
[\[252b.5\]]cad kyi dgongs pa ni kun rdzob tu na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dul ba'o/_/rdo chag pa'i 'phro mi 'byor pa lta bu ni nyan thos kyi 'dul ba'o/_/gser dang /_dngul chag pa'i 'phro 'byor pa lta bu ni kun rdzob tu na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dul 
[\[252b.6\]]ba'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang /_thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba ni nyan thos kyi 'dul ba'o/_/thabs mkhas pa chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad du bsdu bas bsdus pa ni kun rdzob tu na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dul ba'o/_/stobs 
[\[252b.7\]]bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_ma 'dres pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang bral ba ni nyan thos kyi 'dul ba'o/_/stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_ma 'dres pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su bsdu bas bsdus pa ni kun rdzob tu na byang chub 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dul ba'o/_/mes tshig pa las 'bros pa lta bu ni nyan thos kyi 'dul ba'o/_/skyed mos tshal dang /_gzhal med khang lta bur chos kyi dga' bas dga' ba ni kun rdzob tu na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[253a.2\]]'dul ba'o/_/bag chags kyi rgyun ma chad pa ni nyan thos kyi 'dul ba'o/_/bag chags thams cad yang dag par bcom pa ni kun rdzob tu na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dul ba'o/_/lha'i bu mdor na tshad du gtogs pa tshad kyi chos kyis drangs pa ni nyan thos 
[\[253a.3\]]kyi 'dul ba'o/_/tshad du gtogs pa ma yin pa tshad med pa'i chos kyis drangs pa ni kun rdzob tu na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dul ba'o/_/tshad yod pa'i tshul khrims dang /_thos pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_
[\[253a.4\]]rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba thob par byed pa ni nyan thos kyi 'dul ba'o/_/tshad yod pa ma yin pa/_tshad med pa'i yon tan dang ldan zhing /_tshad med pa'i tshul khrims dang /_thos pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam 
[\[253a.5\]]par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba thob par byed pa ni kun rdzob tu na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par grol ba'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so/_/zhes bya ba byin te/_'jam dpal khyod kyis kun rdzob tu na byang 
[\[253a.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dul ba legs par bshad pa legs so legs so/_/'jam dpal yang 'di ltar don de nyid bstan pa'i phyir khyod la dpe bstan to/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na skyes bu gnyis shig yod la/_de las skyes bu gcig 
[\[253a.7\]]ni ba lang gi rjes kyi bsngags pa smra/_skyes bu gcig ni rgya mtsho chen po'i bsngags pa smra na/_'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems/_skyes bu des ba lang gi rjes kyi bsngags pa ji snyed cig brjod nus/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ba lang gi rjes 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]thams cad kyang chung na/_de'i bsngags pa lta ci smos/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin du ba lang gi rjes chung ba ltar nyan thos kyi 'dul bar blta'o/_/'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/_skyes bu cig shos des rgya mtsho chen po'i bsngags pa ji 
[\[253b.2\]]tsam zhig brjod nus/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho chen po'i bsngags pa ni shin tu mang ste/_dpag tu ma mchis/_bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin du rgya mtsho chen po'i bsngags pa dpag 
[\[253b.3\]]tu med pa ltar kun rdzob tu na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dul bar blta'o/_/de nas bstan pa 'di mi ston pa'i tshul gyis bshad pa na lha'i bu khri nyis stong gis don dam par na ma skyes pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes nas tshig 
[\[253b.4\]]'di skad ces kyang smra ste/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa 'di la mi slob pa'i tshul gyis slob bo/_/de nas lha'i bu rab tu zhi ba rnam par dul ba'i dbang phyug gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ci 'jam dpal khyod 
[\[253b.5\]]nyan thos kyi 'dul ba la bslabs sam/_'on te byang chub sems dpa'i 'dul ba la bslabs/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_rgya mtsho chen por mi shong ba'i chu gang yang yod dam/_lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal rgya mtsho chen por mi 
[\[253b.6\]]shong ba'i chu gang yang med do/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu de bzhin du kun rdzob tu na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'dul ba ni rgya mtsho chen po dang 'dra'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal 'dul ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don gang yin/_
[\[253b.7\]]'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu nyon mongs pa 'dul ba ni kun rdzob tu na 'dul ba'o/_/nyon mongs pa yongs su shes pa'ang 'dul ba'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na nyon mongs pa 'dul bar 'gyur/_ji ltar na nyon mongs pa yongs su shes pa 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_don dam par na chos thams cad ma byung ma skyes dngos po med pa yin na kun rdzob tu med pa la phyin ci log tu gyur te/_med pa las phyin ci log tu gyur pa de las kun tu rtog pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa'o/_/kun tu rtog 
[\[254a.2\]]pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa de las tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'o/_/tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa de las bdag tu sgro 'dogs pa'o/_/bdag tu sgro 'dogs pa de las lta ba kun nas ldang ba'o/_/lta ba kun nas ldang ba de las nyon mongs pa rnams 
[\[254a.3\]]'byung ngo /_/gang yang lha'i bu don dam par na chos thams cad shin tu ma skyes ma byung dngos po med par mi shes pa'i tshul gyis rab tu shes pa de ni don dam par na phyin ci ma log pa'o/_/gang don dam par na phyin ci ma log pa de ni rtog pa med cing rnam par mi rtog pa'o/_/gang rtog 
[\[254a.4\]]pa med cing rnam par mi rtog pa de ni tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor ba'o/_/gang tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor ba de la don dam par na bdag tu sgro 'dogs pa mi 'byung ngo /_/gang la don dam par na bdag tu sgro 'dogs pa mi 'byung ba de la lta ba kun nas ldang bar mi 'gyur ba nas don dam par na mya ngan 
[\[254a.5\]]las 'das par lta ba kun nas ldang bar yang mi 'gyur te/_de ltar ma skyes pa la spyod pa de ni nyon mongs pa shin tu rnam par dul bar mi lta ba'i tshul gyis bgyi ste/_lha'i bu 'di ni nyon mongs pa 'dul ba zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu nam nyon mongs pa rnams la snang ba med pa'i 
[\[254a.6\]]shes rab dang ye shes kyis don dam par na shin tu stong pa dang /_shin tu mtshan ma med pa dang /_shin tu smon pa med do/_/don dam par na shin tu ma skyes ma byung /_dngos po med par mi shes pa'i tshul gyis rab tu shes na/_lha'i bu de'i tshe mi shes pa'i tshul gyis 
[\[254a.7\]]nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su shes pa yin no/_/lha'i bu 'di lta ste/_dper na sbrul kha gdug pa'i rig sngags 'don pa des ni sbrul kha gdug pa'i gdug pa rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/lha'i bu de bzhin du gang nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rigs rab tu shes pa de'i nyon mongs pa 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]rnams shin tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal nyon mongs pa'i rigs de gang yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu don dam par na chos thams cad shin tu ma skyes ma byung /_dngos po med pa la gang kun tu rtog pa de 
[\[254b.2\]]ni nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rigs so/_/don dam par na kun tu mi rtog pa'i phyir kun nas nyon mi mongs so/_/lha'i bu kun nas nyon mongs pas kun gzhi med do/_/kun gzhi med pas don dam par na mi gnas so/_/mi gnas pas don dam par mi 'tshig go_/mi 'tshig pas 
[\[254b.3\]]don dam par na nye bar zhi ba zhes bya'o/_/don dam par na ji skad smras pa bzhin du ni ma yin te/_lha'i bu kun rdzob tu na 'di ni nyon mongs pa 'dul ba'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar na nyon mongs pa rnams 'dul bar 'gyur/_ci yod pa zhig gam/_'on te med pa zhig_/'jam 
[\[254b.4\]]dpal gyis smras pa lha'i bu 'di lta ste/_dper na skyes bu zhig gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam la sbrul kha gdug pas zin nas de sdug bsngal gyis gtse ba las yang dug sman btang nas/_de'i gdug pa med par gyur te/_gdug pa med par gyur pas sdug bsngal yang med par gyur na/_lha'i bu de ji 
[\[254b.5\]]snyam du sems/_skyes bu de yang dag par zin tam 'on te yang dag pa ma yin/_lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal don dam par na shin tu yang dag pa ma yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu ji ltar dug de med par 'gyur/_lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal ji ltar zin pa shin tu mi 
[\[254b.6\]]bden pa de bzhin du dug med par gyur pa yang shin tu bden pa ma yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu de bzhin du 'phags pa rnams kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang don dam par mi blta ba'i tshul gyis blta'o/_/lha'i bu gang yang 'di skad du ji ltar na nyon mongs pa rnams 'dul bar 'gyur zhes 
[\[254b.7\]]zer ba ni lha'i bu ji ltar bdag don dam par na bdag med pa de bzhin du lha'i bu don dam par na nyon mongs pa rnams kyang nyon mongs pa rnams ma yin no/_/lha'i bu de ste don dam par na bdag de bzhin nyid yin na ni lha'i bu don dam par na nyon mongs pa yang de bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bu 'di ltar bdag don dam par na 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]bdag ma yin te/_lha'i bu de bas na nyon mongs pa rnams kyang don dam par na nyon mongs pa ma yin no/_/lha'i bu de la gang gi don dam par nyon mongs pa 'dul bar dmigs par 'gyur ba ni don dam par na gang yang mi dmigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i bu don dam par na 
[\[255a.2\]]shin tu ma byung ba'i phyir chos thams cad ni zhi ba'o/_/lha'i bu don dam par na 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni nye bar zhi ba'o/_/lha'i bu don dam par na chos thams cad sgro btags pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni rab tu zhi ba'o/_/lha'i bu don dam par na shin tu ma skyes pa'i 
[\[255a.3\]]phyir chos thams cad ni mi zad pa'o/_/lha'i bu don dam par na shin tu dngos po med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni shin tu ma skyes pa'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal chos thams cad kyi sgo gang yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu smra bar bya ba dang /_smra ba dang shes pa dang /_
[\[255a.4\]]shes par bya ba dang bya ba dang tha snyad dang /_byed pa thams cad 'jug pa'i kun rdzob kyi bden pa ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/smra ba dang /_smra bar bya ba dang /_shes pa dang /_shes par bya ba dang /_bya ba dang /_tha snyad dang /_byed pa thams cad las rnam par log pa'i phyir don dam pa'i bden 
[\[255a.5\]]pa ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/yang lha'i bu kun rdzob tu na tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa ni 'khor ba'i sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na the tsom ni sgrib pa'i sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na rnam par grol ba ni sgrib pa med pa'i 
[\[255a.6\]]sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na kun tu rtog pa ni nyon mongs pa rnams kyi sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na kun tu mi rtog pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa'i sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na rnam par g.yeng ba ni rnam par rtog pa rnams kyi sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na zhi gnas ni nye bar zhi ba'i sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na lta bar gyur pa rnams ni nga 
[\[255a.7\]]rgyal gyi sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na stong pa nyid ni nga rgyal med pa'i sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na sdig pa'i grogs po dang sten pa ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang sten pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na log par lta ba ni sdug bsngal thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]kun rdzob tu na yang dag par lta ba ni bde ba thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na ser sna ni dbul ba'i sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na sbyin pa ni longs spyod chen po'i sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na ngang tshul ngan pa ni ngan 'gro thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na tshul khrims ni lha dang mir skye ba thams 
[\[255b.2\]]cad kyi sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na gnod sems ni byad gzugs ngan pa'i sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na bzod pa ni gzugs phun sum tshogs pa'i sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na le lo ni mi rtogs pa'i sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na brtson 'grus ni rtogs pa'i sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na rnam par rtog pa ni rgod pa'i 
[\[255b.3\]]sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na bsam gtan ni sems shin tu sbyangs pa'i sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na 'chal pa'i shes rab ni khong du mi chud pa'i sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na shes rab ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na byams pa ni khong mi khro ba'i sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu 
[\[255b.4\]]na snying rje chen po ni lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na lhag pa'i bsam pa ni g.yo med pa'i sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na dga' ba ni chos la mos pa'i sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na btang snyoms na nyes pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[255b.5\]]ba thams cad yongs su mi 'bri ba'i sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag pa'i nan tan gyi sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni lus dang sems las su rung ba'i sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na dbang po rnams ni dad pa thob pa'i sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na stobs rnams 
[\[255b.6\]]ni nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms pa'i sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni thams cad mkhyen pa khong du chud pa'i sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni lam ngan pa thams cad las 'da' ba'i sgo'o/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang kun rdzob tu na byang chub kyi 
[\[255b.7\]]sems ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na sems can smin par byed pa ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na thabs ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]mkhas pa'i sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo'o/_/don dam par na shin tu mi 'byung ba ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o//_//bam po gnyis pa ste tha ma/_lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal shin tu mi skye 
[\[256a.2\]]ba'i sgo gang /_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu don dam par na shin tu mi 'byung ba ni kun nas sgo'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal shin tu mi 'byung ba'i rang bzhin gang /_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu don dam par na shin tu 
[\[256a.3\]]dngos po med pa ni shin tu mi 'byung ba'i rang bzhin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal shin tu mi 'byung ba la cha shas dbye ba gang yang yod dam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu de ji snyam du sems/_nam mkha' la cha shas dbye ba gang yang yod dam/_
[\[256a.4\]]lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal med do/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu de bzhin du ji ltar na nam mkha' la cha shas dbye ba med pa de bzhin du lha'i bu shin tu ma skyes pa la yang cha shas dbye ba med do/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod kyis don 
[\[256a.5\]]dam par na shin tu mi 'byung ba yongs su shes sam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu shin tu mi 'byung bas shin tu mi 'byung ba yongs su mi shes so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i bu chos thams cad ni shin tu ma skyes shing ma byung la/_dngos po med pa'i 
[\[256a.6\]]phyir ro/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod kyis chos gang yang yongs su shes shing gang khong du chud pas 'di lta bu'i spobs par gyur/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_brag cas chos gang yongs su shes na/_gang de las sgra 
[\[256a.7\]]'byung /_lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal brag cas chos gang yang yongs su shes pa med mod kyi kun rdzob tu na rkyen las sgra 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu de bzhin du sems can thams cad la dmigs pa'i rkyen gyis kun rdzob tu na/_byang chub 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi smra ba'i tshul gyis smra'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod ci la gnas te de ston/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa gang la gnas te de ston pa la'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin 
[\[256b.2\]]gshegs pa sprul pa ni don dam pa na ci la'ang gnas pa med do/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu de bzhin du don dam par na chos thams cad la mi gnas par bdag mi ston pa'i tshul gyis ston to/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal de ste khyod don dam par na chos thams cad la 
[\[256b.3\]]mi gnas par mi ston pa'i tshul gyis ston na khyod ci la gnas te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu bdag ni mtshams med pa rnams la gnas te/_mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba'i tshul gyis 
[\[256b.4\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_mtshams med pa rnams ci la gnas/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu don dam par na mtshams med pa rnams ni shin tu ma byung zhing dngos po med pa la mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas so/_/
[\[256b.5\]]lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal mtshams med pa rnams byed pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas sems can dmyal bar bshad do/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas mtshams med pa byed pa sems can dmyal bar bshad pa de bzhin du/_lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs 
[\[256b.6\]]pas mtshams med pa byed pa mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis mtshams med pa la gnas na myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes mi ston pa'i tshul gyis ston to/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal mtshams med pa de gang yin/_'jam dpal 
[\[256b.7\]]gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu mtshams med pa gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba'i tshul gyis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mtshams med pa 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]ni 'di lta ste/_lha'i bu mtshams med pa lnga po de dag gang zhe na/_lha'i bu 'di la nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi skye ba'i tshul gyis sems bskyed nas bar ma dor nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_dmigs pa can 
[\[257a.2\]]dang /_mu stegs can thams cad kyi sar sems mi skyed pa 'di ni lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshams med pa dang po'o/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdog pa thams cad gtong ba la mi skye ba'i tshul gyis sems bskyed nas/_nam byang chub kyi 
[\[257a.3\]]snying po la 'dug gi bar du ser sna dang lhan cig mi gnas pa 'di ni lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshams med pa gnyis pa'o/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad la bdag gis rnam pa thams cad kyis yongs su bskyab bo snyam du 
[\[257a.4\]]sems mi skyed pa'i tshul gyis de ltar sems bskyed nas bar ma dor mi nur ba de ni lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshams med pa gsum pa'o/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don dam par na chos thams cad rab tu ma skyes pa/_ma byung ba/_dngos po med 
[\[257a.5\]]pa'o zhes bzod pa ma thob pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa thob nas bar du rdzas dang /_ngo bo dang /_dngos por 'dzin pa len pas ma zin pa 'di ni lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshams med pa bzhi pa'o/_/lha'i bu gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[257a.6\]]skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya'o/_/zhes de ltar ma skyes pa'i tshul gyis sems bskyed nas/_rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mi 'thob pa'i tshul gyis ma thob 
[\[257a.7\]]kyi bar du mi 'dug_/kun tu mi 'dug pa de ni lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mtshams med pa lnga pa'o/_/de ltar mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don dam par mngon par rdzogs 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]par 'tshang mi rgya ba'i tshul gyis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal mtshams med pa gang dag gis byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i mtshams med pa de nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas na mngon par 
[\[257b.2\]]rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rnam grangs yod dam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu yod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i bu don dam par na chos thams cad ni shin 
[\[257b.3\]]tu stong pa ste/_lha'i bu shin tu stong pa nyid khong du chud pa ni byang chub ste/_don dam par na byang chub ces ji skad du brjod pa ltar ni ma yin no/_/lha'i bu don dam par na chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa ste/_lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa khong du chud pa ni byang chub ste/_
[\[257b.4\]]don dam par na byang chub ces ji skad du brjod pa ltar ni ma yin no/_/lha'i bu don dam par na chos thams cad ni shin tu smon pa med pa ste/_lha'i bu smon pa med pa khong du chud pa ni byang chub ste/_don dam par na byang chub ces ji skad du brjod pa ltar ni ma yin no/_/lha'i bu 
[\[257b.5\]]don dam par na chos thams cad ni shin tu gzung bar bya ba med pa ste/_lha'i bu shin tu gzung bar bya ba med pa khong du chud pa ni byang chub ste/_don dam par na byang chub ces ji skad du brjod pa ltar ni ma yin no/_/lha'i bu don dam par na chos thams cad ni shin tu mngon par 'du mi byed 
[\[257b.6\]]pa ste/_lha'i bu shin tu mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i khong du chud pa ni byang chub ste/_don dam par na byang chub ces ji skad du brjod pa ltar ni ma yin no/_/lha'i bu don dam par na chos thams cad ni shin tu 'dus ma byas pa ste/_lha'i bu shin tu 'dus ma byas pa khong du chud pa ni byang chub ste/_don dam par 
[\[257b.7\]]na byang chub ces ji skad du brjod pa ltar ni ma yin no/_/lha'i bu don dam par na chos thams cad ni shin tu mi mthong ba ste/_lha'i bu shin tu mi mthong ba khong du chud pa ni byang chub ste/_don dam par na byang chub ces ji skad du brjod pa ltar ni ma yin no/_/lha'i bu don dam par na chos thams cad ni shin tu 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]ma skyes pa ste/_lha'i bu shin tu ma skyes pa khong du chud pa ni byang chub ste/_don dam par na byang chub ces ji skad du brjod pa ltar ni ma yin no/_/lha'i bu don dam par na chos thams cad ni shin tu ma byung ba ste/_lha'i bu shin tu ma byung ba khong du chud pa ni byang chub ste/_
[\[258a.2\]]don dam par na byang chub ces ji skad du brjod pa ltar ni ma yin no/_/lha'i bu don dam par na chos thams cad ni shin tu dngos po med pa ste/_lha'i bu shin tu dngos po med pa khong du chud pa ni byang chub ste/_don dam par na byang chub ces ji skad du brjod pa ltar ni ma yin no/_/lha'i bus 
[\[258a.3\]]smras pa/_'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la su dad par 'gyur/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu don dam par na de bzhin gshegs pa la yang dad pas mi 'gro na/_gang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_mu stegs can dmigs pa can thams 
[\[258a.4\]]cad lta ci smos/_lha'i bus smras pa/_su dag mos par 'gyur/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_gang don dam par na chos gang la yang mngon par mi chags pa de mos par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_yang su dag nan tan byed par 'gyur/_'jam 
[\[258a.5\]]dpal gyis smras pa/_gang don dam par na chos gang la yang nan tan mi byed pa'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_su dag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_gang don dam par na chos thams cad gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/_/lha'i 
[\[258a.6\]]bus smras pa/_'jam dpal don dam par na su dag chos gang yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu kun rdzob tu na rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dag go/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_
[\[258a.7\]]'jam dpal de dag ji lta bu'i rang bzhin du 'gyur/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu don dam par na de dag rab tu ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal mdo sde 'di lta bu su dag gi lag tu 'gro_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu kun rdzob tu na gang sems can thams cad 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]la dam pa'i chos kyi lag sbyin par byed pa rnams kyi'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal de dag ji lta bur gnas par 'gyur/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu don dam par na shin tu ma skyes/_ma byung dngos po med pa la de dag gnas par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam 
[\[258b.2\]]dpal de dag cis 'gro bar 'gyur/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu don dam par na ma skyes/_ma byung dngos po med par de dag 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ci byang chub 'thob bam/_'jam 
[\[258b.3\]]dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu gang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des byang chub mi 'thob pa ni gnas ma yin te/_go skabs med do/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ci las ldog par 'gyur/_
[\[258b.4\]]'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don dam par na rnam par rtog pa thams cad las ldog go/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_mu stegs can dmigs pa can gyi sa las ldog go/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam 
[\[258b.5\]]dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ci las mi ldog_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos thams cad shin tu mi 'byung ba'i mnyam pa nyid las mi ldog go/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_don dam par na chos 
[\[258b.6\]]thams cad shin tu mi 'byung bar mnyam pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mnyam ste/_de bas na phyir mi ldog go/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_chos thams cad shin tu mi 'byung bar mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba de 'jam dpal chos gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas[,]bla dwags[}]/_'jam dpal gyis 
[\[258b.7\]]smras pa/_chos thams cad shin tu mi 'byung bar mnyam zhes bya ba ni lha'i bu don dam par sna tshogs med pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal chos thams cad shin tu mi 'byung bar mnyam pa la ci'i phyir sna tshogs su snang /_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_gang lha'i bu chos 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]thams cad shin tu mi 'byung bar mnyam pa la don dam par rdzas dang /_dngos po dang /_ngo bor yongs su rtog pas de dag don dam par na sna tshogs su spyod do/_/de dag don dam par sna tshogs su spyod pa la dmigs pa'i lta ba mang du 'gyur ro/_/de dag dmigs pa'i lta ba mang pos 
[\[259a.2\]]'gro ba rnam pa tha dad pa rnams su dbang med par 'khyam mo/_/gang lha'i bu chos thams cad shin tu mi 'byung bar mnyam pa la don dam par ngo bo dang /_rdzas dang /_dngos po yongs su mi rtog na/_de dag don dam par na sna tshogs su mi spyod do/_/de dag don dam par sna tshogs su mi spyod na/_don 
[\[259a.3\]]dam par shin tu dngos po med par 'gro ba'i tshul gyis don dam par chos thams cad shin tu ma skyes pa'i mtshan nyid dang mnyam par khong du chud par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_rnam grangs gang gis nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la byang chub yod kyi nyon mongs pa 
[\[259a.4\]]med pa la ma yin pa'i rnam grangs yod dam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu yod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i bu chos thams cad ni kun rdzob tu 'byung ba yang 'byung ngo /_/mi 'byung yang mi 'byung ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi byang chub kyang kun rdzob tu 'byung ngo /_/
[\[259a.5\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i bu don dam par na chos thams cad ni nyon mongs pa med cing mi skye mi 'gag ste/_chos gang don dam par mi skye mi 'gag pa de don dam par gang gis kyang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so/_/mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro/_/mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[259a.6\]]'tshang mi rgya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i bu don dam par chos thams cad shin tu ma skyes pa'i phyir te/_lha'i bu rnam grangs de lta bus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa la byang chub 'byung ste/_nyon mongs pa med pa la ni ma yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_
[\[259a.7\]]'jam dpal rnam grangs gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ser sna can la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur te/_gtong ba dang ldan pa la ma yin pa'i rnam grangs yod dam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_yod de lha'i bu rnam grangs gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]po ser sna can gyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur gyi gtong ba dang ldan pa la ma yin pa'i rnam grangs yod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang sems can thams cad dang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kun rdzob tu yongs su mi gtong mi 'dor ba de ni lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ser sna'o/_/lha'i 
[\[259b.2\]]bus smras pa/_'jam dpal gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan pa'i ngang tshul can la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur gyi tshul khrims dang ldan pa la ma yin pa'i rnam grangs yod dam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_yod de lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[259b.3\]]gang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sems can la lta'i tshul khrims la ma yin pa de ni kun rdzob tu na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang bzod pa 
[\[259b.4\]]bor la bzod pa can gyi rnam grangs yod dam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu yod de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la don dam par chos thams cad la rdzas dang dngos po dang /_ngo bor mi bzod pa de ni shin tu ma smras pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa'i bzod pa dang ldan par 'gyur te/_
[\[259b.5\]]lha'i bu de ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa dam pa'o/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po le lo can brtson 'grus dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod dam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa lha'i bu yod de/_
[\[259b.6\]]lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po le lo can du gyur pa ni bla'i nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang /_mu stegs can dmigs pa'i brtson 'grus kyis brtson 'grus dang ldan pa ni de lta ma yin no/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brjed ngas pa 
[\[259b.7\]]gang mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod dam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu yod de/_lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la rmi lam du yang don dam par rdzas dang /_ngo bo dang /_dngos po'i sems mi skye ba de ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shin tu 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab med pa/_shes rab chen por 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod dam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu yod do/_/de ci'i phyir 
[\[260a.2\]]zhe na/_lha'i bu don dam par na chos thams cad la shes rab kyis rnam par dpyad de/_btsal na shin tu med cing mi dmigs te/_shes rab de yang don dam par na shin tu med cing mi dmigs pas na/_kun rdzob tu shes rab can zhes bya ste/_shes rab de yang don dam 
[\[260a.3\]]par na shin tu ma skyes pa yin no/_/lha'i bu rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab med pa ni shes rab chen po can zhes bya'o/_/shes rab bye brag tu 'phags pa zhes bya'o/_/shes rab dam pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/shes rab gya nom pa 
[\[260a.4\]]zhes bya'o/_/mi dmigs pa'i shes rab can zhes bya ste/_don dam par na ji skad du brjod pa ltar ni ma yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so/_/zhes bya ba byin te/_legs so/_/legs so/_/'jam dpal khyod 
[\[260a.5\]]kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bya ba dang /_mi bya ba mi bstan pa'i tshul gyis bstan pa ni/_tshig 'di legs par smras so/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na skyes bu bkres pa ltogs pas nyam chung ba mnags pa bla'i/_mi shes pas kha zas 
[\[260a.6\]]dug can zos pa de lta ma yin no/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i ser sna can dang /_ngan pa'i ngang tshul can dang /_gnod sems can dang /_le lo can dang /_brjed ngas pa dang /_shes rab med pa bla'i nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dmigs pa can 
[\[260a.7\]]gyi sems kyi sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyi sbyor ba ni de lta ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dmigs pa'i dug gi skyon chags pa'i phyir de la kun rdzob tu 'jigs par shes par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu mtshams [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nyon mongs pa rnams la 'jigs par mi bgyi'am/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu kun rdzob tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nyon mongs pa rnams la 'jigs par 
[\[260b.2\]]bya'o/_/de bas kyang des nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dmigs pa can gyi sems la shin tu 'jigs par bya ste/_nyon mongs pa rnams la ni de lta ma yin no/_/lha'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu khyod nyid la dris khyod 
[\[260b.3\]]kyis ci nus pa de bzhin du lung ston cig_/lha'i bu 'di yid la ji snyam/_skyes bu 'tsho bar 'dod par gyur pas yan lag gcad pa la 'jigs par bya'am/_'on te mgo gcad pa la rab tu 'jigs par bya/_lha'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das yan lag gcad pa'i skyes bu ni 'tsho ste/_
[\[260b.4\]]bsod nams 'dod pa bsod nams kyi lam yang dag par blangs shing gnas pa de ni mtho ris su skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur gyi/_bcom ldan 'das mgo bcad pa ni 'tsho ba las yongs su nyams te/_bsod nams 'tshal ba bsod nams kyi lam yang dag par len cing spyod mi nus so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i 
[\[260b.5\]]bu de bzhin te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa ni spyod pa nyams kyang bla'i/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dmigs pa can gyi lta bar ltung ba rnams kyis bslab pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa ni de lta ma yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[260b.6\]]dpa' chen po ser sna can ni bla'i/_sems can thams cad yongs su btang ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'dor ba ni de lta ma yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngan pa'i ngang tshul can du gyur pa ni bla'i/_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par mi byed par gyur 
[\[260b.7\]]pa ni de lta ma yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dad pas spyod pa'i sa la spyod pa/_mi dmigs pa la mos shing /_nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa bla'i/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dmigs pa can nges par gyur pa thob pa/_nyon mongs 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]pa med pa ni de lta ma yin no/_/lha'i bus gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mi spyod pa'i tshul gyis spyod pa ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dmigs pa'i dug gi 
[\[261a.2\]]skyon chags pas na/_gang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dmigs pa can rnams kyi tshul khrims de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngan pa'i ngang tshul lags so/_/ji tsam du gang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dmigs pa can rnams kyi brtson 'grus de ni dmigs 
[\[261a.3\]]pa'i dug gi skyon chags pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i le lo'i bar du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i bu 'di lta ste/_dper na gang mi dbul po'i kha zas de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dug go/_/lha'i bu de bzhin du gang nyan thos dang /_
[\[261a.4\]]rang sangs rgyas dmigs pa can rnams kyi tshul khrims dang /_brtson 'grus kyi bar du de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngan pa'i ngang tshul dang le lo'i bar du'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dmigs pa'i dug gi skyon chags pa'i phyir ro/_/lha'i bu 'di lta ste/_dper na gang 
[\[261a.5\]]bdag nyid bsgrubs pa'i las byed pa'i skyes bu'i nor des grong khyer gyi skye bo thams cad bde bar sbyor mi nus so/_/lha'i bu de bzhin du gang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dmigs pa can dbul ba'i sems dang /_dman pa'i sems dang /_dmigs pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyi brtson 
[\[261a.6\]]'grus kyi bar gyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can yongs su thar bar byed kyang mi nus na sems can thams cad lta ci smos/_lha'i bu 'di lta ste/_dper na nor chen po longs spyod chen po gtong ba dang ldan pa/_byams pa la gnas pa/_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa ded dpon chen po ni/_sems 
[\[261a.7\]]can thams cad bla na med pa'i bde bar byed pa la zhugs pa'i nor des grangs med dpag tu med pa'i sems can bde bar byed do/_/lha'i bu de bzhin du gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa/_sems can thams cad la shes rab dang /_thabs dang /_snying 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]brtse ba chen pos bskul ba/_bskal pa chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa'i nor chen po mi dmigs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi bar du de dag gis sems can grangs med/_dpag tu med pa yongs su smin par byed do/_/mi gzhog 
[\[261b.2\]]pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'ang rab tu 'god do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyis 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams mngon sum du bgyis la/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems 
[\[261b.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'dus byas su gtogs pa lags na/_de ji ltar 'dus ma byas su gtogs pa'i nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dmigs pa can thams cad zil gyis gnon/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srung de'i don rab tu grub par bya ba'i phyir dper bya ste/_
[\[261b.4\]]skyes bu mkhas pas smras pa'i don rig pa la la dpes de'i don go bar 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_dper na rgya mtsho chen po bzhi mar gyis gang bar gyur la/_de nas skyes bu la las skra brgyar gshegs pa'i rtse mo'i thog mas mar gyi thigs pa gcig blangs na/_'od srung 'di ji snyam du sems/_
[\[261b.5\]]skrar brgyar gshegs pa'i rtse mo'i thog mas mar gyi thigs pa bcus pas rgya mtsho chen po bzhi mar gyis gang ba zil gyis gnon par nus sam/_'od srung gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[261b.6\]]stsal pa/_yang 'od srung de dag las ches mang ba dang /_ches mchog tu gyur pa dang /_ches dam pa dang /_ches rin che ba gang yin/_'od srung gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rgya mtsho chen po gcig gi bye ba brgya stong gi cha shas de'ang /_bcom ldan 'das shin tu mang /_
[\[261b.7\]]shin tu mchog_/shin tu dam pa/_shin tu rin che ba lags te/_bcom ldan 'das brgyar gshegs pa'i skra'i rtse mo'i thog mas mar gyi thigs pa blangs pa de lta ma lags na/_bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho chen po bzhi lta ci smos/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di lta ste/_
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]dper na brgyar gshegs pa'i skra'i rtse mo'i thog mas mar gyi thigs pa blangs pa tshad yod pa de bzhin du nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dmigs pa can gyi 'dus ma byas kyi ye shes ni chung ngo /_/dmigs pa dang bcas pa'o/_/'od srung 'di lta ste/_dper na rgya mtsho chen 
[\[262a.2\]]po bzhi mar gyis gang ba de tsam du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs pa med pa/_dad pa spyod pa'i sa la mi spyod pa'i tshul gyis spyod pa'i rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa/_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad bsdus pa/_'dus byas kyi ye shes su 
[\[262a.3\]]mi blta ba'i tshul gyis blta'o/_/de yang don dam pa'i me 'bar bas yongs su smin par byas pas rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur ro/_/'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 
[\[262a.4\]]'dus ma byas thob pa'i nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dmigs pa can thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis zil gyis gnon to/_/'od srung 'di lta ste/_dper na grong khyer chen por chud pa'i mching bu'i nor bu khur brgya stong du gyur pa dang /_rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na yod pa grur bcug pa/_
[\[262a.5\]]rin che ba'i bai dUr+ya nor bu rin po che chen po de bde zhing nye zho med par 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin na de ji snyam du sems/_grong khyer chen por chud pa'i mching bu'i nor bus gru'i nang du bcug pa rin po che bai dUr+ya nor bu rin po che zil gyis non par nus sam/_'od srung gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[262a.6\]]de ma lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srung ji ltar grong khyer chen por chud pa'i mching bu'i nor bu bzhin du/_'dus ma byas thob pa'i nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dmigs pa can thams cad du blta'o/_/'od srung ji 
[\[262a.7\]]ltar nor bu rin po che chen po'i bai dUr+ya rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na yod pa grur bcug pa bde zhing nye zho med par tshong khang gi bar du 'ongs par gyur pa/_'od srung de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor ba'i grong khyer gyi tshong khang gi bar du 'ongs na sems can thams cad bla na med pa 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi 'jog pa'i tshul gyis rab tu 'god par blta'o/_/'od srung 'di lta ste/_dper na dpyid zla tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]zla ba la sa chen po lo tog gis rab tu gang ba la grog sbur phra mos zas kyi 'bru gcig khyer ba dang /_sa chen po 'di de dag gis gang ba gnyis gang mang bar 
[\[262b.2\]]sems/_'od srung gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das lo tog gis gang ba'i sa chen po de dpag tu ma mchis pa'i 'bru'i phung po chen po 'byung bar 'gyur te/_des sems can grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams tshim par 'gyur gyi/_bcom ldan 'das grog sbur phra mos 'tshal 
[\[262b.3\]]ba'i zas kyi 'bras bus lta ci zhig bgyi ste/_des sems can gang yang 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srung ji ltar grog sbur phra mos khyer ba'i zas kyi 'bru gcig po de bzhin du 'od srung nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dmigs pa can thams cad kyi zag 
[\[262b.4\]]pa med pa'i rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bur blta'o/_/'od srung ji ltar lo tog mang pos rab tu gang ba'i sa chen po de bzhin du 'od srung byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa la gnas pas/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sogs pa 
[\[262b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang /_bla na med par bsdus pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i lo tog tu blta'o/_/de yongs su smin par gyur nas 'di lta ste/_bla na med pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi bde ba mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can 
[\[262b.6\]]thams cad kyi 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/_/bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'chad pa'i tshul gyis ji ltar bshad pa de de bzhin no/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[262b.7\]]de ltar rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/_bla na ma mchis pa mi dmigs pa'i ye shes kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dad pas spyod pa'i sa la mi spyod pa'i tshul gyis spyod pas nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dmigs pa can thams cad zil gyis non to/_/de nas bcom 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i tog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba 'dir 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis bstan pa 'di thos nas/_
[\[263a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dmigs pa can kun nas nyon mongs pa spong ba'i bka' mchid dang /_ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa'i bar gyi bka' mchid 'di dag thams cad ni spros pa'i bka' mchid do/_/rnam pa 
[\[263a.3\]]tha dad pa'i bka' mchid do/_/dmigs pa'i bka' mchid de/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i tog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na de lta bu'i dmigs pa can gyi bka' mchid ma mchis so/_/de lta bu'i dmigs pa can gyi bka' mchid 
[\[263a.4\]]mi gda' ste/_bcom ldan 'das de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dag pa'i bka' mchid mi thos pa'i tshul gyis thos so/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i bka' mchid mi thos pa'i tshul gyis thos so/_/mi dmigs pa'i bka' mchid mi thos pa'i tshul gyis thos so/_/don dam par 
[\[263a.5\]]chos thams cad shin tu ma skyes pa'i bka' mchid mi thos pa'i tshul gyis thos so/_/don dam par chos thams cad shin tu ma byung ba'i bka' mchid mi thos pa'i tshul gyis thos so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ni 
[\[263a.6\]]shin tu dka' ba mdzad de/_gang 'di snyed kyi nyam nga ba bzod cing gang thams cad don dam par shin tu ma skyes pa la/_chos rnams rab 'bring tha mar ston par mdzad do/_/'di lta ste/_don dam par na shin tu ma skyes pa dang /_ma byung ba dang /_dngos po ma mchis pa'i rnam pa ste/_bcom ldan 
[\[263a.7\]]'das de ltar don dam par chos thams cad rnam pa gcig las sems can rnams kyi dmigs pa gzhom pa'i slad du mi ston pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa du mar chos ston to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams kyis/_lha'i me tog dang /_spos dang /_bdug pa dang /_phreng 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_chos gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_rnam par rgyal ba'i ba don dang bcas pa'i bla res/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la bla na med pa'i 
[\[263b.2\]]mchod pa byas nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal bdag cag 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che dang ldan pa zhes bya bar 'dong ngo /_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu dag da de'i dus la bab par shes na deng shig_/byang chub 
[\[263b.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis smras pa/_'jam dpal ci khyod da mi 'gro'am/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig go/_/de bzhin du sangs rgyas thams cad ni sangs rgyas gcig go/_/de bzhin 
[\[263b.4\]]du chos thams cad ni chos gcig go/_/de bzhin du sems can thams cad ni sems can gcig go/_/de dag 'di las khyad par ci yod na/_rigs kyi bu bdag der 'gro/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis smras pa/_'jam dpal
