[\[263b.5\]]ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig_/'jam dpal ji ltar sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas gcig_/'jam dpal ji ltar chos thams cad chos gcig_/'jam dpal ji ltar sems can thams cad sems can gcig_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_
[\[263b.6\]]rigs kyi bu dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ni zhing ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_don dam par shin tu ma skyes pa'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu dag sangs rgyas thams cad ni sangs rgyas ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_don dam par na shin tu ma byung ba'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu dag chos 
[\[263b.7\]]thams cad ni chos ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_don dam par na shin tu dngos po med pa'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu dag sems can thams cad ni sems can ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_don dam par na shin tu kun nas ma byung ba'i phyir ro/_/de nas de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]pas ci nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i tog gi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar lhag chad med par snang ba de lta bur bsam pa rab tu rdzogs nas de 'dra bar ting 
[\[264a.2\]]nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i tog de dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rin po che dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de'ang mthong ste/_byang 
[\[264a.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 'di snyam du 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che dang ldan pa zhes bya bar phyin par sems so/_/de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[264a.4\]]gshegs pa rin po che'i tog gi kha dog dang dbyibs ci 'dra ba bzhin du mthong ngo /_/nyan thos chen po de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin snyam du sems so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa 
[\[264a.5\]]la rin po che'i tog yin snyam pa byed nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che dang ldan pa zhes bgyi ba 'dir sus phyin par bgyis/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag khyed sus khrid/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[264a.6\]]sems dpa' chen po de dag gis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bdag cag khrid do/_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyed ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ma 'ongs ma song ba'i tshul gyis phyin par byas so/_/de nas 'jam 
[\[264a.7\]]dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu dag khyed gang du khrid/_gang nas khrid par byas pa mnyam par zhog la ltos shig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis rang rang gi ting nge 'dzin 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]la mnyam par gzhag ste bltas na/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de nyid nas bdag nyid gang du yang ma g.yos par mthong ste/_ngo mtshar du gyur rmad du gyur nas/_'di ltar bdag cag stan 'di nyid las ma 'phags par 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che dang ldan pa zhes bya bar yang phyin pa 
[\[264b.2\]]snyam byed de/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyi rlabs med pa'i tshul gyis byin gyi rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab po zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/de dag gis yang smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyis kyang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byin gyi rlabs 'di thob par 
[\[264b.3\]]gyur cig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag 'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' ni sa'i snod dang /_shing gi snod dang /_khar ba'i snod dang /_zangs kyi snod dang /_dngul gyi snod dang /_gser 
[\[264b.4\]]gyi snod dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_a mra gar ba dang /_spug dang /_dung g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang /_mu tig dmar po'i snod la sogs pa'i nang du zhugs par gyur pa rigs kyi bu dag kun rdzob tu snod la tha dad pa yod mod kyi nam mkha' 
[\[264b.5\]]la tha dad yod pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_don dam par na nam mkha' shin tu dngos po med pa'i phyir te/_de bzhin du rigs kyi bu dag don dam par chos thams cad shin tu ma skyes/_ma byung /_dngos po med mod kyi/_'jig rten kun rdzob kyi tha snyad kyis tha snyad du 'dogs shing rab tu 'jog 
[\[264b.6\]]ste/_'di ni gzugs so/_/'di ni tshor ba'o/_/'di ni 'du shes so/_/'di dag ni 'du byed rnams so/_/'di ni rnam par shes pa'o/_/'di dag ni skye mched rnams so/_/'di dag ni khams rnams so/_/'di ni sangs rgyas dkon mchog go/_/'di ni chos dkon mchog go/_/'di ni dge 'dun dkon mchog go/_/
[\[264b.7\]]'di ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'o/_/'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'o/_/'di ni bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'o/_/'di dag ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams so/_/'di dag ni mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams so/_/'di dag ni sems can dmyal ba'o/_/'di dag ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas so/_/'di dag ni 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul lo/_/'di dag ni lha ma yin no/_/'di dag ni mi'o/_/'di dag ni lha'o/_/'di dag ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'o/_/'di dag ni gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'o/_/'di dag ni gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i lha'o/_/'di ni 'dod pa'i khams so/_/'di ni gzugs kyi khams so/_/
[\[265a.2\]]'di ni gzugs med pa'i khams so/_/'di ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa'o/_/'di ni ngag gis legs par spyod pa'o/_/'di ni yid kyis legs par spyod pa'o/_/'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/'di ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/'di ni brtson 
[\[265a.3\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/'di ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/'di ni thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/'di ni smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/'di ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/'di ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/'di ni sa bcu dang /_
[\[265a.4\]]dbang bcu dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bcu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_ji tsam du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /_ji tsam du rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog 
[\[265a.5\]]dang ldan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang /_ji tsam du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /_ji tsam du de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang /_ji tsam du 'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas pa'i chos 
[\[265a.6\]]thams cad dang /_ji tsam du 'khor ba dang /_mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_ji tsam du smra ba dang /_smra bar bya ba dang /_shes pa dang /_shes byar tha snyad 'dogs pa dang /_'brel par 'jug pa de tsam du 'jig rten kun rdzob kyi tha snyad 'jug go/_/don dam par na spyod pa thams cad med par gyur pa ste/_de ci'i 
[\[265a.7\]]phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu don dam par na chos thams cad shin tu ma skyes pa/_ma byung ba/_dngos po med pa'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la yang shin tu rgya che ba/_shin tu khyad par dang ldan pa'i mchod pa byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_tshig 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad 'di lta bu'i seng ge'i sgra/_bye brag tu 'phags pa'i sgra/_khyu 
[\[265b.2\]]mchog gi sgra/_skyes bu chen po'i sgra/_yang dag pa'i sgra/_de kho na'i sgra/_mi dmigs pa'i sgra/_don dam pa'i sgra/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'byin par gyur cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dga' mgu rangs nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[265b.3\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi gan nas slar dong ste/_de dag phyogs bcur song nas mi dmigs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po go cha med pa'i tshul gyis bgos nas don dam pa dang /_kun rdzob kyi bden pa gnyis la gnas 
[\[265b.4\]]pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid mi ston pa'i tshul gyis ston to/_/chos 'dul ba 'di nyid la sems can thams cad 'dul zhing ston to/_/mi 'jog pa'i tshul gyis rab tu 'god do/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan de la 'dug ste ma langs par 'di 'dra ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste/_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[265b.5\]]des 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gtsug tor gyi gseb spyi bo'i gtsug nas sems can thams cad kyi dmigs pa dang /_mi shes pa sel ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung ste/_de byung nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam thams cad snang bar byas so/_/'od zer snang ba 
[\[265b.6\]]des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas chos bshad pa/_kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa gnyis la brten pa mi thos pa'i tshul gyis thos so/_/'di ltar phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 
[\[265b.7\]]na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'od zer gyi snang ba de las lha'i me tog gi char 'bebs pa'i sprin byung ngo /_/lha'i bdug pa'i char 'bebs pa'i sprin byung ngo /_/lha'i spos kyi char 'bebs pa'i sprin byung ngo /_/lha'i phreng 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]ba'i char 'bebs pa'i sprin byung ngo /_/lha'i byug pa'i char 'bebs pa'i sprin byung ngo /_/lha'i phye ma'i char 'bebs pa'i sprin byung ngo /_/lha'i gos kyi char 'bebs pa'i sprin byung ngo /_/lha'i gdugs kyi char 'bebs pa'i sprin byung ngo /_/lha'i rgyal mtshan gyi char 'bebs 
[\[266a.2\]]pa'i sprin byung ngo /_/lha'i ba dan gyi char 'bebs pa'i sprin byung ngo /_/lha'i rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan gyi char 'bebs pa'i sprin byung ngo /_/lha'i bla re'i char 'bebs pa'i sprin gyi bar du byung ngo /_/lha'i me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_
[\[266a.3\]]phye ma dang /_chos gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan dang /_bla re'i char 'bebs pa'i sprin byung ngo /_/rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/_bla na med pa'i bde ba chen po thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i lha'i me tog dang /_
[\[266a.4\]]bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_chos gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan dang /_bla re'i char gyi sprin rab tu gtong ngo /_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/_langs 
[\[266a.5\]]nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la lan brgya stong du mar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bskor ba byas nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba 'di nas slar song ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[266a.6\]]kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi 'byung gnas 'di zung shig_/rgyas par gyis shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos 
[\[266a.7\]]kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag gis gzung ba ni lags na/_rgyas par bgyid ni mi nus so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das don dam par dmigs pa la mngon par zhen pa'i sems can shin tu mang ste/_rdzas la mngon par zhen pa nas dngos po'i bar la mngon par zhen te/_log par 'dzin pa 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]de las dbye ba shin tu dka'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis byin gyis mi rlob 
[\[266b.2\]]pa'i tshul gyis byin gyis brlabs so/_/kun dga' bo khyod rkyen tsam gyis shig_/kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chung ngu na nyan par 'gyur ba de dag ci 'dra bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[266b.3\]]kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par bstan pa/_de kho na bstan pa/_mi dmigs pa bstan pa/_don dam pa bstan pa/_mi ston pa'i tshul gyis bstan to/_/bstan pa de yang bsam gyis mi khyab/_dpag tu med de/_kun dga' bo de bzhin 
[\[266b.4\]]du gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las chung ngu na yi ge 'bru gcig tsam yang mi nyan pa'i tshul gyis mnyan na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab cing dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[266b.5\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di kun rdzob dang /_don dam pa'i bden pa bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_
[\[266b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_'khor de dag thams cad dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags 
[\[266b.7\]]pa kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya pra b+hA dang /_dzi na mi tra dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de d+harma tA shI la la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus nas gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]{D180}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sarba d+harmA pra br-it+ti nir de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa chos thams cad 'byung ba med par bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 
[\[267a.2\]]'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi bya rgod 'phungs pa'i ri la/_dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag bcu gnyis 'dus pa yang 'di lta ste/_byang 
[\[267a.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bkod pa rab tu brgyan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer thogs pa med par shin tu sbyangs pa'i 'od kyi gzi brjid 'bar ba dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[267a.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri rab zom la rnam par spyod pa'i rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bas rab tu 'dzum pa'i 'od dri ma med pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i 'od zil gyis gnon pa'i 'od 'phro dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[267a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po go 'phang dam pa dri ma med pa thob pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid 'gro ba la 'phro ba'i pad ma rab tu rgyas pa'i lus dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi skad sgrogs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[267a.6\]]dpa' chen po seng ge'i rgyal po 'gro ba rnam par rol pa'i blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gser mdog gzi brjid dri ma med pa rnam par dag pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po reg na 'jam zhing gzhon pa'i lus dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[267a.7\]]dpa' chen po gser gyi rgyan ltar mtshan rab tu rgyas pa'i lus dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer bcus bdud rab tu 'dul ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod lam zhi bas nye bar zhi bar 'gro ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]chen po gzugs 'dzin mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i sgra dbyangs skad sgrogs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la dbang phyug gi dbang gi rtsal gyis spyod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[267b.2\]]dpa' chen po gzi brjid dri ma med pa'i lus dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis dang yang thabs cig go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng 
[\[267b.3\]]ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro bas/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de lta bu de mthong nas/_stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_tshigs su bcad de zhu ba zhus 
[\[267b.4\]]pa/_gso med srog med bdag med chos kyi rnams/_/mgon po mtha' yas grags [{]mangs [,]mang [}]bshad du gsol/_/'khor 'di 'di 'dra dam pa mchog lags te/_/zhi ba rtag zhi rtag tu nye bar zhi/_/lta ba'i rnam pa ji ltar byang chub lags/_/khro dang phrag dog nga rgyal bral ba dang /_/'dod 
[\[267b.5\]]chags dngos bral ji ltar byang chub lags/_/mgon po mtha' yas grags [{]mangs [,]mang [}]bshad du gsol/_/skyon bral thar pa gang la ma mchis pa'i/_/'du byed khams kyang ji ltar byang chub lags/_/ji ltar chos rnams gnyis su ma mchis pa/_/rgyal ba thugs rje mnga' bas bshad 
[\[267b.6\]]du gsol/_/chos rnams shin tu rnam par grol gyur cing /_/mya ngan 'das dang grol mnyam ji ltar lags/_/chags pa ma chags nam mkha'i tshul 'dra zhing /_/'ching bar mi 'gyur gang lags mgon po gsung /_/ka la ping ka tshangs pa lha yi gsung /_/'od la dri med gser gyi 
[\[267b.7\]]mdog mnga' ba/_/yid 'ong 'od gsal yon tan mchog mnga' bas/_/chos nyid rtag par tshul gcig bka' stsal gsol/_/sgrib pa ji ltar byang chub mnyam pa lags/_/byang chub rang bzhin ji ltar chos rnams lags/_/chos dang chos min ji ltar 'dra ba lags/_/de gnyis 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]ji ltar nam mkha' mtshungs pa lags/_/chos rnams grangs dang bgrang ba ma mchis shing /_/zhing dang mnyam par de dag ji ltar 'gyur/_/skyon bral byang chub de la ma mchis shing /_/de la kun mkhyen ma mchis ji ltar lags/_/bgyi dang bgyid dang bgyi ba'i rang bzhin dang /_/
[\[268a.2\]]gzung dang 'dzin pa nam yang ma mchis la/_/sems can rnams kyang rtag par ma mchis shing /_/de la chos spyod ji ltar ma mchis 'gyur/_/de la tshul khrims bzod pa ma mchis shing /_/tshul khrims 'chal b.ra'ang de la ma mchis la/_/bsam gtan shes rab de la ma mchis shing /_/
[\[268a.3\]]rtogs dang ma rtogs ma mchis ji ltar lags/_/chos rnams dri med dag pa ji ltar lags/_/nam mkha' 'dra zhing ci yang ma lags la/_/nam yang sems kyi rang bzhin mi dmigs shing /_/chos rnams sems med ji ltar lags par 'gyur/_/yongs su shes bgyi ji ltar ma mchis shing /_/
[\[268a.4\]]sgom dang mngon bgyi mchis pa ma lags la/_/gang du'ang de la spang ba ma mchis pas/_/sems can ji ltar nam mkha'i dbyings 'dra lags/_/gang la chos nyid gcig gi tshul gyur pa/_/de la rang bzhin nam yang ma mchis la/_/skye ba nam yang de la ma mchis pa'i/_/chos kyi tshul ni 
[\[268a.5\]]mgon pos bshad du gsol/_/de la slob dang dgra bcom ma mchis te/_/rang rgyal ji ltar mchis pa ma lags shing /_/byang chub tshol ba'i chos kyang ma mchis la/_/song dang 'ongs pa ma mchis ji ltar lags/_/gang la gnas dang rten pa ma mchis shing /_/'ong dang 'gro ba dag kyang ma mchis 
[\[268a.6\]]la/_/chos rnams 'gro dang 'ong dang bral bas na/_/ri bzhin mi g.yo brtan gnas ji ltar lags/_/de la ji ltar 'du shes gzugs ma mchis/_/gzugs kyi rang bzhin ji ltar byang chub lags/_/gzugs dang byang chub ji ltar gnyis ma mchis/_/dri med mchog mnga' rgyal bas de 
[\[268a.7\]]dag gsungs/_/sangs rgyas gang la ma mchis chos dag dang /_/dge 'dun gang la ma mchis de slad du/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun mchog gi rnams/_/de dag gcig gi tshul du ji ltar 'gyur/_/gang la stong dang mtshan nyid ma mchis shing /_/'du dang 'bral ba de la ma mchis la/_/
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]chos rnams ming dang ming med bral ba ste/_/sgra brjod brag ca 'dra ba ji ltar lags/_/skye dang skye med gang la ma mchis shing /_/gang la skyon bral mya ngan 'das pa dang /_/'khor ba dag kyang de la ma mchis pas/_/chos rnams thams cad tshul gcig ji ltar 'gyur/_/lha dang klu dag de la ma 
[\[268b.2\]]mchis shing /_/gnod sbyin mi'am ci dang 'dre dag dang /_/sems can dmyal ba de la ma mchis shing /_/ji ltar de la sems can lam ma mchis/_/mgon pos chos rnams gang gsungs tshul dag dang /_/sdig pa'i blo can mu stegs gang smra ba/_/de dag gnyis su ma mchis ji ltar 
[\[268b.3\]]lags/_/yi ge kun la gcig tu ji ltar 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/_rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis ji tsam du 'jig rten thams cad 
[\[268b.4\]]kyis yid ches par dka' ba'i dri ba 'di dris pa ngo mtshar che'o/_/rigs kyi bu chog mod khyod kyis 'di dris pas ci zhig bya/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa stong pa nyid kyi lta ba can/_mtshan ma med pa'i lta ba can/_smon pa med pa'i lta ba can/_skye ba med pa'i lta ba can/_
[\[268b.5\]]dngos po med pa'i lta ba can/_mtshan nyid med pa'i lta ba can/_sangs rgyas kyi lta ba can/_byang chub kyi lta ba can dag gi gnas ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu chos bstan pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa'i mdun du mi brjod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[268b.6\]]rnams thams cad kyi thams cad du rgyun chad du 'ong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi byang chub las kyang nyams par 'gyur srid do/_/rtag pa'am chad par yang lhung du 'ong ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pas kyang ci las dgongs te chos bstan mi shes srid do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[268b.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol/_ma byung ba'i dus na/_byang chub sems dpa' stong pa nyid kyi lta ba can/_mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i lta ba can/_smon pa ma mchis pa'i lta ba 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]can/_skye ba ma mchis pa'i lta ba can/_mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i lta ba can/_sangs rgyas kyi lta ba can/_byang chub kyi lta ba can dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_gang yang stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma ma mchis pa la rtog pa dang /_smra ba la dga' ba dang /_smra 
[\[269a.2\]]ba'i tshig la chags pa dang /_yi ges dag par 'dzin pa dang /_tshig gi las la gzhol ba dang /_legs par brjod pa gces par 'dzin pa dang /_ming gces par 'dzin pa gang 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pas chos bstan pa/_yi ge ma mchis shing tshig dang bral 
[\[269a.3\]]ba 'di thos na/_lta ba de dag spong zhing /_ji ltar mos pa'i sems can rnams la de ltar mos pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro/_/de dag thabs mkhas pa la bslabs pas/_'dod pa chung ba'i tshig gi rgyud kyang rjod la/_des dag par yang mi sems/_cho ga 'tshal ba'i tshig gi rgyud rjod la/_des 
[\[269a.4\]]dag par yang mi sems/_sdom pa'i tshig gi rgyud kyang rjod la des dag par yang mi sems/_'du 'dzi'i mi bsngags pa yang rjod la/_chos thams cad rab tu dben par yang mos par 'gyur ro/_/gcig pur dga' ba dang /_'du 'dzi ma mchis pa'i bsngags pa yang rjod la/_des 
[\[269a.5\]]dag par yang mi sems/_byang chub kyi sems kyi bsngags pa yang rjod la/_sems kyi rang bzhin yang byang chub tu 'tshal bar 'gyur/_shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo rnams kyi bsngags pa yang rjod la/_chos thams cad shin tu rgyas par yang 'tshal bar 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[269a.6\]]tshig gi rgyud kyang rjod la/_nyan thos dang /_rang rgyal ba dang /_sangs rgyas rnams tha dad par yang mi lta/_sbyin pa'i bsngags pa yang rjod la/_sbyin pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyang de dag gis rtogs par 'gyur/_tshul khrims kyi bsngags pa yang rjod la/_rang bzhin gyi tshul khrims kyang 
[\[269a.7\]]de dag gis rtog par 'gyur/_bzod pa'i bsngags pa yang rjod la chos thams cad kyi zad pa'i chos dang /_byang ba'i chos dang /_mi skye ba'i chos nyid kyang de dag gis shin tu mthong bar 'gyur/_brtson 'grus kyi bsngags pa yang rjod la/_chos thams cad la btsal ba ma mchis pa dang /_
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]rtsom pa ma mchis pa yang rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/_bsam gtan dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi sgo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis mngon par bsgrub pa yang ston la/_chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mnyam par bzhag par yang 'tshal bar 'gyur/_shes rab kyi bsngags pa 
[\[269b.2\]]rnam pa stong yang rjod la/_shes rab dang /_shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin yang de dag gis shin tu rig par 'gyur/_'dod chags kyi skyon yang ston la/_chos gang yang 'dod chags par mi mthong /_zhe sdang gi skyon yang ston la/_chos gang yang zhe sdang bar mi mthong /_gti mug gi 
[\[269b.3\]]skyon yang ston la/_chos thams cad gti mug gi sgrib pa dang bral bar yang mos par 'gyur/_sems can rnams la sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du mchi ba'i 'jigs pa yang ston la/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_
[\[269b.4\]]gshin rje'i 'jig rten kyang mi dmigs te/_de dag sems can ji ltar mos pa dag la/_de ltar mos pa'i chos ston cing /_gang 'di stong pa nyid la mos par tshul gcig pa la mos par 'gyur/_de bzhin du mtshan ma ma mchis pa la mos pa dang /_smon pa ma mchis pa la mos pa dang /_skye ba 
[\[269b.5\]]ma mchis pa la mos pa dang /_dngos po ma mchis pa la mos pa dang /_mtshan nyid ma mchis pa la mos par tshul gcig par mos par 'gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du thabs mkhas pa'i tshig gang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang 
[\[269b.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ma lags shing /_gzhan du na zab mo la mos pa dang /_tshul gcig pa la mos pa'i yul du 'gyur ba'i thabs mkhas pa'i tshig de dag bshad du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[269b.7\]]dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu de bas na legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_don 'di ngas khyod la bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar bgyi'o zhes/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]bas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/'dod chags zhe sdang 'khrug pa med tshul du/_/gang zhig byang chub mchog tu 'tshang rgya bar/_/'dod pas chos kun 'dod chags rang bzhin 
[\[270a.2\]]zhes/_/de ltar shes na de ni rgyal bar 'gyur/_/'dod chags mi dmigs de bzhin zhe sdang dang /_/gti mug 'di la nam yang mi dmigs te/_/chos rnams kun kyang nam mkha' 'dra ba zhes/_/de ltar gang shes de ni rgyal bar 'gyur/_/lta dang lta med gnyis ka tshul gcig ste/_/
[\[270a.3\]]mnyam dang mi mnyam de bzhin mnyam pa yin/_/sangs rgyas med cing chos dang dge 'dun med/_/de ltar sus shes de ni mkhas pa yin/_/skyes bu la la ji ltar rmi lam na/_/byang chub sangs rgyas 'gro ba 'dul rmis na/_/de la byang chub yod min sems can med/_/de 'dra'i dngos nyid chos 
[\[270a.4\]]'di thams cad do/_/byang chub phyir zhugs gang yang ma brnyes te/_/gang zhig ma brnyes nam yang de mi brnyes/_/rig dang ma rig gnyis ka tshul gcig ste/_/de ltar shes na de ni rgyal bar 'gyur/_/sems can rang bzhin byang chub nyid du gsungs/_/byang chub rang bzhin sems can thams cad 
[\[270a.5\]]de/_/sems can rnams dang byang chub gnyis ma yin/_/de ltar shes na skyes bu'i mchog tu 'gyur/_/ji ltar skyes bu sgyu ma bslabs pa yis/_/sgyu ma rnam mang gzugs dag sprul byas na/_/snang ba yin yang de la gang yang med/_/rnam par rmongs pa'i sems can rnam par 'grang /_/'dod 
[\[270a.6\]]chags zhe sdang rtag par mnyam pa ste/_/gti mug sgyu ma gnyis kyang rtag par mnyam/_/byis pa bdag cag zhe sdang rmongs shes sems/_/gti mug de dag ngan 'gror 'dong bar 'gyur/_/gang la 'dod chags zhe sdang gnyis med cing /_/gti mug gang la nam yang med pas na/_/chos nyid 
[\[270a.7\]]sgyu 'dra rnam par brtags byas shing /_/byis pa rnams ni nyon mongs mes kyang gdungs/_/gang la nyon mongs sems can med pa dang /_/sangs rgyas nam yang yod pa ma yin pa/_/ma skyes chos shes rnam par brtags byas shing /_/bdag cag sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes byis pa smra/_/sangs 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]rgyas yod min sangs rgyas chos med de/_/nam yang sems can med par sus mthong zhing /_/nam mkha' 'dra bar chos nyid sus shes pa/_/de ni myur du skyes bu gtso bor 'gyur/_/byang chub su 'dod de la byang chub med/_/sa dang gnam ltar byang chub mchog las ring /_/sgyu 'drar chos 
[\[270b.2\]]nyid gang gis shes gyur pa/_/de ni myur du sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur/_/su zhig tshul khrims rnam rtog de la ni/_/tshul khrims med de mthong na tshul khrims min/_/tshul khrims 'chal dang tshul khrims mtshan nyid gcig_/de ltar shes na de ni mgon por 'gyur/_/ji ltar skyes bu 
[\[270b.3\]]la la rmi lam na/_/'dod la spyod pa dga' ba myong ba'i nyams/_/gti mug rmongs pas bud med rnam par brtags/_/de na bud med gang yang yod pa min/_/tshul khrims 'chal dang tshul khrims byis pa rnams/_/rmongs pas yang dag ma yin yongs su brtags/_/de la tshul khrims 
[\[270b.4\]]'chal med tshul khrims med/_/de ltar shes na de ni mgon por 'gyur/_/sgra yi rang bzhin yongs su mi shes pas/_/byis pa'i blo can 'di dag ming la chags/_/gang gis ming de ming med shes gyur na/_/de ni bzod pa'i stobs mchog thob par 'gyur/_/byang chub dam bcas sems can 
[\[270b.5\]]mang ba ste/_/de dag tshig gis gzhan la de skad brjod/_/tshig gis dag 'dzin nan tan yod pa min/_/de dag byang chub kun nas khebs par gnas/_/spyod lam dag dang 'khrul la chags gyur cing /_/tshig dang smra la dga' zhing mi mkhas te/_/chos kyi rang bzhin yongs su ma shes na/_/
[\[270b.6\]]tshig gi dag pas byang chub 'tshang mi rgya/_/stong nyid chos dag yongs su rjod byed cing /_/rtsod la dga' zhing 'thab pas sdang ba'i sems/_/sdom med ngan sems byed pa de dag la/_/sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub ga la yod/_/ngan sems bzod gnyis tshul gcig rang bzhin zhes/_/de ltar 
[\[270b.7\]]shes par byas shing khro ba spang /_/sems can rang bzhin yongs su mi shes pas/_/byis pa'i blo can khro ba skyed par byed/_/sems can thams cad bdag la dben pa ste/_/rgyal ba sems can 'grel 'gyur smon ces zer/_/de dag glengs pa tsam gyis khror 'gyur zhing /_/zhe sdang 'chang bas 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]de dag tshig mi ster/_/'thab la dga' zhing nyes pa tshol byed la/_/bzod pa'i bsngags pa'ang rtag par de dag rjod/_/chos rnams thams cad stong pa nyid ces smra/_/nga rgyal khengs pas 'khrul pa rjes su rtog_/zas la chags shing ma rig mdud pas bcings/_/nyin 
[\[271a.2\]]mtshan dag tu 'dod pa'i yon tan sems/_/de dag lhas dang grong khyer grong song zhing /_/sems can mang pos yongs su dgrol zhes zer/_/'gro ba kun la snying rje bdag la yod/_/'jig rten kun la phan sems de bzhin te/_/de dag zhe sdang sems kyis de lta bu'i/_/chos nyid 'tshe 
[\[271a.3\]]ba'i tshul can rjod par byed/_/'tshe ba snying rje gcig tu 'dus pa ni/_/nam yang yod par ma mthong ma thos te/_/phan tshun khro bar byed dang ldan gyur cing /_/tshad med tshe yi zhing du smon par byed/_/gang gA'i klung gi bye ma ji snyed par/_/brdeg cing spyo ba 'thob pa'i gnas yod kyi/_/bzod pa dam pa 
[\[271a.4\]]yongs su ma bsgoms par/_/rgyal ba de dag zhing du de mi 'gro/_/zhing rnams zhing min gang gis shes gyur cing /_/zhing rnams thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin zhes/_/zhing gi yon tan rlom sems gang med pa/_/skyes bu khyu mchog zhing du de 'gro'o/_/thams cad nyes byas bdag gis bzod par 
[\[271a.5\]]bya/_/rgyal ba'i sras la ston par sems shes smra/_/ston pa'i 'du shes can la khro yod pa/_/ngas ni nam yang ma mthong ma thos so/_/bslang ba'i grong dang mdza' ba'i grong chags shing /_/gcig la gcig ni spyod pa sun yang 'byin/_/'di ni bdag gis smin bya'i skal yin gyis/_/su yang der 
[\[271a.6\]]ma 'gro zhes de dag zer/_/bdag dang 'dra ba de 'dra gang yang med/_/de la spyod pa rnam dag med ces zer/_/mi mkhas de ni byang chub 'thob mi 'gyur/_/de la don du 'gyur ba'ang gang yang med/_/nyin par lan gsum mtshan yang de bzhin te/_/byang chub sems dpa' dag la spyi bos thud/_/de 
[\[271a.7\]]dag 'khrul pa gang la'ang brtag mi bya/_/rtag par spyod pa ci bder spyod du tshud/_/'dod pa'i yon tan dga' bar spyod mthong na/_/de yi 'khrul pa gang yang brtag mi bya/_/byang chub spyod pa mtha' yas yon tan gyis/_/de yang ma 'ongs dus na byang chub 'thob/_/lan cig kho nar rgyal bar 'gyur 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]ba min/_/rigs pa'i rim dang bya ba'i rim gyis 'thob/_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig grangs mang du/_/go cha bgos pas 'thob kyi gzhan du min/_/rtog dang rnam rtog 'dod chags med pa ste/_/ngas kyang byang chub 'dod chags 'dra ba thob/_/nyon mongs yod min de dag yod mi 'gyur/_/
[\[271b.2\]]de ltar yid ches bzod pa dam pa 'thob/_/yi ge med pa'i chos la zhugs gyur cing /_/sgra rnams thams cad sgra med blta bar bya/_/gang zhig de 'dra'i chos la yid ches pa/_/de la 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug med/_/'dod chags byang chub lhag chad med par mnyam/_/de gnyis yi ge med par 
[\[271b.3\]]rtogs par gyis/_/de ni gnyis ka'i ming tsam byung ba ste/_/yi ger brjod pa de la ci yang med/_/sgra rnams thams cad sgra gcig rab shes na/_/sna tshogs su ni nam yang 'gyur ba med/_/nga yis gang bshad mu stegs de dag 'chad/_/de dag 'di 'dra'i chos nyid shes pa yin/_/chos rnams 'di dag skad kyis sgras 
[\[271b.4\]]brjod de/_/chos dang sgra ni de la dmigs pa med/_/chos nyid tshul gcig de la rab zhugs na/_/bzod pa bla med mchog ni 'thob par 'gyur/_/khro dang bzod dang 'dod pa'i yon tan dang /_/mi bzod mi rtag rnam par mi rtag ste/_/skye med de ltar rab tu shes gyur na/_/skyon med sems can 
[\[271b.5\]]mchog tu de dag 'gyur/_/lho byang shar nub phyogs rnams thams cad kyi/_/gang gA'i klung gi bye ma ji snyed pa/_/skyes bu la las de blangs 'bru re nas/_/phyogs gcig zhing der rab tu dgod byas te/_/zhing rnams ji snyed byung ba de dag kun/_/rgyal ba rnams la rin chen bkang byas te/_/bskal 
[\[271b.6\]]pa bye ba mang por phul ba bas/_/mdo sde 'di bris bsod nams ches kyang mang /_/de la bsod nams grangs med 'phel bar 'gyur/_/byang chub don gnyer 'di la rab byung ba/_/de dag la ni mdo sde 'di gtad de/_/de dag bzod pa dam pa myur du 'thob/_/mtha' yas sgo yi mdo 'di su ston pa/_/
[\[271b.7\]]de la gzungs rnams mi ring nye bar gnas/_/mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig des 'thob ste/_/spobs dang blo rno'i yon tan 'thob par 'gyur/_/tshig la thogs pa'ang phye bas shes par 'gyur/_/so so yang dag rig kyang myur du 'thob/_/sangs rgyas mtha' yas spobs pa'i sbyin pa mdzad/_/rnam 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]pa mang por mdo sde mang po ston/_/tshul 'di gang gis shes gyur de dag ni/_/rang gis mdo sde mang po dran par 'gyur/_/zhing gi dam pa dag tu'ang de dag 'gro/_/song nas mgon po dag la mchod par byed/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i 
[\[272a.2\]]rtsal gyis 'gro bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa 'di thos pas sems can ji snyed cig gi don bgyis par gyur/_bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo /_/
[\[272a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das chos bstan pa 'di'i tshe/_sems can grangs ma mchis pa 'dus par gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das steng gi bar snang yang lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen pos ma gtams pa 
[\[272a.4\]]ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas kyang sems can mang pos chos 'di bstan pa thos so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/
[\[272a.5\]]rigs kyi bu chos bstan pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe lha'i bu stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob bo/_/gnod sbyin stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/klu stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug byang chub tu sems bskyed 
[\[272a.6\]]par gyur to/_/dge slong mngon pa'i nga rgyal can ma thob pa la thob par 'du shes pa lnga brgyas mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i chos bstan pa 'di thos nas/_chos thams cad ni tshul gcig go zhes bya bar yid ches par gyur te/_nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/
[\[272a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'di'i nang nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis kyis chos thams cad sgrib pa med par khong du chud nas/_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob bo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu chos bstan pa 'di ni phul du byung ba ste/_rigs kyi 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]bu ngas kyang sngon de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi drung du/_chos thams cad ni tshul gcig pa'o zhes bya bar khong du chud par gyur nas/_de'i 'og tu ngas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/_/rigs kyi bu pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams 
[\[272b.2\]]cad thob pa dang /_chos bstan pa 'di thos par mtshungs te/_rigs kyi bu tshul 'di rtogs na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba ngas bshad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu gal te byang chub sems dpas 
[\[272b.3\]]bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sbyin pa byin/_tshul khrims bsrungs/_bzod pa bsgrubs/_brtson 'grus brtsams/_bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag_/shes rab yang dag par blangs te gnas kyang /_chos kyi tshul 'di ma shes na dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad phyir zad 
[\[272b.4\]]par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu lhas byin dge ba'i rtsa ba de lta bu dang ldan par gyur pa la ltos/_rigs kyi bu lhas byin ni mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu dang ldan par gyur to/_/de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa de yang chos kyi tshul 'di ma shes pas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad yongs su chad nas/_
[\[272b.5\]]mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes te/_rigs kyi bu rnam grangs des kyang ji ltar chos kyi tshul 'di khong du ma chud pa rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba chad par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa shin tu bgrang ba las 'das pa/_tshad med 
[\[272b.6\]]pa/_yangs pa/_gzhal du med pa de'i pha rol de yi yang pha rol gcig gi dus na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab ltar mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen 
[\[272b.7\]]pa/_bla na med pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_lha dang /_mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dgu bcu rtsa dgur gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams de'i ming ni gser gyi 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]mdog 'od 'phro ba zhes bya bar gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni gser gyi rgyu las grub par gyur to/_/sems can rnams kyang gang 'di nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang /_theg pa gsum po 'di nyid kyis mya 
[\[273a.2\]]ngan las 'da' bar gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de'i nyan thos kyi tshogs dang po ni dge slong bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_khur bor ba/_rang gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid par kun tu sbyor ba/_yongs su zad pa/_bka' 
[\[273a.3\]]yang dag pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag gi tshogs su gyur to/_/tshogs gnyis pa ni dge slong bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bdun cu'i tshogs su gyur to/_/tshogs gsum pa ni dge slong bye ba khrag khrig drug cu'i tshogs su gyur to/_/tshogs bzhi pa ni dge slong bye ba 
[\[273a.4\]]khrag khrig brgya stong phrag lnga bcu thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_khur bor ba/_rang gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid par kun tu sbyor ba/_yongs su zad pa/_bka' yang dag pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag gi tshogs su gyur to/_/dge slong ma'i tshogs ni de'i 
[\[273a.5\]]nyis 'gyur du gyur to/_/dge bsnyen gyi tshogs dang /_dge bsnyen ma'i tshogs kyang de'i nyis 'gyur du gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyang de'i nyis 'gyur du gyur te/_thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa/_mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa dang ldan pa/_ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul mngon par 
[\[273a.6\]]bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/_sgo mtha' yas pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa/_phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba sha stag gi tshogs su gyur na/_byang chub sems dpa' theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa rnams kyi tshogs lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_der ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa 
[\[273a.7\]]yang tshad med par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de'i 'khor gyi tshogs ni tshad med par 'dus par gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi mdog 'od 'phro ba de na/_shing ngam ldum bu gang ci yod pa thams cad kyang rin po che'i rgyu las grub par gyur te/_shing 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]de dag las kyang 'di lta bu'i sgra gang 'di stong pa nyid kyi sgra dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i sgra dang /_smon pa med pa'i sgra dang /_skye ba med pa'i sgra dang /_'gag pa med pa'i sgra dang /_dngos po med pa'i sgra dang /_mtshan nyid med pa'i sgra dang /_de lta bu'i sgra dag byung bar gyur te/_sgra de dag byung bas 
[\[273b.2\]]sems can de dag gi sems rnam par grol bar gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo stong du dam pa'i chos gnas par gyur te/_de phyin chad sgra de dag kyang shing de dag las 'byung ba med par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[273b.3\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab ltar mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po de yang dge slong chos smra ba spyod pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba/_dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par bskos nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur to/_/de'i tshe dge slong spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba zhig kyang byung 
[\[273b.4\]]ste/_de ni tshul khrims kyi phung po shin tu dag pa dang ldan zhing /_'jig rten pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga thob par gyur te/_'dul ba'i sde snod la'ang shin tu byang bar gyur to/_/dge slong de ni dka' thub kyi mchog dang ldan pa ngan ngon la mos pa/_'khor gyi nang na spyod pa ste/_des gtsug 
[\[273b.5\]]lag khang cig brtsigs nas/_de na gnas shing de'i 'khor du gyur pa rnams kyang tshul khrims kyi phung po shin tu dag pa la bkod par gyur te/_sbyangs pa'i yon tan sdom pa la mos par gyur to/_/dge slong de ni brtson 'grus brtsams shing rtag par byang chub kyi sems la gnas par gyur 
[\[273b.6\]]to/_/byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang spyod lam de nyid la yang dag par bskul te/_dmigs pa can gyi lta ba la yang dag par bskul to/_/des 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa zhes bya bar 'dzin du btsud do/_/'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal zhes bya bar 'dzin du btsud do/_/'du 
[\[273b.7\]]byed thams cad bdag med pa zhes bya bar 'dzin du btsud do/_/dge slong de ni ting nge 'dzin la mkhas par gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mkhas pa ma yin zhing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan par gyur to/_/dge slong chos smra ba spyod pa rnam par dag pa de ni sems can rnams kyi 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]dbang po mchog dang tha ma shes pa la mkhas par gyur te/_de'i 'khor du gyur pa ji snyed pa de dag kyang sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom pa lhur len par gyur te/_mi dmigs pa'i bzod pa can thabs la mkhas pa dag tu gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de nas chos smra ba spyod pa rnam par 
[\[274a.2\]]dag pa 'khor dang bcas te/_dge slong spyod pa'i blo gros gang na gnas pa'i gtsug lag khang der phyin nas de na gnas par gyur te/_de gtsug lag khang de nas yang dang yang sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir grong du 'gro zhing /_de dag tu zas kyi bya ba byas nas phyir 'ongs par gyur to/_/
[\[274a.3\]]des de dag tu rigs brgya stong du ma dad par byas par gyur to/_/de'i 'khor ji snyed pa de dag kyang tshul la mkhas par gyur to/_/de dag kyang de dag tu dong zhing sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/de dag gis kyang srog chags brgya stong mang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[274a.4\]]tu bkod par gyur to/_/dge slong spyod pa'i blo gros kyi 'khor de dag ni bsam gtan lhur len cing /_grong dag tu yang 'khor bar mi 'dong ngo /_/de nas dge slong spyod pa'i blo gros kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag la ma dad pa'i sems bskyed nas des gaN DI rdungs te/_dge slong 
[\[274a.5\]]gi dge 'dun bsdus nas dam tshig byas pa bdag cag gi nang nas su yang rung ste/_sus kyang grong du 'gro bar mi bya'o/_/khyed ni shes bzhin med par spyod pa yin te/_nyung ngu smra ba ma yin gyis/_khyod grong du dong bas kyang ci zhig bya ste/_dgon pa la gnas pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang zhing 
[\[274a.6\]]bsngags pa yin gyis/_khyod grong du ma 'dong bar bsam gtan gyi bde bas rnam par spyod cig ces bsgo'o/_/de dag gis de zer ba ltar ma mnyan te/_yang grong dag tu 'dong bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de nas dge slong de dag nam grong nas phyir 'ongs par gyur pa de'i tshe/_dge slong spyod pa'i blo 
[\[274a.7\]]gros kyis yang gaN DI brdungs nas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdus te/_'di skad du gal te da phan chad khyed grong du 'dong dang /_khyed gtsug lag khang 'di na ma gnas shig ces bsgo'o/_/rigs kyi bu de nas dge slong chos smra ba spyod pa rnam par dag pas dge slong de'i sems bsrung ba'i phyir/_
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]rang gi 'khor rnams bos te/_'di skad du khyed grong du su yang ma 'dong shig ces smras so/_/de nas de'i tshe dge slong de dag gis sems can gang ji snyed cig smin par byas pa de dag dge slong de dag dang /_ma phrad pas shin tu mi dga' bar yang gyur/_dge ba'i rtsa ba yang yongs su 'grib 
[\[274b.2\]]par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de nas dge slong chos smra ba spyod pa rnam par dag pa zla ba gsum po de dag 'das nas/_gtsug lag khang de nas gtsug lag khang gzhan du 'phos nas/_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_ljongs dang /_yul dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu 'gro zhing /_
[\[274b.3\]]sems can dag la chos ston par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de nas dge slong spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/_chos smra ba spyod pa rnam par dag pa yang dang yang grong du 'gro ba yang mthong /_de'i 'khor du spyod lam tha mal pa can du mthong nas/_des yang de la ma dad pa'i sems bskyed par gyur te/_dge 
[\[274b.4\]]slong 'di ni tshul khrims 'chal pa can/_tshul khrims log pa can te/_'dis byang chub ga la 'thob/_dge slong 'di'i byang chub ni rgyang ring ngo /_/dge slong 'di ni 'du 'dzir gnas gnas pa'o zhes 'gro ba mang po dag la de skad brjod do/_/rigs kyi bu de nas dus gzhan zhig na/_dge slong spyod 
[\[274b.5\]]pa'i blo gros de 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur nas/_de de ltar 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang /_las de'i rnam par smin pas mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung ngo /_/de bskal pa bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur sems can dmyal ba chen por sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong bar gyur 
[\[274b.6\]]nas tshe rabs drug cur mi snyan par brjod pa thob par gyur to/_/tshe rabs stong phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis su rab tu byung ba las phyir babs par gyur to/_/las kyi sgrib pa de nyid kyi lhag mas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od 'phro dri ma med pa'i 
[\[274b.7\]]gsung rab la rab tu byung bar gyur to/_/de rab tu byung nas lo bye ba brgya stong phrag drug tu mgo'i thod la me 'bar ba ltar rnam par spyod kyang /_'thun pa'i bzod pa tsam yang ma thob ste/_tshe rabs brgya stong mang por dbang po rtul por gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/_dge slong chos 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]smra ba spyod pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin par sems na/_de ltar mi blta ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa mi sgul ba ni de'i tshe de'i dus na/_dge slong chos smra ba spyod pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/_
[\[275a.2\]]dge slong chos smra ba spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na/_de ltar mi blta ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nga ni dge slong chos smra ba spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya bar gyur to/_/nga yang de lta bu'i thabs phra mos de la ma dad pa'i sems bskyed de/_las kyi sgrib pa mngon par 'du byas 
[\[275a.3\]]pas sems can dmyal ba dag tu lhung bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar phra ba ni las kyi sgrib pa yin gyis/_rigs kyi bu su las kyi sgrib pa de lta bu mi 'dod pa de dag gis gzhan gyi spyod pa la khong khro bar mi bya'o/_/de'i spyod pa thams cad la yid ches par bya'o/_/'di snyam du pha rol gyi 
[\[275a.4\]]sems ni bdag gis mi shes te/_sems can gyi spyod pa ni shes par dka'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/_/don gyi dbang de gzigs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pas 'di skad du chos ston te/_gang zag gis gang zag la tshod gzung bar mi bya'o/_/gang zag gis gang zag la tshod 
[\[275a.5\]]bzung na rma 'byung bar 'gyur te/_nga'am gzhan yang nga dang 'dra ba dag gis gang zag la tshod gzung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu su bdag bsrung bar 'dod pa des gzhan su'i spyod pa la'ang brtag par mi bya ste/_de dag la 'di ni 'di 'dra'o/_/'di ni 'di 'dra'o zhes dpya bar mi bya'o/_/nyin mtshan 
[\[275a.6\]]du sangs rgyas kyi chos la brtson par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos la bsgoms pa'i yid kyis bsam pa thag pa nas yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan la dpya bar brtson par mi gnas so/_/rigs kyi bu gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_
[\[275a.7\]]sems can gang ci snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig gis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa bas/_byang chub sems dpa' gang gcig pu dben par 'dug ste/_chung ngu na se gol gtogs pa tsam du'ang chos thams cad tshul gcig par yid ches 
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]shing tha na chung ngu dri ba'am/_dpyad pa'am/_lung 'bog pa'am/_kha ton bya ba'i phyir gnas na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu tshul 'di khong du chud pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa 
[\[275b.2\]]'thob bo/_/sems can thams cad la chags pa dang /_khong khro ba dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'ang myur du 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das las kyi sgrib pa 
[\[275b.3\]]rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba ji tsam gyis na las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag par 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang chos thams cad las med cing /_rnam par smin pa med par shes pa des las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa 'thob bo/_/
[\[275b.4\]]'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang gis 'dod chags kyi mtha' yang dag pa'i mthar mthong ba dang /_zhe sdang gi mtha' yang dag pa'i mthar mthong ba dang /_gti mug gi mtha' yang dag pa'i mthar mthong ba des las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa 'thob bo/_/'jam dpal 
[\[275b.5\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang gis sems can thams cad dang /_chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mthong ba des las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa 'thob bo/_/'jam dpal de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lta ba yod na las mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur te/_'jam dpal byis pa thos pa 
[\[275b.6\]]med pa so so'i skye bo ni chos thams cad shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mi shes pas/_bdag dang gzhan du dmigs so/_/dmigs nas lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi las rnam pa gsum mngon par 'du byed de/_de yang dag pa ma yin par sgro 'dogs pas bdag ni 'dod 
[\[275b.7\]]chags so/_/bdag ni zhe sdang ngo /_/bdag ni gti mug go zhes rnam par rtog go/_/gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung na/_de 'di snyam du bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o/_/bdag ni tshangs par spyod pa'o/_/bdag gis ni 'khor ba las yang dag par 'da' 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]bar bya'o/_/bdag gis ni mya ngan las 'das pa thob par bya'o/_/bdag gis ni sdug bsngal las rnam par grol ba thob par bya'o snyam du sems shing /_de yang dag pa ma yin par sgro 'dogs pas/_chos 'di dag ni dge ba'o/_/chos 'di dag ni mi dge ba'o/_/chos 
[\[276a.2\]]'di dag ni yongs su shes par bya'o/_/chos 'di dag ni spang bar bya'o/_/chos 'di dag ni mngon du bya ba'o/_/chos 'di dag ni bsgom par bya'o/_/sdug bsngal ni shes par bya'o/_/kun 'byung ba ni spang bar bya'o/_/'gog pa ni mngon du bya'o/_/lam ni bsgom par bya'o zhes rnam par 
[\[276a.3\]]rtog go/_/de 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o/_/'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba'o/_/'du byed thams cad ni kun nas 'bar ba'o/_/ci nas kyang bdag ni 'du byed rnams las 'bros par bya'o snyam du rnam par rtog ste/_de de ltar rtog pa'i tshe/_skyo ba dang ldan pa'i 'du shes 
[\[276a.4\]]yid la byed pa/_mtshan ma sngon du btang ba dag 'byung ste/_de 'di snyam du gang 'di chos rnams yongs su shes pa 'di ni sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa'o/_/de 'di snyam du ji nas kyang bdag gis kun 'byung ba spang bar bya'o zhes de chos thams cad la ngo mi mtho zhing khrel bar sems/_'jigs 
[\[276a.5\]]pa dang /_rab tu 'jigs pa dang /_yongs su 'jigs pa skyed cing /_de 'di snyam du gang 'di chos de dag las ngo tsha bar gyur pa de ni kun 'byung ba spang ba'o snyam du sems so/_/de 'di snyam du ci nas kyang bdag gis 'gog pa mngon du bya'o snyam nas/_de chos de dag rnam par brtags nas 
[\[276a.6\]]de'i 'og tu de dag 'gog par 'du shes shing /_de 'di snyam du gang chos rnams mngon du bya ba de ni 'gog pa yin no snyam mo/_/de 'di snyam du ci nas kyang bdag gis lam bsgom par bya'o snyam ste/_de gcig pu dben par song nas chos de dag yid la byas pas zhi gnas 'thob ste/_de'i 
[\[276a.7\]]skyo ba dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dang /_zhi gnas thob pa des chos thams cad las sems rab tu zhum par 'gyur/_sems rab tu 'gong bar 'gyur/_sems phyir ldog par 'gyur zhing ngo mi mtho ste/_ngo tsha la rnam par smod de/_mngon par dga' ba med pa skyed do/_/de 'di 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]snyam du bdag ni sdug bsngal thams cad las grol ba ste/_bdag gis de las gong du bya ba gzhan med do/_/bdag ni dgra bcom pa yin no zhes dam 'cha'o/_/de 'chi ba'i dus la bab pa'i tshe/_bdag skye bar 'gyur ba mthong nas/_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la nem nur dang the tsom du gyur te/_
[\[276b.2\]]de the tsom du ltung ba'i sems kyis dus byas nas sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu skye ste/_de yang ma skyes pa'i chos rnams la rnam par brtags pa'i phyir ro//_//bam po gnyis pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad 
[\[276b.3\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams ji ltar blta bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal gang gis 'du byed thams cad ma skyes par mthong ba des sdug bsngal yongs su shes so/_/gang gis chos thams cad 'byung 
[\[276b.4\]]ba med par mthong ba des kun 'byung ba rab tu spangs so/_/gang gis chos thams cad shin tu mya ngan las 'das par mthong ba des 'gog pa mngon du byas so/_/gang gis chos thams cad dngos po med par mthong ba des lam bsgoms so/_/'jam dpal gang gis 'phags pa'i bden pa 
[\[276b.5\]]bzhi de ltar mthong ba de ni/_chos 'di dag ni dge ba'o/_/chos 'di dag ni mi dge ba'o/_/chos 'di dag ni yongs su shes par bya ba'o/_/chos 'di dag ni spang bar bya ba'o/_/chos 'di dag ni mngon du bya ba'o/_/chos 'di dag ni bsgom par bya ba'o/_/sdug bsngal ni yongs su 
[\[276b.6\]]shes par bya ba'o/_/kun 'byung ba ni spang bar bya ba'o/_/'gog pa ni mngon du bya ba'o/_/lam ni bsgom par bya ba'o zhes mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos gang dag la byis pa so so'i skye bo dag 'dod chags pa dang /_zhe sdang ba dang /_gti mug par 'gyur 
[\[276b.7\]]ba'i chos de dag des ma skyes pa dang /_med pa dang /_nor ba dang /_yongs su brtags pa dang /_yongs su bskyed par mthong ba'i phyir te/_de chos gang yang mi len mi 'dor ro/_/de'i sems ni khams gsum pa la chags pa med de/_khams gsum pa thams cad ma 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]skyes pa dang /_sgyu ma lta bu dang /_rmi lam lta bu dang /_brag ca lta bu dang /_mig yor lta bur yang dag par mthong ngo /_/des dge ba dang /_mi dge ba'i chos thams cad smig rgyu lta bur mthong ste/_des 'dod chags kyi khams mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 
[\[277a.2\]]mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du zhe sdang gi khams dang /_gti mug gi khams mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mthong ngo /_/des chos rnams de lta bu'i rang bzhin du mthong bas/_sems can thams cad la chags pa dang /_khong khro ba med par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_des gang la 
[\[277a.3\]]chags par bya ba dang /_khong khro bar bya ba de lta bu'i chos mi dmigs so/_/de nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/chos dang dge 'dun yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/de chos thams cad yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas 
[\[277a.4\]]chos gang la yang the tsom mi skyed de/_the tsom med pas nye bar len pa med do/_/nye bar len pa med pas nye bar len pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'das te/_'jam dpal de lta bu'i chos shes pas gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal du mi 'ong ngo /_/
[\[277a.5\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag nyid kyang mi dmigs na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs pa lta smos su ga la yod de/_de ni gnas med do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rnams ji ltar 
[\[277a.6\]]blta bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge slong dag 'byung ste/_de dag mi sdug pa'i rnam pas lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ston to/_/skye ba dang 'gag pa'i rnam pas tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i 
[\[277a.7\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ston to/_/sems skye ba dang /_'gag pa'i chos can du lta'o zhes sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ston to/_/gang la ril po'i 'du shes med pa de la chos kyi 'du shes med do zhes chos la chos kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]ston to/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'o na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi rnams ji ltar blta bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 
[\[277b.2\]]chog mod/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ldem po dag ni shes par dka'o/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal gang gis lus nam 
[\[277b.3\]]mkha' dang mnyam par mthong na/_de ni lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/_/'jam dpal gang gis tshor ba nang dang /_phyi dang /_gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs na/_de ni tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/_/'jam dpal gang 
[\[277b.4\]]gis sems ming tsam du shes na/_de ni sems la sems kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/_/'jam dpal gang gis dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos ma dmigs na/_de ni chos la chos kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/_/'jam dpal dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni 
[\[277b.5\]]de ltar blta'o/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dbang po lnga rnams ji ltar blta bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal gang gis chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis ma byung ba'i phyir/_ma skyes par mthong na/_de ni dad pa'i dbang po'o/_/
[\[277b.6\]]'jam dpal gang gis nye ba dang ring ba'i 'du shes dang bral ba'i phyir/_chos thams cad la sems mi gtong na/_de ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o/_/'jam dpal gang dmigs pa dang bral ba'i phyir/_chos thams cad yid la mi byed cing dran pa la mi 'dogs na/_de ni dran pa'i dbang 
[\[277b.7\]]po'o/_/'jam dpal gang chos thams cad la mi sems pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o/_/'jam dpal gang gis chos thams cad skye ba dang 'jig pa dang bral zhing /_shes pa dang mi shes pa dang bral ba ste/_rang bzhin gyis stong par mthong na/_de ni shes rab kyi dbang po'o/_/
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]'jam dpal dbang po lnga dag ni de ltar blta'o/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag bdun rnams ji ltar blta bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal gang gis chos thams cad rang bzhin med cing 
[\[278a.2\]]yid la byar med par mthong ba 'di ni dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/_/'jam dpal gang gis dge ba dang mi dge ba dang /_lung du ma bstan par rab tu phye ste brtags na yongs su ma grub pas chos thams cad mi dmigs pa 'di ni chos rab tu 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag 
[\[278a.3\]]go/_/'jam dpal gang gis khams kyi 'du shes shin tu rig pa'i phyir khams gsum pa mi len mi 'dor ba 'di ni brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/_/'jam dpal gang gis dga' ba dang /_mi dga' ba shin tu rtogs pa'i phyir/_'du byed thams cad la dga' ba mi 
[\[278a.4\]]skyed pa 'di ni dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/_/'jam dpal gang gis dmigs pa'i dngos po ma dmigs te/_chos thams cad la sems bag yongs su gyur pa 'di ni bag yangs yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/_/'jam dpal gang gis chos thams cad rnam par bsgom 
[\[278a.5\]]pa rjes su rtogs pas sems mi dmigs pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/_/gang chos thams cad la mi gnas mi rten la chags par mi 'gyur/_shes par mi 'gyur zhing chos thams cad yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/_btang snyoms su gnas pa 'di ni 
[\[278a.6\]]btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go/_/'jam dpal byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni de ltar blta'o/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ji ltar blta bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[278a.7\]]'jam dpal gang gis chos thams cad mi mnyam pa med cing gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med par mthong ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i lta ba'o/_/'jam dpal gang gis chos thams cad mthong ba med pa'i tshul gyis brtag tu med cing rnam par brtag tu med la/_yongs su brtag tu 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]med par mthong ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i rtog pa'o/_/'jam dpal gang gis brjod du med pa mnyam pa nyid shin tu bsgoms pa'i phyir/_chos thams cad brjod du med par mthong ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i ngag go/_/'jam dpal gang gis byed pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_chos thams 
[\[278b.2\]]cad bya ba med cing byed pa med par mthong ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha'o/_/'jam dpal gang 'tsho ba mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa'i phyir/_chos thams cad mi sogs mi 'bri ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba'o/_/'jam dpal gang rtsol ba med cing sgrub pa med pa'i tshul gyis/_
[\[278b.3\]]chos thams cad yongs su sgrub pa med pa 'di ni yang dag pa'i rtsol ba'o/_/'jam dpal gang dran pa'i las kyis dben pa'i phyir chos thams cad yid la mi byed cing /_dran pa med pa 'di ni yang dag pa'i dran pa'o/_/'jam dpal gang chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir/_rang bzhin 
[\[278b.4\]]gyis mnyam par gzhag cing /_'khrug pa med la dmigs pa med par mthong ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/_/'jam dpal 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni de ltar blta ste/_'jam dpal gang la las 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi de ltar shes shing /_dran pa nye 
[\[278b.5\]]bar gzhag pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de ltar mthong ba de ni ngan pa rgal ba/_pha rol tu phyin pa/_thang la gnas pa/_bde bar gyur pa/_mi 'jigs pa rnyed pa/_khur bor ba/_rdul sprugs pa/_ci 
[\[278b.6\]]dang yang bral ba/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_dgra bcom pa/_dge sbyong /_bram ze/_khrus byas pa/_mthar phyin pa/_gtsang ba/_shAkya'i bu/_sangs rgyas kyi sras/_tsher ma phyung ba/_'obs bor ba/_'obs las rgal ba/_gsal shing phyung ba/_rims dang bral ba/_dge slong 
[\[278b.7\]]'phags pa rgyal mtshan rdzogs pa zhes brjod do/_/'jam dpal de lta bu'i bzod pa dang ldan pa'i dge slong ni 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa'i sbyin pa'i gnas yin te/_de la thob pa dang /_bkur sti thams cad kyang 'os so/_/'jam dpal de lta bas na dge slong yul gyi zas don yod par 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]bza' bar 'dod pa dang /_bdud 'dul bar 'dod pa dang /_'khor ba las 'da' bar 'dod pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'dod pa dang /_sdug bsngal las bral bar 'dod pa dang /_'jig rten lha dang bcas pa'i sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur bar 'dod pas chos 
[\[279a.2\]]de dag la de ltar brtson par bya'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe/_lha'i bu stong phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis chos mngon par rtogs pa thos par gyur nas de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la me tog man dA ra ba mang pos mngon par gtor nas/_
[\[279a.3\]]'di skad ces smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gis chung ngu na bstan pa 'di rna lam du grag pa tsam du thos kyang de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la legs par rab tu byung ba lags na/_gang gis thos te mos shing yid ches par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin nyid du nan tan du bgyid 
[\[279a.4\]]pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das gang gis bstan pa 'di tha na rna lam du grag pa tsam du thos kyang de dag ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[279a.5\]]gshegs pas gzungs kyi tshig gang gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa thob par 'gyur zhing /_sgra gang gis kyang 'jigs par mi 'gyur ba dang /_chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /_sbyor bar 'gyur ba dang /_chos thams cad tshul gcig par 
[\[279a.6\]]rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzungs kyi tshul gyi tshig bka' stsal du gsol/_de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal de bas na chos kyi sgo gang gis byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad 
[\[279a.7\]]la snang ba thob par 'gyur zhing /_myur du mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ba'i phur pa'i tshig dang /_sa bon gyi tshig bstan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo 'di nyon cig_/'jam dpal phur pa'i tshig dang /_sa bon gyi tshig bstan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo de yang gang zhe na/_'jam 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]dpal sems can thams cad sems gcig pa'o zhes bya ba 'di ni sa bon gyi tshig go/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de sa bon gyi tshig ces bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal chos thams cad ni dmigs pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir sems 
[\[279b.2\]]med pa ste/_de'i phyir de ni sa bon gyi tshig go/_/'jam dpal sems can thams cad ni 'gyur ba gcig go zhes bya ba 'di ni sa bon gyi tshig go/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de sa bon gyi tshig ces bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 
[\[279b.3\]]chos thams cad ni chags pa med par gzhol ba ste/_nam mkha' 'gyur ba yin pas de'i phyir de ni sa bon gyi tshig go/_/'jam dpal sems can thams cad ni sems can gcig pa'o zhes bya ba 'di ni sa bon gyi tshig go/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de sa bon gyi tshig ces 
[\[279b.4\]]bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal sems can thams cad ni ma skyes shin tu ma skyes shing ming med la/_lam gcig pa dmigs su med pas gcig tu bstan pa ste/_de'i phyir de ni sa bon gyi tshig go/_/'jam dpal 'dod chags zhes bya ba 'di ni phur pa'i 
[\[279b.5\]]tshig go/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de phur pa'i tshig ces bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'dod chags ni mi gnas pa'i tshul gyi chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa ste/_mi g.yo mi 'gul zhing rang bzhin gyis dben pa ste/_g.yo ba med 
[\[279b.6\]]pas de'i phyir de ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/'jam dpal zhe sdang zhes bya ba 'di ni rdo rje'i tshig go/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de rdo rje'i tshig ces bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal zhe sdang ni dbyer med pa ste 'di ltar dper na/_'jam dpal rdo rje ni mi phyed mi 
[\[279b.7\]]shigs pa'o/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du chos thams cad ni dngos po ma grub pa'i phyir/_gzhig tu med cing dbyer med pa ste/_de'i phyir 'di ni rdo rje'i tshig go/_/'jam dpal gti mug ces bya ba 'di ni ye shes kyi tshig go/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de ye shes kyi tshig ces 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal chos thams cad ni ye shes kyis grub cing mi shes pa dang bral ba ste/_'di ltar dper na/_'jam dpal nam mkha' ni shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_mi shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin no/_/'jam 
[\[280a.2\]]dpal de bzhin du chos thams cad ni shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_mi shes pa dang ldan pa yang ma yin/_shes par bya ba'i rang bzhin shin tu zhi ba'i phyir shes pa yang ma yin/_mi shes pa yang ma yin te de'i phyir ye shes kyi tshig ces bya'o/_/'jam dpal gzugs zhes bya ba 
[\[280a.3\]]'di ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de phur pa'i tshig ces bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_dbang po'i phur pa ni rab tu gnas pa'i phyir mi g.yo mi 'gul lo/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du chos 
[\[280a.4\]]thams cad mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med de/_blang du med cing rtsol ba med la shin tu brtan pa'i phyir mi gnas pa ste/_de'i phyir de ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/'jam dpal tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni zhi ba'i tshig go/_/gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[280a.5\]]ldan 'das ci'i slad du de zhi ba'i tshig ces bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis shin tu zhi ba ste/_tshor ba ni nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_shar phyogs na yang med/_lho phyogs na yang med/_nub 
[\[280a.6\]]phyogs na yang med/_byang phyogs na yang med/_steng na yang med/_'og na yang med/_phyogs mtshams rnams na yang med do/_/'jam dpal gal te bde ba'i tshor ba nang na yod na ni/_sems can thams cad kyang bde bas shin tu bde bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal 'on tam gal 
[\[280a.7\]]te sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba nang na yod na ni/_sems can thams cad kyang sdug bsngal gyis shin tu sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gal te bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba nang na yod na ni sems can thams cad kyang shin tu rmongs par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]'jam dpal gang gi phyir tshor ba thams cad ni nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang med/_shar phyogs na yang med/_lho phyogs na yang med/_nub phyogs na yang med/_byang phyogs na yang med/_steng na yang med/_'og na yang med/_phyogs mtshams rnams na yang med pas/_de'i 
[\[280b.2\]]phyir sems can thams cad ni rtswa shing dang /_rtsig pa lta bu ste/_rang bzhin gyis ma skyes shing 'gag pa med par mtshan nyid mnyam pa ste/_de'i phyir de ni zhi ba'i tshig go/_/'jam dpal 'du shes zhes bya ba 'di ni sa bon gyi tshig go/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de 
[\[280b.3\]]sa bon gyi tshig ces bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'du shes de yongs su brtags pa las byung ba ste/_log pa las byung ba/_chad ba stong pa lta bu/_smig rgyu'i ngo bo nyid rang bzhin gyis dben pa ste/_de'i phyir de ni sa bon gyi tshig go/_/'jam 
[\[280b.4\]]dpal 'du byed ces bya ba 'di ni sa bon gyi tshig go/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de sa bon gyi tshig ces bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal chos thams cad ni bgrang du med cing /_bgrang ba mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa/_chu shing gi snying 
[\[280b.5\]]po lta bu ste/_'jam dpal 'di ltar dper na/_chu shing gi snying po ni rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir shin tu med cing mi dmigs so/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis dben zhing ming med pa ste/_de'i phyir de ni sa bon gyi tshig go/_/'jam dpal rnam par shes 
[\[280b.6\]]pa zhes bya ba 'di ni sa bon gyi tshig go/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de sa bon gyi tshig ces bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/_ma skyes pa/_ma byung ba/_stong pa/_mtshan ma med pa/_ngo bo nyid med pa/_mtshan 
[\[280b.7\]]nyid med pa/_nam mkha' dang sor mo lnga lta bu ming med pa ste/_de'i phyir de ni sa bon gyi tshig go/_/'jam dpal gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni sa bon gyi tshig go/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/_de ni sa bon gyi tshig ces bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]'di lta ste dper na/_mig yor ni snang ba la yod pa ma yin no/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du chos thams cad ni snang ba la yod pa ma yin te/_mig slu ba/_sems slu ba/_gsog_/gsob/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa/_sgyu ma'i chos can te/_de'i phyir de ni sa bon gyi tshig go/_/'jam 
[\[281a.2\]]dpal sgra zhes bya ba 'di ni sa bon gyi tshig go/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de sa bon gyi tshig ces bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal chos thams cad ni tha dad du byar med cing gnyis su med pa ste/_ri'i sgra'i tshig gi lam brag ca dang 'dra ba ste/_
[\[281a.3\]]de'i phyir de ni sa bon gyi tshig go/_/'jam dpal dri zhes bya ba 'di ni sa bon gyi tshig go/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de sa bon gyi tshig ces bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal chos thams cad ni sna dang dri dang /_rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa'i 
[\[281a.4\]]phyir mnam du med cing rang bzhin gyis blun la/_nam mkha' dang 'dra ba ste/_de'i phyir de ni sa bon gyi tshig go/_/'jam dpal ro zhes bya ba 'di ni sa bon gyi tshig go/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de sa bon gyi tshig ces bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal 
[\[281a.5\]]pa/_'jam dpal chos thams cad ni rang bzhin dang /_ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab cing ro'i khams mi dmigs pas ro dmigs su med pa ste/_de'i phyir de ni sa bon gyi tshig go/_/'jam dpal reg ces bya ba 'di ni sa bon gyi tshig go/_/gsol pa/_
[\[281a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de sa bon gyi tshig ces bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal chos thams cad ni nam mkha' ltar dben pa dang /_lus shin tu bsgom pa dang /_reg bya 'byung ba med pa dang /_reg pa dben pa'i phyir reg pa med pa ste/_
[\[281a.7\]]de'i phyir de ni sa bon gyi tshig go/_/'jam dpal sa zhes bya ba 'di ni sa bon gyi tshig go/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de sa bon gyi tshig ces bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal chos thams cad ni sems dang bral ba/_sems med pa/_
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]ngo bo nyid med pa/_yongs su ma grub pa/_ming dang bral ba/_mtshan nyid kyis dben pa/_chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin te/_de'i phyir de ni sa bon gyi tshig go/_/'jam dpal chu zhes bya ba 'di ni sa bon gyi tshig go/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de sa bon gyi tshig ces 
[\[281b.2\]]bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal chos thams cad ni chu med pa ste/_ma 'dres shing rlan med pa/_smig rgyu'i chu lta bu ste/_de'i phyir de ni sa bon gyi tshig go/_/'jam dpal me zhes bya ba 'di ni sa bon gyi tshig go/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i 
[\[281b.3\]]slad du de sa bon gyi tshig ces bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal chos thams cad ni tsha ba med pa ste/_yongs su gdung ba dang bral ba/_rang bzhin gyis med pa/_ngo bo nyid kyis zhi ba/_phyin ci log gis yongs su brtags pa shin tu ma skyes pa ste/_de'i phyir 
[\[281b.4\]]de ni sa bon gyi tshig go/_/'jam dpal rlung zhes bya ba 'di ni sa bon gyi tshig go/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de sa bon gyi tshig ces bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal chos thams cad ni g.yo ba dang yang dag par bral ba'i phyir chags pa med 
[\[281b.5\]]cing sgrib pa med pa ste/_rlung gi lam las yang dag par 'das shing mtshan nyid med la ngo bo nyid med pa ste/_de'i phyir de ni sa bon gyi tshig go/_/'jam dpal sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'di ni sa bon gyi tshig go/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de sa bon gyi tshig ces bgyi/_bcom 
[\[281b.6\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal chos thams cad ni 'tshang rgya bar byed pa med pa ste/_sangs rgyas pa med/_rjes su sangs rgyas pa med/_rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa med/_'tshang rgya bar nye ba dang bral ba/_'tshang rgya bar byed pas dben pa ste/_de'i phyir de ni sa bon gyi 
[\[281b.7\]]tshig go/_/'jam dpal chos zhes bya ba 'di ni sa bon gyi tshig go/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de sa bon gyi tshig ces bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal chos thams cad ni dbyer med cing bcad du med pa ste/_gcad pa dang bral ba 'chad 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]pas dben pa/_ming med pa/_mtshan ma med pa/_mtshan nyid med pa/_ngo bo nyid med pa tshig gi lam las yang dag par 'das pa ste/_de'i phyir de ni sa bon gyi tshig go/_/'jam dpal dge 'dun zhes bya ba 'di ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[282a.2\]]ci'i slad du de phur pa'i tshig ces bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'phags pa'i dge 'dun ni chos nyid la shin tu gnas pa/_chos kyi dbyings dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_tshul khrims dang /_tshul khrims 'chal pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_ting 
[\[282a.3\]]nge 'dzin dang /_'khrugs pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_shes rab dang /_shes rab 'chal pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa mnyam pa nyid la shin tu gnas shing /_gnas dang /_gnas ma yin pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad la rab tu 
[\[282a.4\]]gnas pas/_de'i phyir de ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad yul ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de phur pa'i tshig ces bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal chos thams 
[\[282a.5\]]cad ni nam mkha'i yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul/_yul med pa/_yul yang dag par chad pa/_dngos po med pa/_chad pa dang bral ba'i phyir dbang dang bral ba ste/_de'i phyir de ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad dmigs pa med do zhes bya ba 'di ni 
[\[282a.6\]]phur pa'i tshig go/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de phur pa'i tshig ces bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal chos thams cad ni gnas pa med cing rten pa yang med pa ste/_de dag ni dmigs pas dben pa'i phyir mi dmigs/_rnam par 
[\[282a.7\]]mi dmigs/_mi sbyor rnam par mi sbyor yongs su mi sbyor ba ste/_de'i phyir de ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad ni len pa med do zhes bya ba 'di ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de phur pa'i tshig ces bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings la yang dag par zhen pa ste/_de dag ni mi 'dor/_mi len mi tshol/_mi smon cing smon pa yang dag par chad pa/_rang bzhin gyis rnam par zhi ba/_nam mkha' dang mnyam zhing 'dra ba ste/_de'i phyir de ni phur pa'i tshig go_/
[\[282b.2\]]'jam dpal chos thams cad ni nyon mongs pa med ces bya ba 'di ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de phur pa'i tshig ces bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal chos thams cad ni dri ma med pa ste/_ci'ang ma yin pa/_dag pa 
[\[282b.3\]]'od gsal ba ste/_nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i phyir shin tu dag pa/_nyon mongs pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa med pa ste/_de'i phyir de ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad gzhi med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[282b.4\]]'das ci'i slad du de phur pa'i tshig ces bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal chos thams cad ni dngos po med cing dbang dang bral bas de dag la kun gzhi med pa ste/_de'i phyir de ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/'jam dpal chos thams cad ni bslab pa med ces bya ba 
[\[282b.5\]]'di ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du de phur pa'i tshig ces bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal chos thams cad ni bslab pa dang bral ba ste/_de dag ni bslab par bya ba ma yin/_bsgom par bya ba ma yin/_bsam par 
[\[282b.6\]]bya ba ma yin/_yid la bya ba ma yin/_gnas par bya ba ma yin/_'gro bar bya ba ma yin/_nan tan du bya ba ma yin/_log pa'i nan tan du bya ba ma yin/_spang bar bya ba ma yin/_mngon du bya ba ma yin/_bshags par bya ba ma yin/_rab tu bshags par bya ba ma yin/_
[\[282b.7\]]dgod par bya ba ma yin/_dgrol bar bya ba ma yin/_brjod par bya ba ma yin/_smos par bya ba ma yin/_gzung bar bya ba ma yin/_gtang bar bya ba ma yin/_rab tu gtang bar bya ba ma yin/_yongs su gtang bar bya ba ma yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal chos thams 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]cad ni shin tu btang ba/_rang bzhin gyis ma bzung ba/_rtag par btang ba ste/_de dag ni shes pas khong du chud par bya ba ma yin/_mi shes pas khong du chud par bya ba yang ma yin te/_de'i phyir de ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon 
[\[283a.2\]]nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das phur pa'i tshig las brtsams te/_bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems can thams 
[\[283a.3\]]cad byang chub thob pa'o zhes bgyi ba 'di ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal ci'i phyir de phur pa'i tshig ces bya/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni thob pa ma mchis pa/_yang dag par thob pa ma mchis pa/_rjes su thob pa ma mchis 
[\[283a.4\]]pa/_thob par bgyi ba dang bral ba/_rtogs par bgyi ba ma mchis pa/_mngon par rtogs par bgyi ba ma mchis pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du de ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa'o zhes bgyi ba 'di ni phur pa'i 
[\[283a.5\]]tshig go/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal ci'i phyir de phur pa'i tshig ces bya/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams ni thams cad kyi thams cad du ma mchis la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rjes su 'brang ba ste/_de'i slad 
[\[283a.6\]]du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa'o zhes bgyi ste/_bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni su la yang thob par bgyi ba'i tshul gyis nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni sems can gyi rang bzhin te/_de'i slad du 
[\[283a.7\]]de ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan no zhes bgyi ba 'di ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal ci'i phyir de phur pa'i tshig ces bya/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]sems can thams cad ni ngo bo nyid ma mchis shing ngo bo nyid dang bral ba ste/_ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i mtshan nyid pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su mchis pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin can te/_de'i slad du de ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/bcom
