[\[283b.2\]]ldan 'das sems can thams cad byang chub kyi snying po zhes bgyi ba 'di ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal ci'i phyir de phur pa'i tshig ces bya/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi snying po zhes bgyi ba'i tshig gi don ci lags/_bcom 
[\[283b.3\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal byang chub kyi snying po zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad zhi ba'i snying po'o/_/chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i snying po'o/_/chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i snying po'o/_/chos thams cad gzung du med pa'i snying po'o/_/chos thams cad ngo bo nyid 
[\[283b.4\]]med pa'i snying po ste/_'jam dpal de ni byang chub kyi snying po'i tshig gi don to/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na sems can thams cad snying po de dang rtag par ldan pa ma lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de de bzhin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[283b.5\]]ldan 'das de ltar rnam grangs des kyang sems can thams cad ni byang chub kyi snying po ste/_de'i slad du de ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad bzod pa thob bo zhes bgyi ba 'di ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal ci'i phyir de phur pa'i tshig ces 
[\[283b.6\]]bya/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad ni mi zad pa'i chos dang mi 'grib pa'i chos dang /_mi skye ba'i chos can te/_ming gi mtshan nyid kyis dben pa'i bzod pa mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su mchis pas de'i slad du de ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/bcom 
[\[283b.7\]]ldan 'das sems can thams cad thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa can no zhes bgyi ba 'di ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal ci'i phyir de phur pa'i tshig ces bya/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyis gang ci 'ang rung ste/_gang 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]dang gang spobs par gyur pa de dang de ni phyogs bcu kun la 'ang ma mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad sgrib pa ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su mchis shing dben la rang gi mtshan nyid la gnas pas de ltar de dag ma mchis pa lags te/_bcom 
[\[284a.2\]]ldan 'das rnam grangs de'i slad du de ni phur pa'i tshig go_/bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad gzungs thob bo zhes bgyi ba 'di ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal ci'i phyir de phur pa'i tshig ces bya/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[284a.3\]]sems can thams cad ni sems can gyi 'du shes can te/_yang dag pa ma lags par yongs su brtags pa'i phyin ci log gi rtog pas mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i slad du/_gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg rnams 'dzin pas de'i slad du de ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/
[\[284a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems dang ldan no zhes bgyi ba 'di ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal ci'i phyir de phur pa'i tshig ces bya/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad ni sems can ma mchis pa 
[\[284a.5\]]ste/_rang bzhin gyis gnod sems ma mchis shing /_gnod sems dang byams pa rtag tu ma mchis pa mnyam pa nyid thob pas de'i slad du de ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad snying rje chen po dang ldan no zhes bgyi ba 'di ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/bka' stsal pa/_
[\[284a.6\]]'jam dpal ci'i phyir de phur pa'i tshig ces bya/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad ni ma bcos ma bgyis pa'i snying rje can te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnyam pa nyid las ma 'das pa snying rje chen po'i ngo bo nyid dang ldan pas/_de'i slad du de ni 
[\[284a.7\]]phur pa'i tshig go/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad ni ting nge 'dzin dang ldan no zhes bgyi ba 'di ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal ci'i phyir de phur pa'i tshig ces bya/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad ni dmigs 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]pas dben pa'i slad du rang bzhin dang ldan pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das dmigs pa gang gis sems can gang gi rnam par shes pa 'byung ba de ni dmigs pa de la ma 'khrugs pa ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams skad cig ma'i slad du 
[\[284b.2\]]ste/_de'i slad du de ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas thams cad 'dod chags dang ldan no zhes bgyi ba 'di ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal ci'i phyir de phur pa'i tshig ces bya/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[284b.3\]]sangs rgyas thams cad ni 'dod chags dang ldan pa ste/_'dod chags kyi ngo bo nyid dang ldan zhing rjes su rtogs pas mnyam pa nyid las ma 'das te/_dgyes shing rab tu dgyes la rnam par dgyes te nyon mongs pa mi mnga' bas na/_bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags nyid ni byang chub ste/_de 
[\[284b.4\]]ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags kyi ngo bo nyid rjes su rtogs pas byang chub ces bgyi ste/_de'i slad du de ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni zhe sdang dang ldan pa'o zhes bgyi ba 'di ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam 
[\[284b.5\]]dpal ci'i phyir de phur pa'i tshig ces bya/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni zhe sdang mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs shing /_'du byed thams cad kyi skyon yang dag par ston pa ste/_zhe sdang gi ngo bo nyid rjes su rtogs pas zhe sdang dang ldan pa 
[\[284b.6\]]zhes bgyi ste/_de'i slad du de ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gti mug dang ldan no zhes bgyi ba 'di ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal ci'i phyir de phur pa'i tshig ces bya/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[284b.7\]]'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gti mug gi ngo bo nyid rjes su rtogs pas/_gti mug mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs shing ming thams cad las 'grel pa ste/_de'i slad du de ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig tshogs dang ldan no 
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]zhes bgyi ba 'di ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal ci'i phyir de phur pa'i tshig ces bya/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jig tshogs la bzhugs pa ste/_'jig tshogs mi skye mi 'byung 
[\[285a.2\]]bar thugs su chud pas chos thams cad kyis rgyas par mi 'gyur/_rnam par rgyas par mi 'gyur/_yongs su rgyas par mi 'gyur te/_mi bzhugs pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs pas de'i slad du de ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams log par 
[\[285a.3\]]lta ba dang ldan no zhes bgyi ba 'di ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal ci'i phyir de phur pa'i tshig ces bya/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dus byas log par yang dag par ston cing /_'dus byas yang dag 
[\[285a.4\]]pa ma lags par yang dag par ston/_'dus byas nor bar yang dag par ston pa ste/_log par lta ba'i ngo bo nyid mtshan nyid kyis mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pas/_'dus byas thams cad gsob gsog ste/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa slu ba'i chos can du ston pa mdzad pas/_de'i slad du de ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/
[\[285a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis phyin ci log la gnas te/_byang chub brnyes so zhes bgyi ba dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sgrib pa la gnas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la gnas/_'dod chags la gnas/_zhe sdang la gnas/_gti mug la 
[\[285a.6\]]gnas te byang chub brnyes so zhes bgyi ba 'di ni phur pa'i tshig go/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal ci'i phyir de phur pa'i tshig ces bya/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gnas zhes bgyi ba 'di ni log par gnas pa'i tshig go/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[285a.7\]]'jam dpal log par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don ci/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das log par gnas pa smad par gnas pa/_g.yo ba rab tu g.yo ba zhes bgyi ba 'di ni/_so so'i skye bo rnams kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]ni 'dod chags mnyam pa nyid dang /_zhe sdang mnyam pa nyid dang /_gti mug mnyam pa nyid dang /_'dod pa'i yon tan lnga mnyam pa nyid dang /_sgrib pa mnyam pa nyid dang /_phyin ci log mnyam pa nyid la yang dag par bzhugs shing legs par bzhugs pa ste/_de dag ni 'dod 
[\[285b.2\]]chags kyi ngo bo nyid kyi gnas na bzhugs bzhin du/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/zhe sdang gi ngo bo nyid kyi gnas na bzhugs/_gti mug gi ngo bo nyid kyi gnas na bzhugs/_'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i ngo bo nyid kyi gnas na 
[\[285b.3\]]bzhugs/_sgrib pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi gnas na bzhugs/_phyin ci log gi ngo bo nyid kyi gnas na bzhugs bzhin du/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 
[\[285b.4\]]la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal khyod la gal te la la zhig gis 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs pa/_dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa'o zhes zer zhing de skad ces 'dri na/_
[\[285b.5\]]lan ci skad ces gdab/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te la la zhig gis bdag la de skad du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs pa/_dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa'o zhes mchi na/_bcom 
[\[285b.6\]]ldan 'das de skad ces 'dri ba de la bdag gis 'di skad bgyi ste/_re shig dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la rim gro gyis shig_/rnal 'byor la brtson par gyis shig_/chos gang la yang sbyar ba dang /_dbye ba ma byed cig_/gzung ba dang /_gtang bar ma byed cig_/dmigs pa dang /_rnam par dmigs 
[\[285b.7\]]par ma byed cig_/btang snyoms dang /_spong bar ma byed cig_/tshol ba dang /_smon par ma byed cig_/chos gang la yang rab ce'am/_tha ma zhe'am/_mchog ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig dang /_de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul shes par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/_yul dang bral zhing yul med pa/_yul thams cad dang yang dag par bral ba/_chos yang dag par chad pa'o zhes bgyi'o/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod kyis de skad ces lung bstan na ci zhig lung bstan par 'gyur/_gsol 
[\[286a.2\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de skad ces lung bstan pas chos gang yang lung bstan par gyur pa ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa'i tshe/_chos la la'i skye ba'am 'gag pa gang yang gzigs sam/_bka' 
[\[286a.3\]]stsal pa/_'jam dpal de ni ma yin no/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos gang ma skyes shing ma byung la/_dge ba'i chos dang ldan pa'ang ma lags/_mi dge ba'i chos dang ldan pa'ang ma lags pa de la yongs su shes par bgyi ba ni gang zhig mchis/_spang ba 
[\[286a.4\]]ni ci zhig mchis/_bsgom pa ni gang zhig mchis/_mngon du bgyi ba ni gang zhig mchis/_mngon par rtogs par bgyi ba yang gang zhig mchis/_de nas steng gi bar snang las lha'i bu stong phrag bcus/_de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lha rdzas 
[\[286a.5\]]kyi me tog ud pa la dang /_ku mu da dang /_pun da rI ka dang /_man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po dang /_many+dzu shi ka dang /_many+dzu shi ka chen po mang pos mngon par gtor/_rab tu gtor nas/_bcom ldan 'das dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal 
[\[286a.6\]]zhing 'di skad kyi tshig brjod par gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni chags pa ma mchis pa'i dpal te/_de ni 'jam dpal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni mi gnyis pa'i dpal te/_de ni 'jam dpal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i dpal te/_de ni 'jam 
[\[286a.7\]]dpal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i dpal te/_de ni 'jam dpal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni de bzhin nyid kyi dpal te/_de ni 'jam dpal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni ma nor ba de bzhin nyid kyi dpal te/_de ni 'jam dpal lo/_/bcom ldan 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]'das 'di ni chos kyi dbyings kyi dpal te/_de ni 'jam dpal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i dpal te/_de ni 'jam dpal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni dam pa'i dpal te/_de ni 'jam dpal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni mchog gi dpal te/_de ni 
[\[286b.2\]]'jam dpal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni phul gyi dpal te/_de ni 'jam dpal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bla na ma mchis pa'i dpal te/_de ni 'jam dpal lo/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[286b.3\]]lha'i bu dag chog gis bdag la ma rtog rnam par ma rtog shig_/kho bos ni chos gang yang dam pa zhes bya ba'am/_mchog ces bya ba'am/_phul zhes bya ba de lta bu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo /_/lha'i bu dag kho bo ni 'dod chags kyi dpal te/_de'i phyir kho bo 'jam dpal lo/_/
[\[286b.4\]]kho bo ni zhe sdang gi dpal te/_de'i phyir kho bo 'jam dpal lo/_/kho bo ni gti mug gi dpal te/_de'i phyir kho bo 'jam dpal lo/_/lha'i bu dag kho bo ni 'dod chags las yongs su 'das pa ma yin/_zhe sdang las yongs su 'das pa ma yin/_gti mug las yongs su 'das pa 
[\[286b.5\]]ma yin te/_lha'i bu dag byis pa so so'i skye bo dag ni 'da' zhing yongs su 'da' ba dang /_rnam par 'da' ba dag byed kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos gang la yang 'pho ba'am/_'gro ba'am/_'da' ba med do/_/lha'i bu rnams kyis smras pa/_'jam dpal 'o na 
[\[286b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams rnam par mi gnon tam/_sa bcu rjes su mi gnon tam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu dag de ji snyam du sems/_sgyu mas sprul pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba dag sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par gnon cing sa bcu 
[\[286b.7\]]rjes su gnon pa yod dam/_lha'i bu rnams kyis smras pa/_'jam dpal sgyu ma'i skyes bu la gnas kyang med na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par gnon pa'am/_sa rjes su gnon pa lta ga la yod/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu dag de bzhin du chos thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/_
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]de dag ni gnon pa med/_rnam par gnon pa med/_yongs su gnon pa med de 'da' ba med do/_/lha'i bu dag gis smras pa/_'o na 'jam dpal khyod byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ram/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu dag de ji 
[\[287a.2\]]snyam du sems/_byis pa so so'i skye bo 'dod chags kyis kun nas glags pa zhig byang chub kyi snying por 'dug na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan par 'gyur ram/_lha'i bu dag gis smras pa/_ci 'jam dpal 'o na khyod 'dod chags kyis kun nas glags pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo 
[\[287a.3\]]yin nam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu dag de de bzhin te/_bdag ni 'dod chags kyis kun nas glags pa'o/_/zhe sdang gis kun nas glags pa'o/_/gti mug gis kun nas glags pa'o/_/bdag ni mu stegs can gzhan no/_/log pa la zhen pa'o/_/lha'i bu dag gis smras pa/_
[\[287a.4\]]'jam dpal ci las bsams te/_de skad du bdag ni 'dod chags kyis kun nas glags pa'o/_/zhe sdang gis kun nas glags pa'o/_/gti mug gis kun nas glags pa'o zhes smra/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu dag de ni ji ltar mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis 'dod chags dang /_zhe 
[\[287a.5\]]sdang dang /_gti mug gi ngo bo nyid la gnas pa'i phyir/_ji ltar phyogs bcu kun tu gnas med pa de ltar gnas so/_/lha'i bu dag gis smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod ji ltar mu stegs can gzhan zhes bya ba yin/_smras pa/_lha'i bu dag kho bo ni mu stegs can gzhan du mi 'gro ste/_de'i 
[\[287a.6\]]phyir mu stegs can gzhan zhes bya'o/_/lha'i bu dag gis smras pa/_'jam dpal khyod ji ltar log pa la zhen ces bya/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu dag kho bos ni chos thams cad log par shes te/_yang dag pa ma yin zhing nor ba yongs su brtags par khong du chud pas/_
[\[287a.7\]]de'i phyir kho bo ni log pa la zhen pa'o/_/de nas de'i tshe lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po de dag gis/_'jam dpal gyis bstan pa de thos nas/_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/'di skad ces kyang smras te/_rdo rje'i tshig dang /_sa bon gyi tshig dang /_phur pa'i tshig rnam pa 'di lta bu 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]dag gang gi rna lam du grag par gyur pa de dag kyang thob par bya ba legs par thob pa yin na/_gang gis thos nas mos par gyur pa dang /_yid ches pa dang /_lung 'bogs pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_ston pa dang /_de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa lta smos kyang 
[\[287b.2\]]ci dgos te/_de dag ni thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa rjes su thob par 'gyur ro/_/chos thams cad la snang ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/tshul gcig tu bstan pa la mkhas par 'gyur ro/_/chos thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang sbyor bar 'gyur ro//_//bam po gsum pa ste 
[\[287b.3\]]tha ma/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu pad mo rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dus slad ma la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rnam pa 'di lta bu'i chos thos na/_mi 'jigs mi dngang /_skrag par mi 'gyur ba dang /_sgra thams 
[\[287b.4\]]cad rtogs par 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang /_thogs pa ma mchis shing /_the tsom ma mchis par bgyi ba'i slad du sgra dang tshig la 'jug pa'i rig pa bstan du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu pad mo rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa la 'di skad ces bka' 
[\[287b.5\]]stsal to/_/lha'i bu khyod la gnas de dris pas ci zhig bya/_chog mod sgra dang /_skad la 'jug pa'i rig pa de ni las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' shes pa'am/_khong du chud pa'am/_bsam pa'am/_gzhal ba'am/_dpyad par sla ba ma yin no/_/de ni byang chub sems dpa' las 
[\[287b.6\]]dang po pa'i mdun du brjod par bya ba ma yin te/_lha'i bu sgra dang skad la 'jug pa khong du chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gal te bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du log pa'i tshig yang dag pa ma yin pa'i ngag gis mi snyan pa brjod de/_spyos pas de la khong khro ba'i 
[\[287b.7\]]sems mi skyed do/_/gal te bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bde ba'i yo byad gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang /_yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas/_bkur stir byas/_bsti stang du byas/_mchod par byas kyang de la chags pa'i sems mi 'byung ste/_
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/_dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa ni chags par bya ba'i gnas kyi chos thams cad la yang chags par mi 'gyur/_khong khro bar bya ba'i gnas kyi chos thams cad la yang khong khro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bu de bzhin du sgra dang /_skad la 
[\[288a.2\]]'jug pa khong du chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang /_bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas kyang /_de la chags pa'i sems mi skyed do/_/bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du log pa yang dag pa ma yin pa'i tshig gis mi 
[\[288a.3\]]snyan par brjod de/_spyos kyang khong khro ba'i sems mi skyed do/_/lha'i bu de ltar sgra dang /_skad la 'jug pa khong du chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni thob pa dang /_ma thob pa dang /_grags pa dang /_ma grags pa dang /_bstod pa dang /_smad pa dang /_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal thams 
[\[288a.4\]]cad kyis mi bskyod mi 'phrogs te/_'jig rten gyi chos thams cad zil gyis gnon cing /_ri'i rgyal po ltar mi sgul bar gnas so/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la lha'i bu pad mo rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[288a.5\]]'on kyang ma byung ba'i dus na/_byang chub sems dpa' 'du shes sbyangs pa/_'du shes byang ba gang ji snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag gis sgra dang skad la 'jug pa'i rig pa 'di thos na/_rang gi skyon yang rtogs par 'gyur/_gzhan la yang ston par 'gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[288a.6\]]sgra dang /_skad la 'jug pa'i rig pa bshad du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu pad mo rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lha'i bu de bas na shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_don 
[\[288a.7\]]'di ngas khyod la bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar bgyi'o zhes nas/_lha'i bu pad mo rnam par rol pa'i mngon par shes pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ltar nyan to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lha'i bu gal te byang chub 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]sems dpa' 'dod chags kyi sgra la nyes pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur zhing 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgra la chags pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi slob bo/_/zhe sdang gi sgra la kha na ma tho ba'i 'du shes su 'gyur zhing /_zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sgra la legs 
[\[288b.2\]]pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi slob bo/_/gti mug gi sgra la kha na ma tho ba'i 'du shes su 'gyur zhing /_gti mug dang bral ba'i sgra la legs pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi slob bo/_/'dod pa chung ba'i sgra la chags shing 'dod 
[\[288b.3\]]pa che ba'i sgra la khong khro na/_sgra dang skad la 'jug pa'i rig pa la mi slob bo/_/chog shes pa'i sgra la chags shing /_chog mi shes pa'i sgra la khong khro na/_sgra dang skad la 'jug pa'i rig pa la mi slob bo/_/sdom pa'i sgra la chags shing /_mi sdom pa'i sgra la khong khro na/_sgra dang skad la 
[\[288b.4\]]'jug pa'i rig pa la mi slob bo/_/gcig pur dga' ba'i sgra la chags shing /_skye bo phal po che'i sgra la khong khro na/_sgra dang skad la 'jug pa'i rig pa la mi slob bo/_/sangs rgyas kyi sgra la chags shing /_mu stegs can gyi sgra la khong khro na/_sgra dang skad la 'jug pa'i rig pa la mi 
[\[288b.5\]]slob bo/_/tshangs par spyod pa'i sgra la zhen cing /_tshangs par mi spyod pa'i sgra la zhe sdang na/_sgra dang skad la 'jug pa'i rig pa la mi slob bo/_/kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgra la khong khro zhing /_rnam par byang ba'i sgra la chags na/_sgra dang skad la 'jug pa'i rig pa la mi slob bo/_/'bras 
[\[288b.6\]]bu la gnas pa'i sgra la chags shing /_byis pa so so'i skye bo'i sgra la khong khro na/_sgra dang skad la 'jug pa'i rig pa la mi slob bo/_/bde ba'i sgra la chags shing /_sdug bsngal gyi sgra la khong khro na/_sgra dang skad la 'jug pa'i rig pa la mi slob bo/_/rab tu byung ba'i sgra la chags shing /_
[\[288b.7\]]khyim pa'i sgra la khong khro na/_sgra dang skad la 'jug pa'i rig pa la mi slob bo/_/'jig rten las 'das pa'i sgra la chags shing /_'jig rten pa'i sgra la khong khro na/_sgra dang skad la 'jug pa'i rig pa la mi slob bo/_/sbyin pa'i sgra la legs pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur zhing /_ser sna'i 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]sgra la khong khro ba'i 'du shes su 'gyur na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi slob bo/_/tshul khrims kyi sgra la chags pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur zhing /_tshul khrims 'chal pa'i sgra la khong khro ba'i 'du shes su 'gyur na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi slob bo/_/bzod 
[\[289a.2\]]pa'i sgra la legs pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur zhing /_gnod sems kyi sgra la khong khro ba'i 'du shes su 'gyur na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi slob bo/_/brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i sgra la legs pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur zhing /_le lo'i sgra la khong khro ba'i 'du shes su 'gyur na/_
[\[289a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi slob bo/_/bsam gtan gyi sgra la legs pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur zhing /_'khrug pa'i sgra la khong khro ba'i 'du shes su 'gyur na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi slob bo/_/shes rab kyi sgra la legs pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur zhing /_shes rab 'chal 
[\[289a.4\]]pa'i sgra la khong khro ba'i 'du shes su 'gyur na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi slob bo/_/nye ba'i sgra la chags shing /_ring ba'i sgra la khong khro na/_sgra dang skad la 'jug pa'i rig pa la mi slob bo/_/'khor ba'i sgra la kha na ma tho ba'i 'du shes su 'gyur zhing /_mya ngan las 'das 
[\[289a.5\]]pa'i sgra la legs pa'i 'du shes su 'gyur na/_sgra dang skad la 'jug pa'i rig pa la mi slob bo/_/tshu rol gyi sgra la khong khro zhing pha rol gyi sgra la chags na/_sgra dang skad la 'jug pa'i rig pa la mi slob bo/_/grong gi sgra la kha na ma tho bar 'du shes par gyur cing /_dgon pa'i sgra la 
[\[289a.6\]]chags par gyur na/_sgra dang skad la 'jug pa'i rig pa la mi slob bo/_/gcig pur spyod pa'i sgra la chags shing /_'du 'dzir spyod pa'i sgra la khong khro na/_sgra dang skad la 'jug pa'i rig pa la mi slob bo/_/dge slong gi spyod pa la chags shing /_khyim pa'i spyod pa la khong khro na/_sgra 
[\[289a.7\]]dang skad la 'jug pa'i rig pa la mi slob bo/_/spyod lam gyi bya ba la chags shing /_spyod lam ma yin pa'i bya ba la khong khro na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi slob bo/_/tshul du shis pa la chags shing /_tshul du mi shis pa la khong khro na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi slob bo/_/
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]tshul khrims kyi spyod pa la chags shing /_tshul khrims 'chal pa'i spyod pa la khong khro na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi slob bo/_/ma 'dres pa'i spyod pa la chags shing /_'dres pa'i spyod pa la khong khro na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi slob bo/_/'dod chags dang bral 
[\[289b.2\]]ba'i spyod pa la chags shing /_'dod chags kyi spyod pa la khong khro na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi slob bo/_/zhe sdang med pa'i 'du shes la chags shing /_zhe sdang gi 'du shes la khong khro na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi slob bo/_/gti mug dang bral ba'i 'du shes la chags 
[\[289b.3\]]shing /_gti mug gi 'du shes la khong khro na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi slob bo/_/stong pa nyid la chags shing /_dmigs pa la khong khro na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi slob bo/_/mtshan ma med pa la chags shing /_mtshan ma la khong khro na/_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[289b.4\]]chos rnams la mi slob bo/_/smon pa med pa la chags shing /_smon pa la khong khro na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi slob bo/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la chags shing /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa la khong khro na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi slob bo/_/
[\[289b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' la ltung bas rgol na/_byang chub las ring du 'gyur te/_las kyi sgrib pa yongs su 'dzin to/_/spyod pa la 'phya na byang chub las ring du 'gyur ro/_/spyod lam gyis rgol na byang chub las ring du 'gyur ro/_/gal te byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' la 
[\[289b.6\]]dma' ba'i 'du shes bskyed de/_bdag la che ba'i 'du shes bskyed na/_bdag la rma 'byung ste/_las kyi sgrib pa yang yongs su 'dzin to/_/'di la byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' la gdams shing rjes su bstan na ston pa'i 'du shes nye bar bzhag ste/_gdams shing 
[\[289b.7\]]rjes su bstan par bya'o/_/gal te des byang chub yongs su btang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas pa'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o/_/lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ni ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' gnyis pa la brten te/_'chad par 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]'gyur ba de ltar gang gis kyang yongs su 'chad par mi 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su bsrung bar 'dod cing /_las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su sbyong bar 'dod pa dang /_chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa 
[\[290a.2\]]myur du thob par 'dod pas nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa thams cad la phyag bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal te 
[\[290a.3\]]'dod chags kyi sgra dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sgra de ni mtshungs pa'o/_/zhe sdang gi sgra dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sgra de ni mtshungs pa'o/_/gti mug gi sgra dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sgra de ni mtshungs pa'o/_/mu stegs can gyi sgra dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sgra de ni mtshungs pa'o/_/'dod pa chung ba'i sgra dang /_
[\[290a.4\]]'dod pa che ba'i sgra de ni mtshungs pa'o/_/chog shes pa'i sgra dang /_chog mi shes pa'i sgra de ni mtshungs pa'o/_/sdom pa'i sgra dang /_mi sdom pa'i sgra de ni mtshungs pa'o/_/gcig pur dga' ba'i sgra dang /_'du 'dzi'i sgra de ni mtshungs pa'o/_/tshu rol gyi sgra dang /_pha rol gyi sgra de ni mtshungs 
[\[290a.5\]]pa'o/_/ring ba'i sgra dang /_nye ba'i sgra de ni mtshungs pa'o/_/'khor ba'i sgra dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgra de ni mtshungs pa'o/_/grong gi sgra dang /_dgon pa'i sgra de ni mtshungs pa'o/_/sbyin pa'i sgra dang /_ser sna'i sgra de ni mtshungs pa'o/_/tshul khrims kyi sgra dang /_tshul khrims 
[\[290a.6\]]'chal pa'i sgra de ni mtshungs pa'o/_/bzod pa'i sgra dang /_gnod sems kyi sgra de ni mtshungs pa'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi sgra dang /_le lo'i sgra de ni mtshungs pa'o/_/bsam gtan gyi sgra dang /_'khrug pa'i sgra de ni mtshungs pa'o/_/shes rab kyi sgra dang /_shes rab 'chal pa'i sgra de ni mtshungs 
[\[290a.7\]]pa'o/_/de nas lha'i bu pad mo rnam par rol ba'i mngon par shes pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal ci'i phyir na de dag mtshungs zhes bya/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu 'dod chags kyi sgra la khyod ji ltar sems/_lha'i bus smras 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]pa/_brag ca dang 'dra bar shes so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu 'o na sangs rgyas kyi sgra khyod kyis ji ltar shes/_lha'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal de yang sgra brnyan gyi mnyam pa nyid las ma 'das pa'o/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar de dag ni 
[\[290b.2\]]mtshungs pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal khyod sngon las dang po ba'i sa la gnas shing 'di lta bu'i tshul khong du ma chud pa'i tshe/_las kyi sgrib pa ji lta bu dag mngon par 'du byas pa lung ston cig dang 
[\[290b.3\]]'jam dpal des ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_byang chub sems dpar dam 'cha' ba ji snyed cig 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang /_de lta bu'i las kyi sgrib pa thob pa dang /_rang rang srung bar 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[290b.4\]]to/_/ci sman bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar de lta bu'i sug las kyi sgrib pa'i nongs pa thos na/_yid mi bde bar yang 'gyur la su ga las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa thob tu lags kyang /_chos thams cad la sgrib pa 'thob par 'gyur lags pa snyam/_bcom ldan 'das sngon 'das pa'i dus na/_
[\[290b.5\]]bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa shin tu bgrang ba las 'das pa/_yangs pa/_tshad ma mchis pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i pha rol/_de'i yang pha rol de'i dus de'i tshe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i nga ro rnga sgra'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba/_rig pa 
[\[290b.6\]]dang rkang par ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_bla na med pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni dgung lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong du gyur to/_/
[\[290b.7\]]theg pa ni gsum gyis sems can rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar gyur to/_/'jig rten gyi khams de'i ming ni snang ba chen po can zhes bgyi ste/_'jig rten gyi khams de na zhugs shing ngam/_ldum bu gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyu las grub par gyur te/_zhugs shing de dag 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]las kyang 'di lta bu'i sgra 'byung ste/_gang 'di stong pa nyid kyi sgra dang /_mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i sgra dang /_smon pa ma mchis pa'i sgra dang /_skye ba ma mchis pa'i sgra dang /_dngos po ma mchis pa'i sgra dang /_mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i sgra dang /_rnam pa de lta bu'i sgra dag 
[\[291a.2\]]'byung ste sgra 'byung ba de dag gis sems can de dag mngon par rtogs pa 'thob par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de'i nyan thos kyi tshogs dang po ni dge slong bye ba dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i tshogs su gyur te/_thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_khur bor ba/_rang gi don rjes su 
[\[291a.3\]]thob pa/_srid par sbyor ba yongs su bas pa/_bka' yang dag pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag gi tshogs su gyur to/_/tshogs gnyis pa ni dge slong bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug gi tshogs su gyur to/_/tshogs gsum pa ni dge slong bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gsum gyi 
[\[291a.4\]]tshogs su gyur to/_/tshogs bzhi pa ni dge slong bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i tshogs su gyur te/_thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_khur bor ba/_rang gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid par sbyor ba yongs su su bas pa/_bka' yang dag pas sems shin tu rnam par 
[\[291a.5\]]grol ba sha stag gi tshogs su gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyang grangs de snyed du gyur te/_thams cad kyang mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa dang ldan pa tshul sna tshogs pa bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po bsnyen bkur ba/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[291a.6\]]bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por rnam par grags pa/_sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yang dag par sgrol ba/_sgo mtha' yas pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa/_ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa sha stag gi tshogs su gyur te/_de ma 
[\[291a.7\]]lags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las dang po pa dang /_theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/_de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan du gyur pa de dag ni tshig gis brjod par sla ba ma lags so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos ni dgung lo stong phrag drug cu'i bar du gnas par gyur te/_zhugs shing de dag las kyang sgra de dag de slan chad mi 'byung bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe dge slong byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba rab tu dga' ba'i dbang po zhes 
[\[291b.2\]]bgyi ba byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dga' ba'i dbang po de ni sngon spyod spyod pa ste/_spyod lam bcos mi 'tshal ba 'jig rten pa'i chos thams cad las slar log pa ma mchis pa ste/_sems can de dag kyang dbang po rno zhing phye ba tsam gyis 'tshal la zab mo la 
[\[291b.3\]]mos pa sha stag ste/_de ni sems can de dag la 'dod pa chung ba'i bsngags pa yang mi rjod/_chog shes pa dang /_sdom pa dang /_gcig pur dga' ba'i bsngags pa yang mi rjod/_'du 'dzi ma mchis pa'i bsngags pa yang mi rjod cing /_des sems can de dag la chos thams 
[\[291b.4\]]cad ni 'dod chags kyi ngo bo nyid do zhes bgyi bar bstan/_chos thams cad ni zhe sdang gi ngo bo nyid do zhes bgyi bar bstan/_chos thams cad ni gti mug gi ngo bo nyid do zhes bgyi bar bstan/_chos thams cad ni sgrib pa med pa'o zhes bgyi bar bstan te/_des thabs des spyod pa thams cad kyang mtshan nyid 
[\[291b.5\]]gcig pa'o zhes bgyi bar bstan nas/_sems can thabs de lta bus bstan pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' de'i spyod pa la mi dga' bar ma gyur te/_khong khro ba'i sems ma mchis pa de dag bzod pa'i sa thob par gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la yang mi phyed cing nges par gyur 
[\[291b.6\]]to/_/de'i tshe dge slong byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bgyi ba byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das chos smra ba rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bgyi ba de ni bsam gtan bzhi thob pa/_gzugs ma mchis pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob pa ste/_sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis 
[\[291b.7\]]kyang yang dag par blangs te gnas par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i blo gros kyis 'dul bar gyur pa de dag ni skyon 'dzin cing skyon rjod pa/_blo mi brtan pa sha stag tu gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i blo gros bsod nams la 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]spyod pa zhig gi tshe/_ma rig nas byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dga' ba'i dbang po'i bslang ba'i grong der mchis te/_des de na khyim bdag gi bu'i gnas shig mchis par mthong nas/_khyim bdag gi bu gang na ba der mchis nas phyin pa dang /_stan bting ba 
[\[292a.2\]]la mchis te/_khyim bdag gi bu de la 'dod pa chung ba'i bka' mchid brjod/_chog shes pa'i bka' mchid brjod/_sdom pa'i bka' mchid brjod/_'du 'dzi'i nongs pa brjod/_gcig pur dga' ba'i bsngags pa brjod/_'du 'dzi ma mchis pa'i bsngags pa brjod 
[\[292a.3\]]nas/_khyim bdag gi bu de'i mdun du byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dga' ba'i dbang po la mi snyan pa rjod pa dge slong des ni skye bo mang po log par bstan to/_/dge slong des ni skye bo mang po log par lta bar byas so/_/dge slong de ni 'du 'dzi'i nang na rnam par spyod pa ste/_'dod 
[\[292a.4\]]chags ni sgrib pa med do zhes ston to/_/zhe sdang ni sgrib pa med do zhes ston to/_/gti mug ni sgrib pa med do zhes ston to/_/chos thams cad ni sgrib pa med do zhes ston to zhes brjod pa dang /_khyim bdag gi bu de yang dbang po rno ba bzod pa thob pa zhig ste/_des dge slong de la smras pa/_
[\[292a.5\]]btsun pa khyod kyis 'dod chags ji ltar mkhyen/_des smras pa/_khyim bdag gi bu 'dod chags ni kun nas nyon mongs par shes so/_/smras pa/_btsun pa 'o na 'dod chags de nang na mchis sam/_phyi rol na mchis/_smras pa/_'dod chags ni nang na yang med/_phyi rol na yang 
[\[292a.6\]]med do/_/smras pa/_btsun pa de ltar 'dod chags nang na yang ma mchis/_phyi rol na yang ma mchis shar phyogs na yang ma mchis/_lho phyogs na yang ma mchis/_nub phyogs na yang ma mchis/_byang phyogs na yang ma mchis/_steng na yang ma mchis/_'og na yang ma 
[\[292a.7\]]mchis/_phyogs mtshams rnams na yang ma mchis te/_de lta lags na de ni ma skyes pa lags te/_gang la ma skyes pa de la kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/_rnam par byang ba'ang ci zhig mchis/_de nas dge slong rgyal ba'i blo gros kyis bstan pa de thos nas 'khrugs te shin tu mi dga' 
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]nas/_bsod snyoms kyang ma blangs par stan las langs te mchis so/_/'di skad kyi tshig kyang rjod de/_kye ma dge slong des ni/_skye bo mang po log par bstan to zhes kyang brjod nas de khyim de nas byung ste/_dgon pa logs su mchis so/_/de slad kyis gtsug lag khang du mchis 
[\[292b.2\]]nas dge slong lhag ma rnams la yang bsgo'o/_/dge 'dun gyi nang du yang dge slong de mthong nas/_'di skad du dge slong 'di ni skye bo mang po log par ston cing /_dge slong 'di ni skye bo mang po log par lta bar byed de/_'di ni 'dod chags sgrib pa med do zhes ston to/_/zhe sdang sgrib pa med do zhes 
[\[292b.3\]]ston to/_/gti mug sgrib pa med do zhes ston to/_/chos thams cad sgrib pa med do zhes ston to zhes bgyis so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dga' ba'i dbang po de 'di snyam du gyur te/_dge slong 'dis ni gdon mi za bar las kyi sgrib pa bsags par gyur gor ma chag na de la bdag gis 
[\[292b.4\]]zab mo'i gtam bya'o/_/des ni ma nus na'ang 'di'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bsgom pa'i rgyu tsam du'ang 'gyur ro snyam ste/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' rab tu dga' ba'i dbang pos/_dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad gcig tu 'dun par bgyis nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di 
[\[292b.5\]]dag smras so/_/'dod chags mya ngan 'das par gsungs/_/zhe sdang gti mug de bzhin te/_/byang chub de dag gnas nyid yin/_/sangs rgyas byang chub bsam mi khyab/_/'dod chags gang gis rnam brtags pa/_/zhe sdang gti mug de bzhin te/_/sangs rgyas byang chub de la ring /_/
[\[292b.6\]]gnam dang sa gnyis ci bzhin no/_/byang chub 'dod chags gnyis ni gnyis su med/_/'jug pa gcig pa mnyam nyid ldan pa ste/_/'di dag chos la byis pa gang 'jigs pa/_/de dag sangs rgyas byang chub ring ba yin/_/'dod chags skye min 'jig pa ma yin te/_/sems kyang kun 
[\[292b.7\]]nas nyon mongs 'gyur ba med/_/gang zhig dmigs pa'i bdag la blo chags pa/_/'dod chags ngan song de dag ltung bar byed/_/gang zhig 'dod chags chos kyang sangs rgyas chos/_/de dag khyad par gang yang med pa ste/_/yi ge gcig cing tshul gcig mtshan nyid med/_/de ltar 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]shes pa bde gshegs nyid du 'gyur/_/tshul khrims 'chal dang tshul khrims rnam brtags shing /_/gang zhig tshul khrims rlom pas myos gyur pa/_/dmigs pa'i lta la rab gnas de la ni/_/byang chub med cing sangs rgyas chos kyang med/_/gang zhig dgon pa'i gnas 
[\[293a.2\]]la rtog byed cing /_/bdag la stod byed gzhan la smod byed pa/_/dgon par lta la rab gnas de la ni/_/mtho ris med na byang chub ga la yod/_/byang chub lta ba gnyis su med gsungs te/_/ming dang yi ge grangs dang sgra 'jug pa/_/de dag gang gis yang dag rtogs gyur pa/_/de la 
[\[293a.3\]]sangs rgyas byang chub ring ba min/_/kun nas nyon mongs de la rnam rtog cing /_/rnam byang lta la byis pa gang chags pa/_/dmigs pa'i lta la rab gnas de la ni/_/byang chub med cing sangs rgyas chos kyang med/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas chos la 'dod skyed pa/_/de la sangs rgyas byang chub 
[\[293a.4\]]ring ba ste/_/yod min chos la 'dod pa skyed pas na/_/de ni sdug bsngal yongs su myong bar 'gyur/_/gang zhig 'dod chags zhe sdang mi rtog cing /_/gti mug chung bas byang chub yin lta ba/_/de la sangs rgyas byang chub ring ba min/_/bzod pa mchog kyang myur du des 'thob 'gyur/_/
[\[293a.5\]]'dus ma byas dang 'dus byas sus mthong ba/_/de ni 'khor ba'i chos las gzhar mi 'grol/_/gang gis khams de mnyam pa nyid rtogs pa/_/de myur skyes bu sangs rgyas mchog tu 'gyur/_/gang gis sangs rgyas chos dang sangs rgyas dag_/thams cad kun tu nam yang ma mthong na/_/chos 
[\[293a.6\]]rnams kun gyis gos pa med pa de/_/bdud bcom byang chub mngon par 'tshang yang rgya/_/su zhig sems can rnam par 'grel 'dod pa/_/des ni sems can khams su blta mi bya/_/ma lus sems can mya ngan 'das dang 'dra/_/de ltar sus shes de ni rang byung 'gyur/_/dgon pa'i chos 
[\[293a.7\]]la gang zhig mi snang zhing /_/grong du phyin na spyod lam 'chos byed pa/_/de ni 'jig rten lhar bcas rkun po ste/_/de la byang chub sangs rgyas chos rnams med/_/bdag ni sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes gang rlom pa/_/byis pa de ni gti mug dbang gis non/_/sangs rgyas chos ni nam mkha' 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]mtshungs pa ste/_/blang dang dor ba'i sgra ni de la med/_/rgyal bas nam yang byang chub sangs ma rgyas/_/des ni nam yang sems can bkrol ba med/_/med pa'i chos rnams brtags shing byis pa rnams/_/sangs rgyas byang chub las ni ring ba yin/_/sems can 'di dag nyon mongs 
[\[293b.2\]]sus mthong ba/_/de la nyon mongs mtha' yas 'byung bar 'gyur/_/sems can de dag sems can med ces gsungs/_/sems can 'du shes gnas la byang chub med/_/gang gis sems can shin tu grol mthong zhing /_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rtag med la/_/sems 
[\[293b.3\]]can zhi zhing rab zhi rnam zhi bar/_/gang gis shes pa de ni mgon por 'gyur/_/gang gis sems can sems can med ma mthong /_/yang dag nyid du sangs rgyas chos ma dmigs/_/ji ltar sems can de bzhin sangs rgyas shes/_/de ltar sus shes de ni mgon por 'gyur/_/nyon 
[\[293b.4\]]mongs rtog na nyon mongs yod par 'gyur/_/tshul bzhin lam sems de bzhin nyon mongs yod/_/nyon mongs lam du nam yang ma brtags na/_/des ni byang chub mi rtog sa 'thob bo/_/stong pa'i chos kyis mi mkhas gang 'jigs pa/_/de dag sangs rgyas chos las ring ba yin/_/
[\[293b.5\]]stong nyid chos la the tsom su med pa/_/de dag sangs rgyas byang chub 'thob par 'gyur/_/byang chub mchog thob par ni su 'dod pa/_/des ni 'dod chags chos la brtag mi bya/_/'dod chags chos kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa/_/de dag sangs rgyas yon tan bsam mi khyab/_/gang zhig 
[\[293b.6\]]sangs rgyas chos la mi 'jug cing /_/sems dang byang chub skye ba med pa dang /_/sems dang sangs rgyas byang chub gnyis med par/_/shes par gyur na de ni mgon por 'gyur/_/sdig sems mu stegs can gyis gang brjod dang /_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsung gang bka' stsal pa/_/
[\[293b.7\]]de dag tha dad tshul gyur med pa ste/_/de ltar shes na de ni mgon por 'gyur/_/gang gis byang chub mthong zhing smon byed pa/_/de dang byang chub ring ste byang chub med/_/sangs rgyas sangs rgyas min pa mi mnyam zhe'am/_/sangs rgyas 'di zhes mi rtog mgon por 'gyur/_/gang 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]zhig bdag ni sems can 'grel pa zhes/_/rlom na sems can 'du shes chags rmongs pas/_/dmigs pa'i lta la rab gnas de la ni/_/byang chub med cing sangs rgyas chos kyang med/_/'dod chags nang dang phyi na mi gnas te/_/phyogs dang phyogs mtshams gang 
[\[294a.2\]]na'ang yod pa min/_/chos rnams yod min rnam par brtag byas shing /_/byis pa 'dod chags 'du shes de ltar rmongs/_/sgyu ma smig rgyu brag ca lta bu ste/_/mo gsham bu dang rmi lam 'dra ba ni/_/nyon mongs 'di dag thams cad dmigs su med/_/byis pa de ltar mi shes rnam par rmongs/_/
[\[294a.3\]]'dus byas chos dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos/_/de dag tha dad gnyis su nam yang med/_/gang la grangs dang bgrang du med pa dang /_/de yi tshul gyis gnyis su med par 'jug_/byis pa gang zhig byang chub sems rlom zhing /_/sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes rlom sems byed gyur na/_/chos kyi dngos 
[\[294a.4\]]nyid phyag rgya 'di bor bas/_/de la sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub med/_/smra la gang dga' yongs rtog spyod yul can/_/smra ba'i don la rnam par mi sems shing /_/ming dang legs la de bzhin chags gyur pa/_/de dag byang chub 'gyur ba the tsom yod/_/lta ba'i rnam pa byang chub gnyis 
[\[294a.5\]]med gsungs/_/ming dang yi ge grangs dang skad 'jug pa/_/mi mkhas gang gis chos 'di ma rtogs pa/_/de dag sangs rgyas byang chub ring bar gnas/_/ming la chags shing smra la dga' ba dang /_/bdag tu lta la gang zhig gnas gyur cing /_/'dod pa chung dang chog shes rnam brtags 
[\[294a.6\]]pas/_/'dod pa'i dbang gis da dung de 'dug go/_/'dod chags chos las shed skyes gang 'bros pa/_/de ni 'dod chags chos las gzhar mi 'grol/_/gang gis yang dag 'dod chags chos shes na/_/'dod chags bral ba'i 'dod chags chos shes 'gyur/_/yun ring dus su 
[\[294a.7\]]tshul khrims bsrung byas shing /_/bskal pa bye bar bsam gtan bskyed byas kyang /_/yang dag nyid mtha' 'di ni ma rtogs na/_/bstan pa 'di la de dag blo yod min/_/ci yang ma yin chos 'di sus shes pa/_/nam yang de ni chos kun chags mi 'gyur/_/tshul khrims 'chal dang 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]tshul khrims rnam brtags pas/_/byis pa dmigs pa'i spyod yul thar mi 'gyur/_/tshul khrims tshul khrims med par sus shes shing /_/tshul khrims 'chal dang tshul khrims tshul gcig ces/_/tshul khrims ngang tshul de ltar sus shes pa/_/tshul khrims 'chal pa de la nam 
[\[294b.2\]]yang med/_/chos rgyal chos la rtog par ma gyur na/_/thabs kyi sa la sems can rnam 'dul zhing /_/byang chub zag med zhi ba 'di la yang /_/tshul gcig chos kyis sems can 'dzud pa yin/_/chos rgyal dam pa'i chos 'di mi g.yo zhing /_/dngos med mtshan nyid med la tshul gcig 
[\[294b.3\]]par/_/ngo bo nyid kyis stong chos ma thos pas/_/g.yang sa chen por byis pa de dag ltung /_/chos 'di thos shing mi dngang gang gyur pa'i/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga chags khyim pa'ang bla'i/_/bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung gyur cing /_/dmigs sta sbyangs pa'i yon tan rlom pa min/_/
[\[294b.4\]]phyogs bcu kun na sangs rgyas rang byung ba/_/'jig rten don mdzad gang dag bzhugs pa rnams/_/de dag kun gyis nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i chos/_/g.yo ba med shes byang chub 'gyur zhes gsungs/_/mi mkhas gang rnams mi sdug bsgom sems shing /_/chos rab 'di thos 'jigs 
[\[294b.5\]]par 'gyur ba dag_/rtag par sdug bsngal che dang ldan gyur cing /_/bskal pa bye ba mang por sdug bsngal 'gyur/_/tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/_lha'i bu stong phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/_/dge slong stong phrag brgyad cu nye bar len pa med 
[\[294b.6\]]par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i blo gros kyang 'chi ba'i dus bgyis nas dog sa'i sgo phye ste/_sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung ngo /_/de sug las kyi sgrib pa des bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong du sems can dmyal ba chen po dag tu 
[\[294b.7\]]sdug bsngal tsha zhing rtsub la yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba mi bzad pa myong bar gyur to/_/tshe rabs brgya stong phrag bdun cu rtsa bzhir mi snyan par brjod pa thob par gyur to/_/bskal pa brgya stong mang por de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan tsam yang ma thos par gyur to/_/de de nas slad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]gzhan dang gzhan dag dang mjal te/_de dag gi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas mngon par mos par ma gyur te/_tshe rabs stong phrag bdun cu rtsa drug rab tu byung ba las slar babs par gyur to/_/sug las kyi sgrib pa de nyid kyi lhag mas tshe rabs stong phrag mang por dbang po 
[\[295a.2\]]rtul por gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' dge slong chos smra ba rab tu dga' ba'i dbang po zhes bgyi ba byung ba de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_da ltar bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes chos kyang ston to/_/shar 
[\[295a.3\]]phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya stong 'das pa na/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin chen sna tshogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzi brjid stug cing dri ma med la nyi zla zil gyis gnon pa bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhes 
[\[295a.4\]]chos kyang ston te/_bcom ldan 'das dge slong rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bgyi bar gang gyur pa de ni bdag nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/_dge slong rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bgyi bar gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi de'i tshe tshul 'di ma 'tshal bas de lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur to/_/bcom 
[\[295a.5\]]ldan 'das bdag ni de 'dra ba'i gnas su gyur te/_de lta bu'i sdug bsngal ma mchis pa'i sdug bsngal yongs su brtags pa'i sdug bsngal/_phyin ci log gi sdug bsngal rnam pa de lta bu myong bar gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la zhugs pa'am/_
[\[295a.6\]]nyan thos kyi theg pa la zhugs pa gang yang rung ste/_de lta bu'i sug las kyi sgrib pa mi 'tshal zhing /_de lta bu'i sdug bsngal mi 'tshal na des dam pa'i chos spang bar mi bgyi'o/_/dam pa'i chos la dpya bar mi bgyi'o/_/chos gang la yang khong khro bar mi bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[295a.7\]]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal tshigs su bcad pa de thos pas khyod la khyad par ci zhig tu gyur/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das tshigs su bcad pa de thos las kyi sgrib pa de las langs nas gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang de dag tu yang 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]zab mo'i bzod pa can/_nges pa'i bzod pa can du gyur te/_chos zab mo ston pa la mkhas par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal su'i mthus khyod kyis de ltar yun ring po na mngon par 'du byas pa'i las kyi sgrib pa rjes su dran/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[295b.2\]]ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ci sems ci smra/_rjes su ci dran yang de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa las byung ba ni chos thams cad do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de 
[\[295b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu thob pa dang /_'di thos pa de ni mtshungs so/_/mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa dang /_'di thos pa de ni mtshungs so/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa ni 
[\[295b.4\]]bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de de bzhin te/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/'on kyang sbyor ba med pa la la de thos nas mos par mi 'gyur du 'ong ba'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa lung mi ston to/_/de nas bcom 
[\[295b.5\]]ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la ci nas kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyas par 'gyur zhing skye bo mang po'i sug par phyin par 'gyur ba dang /_de la 
[\[295b.6\]]bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha dag gis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis brlab tu gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir g.yas g.yon du gzigs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar gzigs ma thag tu de'i tshe phyogs bcur sangs 
[\[295b.7\]]rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur/_rab tu g.yos par gyur/_kun tu g.yos par gyur to/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab pa mdzad de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag gis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe phyogs bcu na gang gA'i klung gi bye ma ji snyed yod la de bas kyang shin tu mang ba'i sems can rnams kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa 
[\[296a.2\]]thob par gyur to/_/gang dag nyan thos nyid la gnas par gyur pa dang /_slob pa'i sa'am/_mi slob pa'i sa la gnas par gyur ba dag ni smos kyang mi smos so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i 
[\[296a.3\]]ming ci zhes bgyi/_ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dga' bo de bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chos thams cad 'byung ba med pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_
[\[296a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /_lha'i bu pad mo rnam par rol ba'i mngon par shes pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po de dang /_dge slong lnga brgya tsam po de dag dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin 
[\[296a.5\]]dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par dga'o//_//'phags pa chos thams cad 'byung ba med pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//lo ts+tsha ba ban de rin chen 'tshos 
[\[296a.6\]]bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
